60a6(dkon brtsegs): gis chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong du ma bstan te/ sems can de dag gi ma rig pa'i las kyi 'du byed bsal nas rnam par grol ba 'thob par byed do/ /glog thob/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sman
60a7(dkon brtsegs): pa bzang po nad mang po gso ba la mkhas pa/ sngar sman dpyad rnams la shin tu goms par gyur pa ni/ nad kyi mtshan ma mthong ma thag tu sngags dang / sman btang ba thams cad
60b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtogs par gyur pas/ des gsos pa gang yang mi sos pa med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings shin tu legs par rtogs pas rtsol ba med pa'i
60b2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyis gti mug gi spyod pa bsags pa'i sems can de dag gi dbang po dang / rang bzhin ji ltar bzhin du chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong du ma bstan nas thams cad rab tu gsal bar rtogs par
60b3(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ glog thob/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gti mug spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gi gter 'di thob par gyur na/ rten cing
60b4(dkon brtsegs): 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu legs par so sor brtags nas/ gti mug spyod pa'i sems can de dag gi ched du bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par de dag gi rang bzhin dang / 'dun
60b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshig 'bru dang / yi ge dang / brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang / gti mug spyod pa'i mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ byang
60b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang / spobs pa yang gtugs par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas
60b7(dkon brtsegs): thob pa'i gti mug spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o/ /'di ltar gti mug gi spyod pa nyi khri chig stong dang / spyod pa gzhan gtogs par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag/ byang chub sems dpas
61a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spang ba'i phyir chos kyi sgo mo brgyad stong du ma rab tu phye nas yang dag par ston pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i gti mug spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o//
61a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang / glog thob/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa'i gter zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me long gi dkyil 'khor
61a3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dag cing yongs su gsal ba/ dri ma med pa lam gyi bzhi mdor bzhag na gzugs brnyan rnams der snang zhing / 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med kyang me long gi dkyil 'khor de bdag gis
61a4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'di dag ston par byed do zhes mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang me long gi dkyil 'khor de shin tu byi dor legs par byas nas/ gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa
61a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rang gi ngang gis rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings kyi me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu legs par byi dor byas pa rtsol ba med
61a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi sgo mo brgyad stong du ma rnam par phye ste bstan nas/ de dag thams cad rab tu rtogs
61a7(dkon brtsegs): shing rnam par grol ba thob par byas kyang / chos kyi mtshan ma dang / sems can gyi mtshan ma skyed par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' des chos kyi dbyings kyi
61b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid shin tu legs par rtogs pa'i phyir dang / spyod pa bzhi po 'di dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pas de dag gi
61b2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang / rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par byed kyang / chos kyi dbyings dang / sems can gyi khams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtogs par byed pas/ gnyis su 'gyur ba'i
61b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid kyang med de/ chos kyi dbyings dang / sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag gnyis su med cing tha dad pa med par gsal bar mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /glog thob/ 'di lta ste/ dper na /
61b4(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' la ni tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma yang med la/ rnam par gzhag pa yang med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings shin tu legs par so sor
61b5(dkon brtsegs): brtags nas chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu 'jug par rtogs pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed kyang /
61b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings la ni tha dad du gyur pa med do/ /glog thob/ cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa 'di la nyi khri chig stong yod pa dang / spyod pa gzhan gtogs par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag kyang / /
61b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas so sor brtags nas thams cad gsal bar rtogs par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sman pa mkhas pa nad dang / sman gtong ba rab tu shes pa bzhin du rtsol
62a1(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa'i ye shes kyis chos rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi cha mnyam pa spyod pa'i
62a2(dkon brtsegs): gter zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na/ sems can rnams kyi ched du bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par de dag mos pa ji lta ba bzhin
62a3(dkon brtsegs): du brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang / spyod pa de dag gi mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang / /spobs
62a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang gtugs par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa'i gter
62a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ / //bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/ gzhan yang / glog thob/ byang chub sems dpa' des de lta bu'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas/ sems
62a6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi dbang po dang / spyod pa dang / bsam pa yang thabs mkhas pas rab tu rtogs pas/ gal te 'dod chags mang ba'i sems can mthong bar gyur na/ de dag rab tu
62a7(dkon brtsegs): gdul zhing / de dag gi nad gso ba'i phyir so so'i skye bo dang mthun par 'dod pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / khyim gyi so tshigs phun sum tshogs pa ston
62b1(dkon brtsegs): par byed kyang / pad+ma bzhin du des gos shing mngon par zhen par gyur pa med do/ /sems can gang gti mug cing blo dang mi ldan pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa mi shes
62b2(dkon brtsegs): pas| 'di snyam du blo dang ldan pa su zhig / so so'i skye bo dang tha mi dad par 'dod pa rnams nyams su len par byed ces byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di ni byang chub spangs pa yin no snyam du
62b3(dkon brtsegs): sems par byed de/ sems can de lta bu de dag ni sems yongs su mi gtsang ba'i phyir/ zhe sdang chen po skyes nas gus par mi 'gyur bas/ las de'i dbang gis lus zhig ste/ shi ba'i 'og tu
62b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung bar gyur na yang / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' shin tu gsang bas gdul ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis kha na ma tho ba'i rnam pa yongs su zad nas/ gdon mi za
62b5(dkon brtsegs): bar mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa la rab tu 'god par byed do/ /glog thob/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me rab tu 'bar ba ni rtswa dang shing dang phrad par gyur pa na/ thams cad rab tu 'bar zhing me'i
62b6(dkon brtsegs): phung po nyid du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ye shes kyi me 'bar bar gyur pa na/ sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
62b7(dkon brtsegs): dang | dge ba dang / mi dge ba ji snyed pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig 'grogs shing thams cad rab tu 'bar nas/ shes rab nyid du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di ni
63a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ 'di lta ste/ rin po
63a2(dkon brtsegs): che sna bzhi las mngon par grub pa yin pas/ sems can rnams kyang de'i rjes su kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid du
63a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bar byed de/ gal te bai DUR+Ya'i ngos su phyin na ni/ thams cad kyang bai DUR+Ya'i kha dog gcig pa nyid du 'gyur bar byed do/ /gser gyi kha dog gi ngos su phyin na ni/ thams
63a4(dkon brtsegs): cad gser gyi kha dog nyid du 'gyur bar byed do/ /dngul dang / chu shel gyi kha dog tu gyur pa yang de bzhin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ma 'dres pa'i chos thob
63a5(dkon brtsegs): pas sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba ji snyed pa de dag byang chub sems dpa'i thad du phyin cing lhan cig 'grogs
63a6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/ thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes la 'jug pa nyid du 'gyur bar byed kyang de'i sems mi gtsang zhing / rang gi sdig pa'i las kyi dbang gis sems
63a7(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du lhung bar gyur pas/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i yon tan dang / smon lam
63b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi stobs kyis kha na ma tho ba'i rnam par smin pa zad pa'i 'og tu gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur pa la 'god par byed do/ /glog thob/ sngon byung ba
63b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med/ dpag tu med/ grangs med pa na snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan
63b3(dkon brtsegs): pa| bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i phung po yon tan gyi sgra
63b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i tshe skye dgu rnams tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub par gyur te/ da ltar nga ji lta ba bzhin no/ /de'i tshe sems can rnams 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug shin tu che
63b5(dkon brtsegs): ste| nyon mongs pa rnams kyis zil gyis non pas pha ma dang / phu nu dang / grogs po'i yid dang 'gal bar byed pa/ mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi rjes su mi 'brang ba/ byas pa drin du mi gzo
63b6(dkon brtsegs): ba| rtag bar gnod sems dang bcas pa/ g.yo sgyu dang / rku ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ phan tshun gcig la gcig gnod par byed pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas dang /
63b7(dkon brtsegs): chos dang / dge 'dun la gus pa med pa/ ser snas zil gyis non pas yi dwags kyi chos spyod pa'i sems can de lta bu sha stag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas par gyur pas na/ shin tu
64a1(dkon brtsegs): gdul dka' bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de yang sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus dus ngan pa de'i tshe/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
64a2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la nyan thos chen po'i tshogs ni nyi khri nyis stong mnga' bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rgya cher byin pa zhes bya ba 'dzam
64a3(dkon brtsegs): bu'i gling la dbang ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la sems shin tu dang bar gyur pa zhig yod pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
64a4(dkon brtsegs): par dbyar zla ba gsum spyan drangs te/ mchod pa rgya cher bshams nas/ mchod cing rim gro byas so/ /de'i tshe dge slong dri ma med pa zhes bya ba spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa/ chos ston
64a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i thabs la mkhas pas 'khor mang po rnams nyan par spro ba/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la rtag par ngal ba med pa/ re ba med par chos ston pa/ mdog gsal zhing
64a6(dkon brtsegs): gsong por smra ba/ gzugs dang stobs phun sum tshogs pa/ byad bzhin sdug cing mdzes pa/ sems can rnams kyis mthong bar mos shing / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar
64a7(dkon brtsegs): byed cing bsngags pa brjod pa zhig yod de/ dge slong gsar bu dag kyang rtag par dri ma med pa'i rjes su 'brang zhing / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'byung zhing 'jug pa dag la thogs pa med
64b1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pas/ gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kyang rim gro byas par gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'khor mang po de las dge slong phal
64b2(dkon brtsegs): cher lus kyi sdom pa dang / sems kyi shes rab bsgom pa mi shes pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la gus pa med pa/ rtag par lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / bdag tu lta ba
64b3(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la skur ba 'debs pa/ rnam par g.yeng zhing gdul dka' ba/ dbang po rnams mi sdom pa/ chos bzhin ma yin pa la gnas pa/ dge sbyong gi
64b4(dkon brtsegs): tshul med par bdag nyid dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las thams cad log par bzhugs pa sha stag gnas par gyur to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de dbyar
64b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / rgyal po rgya cher byin pas tsan dan dmar pos sku zhugs la bzhen nas mchod pa byas te/ ring bsrel gyi mchod rten ngos bzhi kun tu tsan dan
64b6(dkon brtsegs): dmar po'i mu khyud kyis bskor ba/ pad+ma gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa/ bye ba phrag brgyad cu brtsigs so/ /de'i tshe dge slong dri ma med pa ni bcom ldan 'das des mang du thos pa'i mchog tu
64b7(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos rgya cher spel te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal gang dang gang du song ba der sems
65a1(dkon brtsegs): can brgya stong tshad med pa snyed yongs su btul nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod par gyur to/ /de'i tshe dge slong sdig can mang po
65a2(dkon brtsegs): rnal 'byor khong du ma chud pa/ rtag par phrag dog dang bcas pa/ bdud kyis bslus pa rnams rgyal po de ga la ba der dong ste/ 'di skad du rgyal pos bkur ba'i dge slong dri ma med pa ni
65a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i pho brang du 'byung zhing 'jug pa la thags thogs ma mchis te/ dge slong ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma lags la/ dus ma lags par yang zas 'tshal te/ spos dang phreng
65a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dag gis kyang lus brgyan par bgyis pas/ yang dag par tshangs par spyod pa ma lags pas mchod pa mdzad pa mi rigs so/ /bdag cag ni don 'di'i slad du 'dir mchis nas
65a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po la gsol ba lags kyi/ slad kyis 'gyod par yang ma mdzad cig/ sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pa'i bstan pa la thugs mi ches pa yang mi bskyed du gsol zhes smras so/ /de'i
65a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe bdud sdig can zhes bya ba zhig kyang bdag nyid dge slong gi gzugs su bsgyur nas/ rgyal po de ga la ba der song ste/ snga ma bzhin du smras so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po rgya cher byin pas
65a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dang yang du de skad smras pa thos kyang 'di snyam du dge slong dri ma med pa ni rab tu brtson zhing blo dang ldan pas bdag gis bla mar bkur ba yin te/ dngos po 'di lta bu byed pa ni
65b1(dkon brtsegs): ga nas med do snyam mo/ /de nas de'i tshe bdud kyi 'khor rnams par snang las lus phyed bstan nas/ rgyal po de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rgyal po bzo yi sgyu rtsal slobs/ /dus tshod dag la
65b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas par gyis/ /rgyal pos de ni ma shes na/ /mi rgyal rtags dang ldan ma yin/ /sangs rgyas nyan thos dgra bcom pa/ /ye shes chen po ldan pa yin/ /tshig dag la ni mi rten par/ /ci yi phyir
65b3(dkon brtsegs): na chad par lta/ /dge slong rnams ni phan gdags phyir/ /khyod la bden tshigs smras pa yin/ /chad smra ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i mi/ /yang dag tshangs spyod ma yin pas/ /de ni rgyal po'i pho brang du/ /btsun
65b4(dkon brtsegs): mo dag dang lhan cig rtse/ /rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yis/ /legs par rtogs la the tshom sol/ /rgyal pos dngos po 'di thos pas/ /sems la skrag cing mya ngan skyes/ /'khor rnams
65b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ni lhan cig tu/ /myur zhing rings par pho brang dong / /de tshe dri med pho brang nang / /chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa dang / /bdag dang sems can med pa yi/ /dam pa'i don ni ston par byed/ /
65b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dmag 'khor bcas pa rnams/ /thams cad bdud kyis bslus pas na/ /pho brang nang gi btsun mo rnams/ /dge slong yongs bskor mthong ba dang / /zhe sdang glang chen myos 'dra bas/ /
65b7(dkon brtsegs): gshed ma dag la rab bsgo ba/ /dge slong nga yi btsun mo bslus/ /sdug bsngal chos kyi chad pas chod/ /blon po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /thams cad bdud kyis zin pas na/ /dge slong
66a1(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa med pa la/ /sems kyis gnod ba bya bar bsams/ /gshed ma mtshon thogs 'ongs pa dang / /dri med snying brtse mchi ma byung / /rgyal pos khyod ni chos
66a2(dkon brtsegs): min na/ /ci yi phyir na mchi ma byung / /dri med rgyal po la smras pa/ /dngos po 'di ni yid ches dka'/ /re zhig skad cig sdod cig dang / /bdag ni bsad pa'i long yod do/ /rgyal pos
66a3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong tshig thos na/ /gshed ma dag la sdod cig bsgo/ /bden pa'i dngos po ci zhig yod/ /khyod kyis myur du smra ba'i rigs/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa ldan 'gyur zhing / /snying rjes 'jig
66a4(dkon brtsegs): rten phan 'dogs pas/ /sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar te/ /bden pa'i tshig ni 'di skad smras/ /rgyal po chen po mkhyen par mdzod/ /gal te yang dag nyes med na/ /sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ /
66a5(dkon brtsegs): mkha' la me tog char phob cig/ de skad tshig 'di smras ma thag / sa chen rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ /mkha' la lha yi me tog babs/ /bdud 'khor mya ngan skyes par gyur/ /de tshe rgyal po dang ba
66a6(dkon brtsegs): skyes| |rkang la phyag byas bzod par gsol/ /bdag ni dmyal bar lhung 'gyur na/ /mgon med bdag la skyabs mdzod cig /kyi hud sdig pa'i grogs phrad pas/ /gdug pa'i sems ni
66a7(dkon brtsegs): skyes par gyur/ /sdig pa'i grogs po'i rjes 'brang nas/ /mgon dang skyabs byed su yang med/ /ston pa chen po ma gtogs par/ /phyogs bcur bdag gi mgon byed med/ /bdag gis
66b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal srid spangs nas ni/ /nam 'tsho'i bar du skyabs su mchi/ /dge slong des ni rgyal po dang / /g.yog 'khor bsam pa rig gyur nas/ /dam pa'i don ni rab tu bshad/ /rgyal pos thos nas
66b2(dkon brtsegs): dad pa thob/ /'khor ni bye ba brgya stong dag /rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung / /sbyangs pa'i sdom pa blangs pas na/ /gzhan gyis mgron gnyer yong mi len/ /de tshe rgyal po'i pho brang nang / /
66b3(dkon brtsegs): btsun mo 'khor bcas brgyad khri rnams/ /dam pa'i don ni thos pas na/ /phyir mi ldog la gnas par gyur/ /rgyal pos sangs rgyas gsungs pa bzhin/ /lo ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bar/ /nyin
66b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan rtag par sdig bshags kyang / /'on kyang sdig pa'i las ma zad/ /lo ni bye mang sdug bsngal myong / /sdig zad de bzhin gshegs dang phrad/ /sngon ni skrag par byas pa'i rgyus/ /rnam smin
66b5(dkon brtsegs): lhag ma rtag par smin/ /mthar gyis rnal 'byor rab bsgoms te/ /sangs rgyas bye ba stong mchod nas/ /so sor zhing khams gzhan dag tu/ /thams cad mngon par rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /
66b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kun dang mtshan mthun par/ /yon tan grags pa zhes byar gyur/ /de tshe rgyal po rgya cher byin/ /dge slong byams bzod de la ni/ /gdug pa'i sems ni bskyod pas na/ /lo ni
66b7(dkon brtsegs): bye ba mang por yang / /sngon gyi sdig las mngon gyur pas/ /du 'od chen por ltung bar 'gyur/ /rnam smin de ni zad nas kyang / /slar yang mi lus thob gyur te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
67a1(dkon brtsegs): kun spyan phrad/ /rtag tu bsnyen bkur rim gro byas/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag/ brgyad cu dag la rim gro byas/ /de yi 'og tu sangs rgyas pa/ /de ni nga bdag nyid
67a2(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /chos smra nyes pa med pa la/ /gnod pa byas pa'i dge slong ni/ /ma 'ongs mngon par 'tshang rgyab/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa yin/ /de tshe rgyal po'i pho brang nang / /btsun mo'i
67a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ni brgyad khri rnams/ /shin tu dang bas dge rtsa bskyed/ /sangs rgyas tshad med rim gro byas/ /de ltar spyod pa rab bskyed nas/ /sems can phan gdags smon lam gdab/ /sangs rgyas
67a4(dkon brtsegs): bye ba stong mchod nas/ /so sor mngon par 'tshang yang rgya/ /ngas deng khyod la bsgo ba ni/ /thams cad gnod sems ma bskyed cig /gang gis byams bsgoms sangs rgyas bsngags/ /myur
67a5(dkon brtsegs): du byang chub chen po thob/ /de lta bas na/ glog thob/ sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang / rang bzhin dang / bsam pa dag la mi mkhas pa dag gis dus thams cad du gnod sems
67a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par mi bya'o/ /glog thob/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri rnams kyi nang na ri rab mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na mchog
67a7(dkon brtsegs): dang | gtso bo dang / bla na med par gyur pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu bo thams cad kyi nang na rgya mtsho mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye
67b1(dkon brtsegs): shes rnams kyi nang na mchog tu zab cing rgya che bar gyur ba yin no/ /gzhan yang / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal po rnams kyi nang na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mchog dang / gtso bo dang / bla
67b2(dkon brtsegs): mar gyur pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na gong na med par gyur pa yin no/ /glog thob/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i mkhyen pa dang ldan
67b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spyod pa'i sems dang / sems las byung ba 'jug cing 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin
67b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen cing / se gol gtogs pa gcig la thams cad yongs su sdud mdzad do/ /glog thob/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
67b5(dkon brtsegs): pas| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu mig dang ldan pas rtsol ba la mi ltos par rang gi lag mthil na skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu gsal bar mthong zhing the tshom med pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin
67b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa ji snyed pa dag rab tu mkhyen pas 'khor mang po'i nang du chos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston par mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas
67b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na 'dod chags kyi spyod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdungs nas/ nyin mtshan du
68a1(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed cing / don med par dus las 'da' bar byed pa yang ngas rab tu mkhyen cing gzigs so/ /'dod chags kyis gdungs pas lus dang ngag gi las rnam pa
68a2(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs slong bar byed pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen cing gzigs so/ /zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can de dag zhe sdang gi zil gyis non pas gcig la gcig zhe sdang gis phrag dog byed pa dang /
68a3(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa byas pa'i phyir mnar med pa'i gnas su ltung bar 'gyur ba dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen cing gzigs so/ /gti mug spyod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can rnams ma rig
68a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mun nag gis bsgribs shing rmongs pas mngon par zhen pa dang / log par lta ba'i rjes su 'brang ba la mos par gyur ba dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen to/ /'os su gyur pa dang / 'os
68a5(dkon brtsegs): su mi 'gyur ba dang / 'phel zhing rtsol ba dang bcas pa dang / ldog cing nyams par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
68a6(dkon brtsegs): theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pas 'khor
68a7(dkon brtsegs): m ang po'i nang du zhugs nas sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag kyang rab tu mkhyen pas gal te dus la ma bab par rig par gyur na ni cang mi gsung zhing gtang snyoms su bzhag
68b1(dkon brtsegs): nas| sems can 'di dag ni chos la rmongs par gyur pas khong du chud par mi 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbang po dang stobs khyad par du 'phags pa phun sum
68b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs shing dus rab tu mkhyen pa'i phyir 'dul ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / bsam pa mchog tu gyur pa dang / bzod par nus pa'i 'os su gyur pa dang / tshig legs par nyan par gyur pa dag
68b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang rab tu mkhyen te/ de ltar mkhyen par gyur nas kyang sems can de dag yongs su sdud cing phan 'dogs par byed do/ /de lta bas na/ glog thob/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa
68b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i gnas skabs su ma zhugs pa/ sems can rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa legs par khong du ma chud pa dag gis khyim na gnas pa'am rab tu byung ba yang rung ste/ thams cad
68b5(dkon brtsegs): kun la smod cing gnod sems bskyed nas yun ring por bdag nyid la gnod par 'gyur bar mi bya'o/ /de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas theg pa chen po la gnas
68b6(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /sems can gzhan dag sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byed pa mthong na yang gnod sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
68b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu sems can gang rnam par dkar zhing yongs su dag pa'i chos las cung zad cig nyams par gyur na nam yang yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar mi 'gyur
69a1(dkon brtsegs): ro zhes gsungs pas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te 'dod chags spyod pa'i sems can mthong bar gyur na/ sems can 'di dag 'dod chags kyi gdung
69a2(dkon brtsegs): bas bsregs par gyur pa yang bdag gis nyes pa yin no snyam du sems so/ /zhe sdang dang gti mug gi gdung bas bsregs par gyur pa de dag mthong na yang 'di dag thams cad ni bdag gis
69a3(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa yin no snyam du sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis sems can thams cad na ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan par gyur pa dag mthong bar gyur na sman yongs su btsal te thabs
69a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas yongs su gso ba'i rigs pa las/ bdag sngon sems can gyi nad bsal bar yid dam bcas na deng yal bar bor ba 'di nyid bdag gi nyes pa yin no snyam du sems pas
69a5(dkon brtsegs): so| |byang chub sems dpa' ni de lta bu'i bsam pa dang ldan pas bdag nyid kyi nyes pa la lta zhing / sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems skyed par byed do/ /gal te gsod pa 'am
69a6(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag gcod cing btub pa zhig dang phrad par gyur na yang pha rol gnod pa byed pa de dag la lan bya'o snyam pa'i bsam pa med do/ /glog thob/ byang chub
69a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de ltar yang dag par bsgom pa na 'das pa'i mi dge ba'i las ji snyed pa dag kyang gtan du zad cing ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur la/ ma 'ongs pa'i mi dge ba rnams
69b1(dkon brtsegs): ni yang ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /glog thob/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi yang ches snga rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
69b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams
69b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchog tu skyes pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'od zer can zhes bya ste/ rgyal po'i grong khyer rab tu bde ba zhes bya ba'i tshal
69b4(dkon brtsegs): na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bshan pa 'jigs su rung ba zhes bya ba khro gtum che ba gsod pa la dga' zhing / bzod pa dang byams pa'i sems med pa/ lag pa khrag gis bskus pa/ mthong ba thams
69b5(dkon brtsegs): cad skrag par 'gyur ba zhig yod de/ de'i tshe bshan pa des glang zhig khang pa'i nang du bcings te/ nang du zhugs nas gsod par byas pa las/ glang des de mthong nas shin tu skrag pas thag
69b6(dkon brtsegs): pa bcad de bros nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pa bzhugs pa'i tshal ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bshan pa de yang mtshon thogs nas phyi bzhin bsnyegs pas glang de skrag nas
69b7(dkon brtsegs): g.yang sa zab mo zhig tu lhung nas srog chad la thug pa tsam du na zhing sdug bsngal bas sgra phyung ngo / /de'i tshe bshan pas glang de mthong nas zhe sdang cher skyes te/ g.yang sa zab mo de nyid du zhugs
70a1(dkon brtsegs): nas mtshon thogs te gsad par byas pa las mtshon ma btab pa'i bar skabs su/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pa tshal der 'khor mang po brgya stong tshad
70a2(dkon brtsegs): med pas yongs su bskor ba dag la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes
70a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i
70a4(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
70a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di dag thams cad ni sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig go zhes rgya cher rnam par phye ste ston par mdzad
70a6(dkon brtsegs): pas| glog thob/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di la ma rig pa yang 'du byed la mi sems mi rtog la/ 'du byed kyang ma rig pa la mi sems mi rtog go /de bzhin du skye ba yang rga shi la
70a7(dkon brtsegs): mi sems mi rtog pas/ de ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dmigs su med pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa/ dran pa med pa/ bdag dang bdag gi med pa/ rang bzhin gyis rnam
70b1(dkon brtsegs): par dag pa/ phan tshun gcig gis gcig mi rig pa yin no/ /so so'i skye bo rnams 'di lta bu'i chos ma thob pa'i phyir gzugs ni bdag yin no/ /bdag ni gzugs rnams dang ldan no/ /gzugs ni
70b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi yin no zhes 'dzin par byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar la yang de bzhin no/ /bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'i dbang
70b3(dkon brtsegs): gis mi rtag pa la rtag par 'dzin par byed/ sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'dzin par byed/ mi sdug pa la sdug par 'dzin par byed/ bdag med pa la bdag gir 'dzin cing phyin ci log bzhi bskyed par
70b4(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ /phyin ci log tu lta ba'i phyir ma rig pas rmongs nas yang dag par tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing / sems kyi rjes su mngon par zhen par gyur pas srid pa'i sred pa 'ching ba gcod
70b5(dkon brtsegs): par mi nus shing 'khor ba'i 'khor bar rgyun mi 'chad par 'khor bar gyur pa yin no/ /mkhas pa dag ni chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid la shin tu legs par rtogs par byed pa'i phyir/ bdag
70b6(dkon brtsegs): dang | gang zag dang / sems can zhes bya ba nas srog ces bya ba'i bar du cung zad tsam yang yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / gsod
70b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gnod par byed pa dag kyang mi dmigs so zhes gsungs pa dang / glog thob/ de'i tshe bshan pa 'jigs su rung bas rgyang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos bshad pa'i sgra thos nas
71a1(dkon brtsegs): go bar gyur pas de ma thag tu gsod pa'i sems nye bar zhi bar gyur nas/ mtshon cha spangs te g.yang sa nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das de ga la ba der song
71a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs nas phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
71a3(dkon brtsegs): ni deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas lam bsgrub par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rigs so/ /dge slong legs
71a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'ongs sam zhes gsungs ma thag tu dge slong gi dngos por gyur nas bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pas de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa
71a5(dkon brtsegs): thugs kyis mkhyen nas mthar gyis yongs su smin par mdzad nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams rgya cher yang dag par bstan par 'jigs su rung ba thos nas sangs rgyas kyi
71a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa la phyir mi ldog pa thob par gyur ro/ /glang de yang de bzhin gshegs pa des rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos kyi tshig ston pa'i gsung sgra shin tu gya nom pa thos nas sems
71a7(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu dga' ba skyes pas/ shi 'phos pa'i 'og tu dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas su skyes nas tha mar byams pa dang phrad de/ yang dag pa'i dad pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /glog thob/
71b1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ni shin tu zab pa dang / rnam par rig par dka' zhing shes par dka' ba yin te/ de'i phyir/ glog thob/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bla na med pa
71b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar 'dod pas/ sems can gyi dbang po dang spyod pa dag la shin tu mkhas par byas nas sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems
71b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / thogs pa med pa'i sems la rab tu gnas te chos thams cad la rtag tu mngon par zhen pa med par bya'o/ /ci 'dod pa rnams yongs su spangs te tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsgrub
71b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /bzod pa la gnas par bya'o/ /brtson 'grus bskyed par bya'o/ /bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag par bya'o/ /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad
71b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi ngo bo nyid la so sor brtag par bya'o/ /glog thob/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos drug po de dag yongs su rdzogs par gyur na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
71b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brten nas mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /
71b7(dkon brtsegs): glog thob/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi gter gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpas gzugs thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs shing / gzod
72a1(dkon brtsegs): ma nyid nas skye ba med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa mthong ba gang yin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni gzugs la mkhas pa thob pa'i phyir so so yang dag
72a2(dkon brtsegs): par rig pa bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa
72a3(dkon brtsegs): dang | spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /de la don so so yang dag par rig pa ni gzugs kyi don rnams la thogs pa med par gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /gzugs kyi don gang zhe na/ 'di
72a4(dkon brtsegs): lta ste| don dam pa gang yin pa'o/ /don dam pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs dmigs su med pa gang yin pa ste/ don dam pa'i ye shes la 'di lta bu dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni
72a5(dkon brtsegs): don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ /chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni gzugs kyi chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
72a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ /nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'di lta ste/ gzugs rnams la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi
72a7(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pas nges pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ /spobs pa so so yang dag par
72b1(dkon brtsegs): rig pa ni 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi chos rnams sems can gyi dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par phye ste ston par byed kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni spobs
72b2(dkon brtsegs): pa so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas gzugs kyi chos la rmongs shing mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin
72b3(dkon brtsegs): dang | 'dun pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis ci rigs par chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la mtshan nyid gnyis su gyur pa med de/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang /
72b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi bar du yang de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/ glog thob/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi gter zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter
72b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di thob par gyur na spyod yul rnams la rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can de lta bu dag yongs su gdul bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ de dag gi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag re re la yang bskal
72b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs la mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang de dag gi mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab la
72b7(dkon brtsegs): yang 'grib pa med cing chos kyi dbyings dang mi 'gal bar gnyis su med cing dbyer med pa'i rjes su 'brang ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas chos thams
73a1(dkon brtsegs): cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pas 'thob pa'i chos kyi gter zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi gter 'dis sems can dag la ci rigs par chos bstan nas zad mi
73a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i chos kyi gter phun sum tshogs par gyur te/ 'khor ba'i rgyud pa gtan du spong ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ glog thob/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gter
73a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / zad mi shes pa'i gter dang / kun tu zad mi shes pa'i gter dang / mtha' med pa'i gter rnam pa lnga zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gter 'di lta bu dang ldan
73a4(dkon brtsegs): p ar gyur na yong tan khyad par du 'phags pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir tshegs chung dus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
73a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi gter bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' glog thob ni gzungs rab tu thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems
73a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' lnga brgya ni glog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /lha'i bu sum khri drug stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par
73a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du rtsol ba ma mchis pa'i ye
73b1(dkon brtsegs): shes zhes gang gsungs pa de'i don ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis dge ba'i chos rnams la lus dang sems kyi rjes su mthun par
73b2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs shing mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de ni rtsol ba dang bcas pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang lus dang sems rab tu dul bar gyur nas dran pa med pa/ gnas pa med
73b3(dkon brtsegs): pa| rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i mtshan ma dang bral bar gyur pa dang / de sngon gyi smon lam dang ye shes yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag mang po rnams su rnam
73b4(dkon brtsegs): pa sna tshogs su ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings las g.yo ba med pa dang / rtag tu chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi mtshan ma cung zad tsam yang med pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis
73b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can gang yang yongs su bzlas pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sbyangs kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa
73b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / rtag par sangs rgyas rnams rjes su dran par byed kyang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du mi lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu rgyu bar byed kyang chos
73b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings dang mi 'bral gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir
74a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang gang byas pa de dag la yang mngon par zhen pa yang med do/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsol
74a2(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa'i ye shes 'di bstan pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/ /brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
74a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang bcas te steng gi bar snang las me tog man da rab ba dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dang / pun da ri ka dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par phab ste /
74a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /lha'i rnga rnams kyang rang sgra byung bar gyur to/ /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i snang ba chen pos kyang kun tu snang bar byas te/ sems
74a5(dkon brtsegs): can gang la reg par gyur pa de'i lus kyang shin tu bsil bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' glog thob la bka' stsal pa/ glog
74a6(dkon brtsegs): thob/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gnas 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu gsungs
74a7(dkon brtsegs): so/ /ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du byung ba'i tshe yang gnas 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu gsungs bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams
74b1(dkon brtsegs): t shad med grangs med pa dag na da ltar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad pa'i phyir 'od zer chen po 'gyed par
74b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag ba gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde
74b3(dkon brtsegs): logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ bdag gis ji ltar yongs su gzung
74b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mi zad pa'i gter bstan pa zhes bya'o/ /chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan
74b5(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ste/ khyod kyis de ltar yang ming yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' glog thob dang / tshe dang ldan pa
74b6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon
74b7(dkon brtsegs): par bstod do/ / //'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ mi zad pa'i gter bstan pa'i le'u zhes
75a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ste 'dus pa nyi shu ba rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ b+ha dra mA ya kA ra bya kA ra Na nA ma mahA ya nA sU tra/ bod skad du/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po
75a2(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po thog ma gcig/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
75a3(dkon brtsegs): na| bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon
75a4(dkon brtsegs): par grags pa/ mngon par shes pa thob pa/ gzungs thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul thob pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa lnga stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
75a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsan dan bzang po dang / byang chub sems
75a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha lo sgyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha lo sgyur ba chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpal
75a7(dkon brtsegs): dang | byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzi brjid dang ldan zhing nga ro snyan pa dang / byang chub sems
75b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi snying po dang /
75b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can kha lo sgyur ba dul ba dang ldan pa dang / byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
75b3(dkon brtsegs): po thams cad dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ lha rnams
75b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbang po brgya byin dang yang thabs gcig go/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang yang thabs gcig go /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang yang thabs gcig go/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
75b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / /dri za dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po du mas kyang yongs su bskor te/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ni/ rgyal po'i khab kyi
75b6(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer chen po la brten cing bzhugs te/ rgyal po dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs kyi mi rnams kyis ni gus par
75b7(dkon brtsegs): byas| bla mar byas/ bsnyen bkur byas/ mchod par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos dang / zhal zas dang / gzim sa cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / /
76a1(dkon brtsegs): sman zong ni brnyes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang snyan pa dang tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po ni mngon par 'phags te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
76a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang
76a3(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa ste/ thams cad ni mkhyen/ thams cad ni gzigs/ de bzhin
76a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ni ldan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ni ldan/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
76a5(dkon brtsegs): bco brgyad dang ni ldan/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang ni ldan/ spyan lnga dang mi ldan/ cho 'phrul yang brnyes te/ kun
76a6(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni brnyes so/ /bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer
76a7(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa/ grong rdal dang bcas pa/ sa dang bcas pa/ 'gro ba dang bcas pa/ ri rab dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ khor yug
76b1(dkon brtsegs): dang 'obs su bcas pa/ rtswa dang shing dang rir bcas pa 'di nam mkha' la bskal pa'am/ bskal pa bas kyang lhag par skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyis 'dzin par mdzad do/ /yang de'i tshe rgyal
76b2(dkon brtsegs): po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po zhes bya ba bstan bcos la shin tu mkhas pa/ gsang sngags la shin tu mkhas pa/ bzod dang rig pa la mkhas pa/ las kyi mtha' byas
76b3(dkon brtsegs): zin pa/ rab tu byed pa byas pa/ sgra grags pa/ yul ma ga d+ha na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma ji snyed pa de dag gi mchog tu grags pa/ phul du grags pa zhig gnas te /
76b4(dkon brtsegs): des yul ma ga d+ha ril gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad 'dun par byas/ rmongs par byas/ mgo 'khor bar byas nas ya mtshan gyi chos la bkod de/ bden pa mthong ba rnams dang / dad
76b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen rnams ni ma gtogs so/ /des sgyu mas rmongs par byed pa'i rig pa'i stobs bskyed pas rnyed pa dang bkur
76b6(dkon brtsegs): ste dang tshigs su bcad pa yang lhag par rnyed do/ /sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang / snyan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhag par mngon par 'phags te/
76b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha
77a1(dkon brtsegs): lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa ste/ thams cad ni
77a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen/ thams cad ni gzigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ni ldan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ni ldan/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
77a3(dkon brtsegs): ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ni ldan/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang ni ldan/ spyan
77a4(dkon brtsegs): lnga dang ni ldan/ cho 'phrul yang brnyes te/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni brnyes so/ /bzhed na stong gsum gyi
77a5(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer dang bcas pa/ grong rdal dang bcas pa/ sa dang bcas pa/ 'gro ba dang bcas pa/ ri rab dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa/
77a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang 'obs su bcas pa/ rtswa dang shing dang rir bcas pa 'di nam mkha' la bskal pa'am/ bskal pa bas lhag par skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas
77a7(dkon brtsegs): tsam la 'dzin par mdzad do zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ yul ma ga d+ha ril gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad bdag gis 'dun par byas/ rmongs par
77b1(dkon brtsegs): byas| mgo 'khor bar byas nas ya mtshan gyi chos la bkod de/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag chen po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bdag gi ming gis rab tu mgu bar gyur na/ de bzhin
77b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de gcig pu da dung ma bgams/ rmongs par ma byas/ mgo 'khor bar ma byas kyi/ ma la/ bdag de bzhin
77b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga la ba der 'gro bar bya'o/ /song nas kyang bag ma par bya ste/ gal te rmongs pa'am/ mgo 'khor bar bya nus pa lta
77b4(dkon brtsegs): na| de lta na yul ma ga d+ha thams cad bdag la gcig tu 'dus/ bdag gi rnyed ba dang bkur sti yang ches stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po
77b5(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
77b6(dkon brtsegs): ngo| |song nas kyang sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma bye ba phrag 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba/ zhal zla ba bye ba phrag 'bum pas lhag par dri ma med pa/ sku
77b7(dkon brtsegs): shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa/ mdzod spu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od dag pa ltar gsal ba/ spyan pad+ma dang / ut+pal sngon po kha bye ba lta bu'i bkrag yod pa/ spyi gtsug
78a1(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pas kyang bltar mi mthong pa/ 'khor gyi nang na gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu dang ldan pas chos ston pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang des sku de lta bu
78a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong / gsung gi phrin las de lta bu thos nas sems dang bar gyur cing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la/ bdag gis 'di ci thams cad mkhyen la/ thams cad gzigs pa dang
78a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa zhig yin nam/ 'on te ma yin bgam par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bgam
78a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pas sang gi gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren to zhes gsol to/ /'di snyam du yang sems te/ ci 'dis bdag gi sems shes sam/ 'on te mi shes zhig gu /gal te
78a5(dkon brtsegs): shes na ni der 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ci ste mi shes na ni de na 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po gdul ba'i dbang du yang mdzad /
78a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i skye bo phal po che gdul ba'i dbang du yang mdzad nas/ mkhyen bzhin du sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas te cang mi
78a7(dkon brtsegs): gsung bas gnad bar mdzad do/ /de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di bdag rnam par mtho 'tsham pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa la 'dir khas len pa dang
78b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyar na 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa yang ma yin la/ thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
78b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos ni/ sgyu
78b3(dkon brtsegs): ma'i za ma tog gis dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di mtho 'tsham par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod snying las chung bar gyis shig dang /
78b4(dkon brtsegs): ngas yun ring po nas spyad pa bsgrubs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dir dus mkhyen pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang mtho 'tsham par mi
78b5(dkon brtsegs): nus so/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ gzhan yang 'dod chags ni mtho 'tsham par byed pa yin/ zhe sdang ni mtho 'tsham par byed pa yin/ gti mug ni mtho 'tsham par byed na/ de dag ni
78b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la bag la nyal pa dang bcas te zad/ bral/ yongs su gyur/ gzod pa ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can yin te/ des na de bzhin gshegs pa la lha dang bcas pa'i
78b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyis kyang mtho 'tsham par mi nus so/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ gzhan yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sgyu ma ni phyogs gcig pa yin pas sgyu ma yang dag pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin
79a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sgyu ma ni yang dag pa yin te/ des na chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ sems can gyi
79a2(dkon brtsegs): khams su gdags par 'dogs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sgyu ma 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs
79a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgyu ma la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ /bye ba 'bum gyi char yang / grangs su yang / char yang / bgrang bar yang / dper yang nye bar mi
79a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro'o/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par kun tu
79a5(dkon brtsegs): ston nus sam/ gsol pa/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhad na 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed brgyan
79a6(dkon brtsegs): cing de thams cad kyang skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam la kun tu ston par mdzad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma ril gyis bstan par ni mi 'gyur ro/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ phyogs
79a7(dkon brtsegs): bcu na rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang dag yod pa 'di lta ste/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor byed ces bya ba dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su gcod byed ces bya ba gang
79b1(dkon brtsegs): dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yongs su gcod par byed cing yongs su bcad nas kyang 'jig par byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun tu 'thor byed dang / rnam
79b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'thor byed ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi bar na rgyu ba gang dag yin pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun nas yongs su 'jog pa zhes bya ba srid pa'i rtse mo na rgyu ba gang dag yin pa dang / rlung gi dkyil
79b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang rnam par 'jig par byed na ri phal pa lta smos kyang ci dgos pa gang dag yin pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'bar byed ces bya ba sreg pa'i
79b4(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa'i tshe ldang zhing gang gis ni me lce de dag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'phen par byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par sgrub byed ces bya ba gang gis sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me de zhi
79b5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu tshim byed ces bya ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sprin gyi dra ba gcig gis kun tu khebs par byed pa dang / rlung
79b6(dkon brtsegs): gi dkyil 'khor chus 'debs zhes bya ba gang gis na sreg pa'i bskal pa'i tshe char 'bebs par byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor lhag par skems zhes bya ba gang gis na chus 'jig pa de lhag
79b7(dkon brtsegs): par skems par byed pa yod do/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ ngas rlung gi dkyil 'khor las brtsams te bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par chos bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rlung gi
80a1(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor las brtsams te chos bstan pa la mthar thug pa med do/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos rlung gi dkyil 'khor
80a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi nang du 'dug par nus sam/ gsol pa/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu/ nga ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyi nang du spyod lam
80a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhis gnas par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad yungs 'bru gcig gi nang du 'jog par mdzad/ 'jug par mdzad la/ yungs 'bru
80a4(dkon brtsegs): de yang rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur zhing / yungs 'bru de'i nang du rlung gi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad kyang nye bar ston par mdzad la/ rlung de dag phan tshun thug
80a5(dkon brtsegs): par yang mi 'gyur/ ltung bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu nga ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid de lta bu dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang tshad med pa dang ldan no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal
80a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chen po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te ngag mthun par tshig tu smras pa/ bcom ldan
80a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed de/ ston pa 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa/ 'di ltar mthu che ba ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par
80b1(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul 'di thos nas mos par bgyid cing / mos par bgyis nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
80b2(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems bskyed par bgyid pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags so/ /de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ste/ de nyid kyi nub mo
80b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i phyogs gang na grong khyer thams cad kyi btsog dgu dang / mi mthun pa thams cad 'bab pa dang 'byung ba'i sa phyogs der 'khor gyi khyams chen po dar gyi lda
80b4(dkon brtsegs): ldi dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas brgyan pa/ gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/ me tog bkram pa/ spos bzang po mchog gis ba dugs pa/ steng du bla re bres pa
80b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig mngon par sprul to/ /'khor gyi khyams de'i nang du yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa me tog dang 'bras bur bcas pa brgyad stong mngon par sprul to/ /rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyi
80b6(dkon brtsegs): drung du yang seng ge'i khri ras bcos bu du mas g.yogs pa rin po che'i ba dan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mngon par sprul to/ /seng ge'i khri'i g.yas g.yon du yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa
80b7(dkon brtsegs): me tog dang 'bras bur bcas pa bzhi bzhi mngon par sprul to/ /bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su longs spyod par bya ba'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa yang
81a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sprul to/ /rim gro byed pa gos dkar po bgos pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lnga brgya yang mngon par sprul to/ /sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bkod pa
81a2(dkon brtsegs): d e lta bu sprul ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la rgyal po chen po bzhi lus chen por sprul nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa ga la ba de ra song nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang
81a3(dkon brtsegs): po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzang po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang / khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su longs spyad par bya
81a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di mngon par sprul pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /bzang po/ gzhan yang kho bo cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las
81a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba la bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa dang / khyod la blta ba'i phyir 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu gnyis pa cung zhig ston par byed na kho bo cag la
81a6(dkon brtsegs): gnang bar gyis shig / de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas rgyal po chen po bzhi la gnang ba dang / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyis
81a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i 'khor gyi khyams de lta bu zhig mngon par sprul to/ /de nas yang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu sum khri dang lhan cig bzang po'i 'khor
81b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khyams kyi bkod pa ga la ba der song nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzang po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang / de bzhin
81b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di mngon par sprul pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /bzang po/ kho bo cag kyang de bzhin gshegs
81b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la mchod pa'i las bya zhing bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa dang / khyod la blta ba'i phyir 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu gnyis pa cung zhig ston par byed na kho bo
81b4(dkon brtsegs): cag la gnang bar gyis shig / de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la gnang ba dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom
81b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi khang bzang rnam par rgyal byed dang / yongs 'dus brtol bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'khor
81b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi khyams zhig mngon par sprul te/ 'khor gyi khyams des sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i bkod pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bkod pa yang mog mog por byas par gyur to/ /de nas sgyu
81b7(dkon brtsegs): ma mkhan bzang po 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i bu 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la rim gro bya ba dang / mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson te lhags pa dang sbyar
82a1(dkon brtsegs): na sems can 'di ni tha mal pa ma yin pas/ bdag gis sems can mchog de lta bu la mtho brtsams par gyur na mi rung gi/ bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag dor
82a2(dkon brtsegs): gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po sbrul pa'i bya ba de dag 'dor bar byed/ de dag med par byed de/ gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa thams cad
82a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis med par byed cing mi snang bar bya bar brgal kyang / zhal zas dang / rim gro dang / 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa dang / seng ge'i khri yang de kho na bzhin du snang ste/ gsang sngags
82a4(dkon brtsegs): dang rig spags kyi stobs bskyed pa thams cad kyis med par bya ma nus pa dang / de shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sngon chad ni 'dod na sgyu ma ston par
82a5(dkon brtsegs): yang byed/ 'dod na sgyu ma med par yang byed na da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du gnas kyi bkod pa byas pa med par byed ma nus so snyam mo/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
82a6(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa de sems kyis yongs su shes nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzang po/ ji ltar khyod kyis de
82a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir gnas kyi bkod pa byas pa 'di med par bya ma nus pa de bzhin du/ bzang po/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam thob pa de
82b1(dkon brtsegs): dag gi sems bskyed pa de yang med par mi 'gyur te/ de dag gi de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po dga' mgu yi rangs te/
82b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' zhing yid bde bar gyur nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la gdugs tshod la bab pa bskul bar byed de/ bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod lags
82b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus dang tshod la bab na/ da gdugs tshod la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol/ lhung
82b4(dkon brtsegs): bzed thogs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dang la gshegs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs nas sgyu ma mkhan
82b5(dkon brtsegs): bzang po'i 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba der gshegs te/ gang gis na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gis sprul pa'i bkod pa na bzhugs so snyam du shes /
82b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po bzhi yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag cag gis sprul pa'i bkod pa na bzhugs so snyam du shes/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni
82b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sprul pa'i bkod pa na bzhugs so snyam du shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po de
83a1(dkon brtsegs): na gzhan mu stegs can dang / spyod pa ba dang / kun tu rgyu dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gang dag gis thos pa de dag ni ngo mtshar du gyur nas 'khor gyi
83a2(dkon brtsegs): khyams der dong ste/ de ring dge sbyong go'u ta ma la mtho 'tsham par lta bar bya'o snyam mo/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po de na dad pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge
83a3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der dong nas/ de ring de bzhin gshegs pa la bgam pa yang mnyan par bya/ cho 'phrul chen po yang
83a4(dkon brtsegs): blta bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / khengs pa nges par bcom nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
83a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par mtho btsam pa'i bsam pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa 'dir gshegs su gsol ba gang lags
83a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nongs pa 'chags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang zhal zas sprul pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa sprul pa dang / seng ge'i khri sprul pa dang / 'khor gyi khyams sprul pa de la
83a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'di snyam du sems can mchog de lta bu de la bslus par gyur na mi rung gi/ bya ba 'di ma mchis par bgyi snyam ste shin tu spangs kyang ma mchis par ma btub/ gsang sngags
83b1(dkon brtsegs): dang rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa thams cad kyis kyang ma mchis par bgyi rngo ma thogs nas/ zhal zas dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / seng ge'i khri dang / 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa yang
83b2(dkon brtsegs): de kho na bzhin du gda'o/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bzang po/ sems can thams cad kyi nye bar spyad
83b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / yongs su spyad pa yang 'di lta ste/ las kyi sgyu mas sprul pa yin no/ /bzang po/ dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di yang 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sgyu mas sprul pa yin no/ /bzang po/ nga
83b4(dkon brtsegs): yang 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi sgyu mas sprul pa yin no/ /bzang po/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang 'di lta ste/ sna tshogs mngon par 'grub par byed pa'i
83b5(dkon brtsegs): sgyu mas sprul pa yin no/ /bzang po/ chos thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ rkyen tshogs pa'i sgyu mas sprul pa yin no/ /bzang po/ 'on kyang de'i dus la bab par shes na ji ltar sprul pa'i
83b6(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / bldag pa dag khyod kyis phul cig /de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos sprul pa'i rim gro ba de dag dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag dang / lha'i
83b7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa dang ldan cig sprul pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / bldag pa des bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun yang dag par
84a1(dkon brtsegs): tshim par byed do/ /de nas de'i tshe gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /sbyin pa 'di ni ci 'dra dang / /len par byed pa ci 'dra ba/ /de 'dra'i chos
84a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid thob 'gyur pa/ /yon ni rnam par sbyor gyur cig/ mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ gdan ni ji ltar bshams pa dang / /de la gang dag bzhugs pa rnams/ /mi mnyam ma mchis
84a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa ste/ /mchod sbyin dge ba bla na med/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ rim gro byed pa'i sems gang dang / /len par byed pa'i sems gang dang / /sbyin par byed pa'i ji lta bar/ /yon ni
84a4(dkon brtsegs): myur du spyong bar shog / rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ gtong med sbyin pa 'di btang bas/ /len pa med pa rnams kyis blangs/ /gang dag 'dir ni gshegs pa rnams/ /de dag yon sbyong byed
84a5(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ /kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'di ni nam mkha'i sbyin pa ste/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rnams kyis spyod/ /gang dag sems lus grol ba de/ /'jig rten dag na yon sbyong mchog /byang
84a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'od tog gis smras pa/ ji lta bur na sgyu ma mkhan/ /bzang pos bkod pa sprul byas pa/ /dngos kun de dang 'dra ba ste/ /byis pas de ni mi rtogs so/ /byang chub
84a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'od bkod pas smras pa/ ji ltar gdan dang ljon shing dag/ du ma mngon par sprul byas pa/ /yid kyi sgyu ma lta bur stong / /'di la khyad par 'gag yang med/ /byang
84b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' seng ges smras pa/ seng ge'i sgra ni ma thos na/ /wa ni nags stsal nang na sgrogs/ /de yis seng+ge'i sgra thos nas/ /phyogs bcu dag tu 'bros par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sgyu mkhan
84b2(dkon brtsegs): bzang po yang / /de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong na/ /mu stegs nang na rgyal ba bas/ /bdag nyid mchog ces sgrogs par byed/ /bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /sgyu mas sgyu mar
84b3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs byed pa/ /tshad mar gyur pa gsungs na ni/ /de la bdud kyi gting mi dpogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ zhal zas 'di ni sprul pa ste/ /bsnyen bkur
84b4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'ang sprul pa yin/ /spyod par byed pa'ang sprul pa ste/ /sbyin pa dge ba bla na med/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pas smras pa/ me ni mar dang til mar gyis/ /phyi phyir zhing ni rab tu
84b5(dkon brtsegs): mched/ /de bzhin bzang po'i sgyu ma yis/ /sangs rgyas sgyu ma nges par bstan/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ ji ltar 'di na sngon gnas pa/ /thams cad byed pa med pa
84b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar| |de bzhin chos rnams thams cad ni/ /sngon gyi mtha' nas rtag tu mnyam/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po shin tu gdul ba'i dbang du mdzad nas khyim bdag
84b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig sprul te/ 'khor gyi khyams de'i nang du zhugs nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzang po/ ci byed/ smras pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di gdugs tshod gsol
85a1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do/ /des smras pa/ bzang po thong / de skad ma zer/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po ma skyes
85a2(dkon brtsegs): dgra'i khab na gdugs tshod gsol zhing bzhugs so/ /sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po
85a3(dkon brtsegs): ma skyes dgra'i khab na gdugs tshod gsol bar mthong ngo / /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gnyis pa zhig mngon par sprul nas/ de nang du zhugs te sgyu ma mkhan
85a4(dkon brtsegs): bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzang po/ ci byed/ smras pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di gdugs tshod gsol bar byed do/ /des smras pa/ bzang po thong / de skad ma zer/ de
85a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu kun tu rgyu'i srang na bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing zhugs so/ /sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus
85a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu kun tu rgyu'i srang na bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba mthong ngo / /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gzhan
85a7(dkon brtsegs): zhig sprul te/ de nang du zhugs nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzang po/ ci byed/ smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di gdugs tshod gsol bar byed do/ /
85b1(dkon brtsegs): des smras pa/ bzang po thong / de skad ma zer/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni 'tsho byed kyi skyed mos tshal na 'khor bzhi la chos ston cing bzhugs so/ /sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi
85b2(dkon brtsegs): mthus de bzhin gshegs pa 'tsho byed kyi skyed mos tshal na 'khor bzhi la chos ston par mthong ngo / /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sgyu ma mkhan bzang po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
85b3(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzang po/ ci byed/ smras pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di gdugs tshod gsol bar byed do/ /des smras pa/ bzang po thong / de skad ma zer/ de
85b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas na shing yongs 'du'i drung na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la chos ston cing bzhugs so/ /bzang pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sum
85b5(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas na shing yongs 'du'i drung na chos ston par mthong ngo / /de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos shing ljon pa sprul pa ji snyed pa de thams cad kyi lo ma thams cad dang / me
85b6(dkon brtsegs): tog thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba mthong ngo / /sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos seng ge'i khri sprul pa gang dag yin
85b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis seng ge'i khri sprul pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su
86a1(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba mthong ngo / /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ni rtsig pa'am/ khyim mam/ khang bzang ngam/ srang ngam/ lam po che ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad na
86a2(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na yang sgyu ma
86a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhan bzang po bdag nyid phyag 'tshal nas nyes pa 'chags par mthong zhing / de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po mig lam na gang cung zad ci snang ba thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs
86a4(dkon brtsegs): pa gzhan cung zad kyang ma mthong nas/ de tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde bar gyur to/ /de dga' ba dang yid bde ba de nyid kyis dad pa rjes su
86a5(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /ting nge 'dzin de las langs ma thag tu thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /bzhed na
86a6(dkon brtsegs): brgya phrag stong las lhag gyur cing / /dper na gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas mang po sprul par mdzad pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi rdzu 'phrul de la mos/ /bdag gis sngon
86a7(dkon brtsegs): bslabs sgyu ma'i sa ma lags/ /'dzam bu'i gling na bdag 'dra med snyam na/ /de ring rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul 'di mthong nas/ /'di yi grangs dang char yang mi phod do/ /bdag gi sha yi
86b1(dkon brtsegs): mig gis gang mthong ba/ /thams cad rgyal ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ /chos kyi rgyal po la ni 'di dag zhus/ /rgyal ba yang dag gang lags bka' stsal cig /gang zhig mchod
86b2(dkon brtsegs): na legs par mchod pa lags/ /gang la 'bras bu chen por 'gyur ba lags/ /gang gi byang chub mthun par gzung ba 'di/ /kun tu spyan gyis bdag la bka' stsal cig /de ring
86b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon bgam gyis pa yi/ /nongs pa gang lags deng 'dir kun tu 'chags/ /gang dag sems can mchog la gus mi gnas/ /sems can de dag rgyal ba'i bde
86b4(dkon brtsegs): las nyams/ /bdag la lha dang brgya byin tshangs pa dang / /'khor 'dus gyur pa 'di dag kun gson cig/ sems can thams cad rab tu dgrol slad du/ /byang chub sems ni bdag
86b5(dkon brtsegs): gis bskyed par bgyi/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer/ /bdud rtsi bde bas yang dag tshim par bgyi/ /gnyid kyis rab log sems can shes rab kyi/ /mthu
86b6(dkon brtsegs): dang sgrub pas rnam par sad par bgyi/ /rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra mthong gyur cing / bde bar gshegs bka' yid 'ong ye shes dang / /chags pa med pa'i spyod mchog thos
86b7(dkon brtsegs): nas ni/ /su zhig dag pa'i rgyu sems bskyed mi bgyi/ /byang chub sems mkhas ji ltar spyod pa yi/ /byang chub lam ni bdag la bshad du gsol/ /gang la nyan thos rnams
87a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi dpogs pa'i/ /de dag rnams kyi spyod pa ji lta bu/ /cho ga spyod pa'i yon tan ji lta bu/ /mnyan par 'dod la gus pa ji lta bu/ /nges pa rnams kyi spyod lam ci
87a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba/ /bdag la the tshom ma mchis de bzhin gsungs/ /ji ltar thos pa tshol ba la goms pa lags/ /thos pa snying por bgyid pa'i dang po gang / /gzhan la gsal bar ston pa ji lta bu/ /
87a3(dkon brtsegs): srog chags thams cad ji ltar chos la dad/ /ji ltar 'di dag shes kyi khe mi tshol/ /zang zing med pa'i sems la ji ltar gnas/ /byas pa shes shing rab tu phyin 'dogs dang / /sems
87a4(dkon brtsegs): can mi phyed gnas par ci ltar 'gyur/ /grogs po gang dag bsten bgyi ci lta bu/ /sdig pa'i grogs rnams ji ltar rnam par spong / /ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang phrang bar 'gyur/ /de dag
87a5(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas ji ltar mchod par bgyi/ /ci ltar bslab pa dag la gus pa lags/ /de yi bslab pa'i bca' ba gang zhig lags/ /tshul khrims ji ltar rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin
87a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa ji ltar 'thob/ /ji ltar tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba lags/ /tshul bzhin ma lags ji ltar spong ba lags/ /ji ltar shin tu nges par bsams yid dang / /nyon mongs
87a7(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi bcing bas mi thub lags/ /ji ltar dang ldan don ni sems bgyid cing / /sems kyis sems can rnams ni mi gtong lags/ /ji ltar sems can yongs su smin bgyid cing / /
87b1(dkon brtsegs): nor mchog 'dzin pa med la dpa' ba lags/ /ji ltar sems can spyod la 'jug pa dang / /thabs dang byams pa'i snying rjes gnas pa lags/ /mngon par shes pa ji ltar yongs rdzogs
87b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /dran dang blo gros gang gis rnam dag cing / so so yang dag rig gzungs bzod par 'gyur/ /smon lam rnam dag spyod las mi ldog cing / /zab mo shes ldan don dam mkhas pa
87b3(dkon brtsegs): lags/ /smon lam thams cad ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur/ /ji ltar de dag pha rol phyin 'phags shing / /de bzhin byang chub rjes su mthun par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun
87b4(dkon brtsegs): shes shing / /byang chub phyir ni spyod pa mi ldog pa/ /kun mkhyen legs par don bsams shes rab mtsho/ /ye shes 'byung gnas 'di ni bdag la gsungs/ /bcom ldan phan yon bdag
87b5(dkon brtsegs): la bstan du gsol/ /bdag gis nan tan snying por bgyi bar 'tshal/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la slar tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ chos kun sprul
87b6(dkon brtsegs): par gang gis shes pa de/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong sprul par byed/ /sprul pa de dag zhing rnams bye bar 'gro/ de dag song nas sems can bye ba 'brel/ /ji ltar bzang po khyod kyis
87b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med las/ /sna tshogs mtha' yas gzugs ni ston byed cing / /de dag skye ba med cing 'gag med la/ /'gro med 'ong med gnas pa med pa ltar/ /bzang po skyes bu khyu mchog
88a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pa yis/ /phung po dge 'dun tshogs bcas sprul de 'dra/ /de dang ye shes med par mi 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas bsam yas rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul yin/ /ji
88a2(dkon brtsegs): ltar sgyu mas rmongs byas skye bo ni/ /sems pa yod min de la nga rgyal med/ /'di la grub pa med cing rdzas yod min/ /phyin ci log gi sems kyis mthong ba ltar/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas
88a3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med kha dog dang / /dbyibs min spyod pa ston yang spyod lam med/ /'jig tshogs lta ba kun nas bslang ma yin/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas snyam du 'du shes shing / /sangs
88a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas gzugs su mi lta mtshan dang ni/ /na tshod rigs su ma yin sgra dang ni/ /'chad par 'gyur ba ma yin sems dang ni/ /rnam shes yid kyis rab tu phye ma yin/ /chos nyid gang yin
88a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ dus gsum stong zhing mtshan yang ma skyes pa/ /rtag tu sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rnam par grol/ /de la bgrang pas rab tu phye ba med/ /sangs rgyas 'byung gang
88a6(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid 'byung ba med/ /de la phung po yod min khams mi 'byung / /chos de gnas pa mi g.yo rten pa med/ /de ni mig lnga'i gnas kyang ma yin no/ /gang zhig bdag gis sangs rgyas
88a7(dkon brtsegs): blta snyam sems/ /des na gzhan yang sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur/ /'dren pa mthong ba med pa mthong ba ste/ /dper na nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /bzang po gang khyod cung
88b1(dkon brtsegs): zad sangs rgyas blta/ /de kun don gcig yin par shes par gyis/ /nga dang gzhan gang yin pa de kun mtshungs/ /bar snang mthong dang 'dra bar mnyam pa yin/ /de dag ting 'dzin mnyam
88b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing shes rab mnyam/ /de dag rnam par grol par mnyam pa yin/ /rnam grol ye shes mthong dang stobs dang ni/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan kun gyis mnyam pa yin/ /de dag stong don go 'phang
88b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas par mnyam/ /thams cad chags pa med pa'i chos nyid gnas/ /kun kyang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rnam par grol/ /de dag 'byung ba med par 'byung ba yin/ /bzang po rgyal ba gcig
88b4(dkon brtsegs): gi mchod byed na/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la ni mchod 'gyur te/ /'di ltar de dag nga yi chos dbyings dang / /tha dad bya ba nam yang yod ma yin/ /de dag thams cad yon bzhes spyod
88b5(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad/ /kun la phul ba'ang 'bras bu che bar 'gyur/ /de kun chos nyid dag pa mnyam pa brnyes/ /sangs rgyas rnams la tha dad bya ba'ang med/ /rgyal ba yang dag gang yin bshad bya
88b6(dkon brtsegs): yin| |rtse gcig sems dang dran pa nyer bzhag cing / /chos tshul rtogs la rnam par lta bas de/ /legs par nges bsams sems kyis nga la nyon/ /bzang po de kun ma skyes yang
88b7(dkon brtsegs): dag min/ /phyin ci log gis de kun mthong bar zad/ /gal te dngos po'i ngo bo yang dag na/ /dngos po thams cad du ni zad mi 'gyur/ /de phyir shin tu ma skyes yang dag min/ /de dag
89a1(dkon brtsegs): skye med zad la gnas pa med/ /des na ba ltar med ngo bo de dag snang / /rnam par bltas na gnas pa yod ma yin/ /ji ltar bzang bas rgyal ba mthong ba dang / /ji
