89a2(dkon brtsegs): ltar phyogs su mngon par sprul mthong ba/ /gang gzhan phung po rgyal chen rten stobs dang / /phung po lnga po'ang de dang 'dra bar ltos/ /chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin med pa
89a3(dkon brtsegs): ste| |sems can dang ni sangs rgyas mtshan nyid med/ /mtshan nyid med la mtshan du 'dod pa de/ /sangs rgyas las ni shin tu ring bar 'gyur/ /chos yod ma yin kun tu rtog
89a4(dkon brtsegs): pas bslad/ /dngos po med par yang ni brtan nas shes/ /byed pa med cing byed pa po las 'das/ /ming du 'dzin pas stong ba rab tu ston/ /gang gis rgyu dang byed po rkyen min
89a5(dkon brtsegs): shes| |des ni chags bral gyur pa'i chos kyang shes/ /'dod chags bral ba'i chos ni shes gyur na/ /des ni rnam dag mig gis sangs rgyas mthong / /yang de'i tshe tshigs su
89a6(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa dag brjod de bstan pa na/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po chos la nges par rtog pa dang mthun pa'i bzod pa chung du skyes so/ /srog chags lnga stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par
89a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems sngon ma bskyed pa skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
89b1(dkon brtsegs): zhal zas sprul pa de dag gsol nas/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i yon yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gang gis sbyin dang gang la sbyin/ /spyin pa ji
89b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar mi rtog pa/ /sbyin pa mnyam pa de nyid ni/ /bzang po la ni yongs rdzogs shog /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
89b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi khyams 'di rgyan gyis brgyan bzhin du dgung bdun du gnas shing mi gda' bar mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
89b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi khyams de ltar rgyan gyis brgyan bzhin du zhag bdun du gnas shing mi snang par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang
89b5(dkon brtsegs): bcas te stan las bzhengs nas gshegs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas chos bstan pa'i phyir bzhugs so/ /dge slong de dag dang / byang
89b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za de dag kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ngo / /de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po yang
89b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas gus pa dang bcas/
90a1(dkon brtsegs): zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'du gnas kyang bcom ldan 'das la sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol
90a2(dkon brtsegs): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' lam gang la zhugs na byang chub kyi snying por mchi bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bshad du gsol/ de skad ces
90a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bzang po/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang ngas bshad do/ /
90a4(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so/ /zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bzang po/
90a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' lam gang la zhugs na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thams cad
90a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang / sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la ngoms mi shes pa nyid dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung
90a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/ bzang po/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' lam gang la zhugs na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
90b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi lam yin no/ /bzang po/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa dang / gnas yongs
90b2(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa dang / shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / skye ba yongs su dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po/ bzhi po 'di dag ni gang la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
90b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis gting mi dpogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam gtan bzlog pa dang / sems kyis rnam par 'byed pa dang / sems can rnams la snying
90b4(dkon brtsegs): rje che ba dang / spobs pa dang skad sna tshogs pa nyid de/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'phags pa'i spyod pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
90b5(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa na gnas pa dang / 'du 'dzi la mi dga' ba dang / de na gnas na sems can rnams la byams pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro bar shes pa
90b6(dkon brtsegs): ste| bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sri zhu che zhing gus pa la gnas pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
90b7(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / /sems rtag tu dga' ba dang / nga rgyal dang drags pa spong ba dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du sgrub pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po/ byang chub
91a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dus shes pa dang / tshod shes pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / yang
91a2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa nyid de/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na the tshom med pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'gyod pa kun nas ldang ba rnam par gnon pa
91a3(dkon brtsegs): dang | mkhas pa dang shes rab chen po la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / thos pa'i don sems pa dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng zhing gleng ba gang yin pa yang byams pas gleng gi/ skyon
91a4(dkon brtsegs): gtsor byed pas ma yin pa ste/ bzhi pa de dag yin no/ /bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' phan yon bzhi po 'di dag mthong na thos pa tshol bar byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag dang
91a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi shes rab sbyong ba dang / phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa rnams kyi the tshom gcod pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsngags ba zad mi shes pa ste/ bzhi po de
91a6(dkon brtsegs): dag yin no/ /bzang po/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mang du thos pa'i snying po yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ thos nas chos bye brag tu shes pa 'di ni 'di'i snying
91a7(dkon brtsegs): po yin no/ /thos nas bya ba ma yin pa mi byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no/ /thos nas gzhan la ston par byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no/ /thos nas don de nyid rnam par grol
91b1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub la gtod par byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin te/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
91b2(dkon brtsegs): chos ston par byed pa'i phan yon yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ las byas nas kyang zas la yongs su spyod pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang /
91b3(dkon brtsegs): sman zong rnams rnyed pa dang / gzhan gyi phyogs mthu chung bar byed pa dang / chos 'dod pa'i lha rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing de dag gis bsrungs pas bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa ste/ bzang po/
91b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' chos ston par byed pa'i phan yon yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na gzhan dag la chos ston par byed cing 'di'i tshig lam gzung
91b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'os par yang 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / ngang tshul bzang zhing mnyen pa dang / bdag nyid kyis chos grub pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /
91b6(dkon brtsegs): bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na shes kyi khe las 'byol zhing / zang zing med par yang chos ston pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba la 'jigs pa bskyed pa
91b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang 'du 'dzi don du mi gnyer ba dang / pha rol rjes su srung ba dang / 'phags pa'i ris la gnas pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po/ byang chub sems
92a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba dang / byas pa la lan du phan 'dogs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan byang chub yang dag par
92a2(dkon brtsegs): len du 'jug pa dang / las byas pa chud mi gson pa dang / bdag nyid la byams pa ltar gzhan la yang byams pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i rtsal don du gnyer ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin
92a3(dkon brtsegs): no| |bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can rnams la mdza' bshes mi phyed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bzod pa'i stobs kyis go bgos pa dang / lan
92a4(dkon brtsegs): du phan 'dogs par cung zad kyang re ba med pa dang / snying rje chen po mi 'dor ba dang / log par zhugs pa rnams mi spong ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na
92a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la mdza' bshes mi phyed par 'gyur ro/ /bzang po/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par bya ba'i grogs po yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyor ba phun
92a6(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / gang dag 'di'i byang chub nye bar ston par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po/
92a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi dge ba'i grogs po yin par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ theg pa dman pa ston pa dang / byang chub kyi sems la 'dun pa
92b1(dkon brtsegs): zlog par byed pa dang / gang dag bstan na mi dge ba'i chos 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos rnams las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po/
92b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang phrad par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dran pa rtse gcig pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
92b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsngags pa yang dang yang du sgrogs pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam 'debs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po/ byang chub sems
92b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' phan yon bzhi po 'di dag mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar spro bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yon gnas mchog la mchod par 'gyur ba dang / bdag mthong
92b5(dkon brtsegs): nas sems can gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mchod na byang chub kyi sems brtan par 'gyur ba dang / skyes bu chen
92b6(dkon brtsegs): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa mngon sum du mthong na dge ba'i rtsa ba gsog par 'gyur ba ste/ bzang po/ byang chub sems dpas phan yon bzhi po de dag mthong na de bzhin
92b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar spro bar 'gyur ro/ /bzang po/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas don gyi dbang bzhi mthong na bslab pa lhur len par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ngan
93a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / bde 'gro thob par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bus pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi
93a2(dkon brtsegs): po de dag yin no/ /bzang po/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang / sems can thams cad la mnyam par
93a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa mnyam pa la mi skrag pa ste/ bzang po/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yin no/ /
93a4(dkon brtsegs): bzang po/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ /bya ba ma yin pa mi spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / sangs rgyas
93a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub mi spong ba dang / lta ba bag la nyal dang bcas par yang dag par 'joms pa ste/ bzang po/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /
93a6(dkon brtsegs): bzang po/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di 'dzi med pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / sems kyi rnyog pa med pa dang / dge
93a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba nye bar ston pa ste/ bzang po/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs yin no/ /bzang po/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
93b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas byang chub kyi sems mngon du byed pa dang / nang du yang dag 'jog la sgrib pa med pa dang / rnam par dag pa'i sgo
93b2(dkon brtsegs): dag la 'dris par byed pa dang / nges pa la mi 'jug pa ste/ bzang po/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin no/ /bzang po/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang
93b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems skye ba bzlog par bya ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dag la ma mos pa dang /
93b4(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa dag la mi dga' ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par 'du mi byed pa ste/ bzang po/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems skye ba bzlog par bya ba yin no/ /bzang
93b5(dkon brtsegs): po/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis nges par bsam pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can 'ga'i don gyi phyir yang bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar thug par
93b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba na 'khor bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa dang po yin no/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams shes par bya zhing de dag gi
93b7(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir chos ston par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa gnyis pa
94a1(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /bdag gis mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs shing dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par byas nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'jug go/ bdud kyi dbung
94a2(dkon brtsegs): pham par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa gsum pa yin no/ /stong
94a3(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig gis go bar byas te chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa bzhi pa yin te/ bzang po/ bzhi po de
94a4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis nges par bsam pa yin no/ /bzang po/ chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud 'dul ba yin te/ bzhi
94a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ chos la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa dang / tshul bzhin du sbyor ba dang / chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad la mi gnas pa ste/ bzang po/ chos
94a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag ni bdud 'dul ba yin no/ /bzang po/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don sems pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gang zag med pa'i phyir chos rnams
94a7(dkon brtsegs): brten nas skye ba yin gyi/ chos 'ga' yang rgyu med par ni mi skyes pa dang / brten nas skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa de ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir chud mi za
94b1(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ bzang po/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don sems pa yin no/ /bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can rnams mi gtong ba yin te/
94b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ sngon gyi smon lam mi 'dor ba dang / yongs su skyo ba bzod pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos pos sdud pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po/
94b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su smin par byed pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / yongs su smin pa la chos
94b4(dkon brtsegs): ston pa yongs su gtong ba dang / dus dus su bskul bas dran par byed pa yongs su gtong ba dang / bdag nyid kyi bde ba spangs nas gzhan gyi bde ba'i rtsa ba ston pa dang / yongs su smin par
94b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ste/ bzang po/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su smin par byed pa yin no/ /bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ma bsdus pa sdud par
94b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa la mi 'jigs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu la yang mos pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzhan gyi don byed par spro ba dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / des
94b7(dkon brtsegs): pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad la don du gnyer ba med pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos
95a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang ldan na sems can gyi spyod pa la 'jug pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa thob pa dang / ye shes thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin chen por
95a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa tshad med pa la 'jug pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid bsgom zhing rnam par grol ba dang ma 'dres pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po/ byang
95a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems bskyed pa thams cad la byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba ste/ tha na
95a4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa'i sems la yang rung na dge ba'i sems la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa dang / sems can thams cad chos kyi snod nyid yin par lta ba dang / ngo bo nyid med par khong du
95a5(dkon brtsegs): chud pas chos thams cad log pa nyid du nges pa yin par lta ba dang / rnam par grol ba 'dod pas snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i 'du shes sgom par
95a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /bzang po/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
95a7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa bsgom pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab par bya'o snyam du byams pa bsgom pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad bsgral
95b1(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o snyam du byams pa bsgom pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad bskul bar bya'o snyam du byams pa bsgom pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las
95b2(dkon brtsegs): 'da' bar bya'o snyam du byams pa bsgom pa ste/ bzang po/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa bsgom pa yin no/ /bzang po/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
95b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi snying rje yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ngan song du skyes pa rnams bde 'gro'i lam la 'god pa'i snying rje dang / sdig pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba'i snying rje
95b4(dkon brtsegs): dang | theg pa dman pa la mos pa rnams theg pa chen po la yang dag par len du 'jug pa'i snying rje dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam pa'i snying rje ni bzhi
95b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mngon par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus dang sems yang ba dang /
95b6(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du rnam par 'byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la gus pa dang / rim gro'i sems bskyed pa dang / zhi gnas la rtse gcig tu gyur pas rnam par g.yeng ba med
95b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ /bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na so so yang dag par rig pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la mi rton pa dang
96a1(dkon brtsegs): chos la rton pa yin gyi gang zag la mi rton pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa'i nges pa'i tshig dang / yi ge mi zad par shes nas chags pa med cing thogs
96a2(dkon brtsegs): pa med par ston pas ston par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mang du
96a3(dkon brtsegs): thos pas ngoms mi shes pa dang / mang du thos pa rnams la chos bzhin gus par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / rtag tu gzhan dag la chos ston par brtson pa dang / tshig dang yi ge
96a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad gtan la dbab pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs te gsungs pa la 'jug pa yin no/ /bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bzod pa thob par
96a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / tshogs dang / yongs su mi skyo ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang
96a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan na spobs pa dag 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos smra ba gzhan de dag gis bshad pa dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas shing / zhes
96a7(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas par chos nyan pa dang / thos pas khengs pa med pa dang / thos pa nyung du rnams la brnyas par mi byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang
96b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsgyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsgyur ba dang / nyan thos las bsgyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas las bsgyur ba dang / dge
96b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba'i chos la 'du shes bsgyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no/ /bzang po/ chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don zab mo la sbyor ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
96b3(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar rtogs par byed pa dang / dgongs ba rtogs par byed pa dang / bdag gi ngo bo nyid rtogs par byed pa dang / 'di ltar stong pa'i don du chos de dag thams cad
96b4(dkon brtsegs): don gcig par rtogs par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don zab mo la sbyor ba yin no/ /bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na smon lam
96b5(dkon brtsegs): 'grub par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims dang bslab pa yongs su dag pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyong ba dang / g.yo sgyu med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa la sems dbang
96b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam 'grub par 'gyur ba'o/ /bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad
96b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'phags shing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa pha rol tu phyin pa gcig gi nang du pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan thams cad sdud
97a1(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems can gcig gi rang bzhin rtogs pas de las gzhan pa'i sems can thams cad kyang shes pa dang /
97a2(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas chos rnam par dag pa gcig gi tshul rtogs pas chos gzhan dag gi rnam par dag pa yang shes pa dang / chos nyid yin pas sangs rgyas thams
97a3(dkon brtsegs): cad sangs rgyas gcig tu mos pa ste/ bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis 'phags shing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos
97a4(dkon brtsegs): can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa 'di bshad pa na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga'
97a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing dga' ba dang yid bde bar gyur nas/ dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis shing ta la bdun srid tsam gyi steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
97a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'dzum pa mdzad pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer grangs med dpag tu med pa bkye nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od zer des khyab par byas
97a7(dkon brtsegs): nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i
97b1(dkon brtsegs): lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin
97b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni rgyu ma mchis pa dang / rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol
97b3(dkon brtsegs): te| |ye shes 'byung gnas gzi brjid gzhal yas shes rab grags/ /'jig rten gsum du yon tan pha rol phyin brnyes grags/ /rgyal ba rang 'byung gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan pa/ /
97b4(dkon brtsegs): mi yi dbang pos de ni bdag la bka' stsal gsol/ /phyogs rnams na ni 'gro bar sems can ji snyed gnas/ /de dag kun gyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams dang ni/ /dman dang mchog dang tha ma
97b5(dkon brtsegs): bar ma rgyu ldan mkhyen/ /ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa bdag la bstan du gsol/ /lha dang de bzhin zhugs 'bar sgra ni gang lags dang / /mi'am ci dang mi dang brgya byin lha min dang / /mkha'
97b6(dkon brtsegs): lding lto 'phye tshangs pa'i sgra dang sgra gzhan rnams/ /sangs rgyas rdul bral gsung sgra'i char yang ga la spyod/ /'od bzang nyi ma'i 'od dang nor bu'i 'od rnams dang / /brgya byin 'od dang tshangs
97b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'od rnams ji snyed pa/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas 'od kyis khyab par gda' ba ltar/ /'od rnams de dag thams cad rnam par gsal ma lags/ /sangs rgyas zhing der zab mo'i chos ni rjes
98a1(dkon brtsegs): su 'thob/ /stong pa bdag med sems can gang zag med mkhyen nas/ /yod dang med pa'i mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs nas su/ /dus gsum chu zla 'dra bar
98a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen pa po/ /deng 'dir su zhig theg pa'i mchog la sems btud de/ /su zhig sangs rgyas rigs dang chos kyi rigs la gnas/ /su zhig dkon mchog gsum po rgya chen
98a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par bgyid/ /gang gi ched du 'dzum pa mdzad pa legs par gsungs/ /gal te rgyal ba nyan thos rnams la don ldan gsung / /de tshe bde gshegs 'dzum pa zhabs kyi pus mor
98a4(dkon brtsegs): nub| |gal te rkyen gyi theg pa gsung na phrag par nub/ /gang tshe sangs rgyas theg gsung de tshe spyi bor nub/ /ji ltar khyod kyis 'od zer 'bum snyed rab btang ba/ /bde bar gshegs
98a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gtsug tu nub par gyur lags na/ /phan mdzad lha yi lha ste phan pa mdzad pa po/ /'dir ni sangs rgyas theg pa lung bstan dogs ma mchis/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
98a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rigs kyi bu bzang po mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/
98a7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu bzang po 'di ni bskal pa dgu khri nyis stong na bskal pa legs par sprul pa la 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen por de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
98b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
98b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba de ni 'byor bar 'gyur/ rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / mi
98b3(dkon brtsegs): dang | skye bo mang pos gang bar 'gyur zhing / lag mthil ltar mnyam pa dang / ka tsa lin di ltar reg na 'jam pa dang / me tog gi shing ljon pas brgyan pa dang / rol mo sna tshogs sgrogs
98b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ bza' ba dang / btung ba ni/
98b5(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi longs spyod ltar bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub ste/ mi de dag gi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa ni de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /kun dga'
98b6(dkon brtsegs): po| de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen po de rtag tu thams cad nye bar ston par byed de/ des na 'jig rten gyi khams de bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ sangs rgyas
98b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang rgya chen po la mos pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag tu 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin
99a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo khrir 'gyur ro/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos lo bye bar gnas par 'gyur ro//
99a2(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo/ gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de'i tshe yang / byang chub sems dpa' sgra rnam par grags pa 'di nga'i 'og tu
99a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi khyab bdag ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgra rnam par
99a4(dkon brtsegs): grags pa lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /de nas rigs kyi bu bzang po bar snang de las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
99a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis deng slan chad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum phrag du ma
99a6(dkon brtsegs): dang | chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin nyid las slar ma log pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
99a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang / dbyer ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma tshang ba ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid
99b1(dkon brtsegs): dang | mngon par 'du bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin nyid gsung ba bzhin du bdag kyang de skad mchi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
99b2(dkon brtsegs): bos rigs kyi bu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzang po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjes su thob bam ci na/ khyod ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid gsung ba
99b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar khyod de skad smra/ bzang pos smras pa/ kun dga' bo/ chos thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid thob pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ltar de bzhin
99b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa nyid du thugs su chud de/ de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa gang yin pa der kho bo yang chud cing / ji ltar kho bo chud pa bzhin du sems can thams cad
99b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang chud la/ ji ltar sems can thams cad chud pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang chud pa'i phyir te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni gnyis kyis rab tu
99b6(dkon brtsegs): phye ba ma yin no/ /btsun pa kun dga' bo/ gnyis su med pa ni gang na kun tu shes pa med pa nyid dang / yongs su shes pa med pa nyid do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes yongs su shes pa'i
99b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu bzang po ni
100a1(dkon brtsegs): lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mgo rmongs par bgyid pa ste/ sngon yang sgyu ma'i chos nyid kyis mgo rmongs par bgyis so/ /da yang shes rab dang / ye
100a2(dkon brtsegs): shes kyis mgo rmongs par bgyid do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyi spobs pa ni de ltar bu lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma
100a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bzang po khyod lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mgo rmongs par byed pa bden nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar
100a4(dkon brtsegs): mgo rmongs par mdzad pa de bzhin du bdag kyang mgo rmongs par bgyid lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ bdag med pa nyid kyis sems can du tha
100a5(dkon brtsegs): snyad btags te chos ston pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa nyid kyis gang zag tu chos ston pa 'di ni mgo rmongs par bgyid pa chen po lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de bzhin
100a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas ni byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs nas chos 'ga' yang 'chi 'pho ba'am/ 'gro ba'am/ skye ba mi gzigs mod kyi/ 'chi 'pho dang / 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i chos ston par
100a7(dkon brtsegs): yang mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags pas de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par gsung ba bka' stsol ba ltar/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi yul ga la lags/
100b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod ji skad smra ba de kho na bzhin te/ 'di lta ste/ bdag med pa
100b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis sems can du tha snyad btags te chos ston pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa nyid kyis gang zag tu chos ston pa 'di ni mgo rmongs pa chen po yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs
100b3(dkon brtsegs): pas ni byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs nas chos 'ga' yang 'chi 'pho ba'am/ 'gro ba'am/ skye ba ma gzigs mod kyi/ 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i chos ston par yang mdzad
100b4(dkon brtsegs): de| 'di la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'am/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir chos bstan pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang med do/ /de nas rigs kyi bu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la
100b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'byung bar gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod kyis rigs kyi bu bzang po rab tu phyung zhig/ de nas byams
100b6(dkon brtsegs): pas rigs kyi bu bzang po rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/ /rab tu phyung / rdzogs par bsnyen nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
100b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni kha dog dang / rtags dang / tshul gyis rab tu 'byung ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig
101a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma thams cad la yang chags pa ma mchis la/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du khams gsum na yang gnas na/ de ni byang chub sems
101a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi rab tu byung ba lags so/ /yang de'i tshe bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags lnga stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /dge
101a3(dkon brtsegs): slong nyis brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
101a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di'i ming ji skad gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya bar
101a5(dkon brtsegs): yang gzung zhig/ rim gyis byang chub yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' gang de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar 'dod pa
101a6(dkon brtsegs): dang | sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bya bar 'dod pa des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ gzhan dag la yang bstan par
101a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ gang gis 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rab tu bstan pa des ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
101b1(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ des ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang byas pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na khyod kyis skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang
101b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ kun dga' bo/ chos
101b3(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gis byang chub yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di las yang dag par 'byung ba de dag ni theg pa chen po 'di las yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /des
101b4(dkon brtsegs): na chos ni rnam grangs 'di byang chub la yang dag par 'byung ba zhes kun dga' bo khyod mos par bya'o/ /khong du chud par bya'o/ /gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam du byed pa
101b5(dkon brtsegs): 'am| lus la bsrel ba de'i lus la de bzhin gshegs pa yod pa yin na gang dag gis thos nas de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la
101b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskul ba zhes bgyi lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
101b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ 'di ltar bdag gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa'i slad du lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
102a1(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ rigs kyi bu bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang /
102a2(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen por chos kyi rnam
102a3(dkon brtsegs): grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya ba ste 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
102a4(dkon brtsegs): pradz+nyA war ma dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya ma hA pra ti hAR+ya nir de sha nA ma
102a5(dkon brtsegs): ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
102a6(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge
102a7(dkon brtsegs): slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas lha'i bu ded dpon zhes bya
102b1(dkon brtsegs): ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu ded dpon gyis
102b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa cho 'phrul du zhig gis sems can rnams 'dul bar mdzad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
102b3(dkon brtsegs): pa| lha'i bu/ nga ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do/ /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul
102b4(dkon brtsegs): dang | rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lo/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul de gang zhe na/ thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus gzigs pa gang yin pa dang / sems
102b5(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa mkhyen cing gzigs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum po dag la ma dad pa rnams dad par mdzad pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa
102b6(dkon brtsegs): dang | de bzhin gshegs pas gang zag gang la da ltar byung ba na nyes par spyad pa'i gzhi ngan song dang / ngan 'gro gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni de kho na bzhin du 'gyur
102b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi| gzhan du ma yin no zhes kun brjod par mdzad pa dang / gang zag de sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus ngan song rnams las thar nas lha dang mi dag tu skye bar 'gyur
103a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing theg pa gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / yang na nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ yang na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ yang na theg pa chen pos nges
103a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa ji snyed gcig gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa ji lta bus sangs rgyas
103a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar 'gyur zhing / mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /mkhyen nas kyang de ni de kho na
103a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du ma yin no zhes de kho na bzhin du kun brjod par mdzad pa dang / gang zag gang dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus 'dod pa'i khams rnams su skye
103a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi skye mched gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /theg
103a6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa ji snyed cig gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa ji lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong
103a7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur zhing / mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /mkhyen nas kyang de kho na bzhin du kun brjod cing lung ston par
103b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa dang / dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ dman pa'am/ bar ma'am/ mchog gam/ tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mi 'da' ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun brjod pa'i cho
103b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul yin no/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gang zhe na/ bslab pa bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir rjes su ston par mdzad pa gang yin pa ste/ 'di ni bya ba'o/ /'di
103b3(dkon brtsegs): ni bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /'di ni bsten par bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /'di ni bsgrub pa'o/ /'di ni log par bsgrub pa'o/ /chos 'di dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o/ /chos 'di dag
103b4(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam par byang ba'i cha dang mthun pa'o zhes de ltar yon tan thams cad yang dag par blang ba rjes su ston pa dang / mi dge ba thams cad spang ba rjes su ston pa dang / dge ba'i lam gyi tshogs
103b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rjes su ston pa dang / lam 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /lam 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /lam
103b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o zhes rjes su ston pa gang yin pa ste/ de dag ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrubs na gnas gang yin pa de rjes su 'thob par mi
103b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin/ skabs ma yin te/ de ni gnas med do/ /las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su khrid par byed do/ /las 'di yang dag par
104a1(dkon brtsegs): blangs na ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams su khrid par byed do/ /las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su khrid par byed do/ /las 'di
104a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par blangs na ni lha rnams su khrid par byed do/ /las 'di gang dag par blangs na ni mi rnams su khrid par byed do/ /de la gang dag mi dge ba spangs na dge ba yang dag par
104a3(dkon brtsegs): blang ba'i phyir 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam du 'jug pa de dag ni lha dang mi rnams su skyes nas rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / tshul de
104a4(dkon brtsegs): lta bus kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / rmongs pa med pa'i rjes su ston par mdzad pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/ /de la de bzhin
104a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gang zhe na/ gang dag rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dul ba'i sems can nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas bcom pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi cho
104a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul kun tu ston par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ gcig tu gyur nas du mar 'gyur ro/ /du mar gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /snang bar 'gyur zhing mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rtsig pa
104a7(dkon brtsegs): la yang thad kar 'gro'o/ /ra ba la yang mi thogs par thad kar 'gro'o/ /ri la yang mi thogs par thad kar 'gro'o/ /sa la steng du 'byung ba dang bye'u zul byed de/ dper na/ chu la
104b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba bzhin no/ /chu la yang mi nub par 'gro ste/ dper na/ sa la bya ba bzhin no/ /nam mkha' la yang 'gro ste/ dper na/ 'dab chags bya bzhin no/ /lus kyi stod nas me 'bar bar byed
104b2(dkon brtsegs): cing lus kyi smad nas chu'i rgyun 'bab par byed do/ /lus kyi smad nas me 'bar bar byed cing lus kyi stod nas chu'i rgyun 'bab par byed do/ /nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul
104b3(dkon brtsegs): che ba| 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar gzi brjid che ba la yang lag pas 'dzin cing kun tu nyug par byed do/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du yang lus kyis dbang bsgyur ro/ /stong gsum
104b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang kun tu 'bar bar ston te/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i khyad par ci dang ci lta bus sems
104b5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa dag mngon par sgrub par byed de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yin no/ /lha'i bu/ nga ni cho
104b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ cho 'phrul de
104b7(dkon brtsegs): dag ma lags pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan ci zhig mnga' lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu/ yod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal
105a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ cho 'phrul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang thos na zab mo la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
105a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi phyogs kyang shin tu tshar gcad par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di yang
105a3(dkon brtsegs): yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs la khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la
105a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya
105a5(dkon brtsegs): mtsho chen po'i chab kyi phung po gang lags pa de thams cad phyag gi khyor ba ya gcig tu stsal kyang chab kyi sems can rnams la yang gnod par mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
105a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la ni cho 'phrul 'di mnga' lags so/ /yang 'di ni cho 'phrul dam pa lags te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas brjod du ma mchis pa dang / yi ge ma mchis
105a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bsnyad du ma mchis pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / sgra ma mchis pa dang / dbyangs
105b1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa dang / tshig gi lam ma mchis pa dang / rgyu mtshan ma mchis pa dang / mtshan nyid ma mchis pa dang / spyod pa ma mchis pa dang / rgyu ba ma mchis pa dang / kun tu 'byung ba ma
105b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dus ma bgyis pa dang / sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang / tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang /
105b3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba dang / byang ba dang / phra ba dang / mthong bar dka' ba dang / rtag tu ma mchis pa dang / rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ yi ge
105b4(dkon brtsegs): dang | nges pa'i tshig dang / brda dang / tha snyad kyi lam de dang de dag gis chos de dag gzhan dag la rnam par rig par mdzad pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags
105b5(dkon brtsegs): so| |lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis de'i gting mi rtogs shing / dmigs pa dang / mtshan ma dang / yongs su rtog pa dang bcas pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze thams cad dngang
105b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'jug par mi 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen
105b7(dkon brtsegs): po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zhal gyi sgor stsal kyang gling chen po bzhi pa'i sems can rnams dang / dgung zla dang / gdugs dag dang / khor yug rnams dang / ri dang / shing gel
106a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnams la yang sgrib par mi 'gyur ba dang / slar phyung ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod kyang sems can rnams kyang 'di ltar
106a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag yul gang du bkod pa dang / bdag cag yul gang nas bton pa yang mi 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so/ /
106a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni cho 'phrul chen po dam pa lags te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas brjod du ma mchis pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa dang / bsnyad du ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang /
106a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang / tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang / zhi ba dang / byang ba
106a5(dkon brtsegs): dang | phra ba dang / mthong bar dka' ba dang / brtag tu ma mchis pa dang / rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa'i bar gyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ yi
106a6(dkon brtsegs): ge dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda dang / tha snyad kyi lam de dang de dag gis chos de bstan pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
106a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang ldan pa'i cho 'phrul de dag thams cad ni mtshan ma'i dngos po dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kun nas 'dren par mdzad
106b1(dkon brtsegs): pa lags so/ /'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags te/ 'di lta ste/ bdag ma mchis pa la bdag tu tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / sems can ma mchis pa la sems can du tha
106b2(dkon brtsegs): snyad 'dogs pa dang / srog ma mchis pa la srog tu tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / gso ba ma mchis pa la gso bar tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / gang zag ma mchis pa la gang zag tu tha snyad 'dogs pa
106b3(dkon brtsegs): dang | shed las skyes pa ma mchis pa la shed las skyes su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / shed bu ma mchis pa la shed bur tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / ming ma mchis pa la ming du tha snyad 'dogs
106b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa la gzugs su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / tshor ba ma mchis pa la tshor bar tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / 'du shes ma mchis pa la 'du shes su tha snyad 'dogs
106b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'du byed rnams ma mchis pa la 'du byed rnams su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa la rnam par shes par tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / phung po ma mchis pa
106b6(dkon brtsegs): la phung por tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / khams ma mchis pa la khams su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / skye mched ma mchis pa la skye mched du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / mig stong zhes bgyi ba tha
106b7(dkon brtsegs): snyad 'dogs kyang mig ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / gzugs stong ngo zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang gzugs ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems
107a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang /
107a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus dang / reg
107a3(dkon brtsegs): bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang yid ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / chos rnams stong zhes bgyi bar tha
107a4(dkon brtsegs): snyad 'dogs kyang chos rnams ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa
107a5(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems te/ 'di ltar bem po dang / sems pa ma mchis pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis
107a6(dkon brtsegs): p a'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan dag la yang dag par go bar mdzad pa gang lags pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags
107a7(dkon brtsegs): te| cho 'phrul de ni mig dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ gzugs dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ rna ba dang ldan pa yang ma
107b1(dkon brtsegs): lags/ sgra dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ sna dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ dri dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa
107b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lce dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ ro dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lus dang ldan pa yang ma lags/
107b3(dkon brtsegs): reg bya dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ yid dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ chos rnams dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ yid kyi rnam
107b4(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags te/ de lta bu'i cho 'phrul de ni yul ma mchis pa'i cho 'phrul lags so/ /de ni yul dang bral ba'i cho 'phrul lags te/ cho 'phrul
107b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni lus dang ldan par lta ba ma lags/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang ldan par lta ba ma lags te/ de'i slad du cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad
107b6(dkon brtsegs): glo ba mi ches par 'gyur ba lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba ni phung po lnga po dag lags te/ phung po lnga po mi rtag pa de la byis pa rnams mngon par zhen
107b7(dkon brtsegs): cing | de dag gi phung po lnga po dag rtag par bzung ba'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches par 'gyur ba lags so/ /'jig rten gyi phung po lnga
108a1(dkon brtsegs): po dag rtag ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na/ de dag mi rtag go zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches pa lags so/ /'jig rten ni phung po lnga po
108a2(dkon brtsegs): dag bde zhes bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na/ de dag sdug bsngal lo zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches pa lags so/ /'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag bdag ces bgyi
108a3(dkon brtsegs): bar glo ba ches pas na de dag bdag ma mchis so zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so/ /'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag sdug ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas
108a4(dkon brtsegs): na| de dag mi sdug go zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so/ /'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag bdag gi zhes bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na/ de dag bdag po ma
108a5(dkon brtsegs): mchis so zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so/ /'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag yang dag par zhes bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na/ de dag yang dag pa ma lags
108a6(dkon brtsegs): so zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches pa lags te/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul de ni/ 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches par 'gyur ba lags
108a7(dkon brtsegs): so| |cho 'phrul de la ni sems rangs par mi 'gyur lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so/ /cho 'phrul de ni mig tu bgrang ba ma lags/ gzugs su bgrang ba
108b1(dkon brtsegs): ma lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni mig dang gzugs kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa lags so/ /cho 'phrul de ni rna bar bgrang ba ma lags/ sgrar bgrang ba ma lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni rna
108b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang sgra'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa lags so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ cho 'phrul de ni yid du bgrang ba ma lags/ chos su bgrang ba ma lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni yid dang /
108b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa lags so/ /cho 'phrul de ni shes pa'i spyod yul ma lags/ rangs par bgyid pa ma lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni rnam par rig par bgyi ba ma
108b4(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /stong pa nyid ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ stong pa nyid brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ mtshan ma ma
108b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /smon pa ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ smon pa ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /mngon par 'du bgyi ba
108b6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /skye ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ skye
108b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni tshe 'phrul lags so/ /'byung ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /dngos po
109a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ dngos po ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /mtshan nyid ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis
109a2(dkon brtsegs): pa lags na/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /'gag pa ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho
109a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul lags so/ /mya ngan las 'das pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ mya ngan las 'das pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /'di lta ste/ bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis
109a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems can du kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / byang chub la rloms sems ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /'di lta ste/
109a5(dkon brtsegs): lus g.yo ba ma mchis pa dang / ngag brjod pa ma mchis pa dang / sems rgyu ba ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /'di lta
109a6(dkon brtsegs): ste| sred par sgro 'dogs pa ma mchis pa dang / sems skad cig tu 'jig pa dang / lus dang sems rnam par mi rtog pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bzod pa de ni cho
109a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul lags so/ /'di lta ste/ blang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus de ni cho 'phrul
109b1(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /'di lta ste/ nang nye bar zhi ba dang / phyi rol du rgyu ba ma mchis pa dang / sems bsam pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan de ni cho 'phrul
109b2(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /'di lta ste/ ngar 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa dang / nga yi ba rnam par spangs pa dang / nga yi ra 'dzin pa bor ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba'i 'khor gsum
109b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa'i shes rab de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos thams cad ni rnam par bral ba ma mchis pa lags na/ de dag rnam par bral bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos
109b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa lags na/ rang gi ngo bo dang bral bar bshad pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos thams cad ni dbyer ma mchis pa lags na/ yi ges kun tu phye ste
109b5(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos thams cad ni 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gro ba ma mchis pa lags na/ 'ong ba dang 'gro bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos thams
109b6(dkon brtsegs): cad ni 'byung ba ma mchis pa lags na/ 'byung bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos thams cad ni mngon par rtogs pa gcig pa lags na/ 'bras bu rnam par dgod
109b7(dkon brtsegs): pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos thams cad ni ro gcig pa lags na/ theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer ma
110a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa lags na/ chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad ni sangs rgyas gcig pa lags na/
110a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dpag tu ma mchis par bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /zhing thams cad zhing gcig pa lags na/ zhing sna tshogs bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /sems can
110a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni sems can gcig pa lags na/ sems can gyi rim pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos thams cad ni chos gcig pa lags na/ tha ma dang mchog dang bar
110a4(dkon brtsegs): mar bshad pa'i cho 'phrul lags so/ /chos thams cad ni rnam par bsgrubs pa ma mchis pa lags na/ rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /
110a5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa lags na/ gzhan la rnam par rig pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ /de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur
110a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na ji tsam du brjod pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni cho 'phrul yin no/ /'jam
110a7(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni brjod du ma mchis pa yin pas de dag brjod pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po
110b1(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
110b2(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i bu ded dpon la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu/ ci khyod cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di thos nas skrag par mi 'gyur ram/ lha'i bus
110b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ kho bo nyid kyang cho 'phrul yin na de la/ kho bo skrag par 'gyur du ci yod/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ lha'i bu/ khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/
110b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bus smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad ni 'pho ba med pa yin na/ de la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos 'pho ba gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin no/ /btsun pa
110b5(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis kho bo lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ bdag nyid chen po 'di yang thob pa'i dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa de ni
110b6(dkon brtsegs): sems par mi byed cing rnam par shes par mi byed do/ /de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang sems par mi byed cing / rnam par shes par mi byed de/ rnam
110b7(dkon brtsegs): par shes par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du las rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /klu rnams
111a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi klu'i yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /bsam gtan pa rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
111a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste/ de lta bas na chos thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa de ni
111a3(dkon brtsegs): cho 'phrul chen po yin no/ /yang gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad du/ lha'i bu/ ci khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa gang yin pa de thos na skrag par mi 'gyur ram
111a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes zer ba ni/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci de bzhin gshegs pas cho 'phrul bstan pa gang yin pa des nam mkha'i khams skrag par 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ de ni ma
111a5(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas cho 'phrul bstan pa des nam mkha'i khams skrag par mi 'gyur na kho bo yang skrag par mi 'gyur
111a6(dkon brtsegs): ro| |smras pa/ lha'i bu/ ci khyod nam mkha' yin nam/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ kho bo ni nam mkha' yin no/ /smras pa/ lha'i bu/ khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/
111a7(dkon brtsegs): sgras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci bcom ldan 'das kyis nang gi nam mkha'i khams su gsungs pa gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams su gsungs pa gang
111b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de nyid nam mkha'i khams ma yin nam/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ de ni yin no/ /smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khams kyi rang
111b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin can yin no/ /smras pa/ lha'i bu/ ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa bzhin du khyod nyid kyang ring po ma thogs par cho 'phrul de dag nyid nye bar ston par 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa
111b3(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu/ cho 'phrul de dag ni nye bar bstan par mi nus so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ cho 'phrul de dag ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
111b4(dkon brtsegs): la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lha'i bu ded dpon 'di de lta bur ston pa las na 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis shing /
111b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yang bsnyen bkur bgyis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ shA
111b6(dkon brtsegs): ra dwa ti'i bu/ lha'i bu ded dpon 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su smin par byas pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i
111b7(dkon brtsegs): yang ches grangs med pa 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bskal pa mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
112a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/
112a2(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba
112a3(dkon brtsegs): de yang 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can rnams bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gnas shing / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba'i sgra 'ga' tsam yang med la/ 'jig rten
112a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams de yang rin po che sna bzhi gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel las grub cing / lag mthil ltar mnyam la/ ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na 'jam zhing / mi
112a5(dkon brtsegs): khom pa dang / ngan song rnams dang bral la/ lha dang mi rnams kyis kun tu gang zhing / yid la bsams pa tsam gyis bza' ba dang btung ba dag 'byor la/ bde ba tshad med pa dang
112a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas na de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig ste/ brtson 'grus 'bar ba/ shes rab
112a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi snang ba thob pa/ gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po thob pa/ spobs pa mi chod pa/ tshig thams cad rab tu 'byed cing ston pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam par
112b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa khong du chud pa/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la
112b2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar rigs pa bzhin du chos kyi sman sbyor ba la mkhas pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa/ gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes
112b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyen byed pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / brtan pa dang / blo
112b4(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho'i rjes su zhugs pa/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / shes rab la shin tu gnas pa/ thabs mtha' yas pas dge ba'i
112b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pas shin tu zhugs pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam
112b6(dkon brtsegs): par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pas rnam par rtse ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
112b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de'i gsung rab la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos
113a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyal po gling bzhi'i dbang phyug/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa/ mi'i dbang por gyur pa lta bu zhig byung bar gyur to/ /de'i bu stong du tshang bar gyur te/
113a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de yang btsun mo'i
113a3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs rnams dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
113a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de'i sku tshe'i tshad dang / mi dag gi tshe tshad ni lo dung phyur phrag bdun du gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa bu stong dang lhan cig/
113a5(dkon brtsegs): btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu chos la dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dad pa thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
113a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo 'bum tshang bar thugs la dgongs pa bzhin du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims
113a7(dkon brtsegs): cha dang | gdan dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/ /rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa 'khor dang bcas pas
113b1(dkon brtsegs): rtag par rgyun du de bzhin gshegs pa de la mngon sum du nyin gcig mi 'chad par rang gi lag nas gus par phul zhing / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos nyan pa la yang 'jug par gyur to/ /
113b2(dkon brtsegs): de bu dang bcas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas lo 'bum 'das nas kyang yang dang yang du sangs rgyas mthong zhing / yang dang yang du de la chos nyan pas rjes su dran pa bzhi thob par
113b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / sbyin pa dang ldan zhing byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i tshul khrims
113b4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran pa ste/ rjes su dran pa bzhi po de dag thob par gyur to/ /de rjes su dran pa bzhi po de dag dang ldan pas nyin mtshan du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos yang dag par bgro ba dang /
113b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mthong ba dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa bu dang bcas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa de chos mnyan
113b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
113b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas rjes su gdams pa mdzad par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan
114a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de la rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
114a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ cho 'phrul de dag ma lags pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan ma mchis lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
114a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ cho 'phrul de dag ma yin pa'i cho 'phrul dam
114a4(dkon brtsegs): pa gzhan yang yod do/ /de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems dang sems las byung ba gzugs can ma yin pa rnams bshad pa dang / sems dang sems las byung ba 'gags pa
114a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams bshad pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba mi gnas pa rnams smos pa dang / ma skyes ma byung ba'i lam bshad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo ro gcig
114a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la yan lag gsum du smos pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa gcig tu 'dus pa la bden pa bzhir yongs su brjod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam pa med pa
114a7(dkon brtsegs): dang | 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub la yongs su sgrub par byed pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams bshad pa dang / phyin ci
114b1(dkon brtsegs): log dang nyon mongs pas grub pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i chos rnams la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /
114b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / byas pa med pa'i chos rnams la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / 'byung ba med cing skad cig ma'i chos rnams la bzod pa'i pha
114b3(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / lus dang sems dben pa'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / bsdus pa dang / rnam par g.yengs pa med pa'i chos rnams
114b4(dkon brtsegs): la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / pha rol dang / tshu rol med pa'i chos rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / brtag pa dang / bsal ba med
114b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos rnams la thabs mkhas pa yod pa dang / skyob pa med pa dang / rton pa med pa'i chos rnams la byams pa bsgom pa dang / bya ba med pa dang / gzhig pa med pa'i chos rnams
114b6(dkon brtsegs): la snying rjes sbyor ba dang / dga' ba med pa'i chos rnams la dga' ba mngon par sgrub pa dang / gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams la btang snyoms bsgom pa dang / shes pa med pa dang /
114b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i mig mngon par sgrub pa dang / thos pa med pa dang / rnam par rig pa med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i rna ba mngon par sgrub pa dang / dmigs
115a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems pa dang / rnam par bral ba'i chos rnams la pha rol gyi sems shes pa yod pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang bral ba'i chos rnams la sngon
115a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa yod pa dang / sems dang / lus dang / sgra dang / brtson 'grus dang bral ba'i chos rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'thob pa dang / gnas pa
115a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i chos rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yang dag pa'i spong ba bsgom pa dang / dbang po med pa'i
115a4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la dbang po bstan pa dang / stobs med pa dang / nyam chung ba'i chos rnams la stobs yongs su brjod pa dang / nye bar zhi ba'i chos rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag
115a5(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa dang / khyad par med pa'i chos rnams la lam smos pa dang / zhi ba'i mthar song ba'i chos rnams la zhi gnas bskyed pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi
115a6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mya ngan las 'das par smon pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan
115a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de dang / bu stong po de dag dang / btsun mo'i tshogs
115b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag la cho 'phrul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de nyid las brtsams te/ de lta de ltar chos bstan pa dang srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
115b2(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems skyes so/ /rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa dang / de'i bu stong gis ni chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de dag gis bzod pa thob nas sangs
115b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi spobs pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di
115b4(dkon brtsegs): dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na ni/ /lhun po'i rgyal po mdzes pa ltar/ /de bzhin dge 'dun dbus na ni/ /chos kyi rgyal po rnam par mdzes/ /ji ltar
115b5(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma 'char ba yis/ /mun pa thams cad sel ba ltar/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas mdzod spu yang / /sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang bar bgyid/ /ji ltar zla ba nya ba yis/ /zla ba yongs
115b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs lhang nge ltar/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rdzogs pa yi/ /'jig rten mgon yang lhang nge lags/ /ji ltar me tog pad+ma ni/ /chab kyi nang du mi gos ltar/ /de bzhin 'jig
115b7(dkon brtsegs): rten mgon po yang / /'jig rten chos kyis mi gos lags/ /ji ltar seng ge ri dwags rgyal/ /nags na sgra skad sgrogs pa ltar/ /de bzhin skyes bu seng ge yang / /stong pa nyid kyi
116a1(dkon brtsegs): sgra skad sgrogs/ /mchis sam yang na ma mchis dang / /mchis dang ma mchis thams cad dang / /mthar lta ba la rnam 'das pas/ /nges par seng ge sgra zhes
116a2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi| |skye ba'am yang na 'jig pa'ang rung / /de dag mtshan mar bstan 'dzin cing / /mi skye 'gag pa ma mchis pa/ /nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ /pha rol dang ni tshu rol
116a3(dkon brtsegs): dag| de dag rnam par rtog par bstan/ /chos rnams kun la mi gnas pa/ /nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnams byang ba/ /de gnyis mtshan nyid ma
116a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis te/ /shin tu dri ma ma mchis chos/ /nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ni/ /yongs su rtog las byung ba ste/ /rtog bral rnam rtog ma mchis
116a5(dkon brtsegs): pa| |nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ /'khor ba dag ni mya ngan 'das/ /de dag lam du gzhug pa ste/ /chos rnams shin tu gsog lags pa/ /nges pa seng ge'i sgra zhes
116a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyi| |skye dang 'chi dang 'khor ba ni/ /phyin ci log las byung ba ste/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med don/ /nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ /lta dang dmigs pa gnas lags
116a7(dkon brtsegs): te| |de dag gis ni 'jig rten 'jug/ chos rnams stong par rab bshad pa/ /nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ /'jig rten mgon pos cho 'phrul ni/ /gang dag ji snyed
116b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan mdzad pa/ /de dag thams cad bshad pa ni/ /nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ /sems ni mnyam pa nyid slad du/ /rjes su mthun dang mi mthun pa'i/ /gang la'ang sems ni mi
116b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa/ /de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad pa yi/ /zab cing zhi la mthun bgyid cing / /de la rtsod par mi bgyid pa/ /de ni rjes mthun bzod pa
116b3(dkon brtsegs): lags/ /mi dge thams cad ma gtogs par/ /dge chos rnams la 'jug 'gyur zhing / /de la'ang gnas par mi bgyid pa/ /de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags/ /stong pa'i sgra dang
116b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can sgra/ /de bzhin lta ba'i sgra dang ni/ /sgra rnams kun la ma chags pa/ /de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags/ /sangs rgyas sgra dang nyon mongs sgra/ /rnam mang chos kyi sgra
116b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / /gang gi sgra'ang mi rtog pa/ /de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims thos pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab dang / /de bzhin
116b6(dkon brtsegs): kun la brtson bgyid pa/ /de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags/ /thams cad bdag la sems mnyam zhing / /byang chub sems ni mi spong la/ /byang chub lam ni ston bgyid pa/ /
116b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la/ /de 'dra'i chos ni ston mdzad de/ /de la som nyi ma mchis pa/ /de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags /
117a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang byang chub sangs rgyas shing / /seng ge'i sgra skad bsgrags nas ni/ /ji ltar 'dren pas bstan mdzad pa'i/ /cho 'phrul nges par bstan par
117a2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi/ |zhing 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /bla med bsod nams zhing de la/ /bdag gis sa bon btab pas na/ /bdag ni slar mdog ma mchis lags/ /dog sa thams
117a3(dkon brtsegs): cad rdol 'gyur zhing / /rgya mtsho'ang bas par 'gyur ba bzhin/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la bskrun pa yi/ /sa bon nam yang chab mi 'tshal/ /sems can rnams kyi sems 'tshal
117a4(dkon brtsegs): cing | |nam mkha' gzhal bar rngo thogs kyi/ byang chub tu ni bskrun pa'i sems/ /de ni bsod nams tshad ma mchis/ /bdag gi bsam ba ci 'dra ba'i/ /dbang dag lha dang dri
117a5(dkon brtsegs): za dang / /mi rnams gzhan dag ma mchis te/ /bcom ldan 'das nyid bdag gi dbang / /'dren pa bdag ni longs spyod dang / /gzugs dang mtho ris mi 'tshal gyi/ /
117a6(dkon brtsegs): mi mchog khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni/ /ci 'dra de ltar bdag gyur cig /byang chub lam ni dmigs bgyis nas/ /bdag gis dgung lo 'bum du ni/ /ma chags sdang ba ma
117a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis par/ /bdag gis bde gshegs bsnyen bkur bgyis/ /bdag gis byis pa stong rnams dang / /mchis 'brang yongs su smin bgyis pa/ /gang lags 'di
117b1(dkon brtsegs): dag sangs rgyas kyi/ /byang chub slad du spro bar mdzad/ /bdag gis bde gshegs lam mthong zhing / /chos 'di legs par thos pa dang / /byang chub la ni rtag dga' ba/ /
117b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed/ /gang zhig byang chub dga' bgyid pa/ /de ni chos la'ang rtag tu dga'/ /chos rnams spong bar mi bgyid pa/ /sems can kun la
117b3(dkon brtsegs): rtag dga' lags/ /de nas 'khor de nyid du chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba zhig 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des/ /rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa la 'di
117b4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul de dag dang mthun par ma byas kyi/ mi mthun par byas pas na/ khyod ni gnas ma yin pa
117b5(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po/ byang chub ni chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas la gnas pas 'jug pa med pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub ni tshor ba
117b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad med pas shes pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub ni blang pa med cing dor ba med pas/ blang ba med la dor ba med pa yin no/ /rgyal po
117b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po/ byang chub ni nam mkha' la bris pa dang 'dra bas gzugs med pa/ kha dog med pa/ rtags med pa/ dbyibs med pa yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub ni rang
118a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis yongs su dag cing gnyen po med pa yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub ni chos thams cad dang mnyam pas thams cad kyi rjes su
118a2(dkon brtsegs): song ba yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas g.yo ba med pa yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub ni rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid yin
118a3(dkon brtsegs): pas zhi ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub ni brtag pa dang / bsal ba dang bral bas nye bar zhi ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub ni mi mthun pa med pas lhag par g.yo
