118a4(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub ni yongs su grub pa med pas sems mnyam pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pas sems can dang
118a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub ni rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pas skye ba med pas rab tu phye ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub ni sems dang / yid
118a6(dkon brtsegs): dang | rnam par shes pa dang bral bas rnam par rig pa med pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas rgyu ba med pa'o/ /rgyal
118a7(dkon brtsegs): po chen po/ byang chub ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral bas spros pa med pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pas stong pa'o/ /rgyal
118b1(dkon brtsegs): po chen po/ byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas mtshan ma med pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub ni smon pa dang bral bas smon pa med pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub
118b2(dkon brtsegs): ni las kyi rnam par smin pa med pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub ni mtshan nyid gsum dang bral bas 'dus ma byas pa ste/ rgyal po chen po/ gang
118b3(dkon brtsegs): dag byang chub kyi mtshan nyid de lta bu dang / ngo bo nyid de lta bu la sgrub par byed pa dang / gang dag smon lam 'debs par byed pa dang / gang dag mngon par dga' bar byed pa
118b4(dkon brtsegs): dang | gang dag 'dod par byed pa de dag thams cad ni log par rtsol ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po/ byang chub ci 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang de
118b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba yin pas na/ gang dag de ltar spyod pa de dag ni yang dag par spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// //bam po gnyis pa/ de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas chos
118b6(dkon brtsegs): smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig /de skad
118b7(dkon brtsegs): ces smras pa dang / chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ sems can thams cad la rlom sems
119a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /tshul khrims kyis
119a2(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
119a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa yin no/ /bzod pas rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis tha ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / 'chab pa'i yongs su gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi
119a4(dkon brtsegs): y ongs su gdung ba thams cad 'byin par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no| |brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis brtson
119a5(dkon brtsegs): 'grus brtan zhing 'bar ba dang / zhum pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bsam
119a6(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa sgrub pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /shes rab kyis rlom sems su mi
119a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa'i shes rab tshogs yongs su tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /gnyis dang bral ba'i btang snyoms mnyam pa
119b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis tshangs pa'i gnas pa bskyed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ mngon par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mngon par shes pa
119b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /don dang chos la nges par sems pa mnyam pa nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ni/ byang chub sems
119b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /chos kyi dbyings g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rton pa la mos pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /yang dag par
119b4(dkon brtsegs): skye ba med pa'i sems kyis nges par sems mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sdud pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /
119b5(dkon brtsegs): don mthun pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yang dag par 'dzin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sems kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa
119b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /nam mkha' yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs
119b7(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa dang / zhing yongs su dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /mtshan nyid
120a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi tshogs yang dag par sdud pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
120a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yin no/ /lus dang / ngag dang / sems mnyam pa nyid kyis lus dang / ngag dang / sems brgyan pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sems can
120a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la bdag med par mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad la ci zhig bya snyam du spro ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /rmi lam gyi rang
120a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin lta bur mos pa mnyam pa nyid kyis 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la mos pa med
120a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mnyam pa nyid kyis legs par spyod pa'i las byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /chos sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyis brtul
120a6(dkon brtsegs): zhugs dang dka' thub kyi go cha bgos pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sdug bsngal skye ba med par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sdug bsngal thams
120a7(dkon brtsegs): cad bzod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /mdza' bshes dang / mdza' bshes ma yin pa la sems snyoms pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mdza' ba
120b1(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /lan la re ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la sbyor ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
120b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yin no/ /thos pa dang sgrub pa mnyam pa nyid kyis thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa
120b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /chos dben pa mnyam pa nyid kyis dam pa'i chos yongs
120b4(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /don dam pa'i bden pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bden pa'i shes pa yongs su tshol ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
120b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sems can la shin tu 'dud pa mnyam pa nyid kyis nga rgyal nges par bcom pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /yon tan thams
120b6(dkon brtsegs): cad yang dag par blangs pas rlom sems su med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis yon tan thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba yongs su tshol pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
120b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yin no/ /de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid kyi spyod pa de dag thos nas/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi
121a1(dkon brtsegs): rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ gos dang rgyan ci gyon pa rnams kyis chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal
121a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan la mngon par bkab bo/ /bu stong po de dag gis kyang rang rang gi rgyan dag gis chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la bkab nas/ tshig 'di skad du/ gang bdag
121a3(dkon brtsegs): cag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dag rnyed pa ni/ bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /sems can thams
121a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de lta bu dang / spobs pa de lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /ces smras so/ /de nas chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan
121a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di lta ste/ gos dang rgyan tsam gyis mchod pa de ni/ mchod pa chen po ma yin gyi/ de las
121a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan pa'i mchod pa khyad par du 'phags pa dag kyang yod kyi/ de dag khyod kyis sgrubs shig /de yang gang zhe na/ de nas de'i tshe chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi
121a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang dag stong chen sems can de dag kun/ /byang chub phyir ni rab tu zhugs gyur cing / /ma zhum sems
121b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis bskal pa rdzogs par ni/ /bu dang chung ma'i sbyin pa byas pa bas/ /gang gis byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed nas/ /de bzhin du ni rjes su bslabs pa dang / /rab byung
121b2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi gom pa gcig bor ba/ /de ni de bas bsod nams khyad par 'phags/ /gang dag sngon chad byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / /gang dag ma byon byung dang bzhugs pa rnams/ /
121b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag skyon mang khab ni ma spangs par/ /bla med byang chub zhi ba thob pa med/ /rab byung de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /rab tu bstod cing bsngags la bkur ba ste/ /
121b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig sangs rgyas kun la mchod 'dod pa/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la rab byung gzung bar gyis/ /gang zhig khyim gnas rin chen khyim brgyan pa'i/ /gang+gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas
121b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing byin dang / /gang zhig rab byung nyid dang mtshan gcig tu/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med sems byed na/ /gang zhig rab byung bag yod gyur pa yi/ /byang chub sems
121b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' byang chub nye ba dang / /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu bcom byas shing / /dge ba'i phyogs kyang mi 'grib 'phel ba yin/ /rab byung de ni lam ngan spangs pa dang / /las
121b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rjes mthun 'phags pa'i skye bos bstod/ /de na dge ba chud za ma yin zhing / /de ni yongs su 'dzin pa spangs pa yin/ /khyim las grol ba nyon mongs mi 'phel zhing / /
122a1(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs rnam grol bdud kyi 'ching ba med/ /rnam grol sems ni byang chub spyad pa spyod/ /spyod pa dag pas byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /de nas
122a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / longs spyod dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dag la mi lta bar gyur cing /
122a3(dkon brtsegs): skyo la 'dod chags dang bral ba skyes par gyur te/ rab tu 'byung ba la sems gzhol bar gnas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de la 'di skad
122a4(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob lags sam/ bcom
122a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu des bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ rab tu byung ba ni dgag pa med pa ste/ sems can thams cad la yang bar du mi gcod
122a6(dkon brtsegs): cing skabs yod do/ /khyim na gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa'i nang na gnas pa yin gyi/ gal te 'dod na ngas khyod la gdams shing rjes su bstan gyi/ khyod kyis kyang gdams
122a7(dkon brtsegs): shing rjes su bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das des rab tu 'byung ba'i skabs phye ba dang / rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas bu stong po de
122b1(dkon brtsegs): dag la smras pa/ khyed cag las rgyal srid grub pa dang / sems can rnams chos yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par spro ba su yod/ de dag thams cad kyis smras pa/ yab/ bdag
122b2(dkon brtsegs): cag kyang dad pas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung lags kyi/ bdag cag mi dor bar gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te khyed thams cad rab tu byung na gling
122b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad rab tu chud zos par 'gyur gyi/ khyed cag las gang sems can rnams la brtan pa'i snying rje chen po
122b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par 'gyur ba des/ rgyal srid bsgrubs la/ sems can rnams la chos yang dag par 'dzin du chug cig /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag gi nang nas/ rgyal bu
122b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu snying rje cher sems zhes bya ba des/ rang gi pha de dang / rgan rabs de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rab byung yon tan du ma bsags pa zhes/ /de bzhin
122b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs mod kyi/ /de ltar lags kyang snying rjer gyur pa na/ /'gro la phan phyir rgyal srid bdag gis bsgrub/ /ji srid 'tsho bar bdag ni tshangs
122b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod cing / /gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa blang bar bgyi/ /me tog rnams dang dri dang byug pa dang / /de bzhin chang yang myang bar mi bgyi'o/ /lus la rgyan rnams kyang ni mi
123a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs shing / /mchil lham mi 'tshal rin chen gtsug phud min/ /khri rkang gser las bgyis par mi nyal shing / /rgyal po'i rkyen gyi gos
123a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi 'tshal lo/ /sil snyan glu dbyangs sgra la mi dga' zhing / /rma bya ngang pa'i sgra la'ang dga' mi bgyid/ /skye bos mdun bdar bud med gnas spong zhing / /gcig pu mal
123a3(dkon brtsegs): na mchis nyal rlung mi g.yab/ /bdag ni gling nas gling du mchi bgyi zhing / /dge ba bcu rnams rab tu bshad par bgyi/ /khyim na gnas pa'i nongs pa bstan bgyi zhing / /rab tu
123a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i bsngags pa'ang brjod par bgyi/ /gzugs dang dbang phyug longs spyod dregs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun bgrod mi bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bskyud
123a5(dkon brtsegs): par mi bgyi zhing / /rtag tu yid byung srid gsum spyad par bgyi/ /sbyin dang snyan smra don spyod don mthun pas/ /sems can bsdu ba la ni brtson bgyi zhing / /bla med theg chen dam
123a6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di la yang / /srog chags bye ba mang po yongs smin bgyi/ /chos don mnyan cing bshad par bya'i slad du/ /nyin mo dus gsum mtshan mo dus gsum du/ /ri rab lta bu'i
123a7(dkon brtsegs): spyan sngar nyer mchi zhing / /de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mchod pa'ang bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu des/ rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher
123b1(dkon brtsegs): sems la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /bslab pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa'i chos kyi yon tan des na khyim par
123b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rab tu byung ba dang yon tan mtshungs pa yin no/ /khyod kyi snying rje chen po des na rab tu byung ba'i yon tan bsgrub pa'ang sgrub par byed pa yin no/ /de nas
123b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas/ rgyal po gzhon nu snying rje cher sems rgyal srid la bzhag nas/ bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas
123b4(dkon brtsegs): khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /de dag rab tu byung nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa des cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di nyid kyis de lta de ltar gdams shing rjes su
123b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pas/ de dag gis ring po mi thogs par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed par gyur to/ /gzungs dang / dran pa dang / chos mnyan pa'i shes pa yang skyes par gyur to/ /rgyal bu
123b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu snying rje cher sems kyang rgyal srid la dbang bskur nas zla ba nya'o cog la gling chen po bzhi po dag tu rjes su ston par byed de/ ci nas kyang srog chags dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
123b7(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / de lta de ltar sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur to/ /de dag thams cad
124a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ theg pa chen po 'dis bla na
124a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag tu gyur to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis ci tsam du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yongs su sbyang ba
124a3(dkon brtsegs): byas pa'i sems can rnams kyi rten du gyur cing / dad pa bskyed par gyur pa'i gsung rab de la ltos/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal
124a4(dkon brtsegs): po dge ba'i bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ lha'i bu ded
124a5(dkon brtsegs): dpon 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ chos smra ba'i dge slong chos
124a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang som nyi za bar gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'jam dpal
124a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod
124b1(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i bu stong tham par gyur pa de dag gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ bskal pa bzang po 'di
124b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi sangs rgyas stong po de dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de'i bu stong tham par gyur to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher
124b3(dkon brtsegs): sems zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu
124b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu snying rje cher sems zhes bya bar gyur to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa rnams ni/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / shes bzhin gyi spyod
124b5(dkon brtsegs): pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par byung ba yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi tshul dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skye
124b6(dkon brtsegs): dgu las/ srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
124b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod ni lha'i bu ded dpon 'di dang lhan cig tu yun ring po nas/ tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas mang
125a1(dkon brtsegs): po la bsnyen bkur byas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshangs par spyod
125a2(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshig bla dwags yin la/ lam ni 'dus byas yin gyi/ kho bo ni 'dus ma byas su rtogs pa yin pas/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun
125a3(dkon brtsegs): ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa ma yin no/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni spyod pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi/ kho bo ni spyod pa med pa dang / rab tu spyod pa
125a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su sbyor ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni
125a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su sbyor ba yang ma yin la/ gnyis su med par sbyor ba yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshangs
125a6(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po yin gyi/ kho bo ni gnyen pos rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ /btsun
125a7(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos las 'byol ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri
125b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos las 'byol ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba
125b2(dkon brtsegs): ni| bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin
125b3(dkon brtsegs): no| |btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad yin gyi/ kho bo ni dge ba dang sdig pa la nges par sbyor ba mi byed de/ de'i phyir kho
125b4(dkon brtsegs): bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa thob pa yin gyi/ kho bo
125b5(dkon brtsegs): ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa thob pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshangs par spyod pa
125b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de ni 'khor ba las 'byol ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni 'khor ba las 'byol ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ /btsun pa shA
125b7(dkon brtsegs): ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam du 'gro ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni mya ngan las 'da' ba don du gnyer ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring
126a1(dkon brtsegs): po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du 'jam dpal khyod ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur
126a2(dkon brtsegs): byas pa yin no zhes zer ba ni/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs med
126a3(dkon brtsegs): cing bstan du med pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshor ba med cing tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur
126a4(dkon brtsegs): bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'du shes med cing 'du shes kyi mdud pa thams cad dang bral ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin
126a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni 'du byed rnams med cing 'dus ma byas brnyes pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par shes pa med cing yid
126a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa med pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni mig dang gzugs kyi yul ma yin zhing / stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul ma yin pas/
126a7(dkon brtsegs): de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rna ba dang sgra'i yul ma yin zhing / mtshan ma med pa'i yul yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa
126b1(dkon brtsegs): dang | de bzhin gshegs pa ni sna dang dri'i yul ma yin zhing / gnyis dang bral ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lce dang ro'i yul ma yin
126b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing | rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang reg bya'i yul ma yin zhing / thogs pa med pa'i
126b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya ba ma nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni yid dang chos kyi yul ma yin zhing / chos kyi dbyings su yang dag 'du ba yin pas de la bsnyen
126b4(dkon brtsegs): bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin nyid la gnas pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha'
126b5(dkon brtsegs): dang mthun par zhugs pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyis rab tu phye ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi
126b6(dkon brtsegs): nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni chen po stong pa nyid la zhugs pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid
126b7(dkon brtsegs): yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni spros pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin
127a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni dmigs pa med pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par shes pa la
127a2(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni khams gsum na mi gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin
127a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni zag pa med pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas pa yin pas/
127a4(dkon brtsegs): de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhi zhing rab tu zhi la nye bar zhi ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
127a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid dang bral ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni kha dog dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs dang
127a6(dkon brtsegs): bral ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du ma smad cing kha na ma tho ba med pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar
127a7(dkon brtsegs): mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni spyod lam thams cad la yang dag par mi gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / btsun pa shA ra dwa
127b1(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu| de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du skur pa gdab tu med cing nam mkha' la bris pa lta bu yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun
127b2(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du 'jam dpal khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no zhes zer ba la/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni 'jig tshogs
127b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / phyin ci log bzhi rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /
127b4(dkon brtsegs): phung po lnga rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye mched drug rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i gnas bdun rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / log pa brgyad rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / kun nas mnar
127b5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi dngos po dgu rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / sems can gyi gnas dgu rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rtsa ba ma yin pa de gang yin pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin
127b6(dkon brtsegs): no| |btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam la mngon par zhen pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rig pa dang rnam par grol ba la yongs su rtog pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / lhag
127b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / bden pa bzhi po dag
128a1(dkon brtsegs): la yongs su rtog pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / dbang po lngar 'du shes pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug la dmigs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa
128a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sgro 'dogs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mthar gyis
128a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la lta ba skyed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mi slob pa'i chos bcu la mngon par zhen pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin
128a4(dkon brtsegs): no| |phung po'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / lha'i bu'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de
128a5(dkon brtsegs): ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /sgrib pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'gyod pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /
128a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / sems can du lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / srog tu lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / gso ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa
128a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma yin no/ /'byung bar lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'jig par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / chad par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par lta ba rtsa ba ma
128b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'du byed rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa rtsa ba
128b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye mched drug rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / reg pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / tshor ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / sred pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /
128b3(dkon brtsegs): len pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / srid pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rga shi rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / nad dang sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rtsa ba
128b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /'dod pa'i khams rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / gzugs kyi khams rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni
128b5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /sbyin pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma
128b6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub
128b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas 'dod pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /byams
129a1(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po'i rtsa ba dang / snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi 'dor ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems can yongs su smin
129a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa'i rtsa ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i rtsa ba dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i rtsa ba dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i rtsa ba dang / tshul
129a3(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang bslab pa thams cad yang dag par len pa'i rtsa ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba yang mi 'dod pa'i rtsa ba dang / bzod pa dang / zhi ba dang /
129a4(dkon brtsegs): dul ba dang / nges pa'i rtsa ba dang / bdag dang gzhan la yang mi gnod pa'i rtsa ba dang / brtan pa'i brtson 'grus chen po rtsom pa'i rtsa ba dang / dman pa'i chos yang dag par mi
129a5(dkon brtsegs): sdud pa'i rtsa ba dang / bsam gtan gyi rtsa ba dang / bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar mi byed pa'i rtsa ba dang / shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang / btang snyoms kyang ma yin pa'i rtsa ba dang / thabs
129a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rtsa ba dang / thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pa'i rtsa ba
129a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /
129b1(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rgyun gyi rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /gzungs kyi shes pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i
129b2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba yin no/ /spobs pa mi chod pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa thob pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub
129b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ /byang chub kyi snying por 'gro
129b4(dkon brtsegs): ba byin gyis rlob pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang / lan gsum du bzlas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i
129b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba yin no/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas don gyi gzhi rnam par nges par bstan pa gsum po 'di bshad pa na/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so/ /zhes bya ba
129b6(dkon brtsegs): byin nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mngon par gtor nas/ tshig
129b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa der ni de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis byung ba yin par rig par bya'o/ /sems can gang dag
130a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos nas/ mi skrag/ mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan
130a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin no/ /de dag gis ni bdud kyi las thams cad bkag pa yin no/ /de dag ni theg pa chen po la snang ba thob pa yin no zhes kyang smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams
130a3(dkon brtsegs): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des smras pa la rjes su thugs rangs pa mdzad nas/ lha'i bu ded dpon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i bu/ gang dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur
130a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas bshad pa de thos nas mos par 'gyur ba de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin te/ de dag ni de las gzhan pa'i cho 'phrul rnams kyis skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
130a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la mi rtag par bshad pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa rnams la sdug bsngal bar bshad pa dang / bdag tu
130a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa rnams la bdag med par bshad pa dang / sdug par 'du shes pa rnams la mi sdug par bshad pa dang / dngos por 'du shes pa rnams la dngos po med par bshad
130a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / lta bar 'du shes pa rnams la stong par bshad pa dang / mtshan mar 'du shes pa rnams la mtshan ma med par bshad pa dang / khams gsum par 'du shes pa rnams
130b1(dkon brtsegs): la smon pa med par bshad pa dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa 'du shes pa rnams la lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral bar bshad pa de ni 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa
130b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po yin te/ gang dag de la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni yang dag par dul ba yin pas na/ yang dag par dul ba rnams ni gang la yang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i
130b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ de gang las skrag par 'gyur ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ ngar 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa de dag des yongs su ma bzung bas/ yongs
130b4(dkon brtsegs): su ma bzung ba la rten med pa dang / rten med pa la g.yo ba med pa dang / g.yo ba med pa la 'gul ba med pa dang / 'gul ba med pa la blang ba med pa dang / blang ba med pa la dor ba
130b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / dor ba med pa la 'dzin pa med pa dang / 'dzin pa med pa la mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa la phyin ci log med pa dang / phyin ci log med
130b6(dkon brtsegs): pa la log pa nyid med pa dang / log pa nyid dang bral ba ni yang dag par bsgrub pa yin pa dang / yang dag par bsgrub pa ni yang dag par lta ba yin pa dang / yang dag par lta ba ni yang
130b7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dag yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa la rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang / sems rnam par mi g.yeng ba la gnas pa med pa dang /
131a1(dkon brtsegs): sems mi gnas pa la gnas med pa dang / sems kyi gnas med pa la rnam par shes pa'i gnas med pa dang / rnam par rig pa med pa la brtag cing
131a2(dkon brtsegs): bsal ba med pa dang / brtag cing bsal ba dang bral bas dmigs pa med par gnas pa la sgrib pa med pa dang / sgrib pa med par gnas pa la rlom sems med pa dang / gang
131a3(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe rlom sems med pa de'i tshe lhag par rlom sems med pa dang / gang gi tshe lhag par rlom sems med pa de'i tshe bdag dang gzhan du mthong ba med pa dang / mthong ba med pa la
131a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / yongs su gdung ba med pa la sgyid lug pa med pa dang / sgyid lug pa med pa la nyon mongs pa'i rgyu med pa dang / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i sems
131a5(dkon brtsegs): la gsal ba snang ba dang / gsal ba thob pas ye shes mthong ba dang / ye shes mthong ba la gnas pa'i sems kyi shes pa rgya che ba/ sems kyi shes pa rgya chen po la gnas
131a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa dang / bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom pa la sgrib pa med pa mngon du gyur ba dang / sgrib pa med pa la gnas pa la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
131a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mngon du gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bu/ gang byas pa med cing skye ba med pa'i chos rnams la/ chos kyi go rim gyi mtshams sbyar ba de ltar ston pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po
131b1(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kho bo cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la ci dang ci 'dri ba de dang de nyid kyi
131b2(dkon brtsegs): tshig gi mtshams las/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang ngo / /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod
131b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du sgrub par byed do/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad ni mi zad pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du ston par byed do/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos
131b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni bem po ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rjod par byed do/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar
131b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par 'jog par byed do/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad ni mthong ba med pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par dgod par byed do/ /
131b6(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad btang snyoms pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du 'chad par byed do/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos de dag ni gang nas kyang ma
131b7(dkon brtsegs): blangs| gang du yang ma khrid pa ste/ de dag ni bsags pa yang ma yin/ spungs pa yang ma yin no/ /de dag ni bshad kyang rung / ma bshad kyang rung ste/ chos kyi de bzhin de mi 'dor
132a1(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no/ /sems can thams cad kyi yi ge 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa'i yi ge 'byung ba gang yin pa'i yi
132a2(dkon brtsegs): ge de dag thams cad ni/ lus las kyang ma byung / sems las kyang ma byung ba ste/ rgyu dang rkyen nyid las byung ba yin no/ /ji ltar yi ge rnams la bsags pa med pa de bzhin
132a3(dkon brtsegs): du| sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams la yang bsags pa med do/ /ji ltar sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams la bsags pa med pa de bzhin du /
132a4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa thams cad la yang bsags pa med do/ /ji ltar nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa thams cad la bsags pa med pa de bzhin du/ shes pa gang gis
132a5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa'i shes pa de la yang bsags pa med de/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang mi gnas pa'i shes pas mi gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs
132a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no/ /de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
132a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi shes pa gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa'i shes pa dang / phung po yongs su spangs pa la yongs su skyo ba med pa'i shes pa
132b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdu ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / skye ba shes pa dang / 'byung ba shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / lam
132b2(dkon brtsegs): ngan pa rnam par bcad pa shes pa dang / rgyu shes pa dang / chud mi za ba shes pa dang / 'bras bu shes pa dang / mngon sum du bya ba spangs pa shes pa dang / rkyen shes pa dang / tshogs bsags
132b3(dkon brtsegs): pa shes pa dang / bden pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la lta zhing thob par bya ba shes pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa
132b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa shes pa dang / phung po lnga shes pa dang / phung po'i bdud spangs pa shes pa dang / khams shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa dang / skye mched shes pa dang /
132b5(dkon brtsegs): grong stong pa lta bu so sor rtog pa shes pa dang / sbyin pa shes pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin pa las mi 'da' ba shes pa dang / tshul khrims shes pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba'i sems
132b6(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang / bzod pa shes pa dang / sems can rjes su bsrung ba shes pa dang / brtson 'grus shes pa dang / legs par bya ba'i las bya ba shes pa
132b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsam gtan shes pa dang / bsam gtan las ldog pa shes pa dang / shes rab shes pa dang / lta ba yongs su shes pa dang / thabs shes pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par
133a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba shes pa dang / byams pa shes pa dang / sems can bskyab pa shes pa dang / snying rje shes pa dang / yongs su mi skyo ba shes pa dang / dga' ba shes
133a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / chos la dga' zhing rab tu dga' la mchog tu dga' ba shes pa dang / btang snyoms shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa shes pa dang / sems can
133a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhug pa shes pa dang / tha snyad shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes pa dang / gnas med pa la gnas pa shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba shes pa dang / mnyam
133a4(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid dang mi 'gal ba shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa shes pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par so sor rtog pa shes pa dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang / stobs shes pa
133a5(dkon brtsegs): dang | chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa shes pa
133a6(dkon brtsegs): dang | dran pa'i dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / chos thams cad mi brjed pa shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam
133a7(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du shes pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan
133b1(dkon brtsegs): lag shes pa dang / rang byung gi ye shes rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / lam ngan pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang / snying rje chen po la lhag par dmigs
133b2(dkon brtsegs): pa shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mi zad pa shes pa dang / skye ba med pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa
133b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su grub pa shes pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba shes pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / phyir
133b4(dkon brtsegs): mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dag par 'du ba shes pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba shes pa dang / tshul
133b5(dkon brtsegs): khrims rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sdig pa thams cad mi bya bar shes pa dang / sems can gyi dbang
133b6(dkon brtsegs): po shes pa dang / rim pa rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / thos pa'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang / tshogs thams cad kyis mi ngoms pa shes pa dang / sman thams cad shes
133b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ba shes pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / gnas ma yin pa mi bya bar shes pa dang / stobs bcu shes pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang
134a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa dang rjes su mthun pa shes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa shes pa dang / bar du gcod pa dang bar du gcod pa ma yin pa'i chos rjes
134a2(dkon brtsegs): su rtogs pa shes pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi gnas par shes pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / chos
134a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las yang dag par mi 'da' ba shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang / rab tu gnas pa med pa shes pa dang / lus
134a4(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus la 'jug pa shes pa dang / ngag sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra rab tu dbye ba shes
134a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / yid sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnam par g.yo ba rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i shes pa dang /
134a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi 'khrul pa rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / rtsod pa nye
134a7(dkon brtsegs): bar zhi bar bya ba shes pa dang / mi brjed pa'i shes pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can dran pa la 'jog pa shes pa dang / dgongs pa rab tu
134b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa shes pa dang / sems can le lo can yongs su bzung ba shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shes pa dang / gdul ba'i sems can 'dul ba rjes su
134b2(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / thabs shes pa dang / shes rab shes pa ste/ lha'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin te/ shes pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
134b3(dkon brtsegs): ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med pa 'thob bo/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang /
134b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa de ni ngo mtshar te/ shes pa de ni go cha ngan ngon dang ldan pas yang dag par bsdu bar mi nus so/ /'jam
134b5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gang de lta bu'i shes pa skyed par byed pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no/ / //bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' go
134b6(dkon brtsegs): cha legs par bgos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems can
134b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' ni go cha legs par bgos pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya/
135a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa| lha'i bu/ byang chub kyi gnas rjes su 'jug pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci'i phyir sems dpa' chen
135a2(dkon brtsegs): po zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ rtsom pa chen po nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa dang / ye shes chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pas na sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam
135a3(dkon brtsegs): dpal| ci'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ shes rab kyis gzung ba med pa'i chos la 'jug pa dang / thabs kyis chos thams cad yang dag par bsdus pas
135a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci'i phyir sems can dag pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas shing /
135a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom par yang byed pas/ de'i phyir sems can dag pa zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci'i phyir sems
135a6(dkon brtsegs): can rnam par dag pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad nges par 'byung ba'i lam rnam par sbyong bar byed pas/ de'i phyir sems can rnam par dag pa
135a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ 'di ltar lam de la gnas nas/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yongs su smin
135b1(dkon brtsegs): par byed pas/ de'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci'i phyir rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ 'di ltar gdul ba'i sems can rnams shin tu 'dul
135b2(dkon brtsegs): ba la rab tu 'god par byed pas/ de'i phyir rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ ji tsam gyis
135b3(dkon brtsegs): bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sred pa len par byed pa de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba yin no/ /smras pa/
135b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thul bar dka' ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ 'di ltar sngon dam bcas pa dang / sngon gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/
135b5(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dag la 'dod par mi byed pa de lta bu ni thul bar dka' ba yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par
135b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i shes rab dang / thabs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir kun
135b7(dkon brtsegs): du snang ba de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'phags pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang
136a1(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i tshig gis/ sems can thams cad kyi nyes par smra ba zil gyis gnon par byed pa de lta bu ni/ chos smra
136a2(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na 'dul ba smra ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe bdag tshul khrims la gnas la/ sems can thams cad kyi 'gyod pa
136a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / kun nas ldang ba rnam par bsal ba'i phyir/ chos ston par byed pa de lta bu ni 'dul ba smra ba yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na don smra ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i
136a4(dkon brtsegs): bu| gang gi tshe thos pa thams cad la nan tan snying por byed cing don rjes su rtogs pa de lta bu ni don smra ba yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
136a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gzhi phun sum tshogs pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa thams cad sems can rnams la
136a6(dkon brtsegs): stob par byed pa de lta bu ni/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gzhi phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' drang po yin/
136a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe bdag gi nyes pa mi 'chab pa de lta bu ni drang po yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dam pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/
136b1(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi gya gyu can rnams la khong khro bar mi byed pa de'i phyir dam pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na g.yo ba med pa
136b2(dkon brtsegs): yin| smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe ji skad smras pa'i tshig las 'da' ba med pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na sgyu med pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe ji ltar
136b3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa de bzhin du tshig tu brjod pa de lta bu ni sgyu med pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na nga rgyal med pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe sems
136b4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la 'dud par byed cing mi dge ba mi byed pa de lta bu ni nga rgyal med pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin bdag yin/ smras pa/ gang

138a7(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub la rag las par mthong ba yin no/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /

143a5(dkon brtsegs): par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'gag pa med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar mnyam pa nyid dang / dben par mnyam pa nyid dang / dngos po med par mnyam pa

143a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par mnyam pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo ste/ lha'i
143b1(dkon brtsegs): bu| de ltar mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa yin no/ /de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon
143b2(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub sems
143b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i
143b4(dkon brtsegs): bu| 'dod chags kyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni ma yin
143b5(dkon brtsegs): no| |zhe sdang gi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/ /gti mug
143b6(dkon brtsegs): gi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ shes rab kyi bya ba sgrub par byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/ /ser
143b7(dkon brtsegs): sna med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/ /'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni /
144a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/ /gnod sems med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub
144a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ bzod pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/ /le lo med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ brtson
144a3(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/ /rnam par g.yeng ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ bsam gtan gyis rlom sems
144a4(dkon brtsegs): su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/ /'chal ba'i shes rab med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma
144a5(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /nyon mongs pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ nyon mongs pa med pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/ /nang dang phyi'i
144a6(dkon brtsegs): dngos po yongs su gtong bas brtse ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma yongs su gtong bas mngon par dga'
144a7(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /'dod pa'i yon tan la smod pas rtag tu gnod sems med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
144b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa yin no/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdus pas mi lta ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /lus dang srog la mi lta bas lta ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang
144b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su gtong bas tsham tshom med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /'khor ba dpag
144b3(dkon brtsegs): tu med pas mi skrag pas 'jigs pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sems can thams cad kyi khur sgrol bas khur chen po sgrol ba'i spyod pa ni byang
144b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sngar dam bcas pa nyams su len par byed pas phyir mi ldog pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /rjes su 'gyod
144b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pas yid la gcags pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /theg pa thams cad zil gyis mnan pas mngon par 'phags pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub
144b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /yi dam ma zhig pas go cha rdo rje lta bu'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems la nges par sems
144b7(dkon brtsegs): pas rang gi sems la nges par sems pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /las byas pa chud mi za bas chud mi za ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
145a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas tha dad med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /dgra thams cad
145a2(dkon brtsegs): nges par bcom pas dpa' ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /skal pa mnyam pa'i skye bo dang mthun par 'jug pas ma 'dres pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub
145a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /gshe ba dang / sdang ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pas/ rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
145a4(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /sangs rgyas lta ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba la mchog tu dga' bas dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i spyod pa ni byang
145a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan par byed pas rgyan gyi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin
145a6(dkon brtsegs): no| |mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa'i gnyen por gyur pas zil gyis mi non pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /skye bo mkhas shing mdzangs pa rnams
145a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab tu bsngags pas ngan pa ma yin pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /tshul bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa rnams shin tu nges par brtags pas mi rtsi
145b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /khur blangs pa nyams su lon pas skyes bu dam pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /brtson 'grus
145b2(dkon brtsegs): brtan pos phyir mi ldog pas khyad par du 'gro ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par sdud pas chos spyod pa ni byang
145b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pas byas pa shes shing byas pa gzo ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin
145b4(dkon brtsegs): no| |dkon mchog gsum 'dri bar mi byed pas dkon mchog gi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /sdud pa dang yongs su gcod pas shes rab dang
145b5(dkon brtsegs): thabs kyi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
145b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod kyis
145b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa de ni legs par smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag spyod pa de dang ma bral ba de dag ni/ de nyid kyis lung bstan pa yin no/ /bcom ldan
146a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe nga spyod pa de dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe de
146a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ der ngas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /lha'i bu/ gang spyod pa
146a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa de lta bu de dag rab tu 'byed par byed pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen
146a4(dkon brtsegs): po yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni ci lags/ 'jug pa gang gis ni byang
146a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu/ mi skye ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i mu'i mtshan
146a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi tshig bla dwags yin te/ de ni sngon byung bar gyur la/ phyis ma byung bar gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas ma byung ba nyid yin no/ /de ni sngon srid par gyur la/ phyis
146a7(dkon brtsegs): mi srid par gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas mi srid pa nyid yin no/ /de ni sngon skyes par gyur la/ phyis ma skyes par gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid yin
146b1(dkon brtsegs): no| |de ni sngon mngon par 'dus byas pa yin la/ phyis mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas mngon par 'dus ma byas pa nyid yin no/ /de ni sngon yod par gyur la/
146b2(dkon brtsegs): phyis med par gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas 'gyur ba med pa nyid yin no/ /de ni sngon gang zag tu bgrang bar gyur la/ phyis gang zag tu mi bgrang bar gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod
146b3(dkon brtsegs): ma nas stong pa nyid yin no/ /de ni sngon mtshan mar bgrang bar gyur la/ phyis mtshan mar mi bgrang bar gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas mtshan ma med pa nyid yin no/ /gang gis de
146b4(dkon brtsegs): ltar rjes su rtogs pa dang / sems kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa la mngon par zhen pa med par rtogs pa de ni mi skye ba zhes bya'o/ /de la bzod pa gang zhe na/ de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin
146b5(dkon brtsegs): du sems can thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/ /de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du zhing thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/ /de dag ji ltar mi skye
146b6(dkon brtsegs): ba de bzhin du slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/ /de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
146b7(dkon brtsegs): cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/ /de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du/ chos thams cad
147a1(dkon brtsegs): la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/ /bzod pa de yang skad cig pa yin te/ gang gis skad cig pa yin zhe na/ skad cig pa nyid kyis skad cig pa
147a2(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no/ /mtshan ma med pa ni mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin no/ /ji ltar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa stong pa

147b1(dkon brtsegs): no| |ya ma rla gang yin pa de ni gsog yin no/ /gsog gang yin pa de ni gso ba yin no/ /gso ba gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags med pa yin no/ /'dod chags med pa gang yin pa
147b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no/ /'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid med pa yin no/ /ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa yin te/ de ni chos thams
147b3(dkon brtsegs): cad stong pa nyid dang / skad cig pa dang / ya ma rla dang / dben pa dang / gsog ces bya ste/ chos thams cad la de ltar bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/ /bzod pa de yang bzod

147b5(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ de la dmigs pa gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe bdag dang / bzod pa gnyi gar dmigs na/ de ni dmigs pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba
147b6(dkon brtsegs): dang | gang zag dang / bzod pa gnyi gar dmigs na de ni dmigs pa zhes bya'o/ /de la dmigs pa med pa gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe bdag dang / bzod pa gnyi gar mi dmigs pa de ni
147b7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / bzod pa gnyi gar mi dmigs pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ phung
148a1(dkon brtsegs): po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid gtan med pa yin no/ /ngo bo nyid gtan med pa gang
148a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa yin te/ ngo bo nyid de dang / bzod pa de la gnyis su rjes su rtog par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bu/ bzod pa de lta
148a3(dkon brtsegs): bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par spyod pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa yin no/ /bzod pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na
148a4(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /'jig rten 'di snang ba chen pos kyang khyab par gyur to/ /sil snyan brgya stong yang
148a5(dkon brtsegs): ma dkrol bar sgra 'khrol bar gyur to/ /me tog gi char pa dag kyang rab tu bab bo/ /srog chags bzhi khri nyis stong gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
148a6(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri drug stong gis ni/ chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
148a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dir ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad/ rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can du zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu yang kun tu snang bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
148b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ chos nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma/ kha dog sna tshogs
148b2(dkon brtsegs): kha dog 'bum phrag du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/ de dag gis
148b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ nyi ma dang zla ba dag gi 'od kyang zil gyis
148b4(dkon brtsegs): mnan nas yang phyir log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
148b5(dkon brtsegs): bo stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas
148b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /thub pa ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad gyur pa/ /mi mnyam gzi brjid mnga' ba khyod
148b7(dkon brtsegs): la zhu/ /'od kyi bkod pa mdzad pa khyod la zhu/ /rab rib nyon mongs spong ba khyod la zhu/ /bde gshegs ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa/ /pha rol tshogs rnams 'joms pa khyod
149a1(dkon brtsegs): la zhu| |bdud dpung pham par mdzad pa khyod la zhu/ /stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa khyod la zhu/ /rgyal ba ci slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /sum
149a2(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gnyis yon tan mtshan brgyan pa/ /bde gshegs rab dga' 'dzum pa mdzad pa po/ /gzugs kyi dam pa mnga' ba khyod la zhu/ /bcom ldan ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa/ /mkhyen
149a3(dkon brtsegs): pa mtha' yas yon tan ston pa po/ /ye shes 'byung gnas 'gro ba shes mdzad pa/ /ye shes ljon shing mkhyen pa mchog la zhu/ /'jig rten gsum grags grags pa mtha' yas
149a4(dkon brtsegs): pa| |gsum rig dri gsum mtha' mar mdzad pa po/ /'jig rten gsum rig rnam thar gsum mthar byon/ /ci yi slad du 'dzum pa bstan pa mdzad/ /sman pa dam pa skye rga mthar
149a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan zhabs la dri mchog 'khor lo mnga'/ /sred med sras po rdo rje mkhregs pa po/ /thub pa 'dzum mdzad sbyor ba bka' stsal gsol/ /gang gis spyod pa de
149a6(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam sbyangs sam/ /gang 'dir bzod pa de dag yongs rdzogs sam/ /gang sems sangs rgyas yon tan nges gyur tam/ /ci yi slad du thub chen 'dzum pa mdzad/ /bde gshegs
149a7(dkon brtsegs): bla med rgyu zhig mi mnga' bar/ /bcom ldan 'dren pa 'dzum pa mi ston pas/ /de thos sems can glo ba rangs 'gyur gyi/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs can legs par gsung dbyung
149b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ srog
149b2(dkon brtsegs): chags bdun khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
149b3(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ gzhan yang khyod kyis lha'i bu ded dpon 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
149b4(dkon brtsegs): pa| kun dga' bo/ lha'i bu ded dpon gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag la bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas/ mchod par byas /
149b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su zhu ba byas/ yongs su dri ba byas shing / sems can dpag tu med pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go /kun dga' bo/
149b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu ded dpon 'di ni bskal pa grangs med pa sum brgya 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag
149b7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde
150a1(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan
150a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'od ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa de yang / rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang /
150a3(dkon brtsegs): bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po las grub cing / lag mthil ltar mnyam la/ rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis mig mang ris su kun nas
150a4(dkon brtsegs): bkab par gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams der nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gi ming yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dag
150a5(dkon brtsegs): dang | bdud rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems can rnams kyi ming yang med cing mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi khom pa brgyad po dag kyang med la/
150a6(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba dang / btung ba dag kyang yid la bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ltung ba dang / 'khrul pa'i nyes pa dag dang / sdug bsngal gyi sgra yang
150a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can de dag gi longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa ci 'dra ba de lta bur 'gyur
150b1(dkon brtsegs): ro| |sems can de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /phal cher bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
150b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de ni yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon
150b3(dkon brtsegs): tan rgyal po 'od de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni/ bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcur 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang smon lam gyi dbang gis bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur
150b4(dkon brtsegs): ro| |de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni dung phyur phrag drug dang bye ba phrag gnyis su 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis bla
150b5(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag /'jig rten gyi khams yongs
150b6(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rgyal po 'od kyis/
150b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor de nyid du lha'i bu spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba
151a1(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man da ra ba dag gis mngon par gtor nas/ tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol
151a2(dkon brtsegs): to| |bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang gang gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgyal po 'od de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
151a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa der skye zhing 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub
151a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing / bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der bla na med
151a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
151a6(dkon brtsegs): bo| lha'i bu spyan ras gzigs 'di ni gang gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po 'od de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
151a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ 'di yang der 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po legs mthong zhes bya bar gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa dpag tu
151b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa byas shing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
151b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
151b3(dkon brtsegs): pa| 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'od ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar
151b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ rgyal po legs mthong de yang dus gzhan zhig na/ bu thu bo rgyal srid la bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par
151b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' de la byang chub sems dpa' legs mthong 'di ni/ nga
151b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
151b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i bu ded dpon la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan tam/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i
152a1(dkon brtsegs): bu| kho bo ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa lung bstan pa ltar lung bstan te/ da ltar gyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du/ ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin
152a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang de lta bu yin pas/ de bzhin nyid de la ni 'phel ba yang med la/ yongs su 'grib pa med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
152a3(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung zhig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /shod cig /kun chub par gyis shig /skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la
152a4(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang / da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba rjes su yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston

152a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig /'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
152a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / rin po che thams cad kyi le'u zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa
152b1(dkon brtsegs): dang | mos pa dang / mos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed pa de dag ni/ bsod nams thams cad
152b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha'i bu ded dpon dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
152b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
152b4(dkon brtsegs): par bstod do/ / //'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa lha'i bu ded dpon gyis
152b5(dkon brtsegs): zhus pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / pra dz+nyA warma dang / lo ts+tsha ba zhang ye shes sde la sogs pas
152b6(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya mai tri ya ma hA sing ha nA da na nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po
152b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
153a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang
153a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / byams pa la sogs

153a5(dkon brtsegs): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus
153a6(dkon brtsegs): nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/ /de skad
153a7(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang /
153b1(dkon brtsegs): ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol

153b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi don dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de lta bu yongs su 'bri bar sems pa ni yang khyod legs so/ /'od srung /
153b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom

154a1(dkon brtsegs): pas| legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa dang / cho
154a2(dkon brtsegs): ga phun sum tshogs pa dang / spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa dang / kha na ma tho ba phra rab tsam dag la yang 'jigs par lta ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs
154a3(dkon brtsegs): te bslab par bya'o/ /brkam chags med pa dang / tshul 'chos med pa dang / kha gsag med pa dang / gzhogs slong med pa dang / thob kyis 'jal ba med pa dang / rnyed pas rnyed par
154a4(dkon brtsegs): byed 'dod pa med pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa dang / khrel yod pa dang ldan pa dang / 'dzem pa dang ldan par bya'o/ /'khor ba la yid skrag pa dang / nges par 'byung ba la
154a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa dang / nges par 'byung ba la mngon par brtson pa dang / 'khor ba la rtag tu yid skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba la phan yon du lta bar bya zhing / shing drung na 'dug
154a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang rung / ri la 'dug kyang rung / gnas khang na 'dug kyang rung / phug na 'dug kyang rung / des de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las yid la bya ste/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das

154b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gdung rgyud phun sum tshogs pa/ rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs
154b2(dkon brtsegs): pa| tshul khrims kyis dpag tu med pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas dpag tu med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
154b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis dpag tu med pa/ yon tan gyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ bden pa gsung ba/ yang dag par gsung ba/ ji skad
154b4(dkon brtsegs): gsung ba de bzhin du mdzad pa/ mi slu bar mdzad pa/ 'phags pa/ sman pa chen po/ zug rngu 'byin pa/ ma gsol bar bshes gnyen mdzad pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ ded dpon chen
