154b6(dkon brtsegs): chad pa/ smon pa med pa/ smon pa dang bral pa/ spros pa med pa/ spros dang bral ba/ mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ nye bar gtod pa/ dngos po dang bral ba/ dben pa/
154b7(dkon brtsegs): dben dang bral ba/ dngos po med pa/ dngos pos ma gos pa/ rgyu med pa/ rgyu yang dag par chad pa/ 'gro ba dang bral ba/ brjod du med pa/ brjod pa dang bral ba/ rlom sems med pa/
155a1(dkon brtsegs): kun du bstan pa/ rnyog pa med pa/ rnyog pa dang bral ba/ blang ba med pa/ dor ba med pa/ sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba/ sred pa yang dag par chad pa ston par
155a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa/ yang dag par ston par mdzad pa yin no/ /zhes rnam pa las yid la bya'o/ /'od srung / de la dge slong gcig pu dben par song ste/ nang du yang dag par 'jog pa la
155a3(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pas ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las yid la bya ste/ bdag gis mi'i lus thob cing / rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po yang
155a4(dkon brtsegs): thob| bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yang mnyes par byas pas na/ bdag le lo byed pa dang / bya ba sna tshogs kyi 'du 'dzis g.yen spyo zhing gnas pa ni/ bdag gi mi cha'o/ /
155a5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag la 'bras bu ma thob pa kho nar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de lta bu yang yod la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan rnams ni 'di lta ste/
155a6(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ u dum wa ra'i me tog ltar brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ de lta na bdag gis da ltar byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
155a7(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par byas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las yid la bya'o/ /'od srung / de la dge slong gis ni khyod dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi
155b1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su bslab par bya ste/ 'od srung / 'di ltar khyod nga ma mthong ma thos par 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa de dag gi rjes
155b2(dkon brtsegs): su slob pa na/ rab tu byung ba ni/ 'od srung khyod chos 'dul ba 'di nyid la mdzes par gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong zhing / mthong
155b3(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang nye bar 'ongs te/ rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gsol bar byed pa de dag gi rab tu 'byung ba ni/ de'i 'og tu yang de bzhin gshegs pas
155b4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su mkhyen to/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos don gyi dbang gnyis mthong bas ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bar khas blang bar bya ste/ gnyis gang
155b5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na| tshe 'di la 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa na bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'od srung / de la skyes bu blun po kha cig de bzhin
155b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gos dur smrig dag bgos shing rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos por khas blangs te/ bslab pa rnams blangs nas/ gnas
155b7(dkon brtsegs): khang du song ngam/ phug tu song ste/ sgo bcad nas/ 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag la rnam par rtog par byed cing / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dag dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i
156a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa dag dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos kyi rnam par rtog pa dag dang / mdza' ba shes kyi khyim dang / slong mo ster ba'i khyim gyi rnam par
156a2(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa dag la rnam par rtog par yang byed la/ de dag 'di snyam du yang sems te/ bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mi mkhyen/ mi rig /rnam par mi rtogs so snyam du yang
156a3(dkon brtsegs): sems so/ /'od srung / gang gi tshe dge slong gnas khang na 'dug kyang rung / phug na 'dug kyang rung / 'chags na 'dug kyang rung ste/ 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gam/ gnod
156a4(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dag gam/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag gam/ mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag la/ rnam par rtog par byed pa de'i tshe/
156a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas khang ngam/ phug gam/ 'chags de na/ lha gang dag gnyug ma gnyug mar gnas pa de dag gis dge slong de'i sems sems kyis shes nas/ de dag 'di snyam du dge slong
156a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di gang gi phyir legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung la/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa de lta bu dag la rnam par rtog par byed pa ni mi rigs so snyam nas
156a7(dkon brtsegs): yid ma rangs pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde bar gyur te/ 'od srung / de la lha de dag las kha cig ni skul bar yang byed la/ kha cig gis ni snod ma yin par rig nas/
156b1(dkon brtsegs): khyad du bsad de 'khod par yang byed do/ /'od srung ltos/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung du dang / shes pa chung du dang ldan pa'i lha de dag gis kyang / gzhan gyi sems shes na/ de bzhin gshegs
156b2(dkon brtsegs): pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa nas/ legs par spyod pa spyad pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'od srung / de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mkhyen pa'am/ ma gzigs
156b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ thugs su ma chud pa'am/ mngon sum du ma mdzad pa ci yang mi mnga' ste/ 'od srung / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / dus
156b4(dkon brtsegs): las rnam par grol ba dang / brjod par mi bya ba'i shes bya rnam pa lnga la ye shes thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing / the tshom dang bral ba yin no/ /'od srung / de lta bas na rigs kyi
156b5(dkon brtsegs): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bas/ bdag nyid rang la rag lus par shes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag gi sems
156b6(dkon brtsegs): thugs kyis mkhyen la/ gang dag phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang /
156b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen pas na/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ dge sbyong gi chom rkun mi bya'o zhes bslab par bya'o/ /'od srung /
157a1(dkon brtsegs): de la dge sbyong gi chom rkun gang zhe na/ bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'od srung / 'di la dge slong dge sbyong gi kha dog
157a2(dkon brtsegs): dang | rtags dang / dbyibs la gnas shing / de yang tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / sdig pa'i chos can yin par gyur na/ de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun dang po yin no/ /dben pa'i
157a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas su song ste gnas pa ni mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag la rnam par rtog pa byed na de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun gnyis pa yin no/ /bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin
157a4(dkon brtsegs): du rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas/ gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid dgra bcom pa yin par khas 'che bar byed na/ de ni dge sbyong
157a5(dkon brtsegs): gi chom rkun gsum pa yin no/ /bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod par byed na/ de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun bzhi pa yin te/ 'od srung / bzhi po de dag ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun
157a6(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /'od srung / mi gtum pa/ brlang ba/ drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/ nyams stobs dang ldan pa/ stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/
157a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung / skyes bu des 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi gang ji snyed pa rnams dbyug pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab bam/ khu tshur gyis bsnun te/ pham par byas nas nye bar spyod pa'i
157b1(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / khang khyim
157b2(dkon brtsegs): dang | bzhon pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / stan gyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i longs spyod ji snyed pa de dag thams
157b3(dkon brtsegs): cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/ 'od srung / 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhi de las mi de bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bskyed snyam mam/ 'od srung gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
157b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ mang du bskyed lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang du bskyed lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya
157b5(dkon brtsegs): ste| gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du/ de rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pas 'dod pas zil gyis non pas/ gzhan dag
157b6(dkon brtsegs): gi mdun du bdag nyid rgyun du zhugs pa yin par khas 'che bar byed cing / tha na bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i
157b7(dkon brtsegs): phung po mang du bskyed de/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mi bzad pa bskyed pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol
158a1(dkon brtsegs): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas dpe bstan pas bsdam pa'i gnas bka' stsal pa de ni ngo mtshar lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/
158a2(dkon brtsegs): dpe rin po che de lta bu thos nas su zhig 'bras bu ma thob par tha na dad pas stsal ba chab snod gang tsam yang len par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
158a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung / de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ mgo dang / gos la me 'bar ba lta bus gnas par bya zhing / 'bras bu ma thob par tha na dad pas byin pa'i chu snod gang
158a4(dkon brtsegs): tsam yang blang bar mi bya'o/ /'od srung / mi gnyis pa ches gtum pa/ ches brlang ba/ ches drag shul gyi lam dang ldan pa/ ches nyams stobs dang ldan pa/ ches stobs chen po'i
158a5(dkon brtsegs): shugs dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/ 'od srung / mi des gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mi gang ji snyed pa rnams dbyug pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis
158a6(dkon brtsegs): btab bam/ khu tshur gyis bsnun te/ pham par byas nas/ nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man
158a7(dkon brtsegs): shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / khang khyim dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / gtung ba dang / mal cha dang / stan
158b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i longs spyod ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/ 'od srung / 'di ji snyam du
158b2(dkon brtsegs): sems| gzhi de las mi des bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bskyed snyam mam/ 'od srung gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang du bskyed lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang
158b3(dkon brtsegs): du bskyed lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung / khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing / so so'i
158b4(dkon brtsegs): skye bo yin par shes bzhin du de rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid lan gcig phyir 'ong ba yin par khas
158b5(dkon brtsegs): 'che bar byed cing / tha na bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du bskyed de/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma
158b6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i phung po mi bzad pa bskyed pa yin no/ /'od srung / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ mi gang ji snyed pa thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod rnams lta zhog gi /'od
158b7(dkon brtsegs): srung | mi gsum pa ches shin tu gtum pa/ ches shin tu brlang ba/ ches shin tu drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/ ches shin tu nyams stobs dang ldan pa/ ches shin tu stobs po che'i
159a1(dkon brtsegs): shugs dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/ 'od srung / mi des stong gsum gyi stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ mi gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de
159a2(dkon brtsegs): dag dbyug pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab bam/ khu tshur gyis bsnun te/ pham par byas nas nye bar spyod pa'i longs spyod 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang /

159a4(dkon brtsegs): mal cha dang / stan gyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i longs spyod ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/ 'od srung /
159a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhi de las mi des bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bskyed snyam mam/ 'od srung gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang du bskyed lags so/ /bde bar
159a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa/ mang du bskyed lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu
159a7(dkon brtsegs): ma thob cing so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du de rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas/ gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid phyir mi
159b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba yin par khas 'che bar byed cing / tha na bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na/ de ni de bas bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du bskyed de/ de ni de bas
159b2(dkon brtsegs): ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mi bzad pa bskyed pa yin no/ /'od srung / stong chung ngu phra mo'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mi gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa'i longs
159b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod rnams lta zhog gi / 'od srung / mi bzhi pa ches shin tu rab tu gtum pa/ ches shin tu rab tu brlang pa/ ches shin tu rab tu drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/ ches shin tu rab tu nyams
159b4(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang ldan pa/ ches shin tu rab tu stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/ 'od srung / mi des stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang / klu dang /
159b5(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dbyug
159b6(dkon brtsegs): pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab bam/ khu tshur gyis bsnun te/ pham par byas nas/ nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai

160a1(dkon brtsegs): mal cha dang / stan gyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i yo byad ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyed
160a2(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur na/ 'od srung / 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhi de las mi des bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bskyed snyam mam/ 'od srung gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang du bskyed
160a3(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang du bskyed lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ gang zhig bdag
160a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing / so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du de rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas/ gzhan dag gis mdun du
160a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid dgra bcom pa yin par khas 'che bar byed cing / ci nas kyang gzhan dag gis bdag dgra bcom pa yin par shes par bya'o snyam nas/ dgra bcom pa steng du 'byung ba
160a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar steng du 'byung bar yang byed/ dgra bcom pa'i dpe ston pa ltar dpe ston par yang byed la/ de ltar sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/ tha na gzhan gyis byin pa'i dad
160a7(dkon brtsegs): pas byin pa bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du bskyed de/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin
160b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phung po mi bzad pa bskyed pa yin no/ /'od srung / de lta bas na gang stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad 'phrog bar spro ba de ni/ sdig pa
160b2(dkon brtsegs): can gyi 'dod pa de lta bu des dad pas byin pa yongs su longs spyod par byed de/ 'od srung / ngas ni sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa de las gzhan pa/ rab tu byung ba'i chos shin tu tha chad gcig shos
160b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan ma mthong ngo / /'od srung / bzhi po 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rab tu byung ba'i sdig pa 'dod pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa dang /
160b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor los bsgyur pa'i rgyal srid 'dod pa dang / gzhan yang rgyal rigs kyi rigs dag 'dod pa dang / bram ze'i rigs dag 'dod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rab
160b5(dkon brtsegs): tu byung ba'i sdig pa 'dod pa yin no/ /gang du 'ga' zhig la smon par byed na/ cher na mya ngan las 'das pa la smon par byed na yang / de yang de'i sdig pa 'dod pa nyid yin te/ de bzhin
160b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas de la dgongs nas/ dge slong dag nga ni cher na/ phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yang rung ste/ skad cig tsam skye ba la yang bsngags pa mi brjod do/ /
160b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes ston to/ /'od srung / bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi dri ma ste/ rab tu byung bas de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du mi bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'jig tshogs la mngon par zhen pa dang / gang
161a1(dkon brtsegs): zag tu 'dzin pa dang / bslab pa las 'da' ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni dge sbyong gi dri ma yin te/ rab tu byung
161a2(dkon brtsegs): bas de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du mi bya'o/ /'od srung / dge sbyong dang bram ze'i 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa/ sdig pa 'dod pa med la/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ drang po'i rang bzhin
161a3(dkon brtsegs): can| g.yo med pa/ sgyu can ma yin pa/ khengs pa ma yin pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 'dod pa rnams kyi ched du ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
161a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na/ 'od srung / de dag dbugs 'byin par byed pa brjod par bya ste/ de thos na rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa dag dga' ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur ro/ /'od
161a5(dkon brtsegs): srung | rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la bskal pa'am/ bskal pa
161a6(dkon brtsegs): las lhag par bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas pa bas ni/ yang dag par zhugs pa/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/
161a7(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa zhig gis sbyin pa po gang gis dad pas byin pa/ tha na chu snod gang tsam zhig bdag gir byas par gyur na/ de nyid de la bsod nams kyi phung po ches rgya che bar
161b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur gyi/ gling chen pa bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad la bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/
161b2(dkon brtsegs): ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas pa de la ni de lta ma yin no/ /'od srung / ji ltar mi blun po sdig pa 'dod pa dang ldan pa des/ gang gi drung nas chos gos sam/ bsod snyoms yongs su longs
161b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa de'i don de yongs su nyams par byed pa de ltar ni dgra bo dang / gshed ma dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgras kyang yongs su nyams par byed mi nus so/ /'od srung / bzhi
161b4(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag ni rab tu byung ba'i nyon mongs pa cha phra ba rnams yin te/ rab tu byung ba nyon mongs pa cha phra ba de dag dang ldan na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mda' 'phangs pa de bzhin du/ sems
161b5(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o/ /gzhan gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog gi chos nyid dang ldan pa dang / sdom pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde 'di thos nas tshul
161b6(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi nyes pa 'byin par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' las 'das sam/ bslab pa las 'das na lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'chab par byed cing / rnam par 'byed
161b7(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed/ 'chags par mi byed pa dang / shes shing rtogs bzhin du dad pas byin pa yongs su longs spyod par byed pa ste/ 'od srung / bzhi po 'di dag ni/ rab tu byung ba'i nyon mongs
162a1(dkon brtsegs): pa cha phra ba rnams yin te/ rab tu byung ba nyon mongs pa cha phra ba de dag dang ldan na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mda' 'phangs pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba
162a2(dkon brtsegs): yin par brjod par bya'o/ /'od srung / bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong ltar bcos pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / dam pa'i chos
162a3(dkon brtsegs): spong ba dang / 'jig rten rgyang pan pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni dge sbyong ltar bcos pa yin no/ /'od srung / bzhi po 'di dag ni rab tu byung ba'i rgyags shing bag med pa yin te/ rab tu
162a4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba rgyags shing bag med pa de dag dang ldan na/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ mang du thos pas rgyags shing de mang du thos pas
162a5(dkon brtsegs): bag med par 'gyur ba dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pas rgyags shing de rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa zil gyis non pas bag med par
162a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slong mo ster ba'i khyim gyis rgyags shing / de mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slong mo ster ba'i khyim gyis spags pas bag med par 'gyur
162a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pas rgyags shing / de sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pas rgyags pas bdag la bstod par byed/ gzhan la smod
162b1(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa de ni bag med pa zhes bya ste/ 'od srung / bzhi po de dag ni rab tu byung ba'i rgyags shing bag med pa yin te/ rab tu byung ba rgyags shing bag med pa de dag dang ldan na/ sems can
162b2(dkon brtsegs): dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i tshe/ slad ma'i dus lnga
162b3(dkon brtsegs): brgya pa tha ma la/ dge sbyong dge sbyong ltar bcos pa/ ngur smrig 'tshal ba gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag
162b4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di nub par bgyid par 'gyur ba ci 'dra ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di
162b5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung / de bzhin gshegs pa la gtam 'di yongs su dris pas khyod la ci bya'i thong zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung / gal te de bzhin gshegs pas
162b6(dkon brtsegs): mi blun po de dag gi sdig pa 'dod pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang / g.yo dang / chom rkun dang / phyin ci log dang / bdud kyi nyes pa dang / bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi skyon yang
162b7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa thams cad brjod cing yang dag par bshad par gyur na/ 'od srung khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gi sdig ba kun spyod pa de dag thos na/ yang dag pa ma yin yang snang
163a1(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan
163a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshags pas chos 'dul ba 'di ci nas kyang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung
163a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung / de bzhin gshegs pa ni ring po mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /'od srung gis gsol pa/ bcom
163a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrung ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par bzhugs su gsol/
163a5(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung / gal te sangs rgyas stong snyed cig gis/ mi blun po
163a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag la cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i chos bstan du zin kyang / skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag sdig pa 'dod pa dang / sdig pa 'dzin pa de dag las phyir gzung ba'am bzlog par mi
163a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod do/ /'od srung / gzhan yang khyod phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha mal dam pa'i chos bsrung bar spro'am/ sems can bsam pa dge ba gang dag khyod kyis bshad pa la gus
163b1(dkon brtsegs): par nyan pa bskyed par 'gyur ba dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
163b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ bdag gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang bcas pa/ brag dang ri bo'i zom dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / nags tshal
163b3(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa 'di bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par phrag pa'am/ spyi bo la 'tshal bar ni spro lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi log par
163b4(dkon brtsegs): smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rgya shug gam/ til lam/ 'bras 'bru gcig gis bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par 'tsho ba
163b5(dkon brtsegs): ni spro lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi log par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag stong gsum gyi
163b6(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bskal pa'i zhugs chen po 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar bar gyur pa'i nang du spyod lam bzhi po dag gis dgung lo bye ba
163b7(dkon brtsegs): snyad du gnas par ni spro lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi log par spro ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags so/ /bcom ldan
164a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ bdag sems can thams cad las khro ba dang / spyo ba dang / smad pa dang / bshung ba dang / bsdigs pa dang / brdeg btsog dag bzod pas dang du
164a2(dkon brtsegs): len par ni spro lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni mi blun po/ chos kyi rkun po/ chos kyi chom rkun po/ chos la mu cor smra ba/ chos ltar bcos pa ston pa de dag gi log par smra ba'i
164a3(dkon brtsegs): sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni nye tshe bar spyod pa/ nye tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa lags pas/ de lta bu'i khur 'degs pa'i rngo mi thogs
164a4(dkon brtsegs): lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de lta bu'i khur 'degs par rngo thogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang 'di la bdag dper brjod par spobs
164a5(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ mi la la zhig rgas shing gtugs la/ 'khogs par gyur cing / de yang na tshod dgung lo brgya nyi shu tsam lags par gyur
164a6(dkon brtsegs): la| mi de bro nad kyis thebs shing / glo ba mi bde nas/ mchis mal gyi khri steng du mchis/ nyal bar gyur na/ mi shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can phyug pa/ nor mang pa/ longs
164a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod che ba la la zhig der mchis nas/ mi mchis mal gyi khri steng na mchis nyal ba de la/ kye skyes bu kho bo'i gter 'di khyod la gdams kyi/ kho bo gang gi tshe lo bcu'am nyi shu tsam na
164b1(dkon brtsegs): yul gzhan nas phyir 'ong ba de'i tshe/ khyod kyis kho bo la gter 'di phyir byin cig /ces de'i sug par gter 'doms par bgyid cing / de ltar gtams nas/ yul gzhan du mchis par gyur
164b2(dkon brtsegs): la| mi mchis mal gyi khri steng na mchis nyal ba de la yang bu yang ma mchis/ bu mo yang ma mchis/ 'khor kyang ma mchis la/ de nas mi de yul gzhan du mchis nas/ ring po ma lags par de
164b3(dkon brtsegs): yang 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par gyur na/ nor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyang chab 'tshal bar gyur pa'i slad na/ mi de slar mchis na su la ji skad bgyir yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du/
164b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ gang zhig nyan thos nyi tshe bar spyod pa/ nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa zla bo ma mchis pa/ yun ring por mi gnas pa la/ dam pa'i chos kyi gter 'doms par bgyid na/

164b6(dkon brtsegs): lta bu thos na/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag kun du skyo ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur pas na/ ngas shes bzhin du khyed la dris pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen
164b7(dkon brtsegs): pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la bdag dpe gnyis pa brjod par yang spobs lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ mi bro nad ma mchis
165a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rang bzhin can bro nad dang bral ba/ dgung lo 'bum phrag du mar 'tsho ba/ gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa/ g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa/ longs
165a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod phun sum tshogs pa/ rus phun sum tshogs pa/ rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ dge ba'i ngang tshul can/ byams pa dang ldan pa/ snying rje che ba/ yid dga' ba dang ldan pa/ sems can
165a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi skyon dang nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams la btang snyoms su 'jog pa/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don

165a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bsrung bar bgyid cing / mi de slar mchis nas kyang gter de slar stsol bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' la dam pa'i chos kyi
165b1(dkon brtsegs): gter 'doms par bgyid na/ de ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por yang cha ba 'tshal bar mi 'gyur zhing / skye bo mang po la yang sman thogs par 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung

165b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i bu
166a1(dkon brtsegs): thu bo gang lags pa de ni rgyal po'i 'og tu rgyal srid bgyid du stsol bar 'gyur lags pas/ de ni rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de nyid
166a2(dkon brtsegs): mchis bzhin du yang rgyal srid la spro bar bgyid cing / chos dang ldan par yang 'gyur la/ de 'di snyam du yang sems lags te/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba

169a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / sdig pa kun du spyod pa yin bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bsngags pa yang brjod cing / byang chub sems dpa' bsam

169b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i rigs pa wa'i sgra bsgrag cing / wa'i las rnams byed pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i bsngags par byed cing / 'jig rten gyi zang zing yun mi ring par yongs su
169b2(dkon brtsegs): gtong bar mi byed la/ ser snas zil gyis gnon cing / yo byad kyi dri mas spags pa de dag gis gtong ba phyi rol du byas pa/ phan pa'i dngos po'i bsngags pa rjod par byed cing / gnod
169b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / tha ba dang / khong khro ba'i nyes pa mang po byed pa dang / bzod pa'i bsngags brjod par byed cing / gcig tu gnod sems kyi sems su byed pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi

169b5(dkon brtsegs): la ltos/ de dag ni tshig tsam gyi dngos por 'gyur ba yin gyi/ de dag yon tan yang dag par blang ba dang / 'dres pa'i spyod pas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la mos pa'i rjes su
169b6(dkon brtsegs): slob par byed pa ni ma yin no/ /byams pa/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa dang / ches grangs med pa dang / ches shin tu grangs med pa dang / rgya che ba dang / tshad
169b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes bla ma
170a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi

170a3(dkon brtsegs): kho na'i 'jig rten du byung ngo / /byams pa/ de'i tshe na dge slong brtson 'grus mos zhes bya ba dran pa dang ldan pa/ rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ blo dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa chung ba chog shes pa/

170a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang chos ston par byed cing / rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dag dang / skye bo phal po che gzhan dag gis kyang rin mo byas/ mchod pa byas/ bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ shes par byas/

170a7(dkon brtsegs): de lan gnyis su 'gro bar sems bskyed par mi byed do/ /de 'jungs pa dang / ma dad pa dang / log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i khyim gzhan dag tu song zhing de dag tu son pa dang / de la de
170b1(dkon brtsegs): dag 'ongs pa legs so zhes kyang mi zer/ de dag tshig snyam par yang mi brjod pa'i steng du/ de la khro bar byed/ gshe bar byed na yang / de bzod pa'i go bgos shing / snying rje chen po la gnas
170b2(dkon brtsegs): pas 'gro la/ khyim de dag tu yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing / yid mi bde bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos des/ khyim gang dag dad par
170b3(dkon brtsegs): byas ba de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag gis dge slong gzhan dag gi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /
170b4(dkon brtsegs): byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de khyim de dag tu yang 'gro bar mi byed cing / 'gro bar sems bskyed par yang mi byed mod kyi/ 'on kyang de de dag la phrag dog dang / ser sna'i sems skyed
170b5(dkon brtsegs): par byed snyam mam/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ de ltar
170b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos de khyim gang dag nas tshig snyam pa dang / bdag la gus par nyan pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba rnyed pa'i khyim de dag mngon par dad par byas shing /
170b7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gzhan dag gi nye bar 'tsho bar byas nas/ de dag tu lan gnyis su 'jug par mi byed pa dang / 'jungs pa dang / ma dad pa dang / log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i khyim gang dag yin pa de
171a1(dkon brtsegs): dag dad par byed cing / de dag khro zhing gshe na yang yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing / yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba'i phan pa'i dngos po nyid dang / lhag pa'i
171a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa nyid dang / 'dod pa chung ba nyid dang / chog shes pa nyid dang / nges pa nyid dang / snying rje dang ldan pa nyid la ltos/ byams pa/ de ltar na sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
171a3(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag dad par byas shing / gzhan gyi nye bar 'tsho bar byed kyi bdag nyid kyi chos gos dang / bsod snyoms kyi don du byed pa ni ma yin no/ /byams pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub
171a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du/ khyod yid gnyis dang the tshom za bar gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang
171a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos zhes bya bar gyur to/ /byams pa/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'dod pas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus
171a6(dkon brtsegs): mos de'i rjes su bslab par bya/ de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum chogs pa dag gi rjes su yang bslab par bya zhing / de dag gi chos kun tu spyad
171a7(dkon brtsegs): bar yang bya'o/ / //bam po gnyis pa/ byams pa/ yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/ byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba'i dge slong kha cig 'byung bar
171b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ de dag 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms kyi don du khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/ khyim pa rnams dad pa la dgod pa'i phyir ni ma yin te/ de dag ni gcig
171b2(dkon brtsegs): la gcig bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa dang / 'byed pa dang / rtsod pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni ji ltar gzhan dag gis ma rnyed pas yi rangs bar 'gyur ba ltar bdag nyid
171b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis rnyed pas ni de lta ma yin la/ ji ltar gzhan dag gis rnyed pas yid mi bde bar 'gyur pa ltar/ bdag nyid kyis ma rnyed pas ni de ltar ma yin no/ /byams pa/ 'di ltar byang chub sems
171b4(dkon brtsegs): dpas ni bdag nyid kyi bde ba'i yo byang de dag thams cad la mi lta bar gzhan dag la sbyin par bya ba yin no/ /de dag ji tsam du phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba la ltos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa/
171b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar des ni bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba bskyed par bya'o zhes snying rje chen po sngon du btang ba'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshong dpon
171b6(dkon brtsegs): nam| khyim bdag gcig la bu gcig pa/ sdug ba/ phangs pa/ yid du 'ong ba zhig bdog par gyur pa de/ le lan 'ga' zhig gi phyir rgyal pos brtson rar bcug par gyur na/ byams pa/
171b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag de yid la byed pa'i sems ji lta bu dag gis rgyal pos brtson ra der 'jug par 'gyur snyam de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
172a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar bu gcig pa de thar
172a2(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi ba'i bsam pas/ bdag gis bu gcig pa 'di btson ra 'di nas myur du thar par bgyi'o snyam nas bu gcig pa yid la bgyid pa kho na dag gis brtson ra der 'jug par
172a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid de/ thar par yid la bgyid pa dag gis 'jug cing 'byung bar bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ ngas dpe de ni don shes par bya ba'i
172a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir brjod pa yin te/ 'dir don kyang gang zhig yin par blta bar bya zhe na/ byams pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal po'i brtson ra de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni 'khor ba'i brtson rar
172a5(dkon brtsegs): blta bar bya'o/ /byams pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpa' blta bar bya'o/ /byams pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
172a6(dkon brtsegs): bu gcig pa ji lta ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya bar blta bar bya'o/ /byams pa/ 'di lta ste/
172a7(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag de rgyu gzhan gyi phyir ma yin zhing / chad ka gzhan gyi phyir ma yin gyi/ bu gcig de'i don du btson ra der 'jug par 'gyur ba ji lta ba de bzhin
172b1(dkon brtsegs): du ni| byams pa/ byang chub sems dpas chos gos kyi ched dang / bsod snyoms kyi ched du khyim rnams su 'gro bar mi bya'i/ 'di ltar sems can de dag nyid 'khor ba las yongs su thar
172b2(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba'i phyir khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya ba la blta bar bya'o/ /byams pa/ yang byi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa/ sems ma bsgoms pa/ tshul
172b3(dkon brtsegs): khrims ma bsgoms pa/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni chos gos dang / bsod snyoms kyi che dud me tog gi skyes dag dang / 'bras bu'i skyes dag dang / lo
172b4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i skyes dag dang / yo byad kyi skyes dag dang / byas pa'i lan gyi skyes dag dang / khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur bas/ byis pa dge slong gis ni me tog phreng brgyud lta bur mi bya zhing / bran dang
172b5(dkon brtsegs): las mi lta bu yang mi bya'o/ /byams pa/ dge slong khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'dod pas ni chos kyi skyes kyis 'gro bar bya bar ma gtogs par/ skyes gzhan bkur bar mi bya ste/ des ni mang du
172b6(dkon brtsegs): thos pa dang / gzhung la shin tu zhugs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa dang / brkam chags med pa dang / tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / kha gsag med pa dang / bdag gir bya ba med par bya zhing /
172b7(dkon brtsegs): chos la dga' ba bskyed nas khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya'o/ /khyim rnams su song nas kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod par bya ba dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul
173a1(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya zhing / chos kyi gtam bya ba'i skyes ma gtogs
173a2(dkon brtsegs): par| khang khyim gyi ched dam/ zhing las kyi ched dam/ rnyed pa'i ched dam/ reg pa bde ba'i gtam mam/ rgyal po'i gtam mam/ chom rkun gyi gtam mam/ grong gi gtam mam/ grong khyer
173a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi gtam mam/ ljongs kyi gtam mam/ bu'i gtam mam/ bu mo'i gtam mam/ gtam gzhan gyi skyes dag mi bya'o/ /byams pa/ gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
173a4(dkon brtsegs): khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo zhig la byin pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems
173a5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsdus te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la byin par gyur na nor gyi phung po de tsam dang / bde ba'i yo byad de tsam
173a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis ni/ des rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la snying brtse ba'am/ phan btags par mi 'gyur gyi/ de'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam zhig nyan du bcug
173a7(dkon brtsegs): ste| de yang de'i rna ba'i rnam par rig par grags shing thos pa tsam de kho nar zad kyi/ re zhig dad pa thob par ma gyur du zin kyang / de ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rgyas
173b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / phan 'dogs pa dang / snying brtse ba ches shin tu mang du byed pa yin no/ /byams pa/ dge slong de dag khyim rnams su zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' spangs te/ 'jig rten
173b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gtam nye bar sbyor bar byed cing / ji tsam du don med pa chen pos khyim der mngon par brtson par byed pa la ltos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa/ 'di ltar gser ram/ dngul
173b3(dkon brtsegs): lam| nor bu dag gam/ rin po che dag gam/ mu tig dag gam/ bai DUR+Ya dag gam/ dung dag gam/ man shel dag gam/ byi ru dag gam/ bde ba'i yo byad gzhan dag gis ni/ sems
173b4(dkon brtsegs): can skye ba'i chos can rnams skye ba las yongs su thar bar mi 'gyur/ sems can na ba'i chos can rnams kyang nad rnams las yongs su thar bar mi 'gyur/ sems can rga ba dang /
173b5(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams kyang rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don
173b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar bar mi 'gyur gyi/ chos thos pas ni sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams kyang skye ba las yongs
173b7(dkon brtsegs): su thar par 'gyur la/ sems can na ba'i chos can rnams nad rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ sems can rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags
174a1(dkon brtsegs): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams kyang 'khrug pa las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de las
174a2(dkon brtsegs): dgongs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di skad ces/ stong chen 'jig rten khams ni gser dag gis/ /bkang ste gang la sbyin par byed pa ni/ /tshig bzhi'i tshigs su bcad pa
174a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig brjod pas/ /ji ltar phan 'dogs de ltar 'gyur ma yin/ /phan 'dogs byed par 'dod pa gang zhig gis/ /'jig rten gsum na sems can thams cad kyi/ /bde ba gang dag
174a4(dkon brtsegs): yod pa de dag kun/ /sems can gcig la sbyin pa byas pa bas/ /gang gis de la sangs rgyas lugs kyi ni/ /tshig bzhi'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig bsgrags na/ /de ni shin tu phan
174a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs mchog yin te/ /des ni sdug bsngal dag las grol bar 'gyur/ /zhes ston to/ /byams pa/ byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag rin po
174a6(dkon brtsegs): che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dbul ba phul ba bas ni snying rje chen po bskyed de/ sems can gcig la tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su
174a7(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa gcig cig gis bsgrags par gyur na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi gang gis ni gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi/ /
174b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten khams mchog rin chen gang byas te/ /dga' mchog sems kyis rgyal la phul ba dang / /gang gis sems can gcig la tshigs bcad byin/ /rin chen sbyin pa shin tu rgya chen
174b2(dkon brtsegs): des| |tshigs bcad sbyin pa snying rjes bsgrubs de la/ /char yang mi phod grangs su'ang ma yin na/ /gnyis sam gsum la bsam du ga la yod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang
174b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag g.yas pa'i dkyil na bsod nams thams cad mngon par bsgrubs
174b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyu mthun pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer mngon par grub pa yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na/ phyag g.yas pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
174b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di thams cad kun tu g.yogs par mdzad nas/ sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar bsgrubs par mdzad cing / zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom 'dod
174b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la ni skom/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/ rin po che 'dod pa rnams la ni rin po che rnams gang ci 'dod pa de la sbyin par yang spyod mod kyi/ de tsam gyis sems can de dag 'khor
174b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgya mtsho thog ma dang tha ma med pa nas chu srin 'dzin khri'i sdug bsngal chen po de las thar bar mi 'gyur bas/ byams pa/ nga ni 'jig rten pa'i bde ba'i yo byad de lta bu dag rnam par spangs
175a1(dkon brtsegs): nas| 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba'i chos rin po che yang dag par ston par mdzad de/ de thos na sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gtan du nye
175a2(dkon brtsegs): bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa/ de lta bas na khyed kyis kyang nga'i rjes su bslab par bya zhing / khyed zang zing la gdu bar mi bya'i/ khyed chos la gdu bar bya'o/ /byams pa/
175a3(dkon brtsegs): yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe na/ byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
175a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni ltung ba lhag par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / lus ma bsdams pa dang / ngag ma bsdams pa dang / yid ma bsdams pas sdig pa'i las lhag par spyad nas/ nyes pa
175a5(dkon brtsegs): bshags pa tsam gyis dag par 'gyur bar sems kyi/ phyin chad sdom par yang mi byed la/ phyin chad yang dag par bsdam pa'i phyir sdom par yang mi byed do/ /ngas ni sngon
175a6(dkon brtsegs): byas pa'i sdig pa'i las zad par bya ba'i phyir/ phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa yin na/ de la mi blun po de dag ni lhag par ltung ba mngon par 'du bya ba mngon
175a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'du byas nas/ nyes pa bshags shing sbyang ba tsam gyis dag par 'gyur bar sems shing / phyin chad sdom par ni mi byed do/ /byams pa/ gzhan yang ngas byang chub sems
175b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi las yongs su bsal ba byas pas na/ mi dge ba'i las chung ngus ni byang chub sems dpa' sems can dmyal ba'am/
175b2(dkon brtsegs): dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ dbul por skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag tu yang ltung bar mi nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpas ni myur
175b3(dkon brtsegs): du med par bya zhing / /'dzem dog dang ldan pa dang / bslab pa 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba dang / rtag tu yid skyo ba dang / srid par 'gro ba'i skye ba'i
175b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas thams cad la yid skrag par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bdag brgal nas/ khyed cag thams cad bsgral bar bya'o/ /
175b5(dkon brtsegs): grol nas dgrol bar bya'o/ /dbugs phyin nas dbugs dbyung bar bya'o/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes/ sems can thams cad
175b6(dkon brtsegs): nye bar gzung ba'i phyir te/ byams pa/ ngas ni lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi
175b7(dkon brtsegs): sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na/ byang chub sems dpa'i las ji snyed pa dang / khur ji snyed pa dang / dgos pa ji snyed pa dang / don bya ba ji snyed pa dang / bya ba ji snyed pa de snyed ni/
176a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'ga' la yang ma mthong ngo / /byams pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ brag dang / ri
176a2(dkon brtsegs): dang | rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / nags tshal dang bcas pa 'di mi la la zhig gi spyi bo'am/ phrag pa'i steng du bzhag ste/ 'di skad ces kye skyes bu khyod kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen
176a3(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ brag dang / ri dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / nags tshal dang bcas pa 'di bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag pa'am/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa
176a4(dkon brtsegs): stong ngam/ bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du gdag par bya zhing gzhag par mi bya/ ngal bso bar mi bya'o zhes kyang bsgo na/ byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de'i khur de che ba dang / spro ba
176a5(dkon brtsegs): mthu dang ldan pa dang / mthu stobs mthu dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus mthu dang ldan pa yin snyam mam/ byams pas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthu dang ldan pa lags so/ /
176a6(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa/ mthu dang ldan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ byams pa/ de bas
176a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang gang zhig gis kye sems can rnams ngas khyed cag mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la dgod par bya'o zhes sems can thams cad nye bar gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
176b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i khur dang / spro ba dang / mthu stobs dang / brtson 'grus ches stobs dang ldan par blta bar bya'o/ /byams pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi la la zhig gi las stong gsum gyi stong
176b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las ji tsam pa de tsam du gyur la/ des sems can thams cad kyi las de dag kyang se gol gtogs pa gcig tsam gyis
176b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su sgrub par byed cing / las kyi mtha' 'ga' tsam yang yongs su nyams par ma gyur na/ byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de'i las de stobs dang ldan pa yin snyam mam/ byams
176b4(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de lta lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ stobs dang ldan pa lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ stobs
176b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ byams pa/ de bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gang gis
176b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du/ bdag gis sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las dgrol bar bya'o zhes tshig tu brjod nas/ las su bya bar byed pa de ches stobs dang ldan pa yin no/ /
176b7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khyim bdag la la zhig la bu gcig pa sdug pa/ phangs pa/ yid du 'ong ba ma mthong na mi mthun pa med pa zhig bdog par gyur la/ khyim bdag de nyes pa
177a1(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' zhig gi le lan gyis bu gcig pa dang bcas/ chung ma dang bcas/ las byed pa dang zho shas 'tsho ba rnams dang bcas/ nor dang / dbyig dang / yo byad thams cad bcas te/
177a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i pho brang du bkug par gyur cing / de nas rgyal po des khyim bdag de la 'di skad du/ kwa'i khyim bdag khyod 'di nas dpag tshad 'bum gyi pha rol na/ grong khyer che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig yod
177a3(dkon brtsegs): par don 'di'i phyir zhag bdun gyis phyin par song la/ cha khyer te phyir yang zhag bdun gyis nga'i drung du phyin par shog cig dang / de lta na ngas khyod kyi bu gcig pa 'di dang / chung ma 'di dang / 'khor
177a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag thams cad dang / nor dang dbyig dang / yo byad 'di dag thams cad kyang khyod la phyir sbyin par bya zhing / gzhan yang khyod la rgyal srid phyed kyi sbyin pa yang lhag par sbyin par bya'o/ /gal te
177a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod song nas grong khyer de nas cha blangs te/ nyin mtshan bdun gyis phyir ma 'ongs na/ khyod la cung zad kyang sbyin par mi bya ba'i steng du/ khyod bu gcig pa dang bcas/ chung ma dang bcas/ 'khor
177a6(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas te/ chad pas bcad pa dang / srog dang dbral zhing gsad par bya'o zhes bsgo bar gyur na/ byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyim bdag de de skad bsgo ba na/ bdag phangs pa dang ldan
177a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bu phangs pa dang ldan pa dang / chung ma phangs pa dang ldan pa dang / 'khor phangs pa dang ldan pa dang / nor phangs pa dang ldan pas stobs dang ldan pa'i rtsom pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa'i
177b1(dkon brtsegs): mgyogs pas grong khyer der 'gro bar 'gyur snyam mam/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de lta lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i
177b2(dkon brtsegs): don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ de ni don de yongs su ma grub kyi bar du sems rnam par g.yeng bar mi bgyid/ zas kyi 'du shes bskyed par mi bgyid/ rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sems bskyed par
177b3(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyid lags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar de'i slad rol gyi dngos po gzhan dag lta zhog lags kyi/ bdag nyid phangs pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
177b4(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ byams pa/ gal te sems can thams cad de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa chen po dang ldan par gyur kyang / sems can de dag thams cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po de ni/ byang chub
177b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i brtson 'grus chen po de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi
177b6(dkon brtsegs): cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni rgyun phyogs su ded pa'i sems can
177b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rgyun las bzlog pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu dgod par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /byams pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi 'di tsam du stobs dang ldan pa/ 'di
178a1(dkon brtsegs): tsam du shugs dang ldan pa/ 'di tsam du mthu dang ldan pa/ 'di tsam du brtson 'grus dang ldan pa la la zhig skyes par gyur la/ des rgya mtsho chen po bzhi
178a2(dkon brtsegs): p o de dag na chu'i phung po gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad chu klung chen po'i rgyun gang dang gang dag nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs par gyur pa'i chu klung chen po'i rgyun de dag nyid nas chu'i
178a3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' phyir bzlog nas rgyun las bzlog thabs kho nar mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang du phab par gyur na/ byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba dang / brtson 'grus
178a4(dkon brtsegs): che ba yin snyam mam/ byams pas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de lta lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams
178a5(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ de bas kyang gang dag lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad kyi don du snying rje chen po kun du bskyed nas/ bla na med pa
178a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ nan tan gyis mdzes par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ /de bas kyang gang sangs
178a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas yod do/ /chos yod do/ /dge 'dun yod do/ /legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yod do zhes nges par rtog par byed pa de dag
178b1(dkon brtsegs): ches shin tu dga' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ /de bas kyang gang dag 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa dang / zhe sdang gi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa dang / gti
178b2(dkon brtsegs): mug gi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ /de bas kyang gang dag mdza' bshes dang / grogs dang / nye du dang / rgan rabs rnams
178b3(dkon brtsegs): la mi lta bar spangs shing / longs spyod chung ngu dang / longs spyod chen po'i tshogs rnams kyang yongs su spangs nas/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'du lba la rab tu 'byung ba'i sems kyis
178b4(dkon brtsegs): khyim gyi gnas nas gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ /de bas kyang gang dag gos dur smrig dag bgos te/ legs par gsungs
178b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par legs pa kho nar rab tu 'byung bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ /de bas kyang gang
178b6(dkon brtsegs): dag de dag rab tu byung nas/ gdams ngag la nan tan gyis mdzes par byed pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi ji ltar bcas pa dag la slob par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang /
178b7(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ /de bas kyang gang dag 'du 'dzi'i gtam la 'jigs par lta zhing / dben pa 'dod pas dgon pa la mngon par phyogs te/ gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa de dag ches
179a1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ /de bas kyang gang dag chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes mos par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang /
179a2(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ /de bas kyang gang dag chos zab mo rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob pa de dag ches shin tu dga' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ /de bas kyang gang dag
179a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag mngon sum du byas nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob par byed pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu rjes su thob par byed pa de dag
179a4(dkon brtsegs): ches shin tu dka' bar byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad cing dang ba dang / rab tu byung zhing bsnyen
179a5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs dge slong gi dngos po dang / 'bras bu thob pa de ni shin tu dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa/ de la yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub
179a6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i las spangs te/ byis
179a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las la rab tu gnas pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ byams pa/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las gang zhe na/ nyi shu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
179b1(dkon brtsegs): las yin te/ de dag yongs su ma rdzogs na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar mi nus so/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ ser sna'i sems tshar gcad par bya ba dang / gtong ba
179b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po spel bar bya ba dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / gnod sems dang tha ba'i skyon rnam par spang bar
179b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / bzod pa'i stobs la gnas par bya ba dang / le lo'i sems rnam par mnan par bya ba dang / brtson 'grus chen po brtsam par bya ba dang / brjed ngas pa'i sems yongs su
179b4(dkon brtsegs): spang bar bya ba dang / dran pa dang / blo gros kyis bsam gtan rnams la mi brten par bsam gtan du bya ba dang / zab mo la bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
179b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad spang bar bya ba dang / mtshan ma med pas gnas par bya ba dang / smon pa dang bral bar bya ba dang / smon pa med pa'i yul yongs
179b6(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang bar bya ba dang / snying rje chen pos gnas par bya ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dga' ba'i sems
179b7(dkon brtsegs): yid la mi bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing nem nur med pa dang / yid ches par bya ba ste/ byams pa/ nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las yin te/ las
180a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag yongs su ma rdzogs na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar mi nus so/ /byams pa/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang
180a2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i dam bca' ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag nyid kyi bde ba spong ba dang / chos kyis ngoms mi shes pa dang / chos yongs su tshol bas bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o/ /chos kyi 'khor
180a3(dkon brtsegs): lo bskor bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa las thar bar bya'o/ /sems can gyi khams tshad med pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang
180a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya'o zhes yang dag par dam bca' ba ste/ byams pa/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag par dam bca' ba yin no/ /byams pa/ 'di
180a5(dkon brtsegs): lta ste| dper na/ mi sman mkhas la gsang sngags mkhas shing dug dang rtsi la mkhas pa gnyis shig yod par gyur la/ de gnyis las mi gcig gis skye bo phal po che'i mdun du ngo mtshar
180a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi 'du shes bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dug za bar byed cing / zos nas kyang yan lag dang nyid lag rnams shig shig por gyur pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar gyur pa las/ yang gsang
180a7(dkon brtsegs): sngags sngon du btang ba'i sman za bar byed cing / de gsang sngags yang dag pa dang / sman des dug gi nyes pa de dag dang bral bar gyur la/ de nas mi des dus gzhan gyi tshe na sman de ma rnyed cing
180b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyen po ma rnyed pas/ dug des shi bar gyur la/ de nas mi cig shos des 'di skad ces smras te/ kho bos ni sman gyis dug zhi bar byed nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo la ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes mi
180b2(dkon brtsegs): dgos/ yan lag dang nying lag shig shig phor 'gyur ba mi dgos pas/ dug kyang mi za/ sman yang mi 'thung ngo zhes zer ba de bzhin du/ byams pa/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma
180b3(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba kha cig 'di skad ces sdig pa'i las ni nyes pa bshags pas ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro zhes zer zhing / de dag sdig pa
180b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du byang mngon par 'du shes nas yang bshags par bya'o/ /zhes ltung ba lhag par 'byin par byed cing / phyis sdom pa 'dzin par ni mi byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag
180b5(dkon brtsegs): ni 'chi ba'i chos can yin no zhes nga smra ste/ 'chi ba yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dug za ba'i mi de dang 'dra bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ log par ltung ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur
180b6(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no/ /byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni/ 'di skad ces bdag cag la dug kyang mi dgos/ sman yang mi
180b7(dkon brtsegs): dgos kyi/ bdag cag ni 'das pa'i dus na sdig pa'i las byas pa zad par bya ba dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba na mngon par 'du mi bya ba ma gtogs par sdig pa'i las kyang mi bya
181a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing / ltung ba yang 'byung bar mi bya la/ bshags par yang mi bya'o zhes zer te/ byams pa/ 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la dug ces bya ba de ni/ 'di lta ste/
181a2(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa'i gzhi ji ltar bcas pa dag las 'da' bar byed pa yin pas khyed cag gis ni dug bza' bar mi bya'o/ /byams pa/ bzhi po 'di dag ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
181a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gcod par byed pa'i chos rnams yin te/ de dag ni nyan thos kyis kyang bya ba ma yin na/ byang chub sems dpas lta smos kyang ci dgos
181a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ byas pa mi bzo ba nyid dang / g.yo la brten pa nyid dang / rdzun gyi tshig smra ba nyid dang / bslab pa las 'da' bar byed pa nyid yin te/ bzhi po de dag ni 'di lta ste/ byang
181a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gcod par byed pa'i chos rnams yin te/ de dag ni nyan thos kyis kyang bya ba ma yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta
181a6(dkon brtsegs): smos kyang ci dgos/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po 'di dag las dpag tshad brgyar 'byol bar bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa
181a7(dkon brtsegs): dang | sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag pa dang / 'du 'dzi'i gnas dang / gnas gang na gnas pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gzhan zhig kyang 'dug par gyur la/ gal
181b1(dkon brtsegs): te de dang lhan cig tu mgu ba dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skyes la/ 'thab pa med pa dang ldan pa dang / rtsod pa med pa dang ldan par gnas na ni/ des der gnas par bya'i/ gal te
181b2(dkon brtsegs): de de la tha na tha ba dang zhe sdang gi sems gcig tsam zhig skyed par byed na yang / des de nas dpag tshad brgyar 'byol bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpas ni byang chub sems dpa' la tha ba dang /
181b3(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ /byams pa/ byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can gang ji snyed pa de
181b4(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad la spyos sam/ brgyad pa'am/ dbyig pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab par gyur na/ byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' des sems can ji
181b5(dkon brtsegs): snyed cig la spyos pa'am/ brgyad pa'am/ dbyig pas brdegs pa'am/ mtshon gyis btab pa'i gzhi de las sdig pa dang / smas pa dang / nyams pa mang po bskyed par 'gyur snyam mam/ byams
181b6(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gcig cig la spyos sam/ brgyad pa'am/ dbyig pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab na yang bsod nams ma lags pa mang du
181b7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed lags na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa thams cad la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang
182a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas ni sems can 'ga' tsam la yang tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang / gnod sems bskyed par mi bgyi ba'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang /
182a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa/ byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
182a3(dkon brtsegs): su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad spyos sam/ brgyad pa'am/ dbyig pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab pa gang yin pa des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig la tha na tha ba dang / zhe
182a4(dkon brtsegs): sdang gi sems gcig tsam zhig bskyed par gyur pa de tsam du byang chub sems dpa' de smas pa dang / nyams par mi 'gyur te/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'
182a5(dkon brtsegs): cig shos de la tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par byed na/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub yongs su mi gtong ba zhig yin na/ sems ji snyed bskyed pa de snyed kho na'i bskal
182a6(dkon brtsegs): par byang chub kyi phyir yang go cha bgo bar bya dgos so/ /byams pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lcags ni lcags nyid kyis gcod par byed pa ma gtogs par bong ba'am/ shing ngam/ rtswas
182a7(dkon brtsegs): gcod par mi nus pa de bzhin du/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang byang chub sems dpa' cig shos la/ tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems bskyed pas zad par byed pa
182b1(dkon brtsegs): ma gtogs par gzhan gyis zad par mi 'gyur te/ byams pa/ de lta bas na khyed cag gis gcig la gcig zhe sa dang bcas pa dang / gcig la gcig gus pa dang bcas pas gnas par bya'o zhes
182b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bslab par bya zhing / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la yang ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
182b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can thams cad la yang zhe sa dang bcas pa dang / gus pa dang bcas pas gnas par bgyis lags na/ /
182b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni gnod sems la dpa' bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bzod pa'i stobs dang / mthu
182b5(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni g.yo la brten par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/
182b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni gzhan gyi khyim la lhag par chags par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bdag gir 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das /
182b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni zang zing lhur len par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni chos lhur len par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni zas dang / gos lhur len par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni pha'i nor yongs su
183a1(dkon brtsegs): tshol bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni phrag dog dang / ser snas kun nas dkris par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni gzhan gyi 'byor pa dag la yid
183a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / gtong ba phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni dge sbyong gi ming lhur len par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni dge sbyong gi yon tan dag la slob
183a3(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni smra ba lhur len par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sgrub pa snying por bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la
183a4(dkon brtsegs): lhag par chags par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni don nyung ba dang / bgyi ba nyung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su tshol bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni zang zing
183a5(dkon brtsegs): gis bsgos pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis grong dang grong khyer du 'jug par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yid la bgyid pa la mngon par brtson pas grong dang
183a6(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer du 'jug par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni chos gos dang bsod snyoms kyi slad du tshul 'chos par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni tshul 'chos pa ma mchis pa dang /
183a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i rigs bzhis chog shes par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni byis pa'i spyod pa la slob par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa la slob par bgyid
183b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni gzhan dag gi bgyid pa dang / ma bgyis pa dag la so sor rtog par mi bgyis kyi/ bdag ni bdag nyid dul ba dang / zhi bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson
183b2(dkon brtsegs): pas gnas par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni ltung ba 'ga' yang gleng bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni ngag gi las kyi mtha' sdom par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
183b3(dkon brtsegs): ni bslab pa thag ring du mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni so sor thar pa la slob par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pas 'tsho
183b4(dkon brtsegs): bar sems par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod cing de la dga' ba'i sems bskyed par bgyid pa dang / bdag ni chos kyi bsngags pa brjod cing chos kyi rjes su
183b5(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa'i chos bsgrub pa la gnas par bgyid pa dang / bdag ni dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la brten par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
183b6(dkon brtsegs): ni gzhan gyis mthong ba bskyed pa'i slad du tshul 'chos pas mchi ma 'byin par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma 'byin par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni bgyi
183b7(dkon brtsegs): ba sna tshogs kyi 'du 'dzin sbags te gnas par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni chos yongs su tshol ba la mngon par brtson par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni 'jig rten pa'i bgyi pa la
184a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la dga' bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni gsog 'jog
184a2(dkon brtsegs): gi zas dang ldan par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni tshul 'chos pa ma mchis par kun tu spyod par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni gnas dang yul gcig yongs su 'dzin par
184a3(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni ri dwags ltar kun tu rgyu bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni bsod snyoms la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi
184a4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan yongs su tshol ba la brtson par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis nyal bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni nam gyi cha stod dang / nam gyi cha smad
184a5(dkon brtsegs): la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni 'du 'dzi'i spyod yul la brtson par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni dben pa la dga' bar bgyid pa dang /
184a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni yon tan cung zad tsam gyis chog shes par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni yon tan yongs su tshol bas ngoms ma 'tshal bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
184a7(dkon brtsegs): ni khyi'i chos rnams la kun tu spyod par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni cung zad bshes pa dang ldan par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag
184b1(dkon brtsegs): ni mdza' bshes shin tu brtan par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni bgyis pa mi bzo bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bgyis pa bzo ba dang / bgyis pa tshor bar bgyid pa dang / bcom
184b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ bdag ni sbyin pa'i lan gyis mdza' bshes su mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pas mdza' bshes su bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam
184b3(dkon brtsegs): pa bcos mar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni dman pa la mos par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su
184b4(dkon brtsegs): 'grub pa lhur blang ba rgya chen po la mos par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa ma mchis pa dang / bslab pa la gus pa ma mchis par mi bgyid
184b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi| bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa dang bcas pa dang / bslab pa la gus pa dang bcas par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems kyang gzhan la/ smra ba
184b6(dkon brtsegs): yang gzhan pa'i lce gnyis su mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni tshul 'chos pa'i byang chub sems dpar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni
184b7(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / bdag nyid dul ba dang / zhi ba la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni nga rgyal gyis nga rgyal bskyed par mi
185a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyid kyi/ bdag ni gdol ba'i bu dang 'dra bar nga rgyal nges par 'joms par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni chags pa dang bcas pas bsod
185a2(dkon brtsegs): snyoms yongs su longs spyod par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / dad pas stsal ba la lci ba'i 'du shes su bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni tshul
185a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ma lags pa'i rnam par rtog par yid la bgyid pa sngon du btang pas/ gdugs pas ma thag kho nar mchis nyal ba dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyi bar du zil gyis gnon
185a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub par bgyi ba'i slad du rtag tu brtson zhing sbyor bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni gang zag tu lta
185a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la brten par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni stong pa nyid la gnas par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni rnam par rtog pa dang / 'khrul pa smra bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni
185a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma ma mchis pa la gnas par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni tshul 'chos par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su dag
185a7(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni zang zing gis bsgos pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis chos ston par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems kyis chos ston par
185b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni zang zing gi sbyin pas mdza' bshes su mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni chos kyi sbyin pas mdza' bshes su bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni bdag
185b2(dkon brtsegs): dang gzhan la yongs su gdung bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bdag la sman pa dang / gzhan la sman pa'i slad du bsgrub par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni dgon par gnas pa la tshul
185b3(dkon brtsegs): 'chos par mi bgyid/ bsod snyoms la tshul 'chos par mi bgyid/ phyag dar khrod la tshul 'chos par mi bgyid de/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis yang dag
185b4(dkon brtsegs): par blangs te/ gnas par bgyid cing / de yang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad la brten pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
185b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byams pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa
185b6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar seng ge'i sgra 'di sgrogs par byed pa/ khyod sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / chos de dag dang / yon tan de dag la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa
185b7(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ legs so/ /legs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de nas dge slong lnga brgya stan las langs te dong ngo / /de
186a1(dkon brtsegs): nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos dge slong lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge slong chen po dag /khyed cag yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam brjod pa'i
186a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe stan las langs te gar 'dong / de skad ces smras pa dang / gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la dge slong lnga brgya po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ byang chub sems
186a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam de lta bu bstan pa'i gnas pa de dag ni srid par dka' ba lags pas bdag cag 'di snyam du/ bdag cag ni yo byad bsnyungs
186a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan de dag la yang dag par mi snang bas bdag cag phyir khyim du 'dong gor ma chag go / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dad pas byin pa ni reg par dka' zhing sbyangs par dka' ba'i phyir
186a5(dkon brtsegs): ro snyam du sems pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu dag /legs so/ /legs so/ /gang dag dad
186a6(dkon brtsegs): pas byin pa la yongs su longs spyod par mi spro ba dag gis ni/ de ltar mdzem pa dang ldan pa dang / 'gyod pa dang ldan par bya ste/ nyin gcig la lan brgya rab tu byung ba phyir spangs pa ni bla'i/
186a7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pas dad pas byin pa la yongs su longs spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
186b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pas stsal ba ji ltar rjes su gnang bar mdzad pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ ngas ni rigs pa dang / grol
186b2(dkon brtsegs): ba la dad pas byin pa rjes su gnang ngo / /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong lnga brgya tsam po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag /khyed cag sbyor cig /rtsol cig
186b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bod cig / sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka' ba yin gyi/ khyed cag rab tu byung ba las phyir ma ldog cig /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la dge slong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis 'di skad
186b4(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ bdag cag gis ji ltar sbyar bar bgyid lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis ji ltar ji ltar sbyor ba dang / 'bad pa dang / rtsol bar byed pa
186b5(dkon brtsegs): na| chos 'ga' yang sbyor bar mi byed/ chos 'ga' yang 'byed par mi byed pa dang / chos 'ga' yang skyed par mi byed/ chos 'ga' yang 'gog par mi byed pa dang / chos 'ga' yang thob par mi
186b6(dkon brtsegs): byed| chos 'ga' yang spong bar mi byed pa dang / chos 'ga' yang 'bri bar mi byed/ chos 'ga' yang 'phel bar mi byed pa de ltar sbyor bar gyis shig /dge slong gang de ltar sbyor bar de ni
186b7(dkon brtsegs): chos 'ga' yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang chos 'ga' yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de ni gar yang mi 'gro/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo / /gang la 'gro ba med pa de la ni 'ong ba yang 'ga'
187a1(dkon brtsegs): yang med do/ /de ni 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa'i dge slong zhes bya ste/ gang du yang rten pa yang ma yin/ mi rten pa yang ma yin no/ /bstan pa 'di bshad
187a2(dkon brtsegs): pa na| dge slong lnga brgya po de dag len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
187a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma de la byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
187a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung / gang dag sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing / lhag pa'i bsam pa nyam chung ste/ zas dang gos lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dag ni mang du 'byung
187a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du
187a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas gang dag dang / spyod pa gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa nyam chung ba dang / tshul 'chos pa lags par 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag legs pa legs
187a7(dkon brtsegs): par bshad du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar gnas de dag thos na/ byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gang dag lags pa de dag
187b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang bdag nyid bsrung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i
187b2(dkon brtsegs): dus lnga brgya pa tha ma de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing lhag pa'i bsam pa nyam chung ba de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la me tog
187b3(dkon brtsegs): dang | bdug pa dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / mar me'i sbyin pa dag gis mchod pa'i las la brtson
187b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / ngas ni shes pa dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir mchod pa bshad pa yin na/ mi blun po de dag ni de la brtson par 'gyur te/
187b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung / ngas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du dge slong dag khyed cag ni bdag nyid dul ba dang / zhi bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pas gnas par gyis shig /bram ze dang / khyim bdag
