187b6(dkon brtsegs): dad pa dang ldan pa dag yod na/ de dag ni nga'i sku gdung rnams la sku gdung gi mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de skad gsung na/ 'od srung / mi blun po de dag rnal 'byor kyang spangs/ spong ba
187b7(dkon brtsegs): yang spangs/ lung nod pa yang spangs/ kha ton bya ba yang spangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi mchod pa'i las la brtson par 'gyur zhing / de dag la brten nas 'tsho bar
188a1(dkon brtsegs): sems par byed pa de dag la ltos/ 'od srung / byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chu'i phung po
188a2(dkon brtsegs): nas bzung ste/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug pa'i bar du 'bru mar gyis yongs su bkang ste/ mar me'i snying po ri rab tsam bcugs nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod
188a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las kyi phyir mar me bus pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa cig shos kyis mkhan po'am
188a4(dkon brtsegs): slob dpon gyi drung nas tshig bzhi ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig lung mnos te/ kha ton byed cing gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa gang yin pa de/ de bas ches bsod
188a5(dkon brtsegs): nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog dang / bdug pa dang /
188a6(dkon brtsegs): phye ma dang / spos kyis rab tu bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ lo 'bum gyi bar du nyid lan gsum/ mtshan lan gsum phul ba bas ni
188a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'jigs shing skrag pa gzhan zhig khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs shing / sems can gyis don mngon par bsgrub
188b1(dkon brtsegs): ba na dgon po la mngon par phyogs te/ gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa gang yin pa de de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / 'di ji snyam du sems/
188b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas kyal ka'i ched dam/ brjod pa'i ched du de skad gsungs pa ma yin grang snyam na/ 'od srung / khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni nga la
188b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'od srung / sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ /bskal pa grangs med pa dang / ches grangs med pa dang / ches shin tu grangs med pa dang / rgya che ba dang /
188b4(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpag tu med pa dag byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog sna
188b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa
188b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ 'od srung / de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i nyan thos rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po ni bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu
188b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ /'od srung / de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po zhig byung bar gyur te/ 'od srung /
189a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po mu khyud de la bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong
189a2(dkon brtsegs): yod par gyur to/ /'od srung / rgyal po mu khyud de'i bu stong po de dag gi rjes la de'i pang bar chos zhes bya ba dang / chos bzang zhes bya ba'i khye'u gnyis shig pa rdzus te skyes
189a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ /'od srung / rgyal po mu khyud des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la/ lo brgyad khri bzhi stong
189a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs kyi bar du las gzhan mi byed par khyim gyi yid la byed pa thams cad spangs te/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang /
189a5(dkon brtsegs): yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams pa yang zhag bdun bdun 'das shing / chos gos yid du 'ong ba gzhan dang gzhan dag phul lo/ /gang
189a6(dkon brtsegs): dang gang ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag la kha zas kyi rnam pa yid du 'ong ba de lta de lta bu dag kyang phul lo/ /gang dang gang dag ji dang ji lta bu 'dod pa de dag gis gtsug lag khang
189a7(dkon brtsegs): yid du 'ong ba de lta de lta bu dag kyang brtsig tu bcug go / dge slong re re la yang 'chags dang / skyed mos tshal dang / bsnyen bkur ba bdun bdun dang / ro brgya dang ldan
189b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i kha zas dag kyang phul lo/ /'od srung / 'di ltar rgyal po mu khyud des/ khang bzang khor khor yug tu dpag tshad brgyad cu yod pa/ ngos bzhi khang mig can shin tu 'brel ba/
189b2(dkon brtsegs): bkra ba blta na sdug pa/ legs par byas pa/ shin tu zin par byas pa/ 'khrul 'khor gyi srid bus yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dag kyang byed du bcug ste/ gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs
189b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag khang bzang de dag na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ 'khrul 'khor gyi srad bu de dag shugs kyis khang bzang de dag gi steng nas me tog kha dog rnam ba du ma'i char
189b4(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang 'bab bo/ /me tog de dag gis khang bzang de dag pus mo nub tsam du gang bar gyur to/ /'od srung / de ltar rgyal po mu khyud des/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs dge
189b5(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong rdzogs kyi bar du yon tan bkod pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dag dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar
189b6(dkon brtsegs): byas| ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas so/ /'od srung / de nas lo brgyad khri bzhi stong pa de dag 'das pa'i phyis de nyid par/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad lags
189b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'og tu/ khye'u chos dang / chos bzang gnyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
190a1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog sna tshogs de'i spyan sngar btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la yid kyis zhu ba 'di skad ces yongs su zhus
190a2(dkon brtsegs): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po mu khyud 'dis yun ring po 'di srid du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa rnam pa mang po 'di lta bu thams cad zil gyis non cing / yongs su gtugs
190a3(dkon brtsegs): te gnas par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa dang / bsod nams dang / longs spyod dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan zhig mchis lags sam/ 'od srung / de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis zhabs
190a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis la gtugs ma thag tu/ de nas skad cig de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rab tu g.yos shing / 'jig rten du sa g.yos pa chen po yang byung bar
190a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ /'od srung / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i bsnyen bkur ba thub dka' zhes bya ba zhig yod par gyur pa gang yin pa de stan las
190a6(dkon brtsegs): langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de ga la ba de logs
190a7(dkon brtsegs): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten dogs cher g.yos pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang
190b1(dkon brtsegs): lags| ci'i slad du na/ khye'u 'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs par gyur lags/ 'od srung / de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
190b2(dkon brtsegs): pa me tog sna tshogs des bsnyen bkur ba thub dka' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ gtam de lta bu yongs su zhus pas khyod la ci bya/ gal te de bzhin gshegs
190b3(dkon brtsegs): pas khye'u 'di gnyis kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu dang / zab mo la bzod pa bsgom pa ji lta bu dang / snying rje chen po ji lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs
190b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas de bshad par gyur na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di rmongs par 'gyur ro// //bam po gsum pa/ 'od srung / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
190b5(dkon brtsegs): me tog sna tshogs des/ nyan thos chen po rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba la bka' stsal pa/ sred med kyi bu khyod longs la khye'u 'di gnyis slong ste/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul
190b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi mthu ston cig / 'od srung | de nas dge slong sred med kyi bu des de las khye'u gcig lag pa g.yas pas bslangs la/ khye'u cig shos lag pa g.yon pas bslangs te/ gyen du 'phang ngo snyam
190b7(dkon brtsegs): na gdeg par ma nus so/ /des yang rgya cher mthu dang stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / spro ba dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po yang dag par bstan cing gyen du 'phang ngo snyam na/ tha na de gnyis skra'i
191a1(dkon brtsegs): rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang bskyod pa'am/ bsgul bar ma nus so/ /'od srung / de ltar des khye'u de gnyis shin tu gyen du 'phang par bskyed pa na/ stong
191a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brag dang / ri dang / rtswa dang / shing dang / chu dang bcas pa de rab tu g.yos shing bla 'og tu 'gul bar gyur kyang khye'u de gnyis
191a3(dkon brtsegs): bslang bar ni ma nus so/ /'od srung / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des de'i tshe/ nyan thos chen po de'i sems yang dag par rab tu bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul
191a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi mthu nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu nye bar bsgrubs pa des dge slong sred med kyi bu des 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'gul
191a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / g.yos pa dang / rab tu 'khrugs pa dang / bla 'og tu 'gul bar byas kyang / tha na khye'u de gnyis skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang g.yo ba'am/ 'gul bar byed mi nus
191a6(dkon brtsegs): so| |'od srung / de nas dge slong sred med kyi bu des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
191a7(dkon brtsegs): me tog sna tshogs de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs las yongs su nyams pa'am gcig tu ma gyur lags grang / de ci'i
191b1(dkon brtsegs): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar bdag gis khye'u skyes nas ring po ma lags pa/ byis pa'i gzugs su mchis pa/ lus bong chung du 'di gnyis kyis dog sa la gtugs
191b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang bslang bar rngo ma thogs pa'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des/ dge slong sred med kyi bu de la 'di skad ces
191b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to/ /sred med gyi bu khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs las yongs su ma nyams mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas
191b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnam par dkrugs pa'am/ bsam par sla ba ma yin te/ sred med kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
191b5(dkon brtsegs): na| sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ngas da ltar khyod nyid nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang ldan
191b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cing / de tsam du rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / de tsam du mthu che ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa bye ba snyed da rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag
191b7(dkon brtsegs): gi rnam par 'phrul pa byas kyang / de dag gi khye'u 'di gnyis bslang ba'am/ bsgul bar mi nus so/ /'od srung / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des tshig de skad
192a1(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa ni/ 'khor de las srog chags 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de
192a2(dkon brtsegs): dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs shing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pa kho na yin yang / gang la nyan thos
192a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di dag brdugs par byas te/ bkod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de lta bu dang ldan pa de ni ngo mtshar te/ bdag cag gis kyang byin gyi rlabs de lta bu thob par bya ba dang / sangs
192a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi ye shes kyang thob par bya'o snyam du sems shing / de ltar yang dag par shes pa'i srog chags 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
192a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /'od srung / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nyid du 'dus te/ 'dug par gyur
192a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs ga la ba
192a7(dkon brtsegs): de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ khye'u 'di gnyis bslangs par mdzad cing
192b1(dkon brtsegs): khye'u 'di gnyis kyis zhus pa rab tu rnam par dbye ba yang bstan du gsol/ 'od srung / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des de'i tshe se gol gyi sgra mdzad de/ se gol gyi
192b2(dkon brtsegs): sgra des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mngon par grags par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed du se gol gyi sgra mngon par grags par gyur pa de snyed
192b3(dkon brtsegs): kho na rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par yang gyur to/ /ji snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur pa de snyed kho na snang ba chen pos yongs su khyab par yang gyur to/ /'od srung / de nas khye'u
192b4(dkon brtsegs): de gnyis kyis sgra de thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs kyi drung nas langs par gyur te/ 'od srung / khye'u de gnyis langs par gyur pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
192b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams de na lha dang / mi'i sil snyan gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad ma gsil ma dkrol bar rol mo'i sgra dag 'byin par gyur cing / me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu
192b6(dkon brtsegs): bab par gyur to/ /'od srung / de nas khye'u de gnyis langs nas kyang / yang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar
192b7(dkon brtsegs): te| de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal du lta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /'od srung / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po la bos
193a1(dkon brtsegs): te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ rigs kyi bu/ khye'u 'di gnyis kyis nga'i zhabs kyi drung du gtugs nas/ nga la yid kyis zhu ba 'di skad ces yongs
193a2(dkon brtsegs): su zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po mu khyud 'dis sbyin par bya ba'i chos sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa gang lags pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / yongs
193a3(dkon brtsegs): su gtong ba gang lags pa de zil gyis gnon cing yongs su gtugs te gnas par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa mchis lags sam/ yongs su gtong ba mchis lags sam/ dge ba'i
193a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba mchis lags sam zhes khye'u 'di gnyis kyis nga la zhu ba 'di skad ces yongs su zhus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs so/ /'od srung / de bzhin gshegs
193a5(dkon brtsegs): pa me tog sna tshogs de la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig
193a6(dkon brtsegs): rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal bo che'i don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du khye'u 'di gnyis kyis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/
193a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung gis de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/
193b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ rgyal po mu khyud 'dis bsod nams kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba gang yin de bas ni byang chub sems dpa' dben par
193b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa zhig dgon pa dang / rab tu dgon pa na gnas shing / se gol gtogs ba tsam zhig chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa'o zhes bzod pa thob pa gang yin pa de bsod nams kyi phung
193b3(dkon brtsegs): po ches che bar rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ rgyal po mu khyud 'di'i sbyin pa lta zhog gi /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji tsam pa sems can du
193b4(dkon brtsegs): bsdu bas bsdus pa'i sems can de dag thams cad las sems can re res kyang so so nas/ rgyal po mu khyud 'di'i sbyin pa ji snyed pa de snyed cig byin par gyur na stong gsum gyi stong chen
193b5(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dben par gnas pa yang dag pa'i bsam pa
193b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i lam du zhugs pa tshul bzhin la rab tu brtson ba zhig chos thams cad stong pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med pa zhes bya bar se gol gtogs pa
193b7(dkon brtsegs): tsam zhig bzod cing gnas par gyur la/ sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des ni se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig bzod pa la gnas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de'i
194a1(dkon brtsegs): brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang / bye
194a2(dkon brtsegs): ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bar gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / nye bar 'jal ba dang / rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
194a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po lta yang zhog /'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
194a4(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ji snyed sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa'i sems can de dag thams cad las sems can re res kyang skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam
194a5(dkon brtsegs): cig la rgyal po mu khyud 'dis sbyin pa byin pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'dus byas pa ji snyed pa de snyed cig byas shing / sems can de dag re res se gol gtogs pa tsam gcig la
194a6(dkon brtsegs): yang de snyed kyi sbyin pa byin zhing dge ba mngon par 'dus byas par gyur la/ rnam grangs de lta bus sems can de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa gang+gA'i rlung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa
194a7(dkon brtsegs): byin zhing dge ba mngon pa 'dus byas par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mang ba yin snyam mam/ 'od srung / de skad ces bka' stsal pa
194b1(dkon brtsegs): dang | de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de la/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas
194b2(dkon brtsegs): dpe de lta bu mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni bsam par yang sla ba ma lags pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so/ /'od srung / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
194b3(dkon brtsegs): me tog sna tshogs des/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ mkhas pa
194b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sbyang bar byas pa/ zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni 'di la mos par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yun ring po
194b5(dkon brtsegs): de srid du mngon par 'dus byas pa de tsam du dpag tu med cing / de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa sems can de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma de ni khye'u
194b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di gnyis kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa gang gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la gtugs shing phyag 'tshal ba 'di'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha
194b7(dkon brtsegs): dang | bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bar gyi dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba
195a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / dpe dang / nye bar 'jal ba dang / rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /'od srung / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs
195a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i dge slong gi dge 'dun las/ dge slong brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bstan pa 'di thos nas tshig mthun par rjes su yi rang ba'i tshig 'di skad ces brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das/
195a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag ni sems can gang dag chos zab mo rnams la bzod par gyur pa dang / gang dag chos thams cad stong par mos par bgyid pa dang / gang dag dben pa la dga' zhing dgon
195a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la mngon par phyogs te gom pa bdun 'dor bar bgyid pa dang / gang dag ye shes de lta bu yongs su bsgrub par bgyi ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
195a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyid pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba'i tshig brjod par gyur to/ 'od srung / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
195a6(dkon brtsegs): me tog sna tshogs des/ dge slong de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu dag /khyod kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bus rjes su yi rang ba'i tshig de lta bu dag brjod pa
195a7(dkon brtsegs): legs so/ /legs so/ /gal te khyed cag gi sems dag rnam par grol bar ma gyur du zin na ni/ khyed cag dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid gang+gA'i klung
195b1(dkon brtsegs): gi bye ma snyed byed du bcug nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang / 'khor
195b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyis tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni sems can de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag dang / gang dag la chos thams cad
195b3(dkon brtsegs): stong pa dang / dben pa dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / rang bzhin ma mchis par glo ba ches pa mchis pa dang / bzod pa mchis pa dang / mos pa mchis pa de dag
195b4(dkon brtsegs): la yang rjes su yi rang lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna
195b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs de la khye'u chos dang / chos bzang gnyis kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na/ sbyin pa la dga' bar yang mi bgyid la/ ser sna
195b6(dkon brtsegs): can du yang mi 'gyur ba dang / kun 'dzin pa'i sems ma mchis pa dang / gzhan 'jig rten gyi zang zing stsol bar bgyid pa de dag mthong na yang de la dga' ba bskyed par mi bgyid pa dang / gong
195b7(dkon brtsegs): du yang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa bla na med pas gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par yang
196a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyid lags/ 'od srung / de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des khye'u chos dang / chos bzang gnyis la 'di skad
196a2(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sbyin pa la dga' bar yang mi byed la/ ser sna can du yang mi 'gyur ba dang / kun 'dzin
196a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems med pa dang / gzhan 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin par byed pa de mthong na yang de la dga' ba bskyed par mi byed pa dang / gong du yang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa
196a4(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pas gnas pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa'i ye shes kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ bzhin gang zhe na/ stong
196a5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid la mos pa dang / dben par gnas pa dang / zab mo la bzod pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu dag /byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan
196a6(dkon brtsegs): na sbyin pa la yang dga' bar mi byed la/ ser sna can du yang nye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / kun 'dzin pa'i sems med pa dang / gzhan 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin par byed pa de mthong
196a7(dkon brtsegs): na yang de la dga' ba bskyed par mi byed pa dang / gong du yang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa bla na med pas gnas pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan par
196b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa'i ye shes kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sbyin pa la dga'
196b2(dkon brtsegs): bar yang mi byed la/ ser sna can du yang mi 'gyur ba dang / kun 'dzin pa'i sems med pa dang / gzhan 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin par byed pa de mthong na yang de la dga' ba bskyed par
196b3(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa dang / gang yang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa bla na med pas gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa'i
196b4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yongs su tshol bar byed pa dang / de mang du
196b5(dkon brtsegs): thos par gyur nas grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / yul 'khor dag tu zhugs te/ chos kyi sbyin pa byin par byed pa dang / gang las kyang tha na legs
196b6(dkon brtsegs): so zhes bya ba tsam cung zad kyang re ba med cing / de gos pa med pa'i sems kyis gzhan dag la chos ston par byed pa dang / de gos pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/ chos kyi
196b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i sbyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags shing bstod pa yin pas na/ mchog yin no zhes dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed pa ste/ de dag ni sbyin pa
197a1(dkon brtsegs): dam pa/ sbyin pa gtso bo 'di la gnas pa yin no zhes yang dag par mthong ba na dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed cing / sems can 'jig rten gyi
197a2(dkon brtsegs): zang zing yongs su gtong ba la mngon par brtson pa gzhan dag la ni dga' bar mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag / byang chub sems dpa' gang gis phyogs bcu'i
197a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba ji snyed cig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
197a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad la/ tshe'i mtha' ji srid par ma tshang ba med pa'i sbyin pa phul bar gyur pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa tshul
197a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa gzhan zhig gis snying rje chen po kun du bskyed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes su dran par byed na gos pa med pa'i sems
197a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa mi 'dod par sems can gcig la tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam zhig sgrogs par byed cing / des tshigs
197a7(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa de bshad nas kyang yi ge mnyam pa nyid kyis 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yi ge 'di dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong
197b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ /zhes rab tu rtogs par byed pa na/ rigs kyi bu dag /bsod nams kyi phung po de la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang /
197b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bar gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang
197b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dpe dang / nye bar 'jal ba dang / rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro ba'i phyir ro/ /'od srung / de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des khye'u de gnyis la 'di skad
197b4(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas ba rgya chen pos gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
197b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ rgya chen po la 'jug pa dang / chos rgya chen po 'chad pa dang / sbyin pa rgya chen po yongs su gtong ba dang / rgya chen po la mos pa ste/ rigs kyi bu dag /byang chub sems dpa'
197b6(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa rgya chen pos gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des
197b7(dkon brtsegs): khye'u de gnyis la de lta de ltar chos bstan pas khye'u de gnyis chos kyi mchog tu dga' bde nyid kyis ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te/ de gnyis steng gi bar snang la 'khod
198a1(dkon brtsegs): nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la gnyi gas tshigs mthun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /thub pa spyod pa thams cad mkhyen/ /spyod pa kun la mkhas
198a2(dkon brtsegs): pa lags/ /sems can rnams la gtong ba dang / /de bzhin stong la mi gnas ston/ /'di la bdag dang sems can dang / /srog dang gang zag ma mchis par/ /bzod pa bla med gang
198a3(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ /sbyin pa de ni byin chen lags/ /bzod pa zab mo sgom byos la/ /de la'ang rtog pa ma byed ces/ /bgyi ba 'di 'dra bka' stsal pa/ /dpa' chen khyod ni ngo mtshar lags/ /
198a4(dkon brtsegs): gang la chags la sogs med pa/ /byang chub dam pa don du gnyer/ /ye shes chen po sbyang byas nas/ /de la'ang rlom sems ma byed ces/ /rnam grol stong pa bsgom par bgyi/ /de la'ang
198a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam rtog ma byed cig / dgon pa'i gnas ni ston byed pa/ /dben pa'i gnas zhes gsung ba mdzad/ /rlom sems yongs su spang ba yi/ /sbyin pa rtag tu byin par bya/ /gang la 'du shes
198a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jug pa/ /de ni rdul bral mtha' yin no/ /zhi ba'i gnas la mi g.yo ba'i/ /tshul khrims yongs su sbyang bar bya/ /gang gi zhi tshul mdzes rtogs pa/ /de ni tshul khrims mchog yin
198a7(dkon brtsegs): gsungs/ /bzod pa rtag tu bsgom gyis la/ /sems can rnams la rtog ma byed/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /de ni bzod pa yin par gsungs/ /brtson 'grus brtan pa'ang
198b1(dkon brtsegs): brtsam par byos/ /'dus byas kun kyang spang bar gyis/ /dben par lta ba gang yin pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas brtson 'grus gsung / /dngos po'i dngos de med pas na/ dngos po thams cad bsreg
198b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya| |nyon mongs med pa gang yin pa/ /de ni rtog med bsam gtan yin/ /tshu rol ma yin pha rol min/ /dbus su'ang gnas par mi bya ste/ /dus gsum mnyam lta gang yin pa/ de ni
198b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dam pa yin/ /dgon pa'i 'du shes bsgom bya zhing / /'du shes de la'ang lta mi bya/ /'du shes gang las skye 'gyur te/ /des de 'du shes med ces bya/ /chos kyi sbyin pa'i yon tan
198b4(dkon brtsegs): dang | |de bzhin phan yon rnams kyang bstan/ /de phyir rlom sems med pa yin/ /ji ltar thos pa'i chos kyang shod/ /yi ge rnams ni zad med de/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'grub pa med/ /de phyir chos
198b5(dkon brtsegs): la mi rlom zhing / /khyed kyis 'bras bu med mi bya/ /bdag ni chos ston byed pa'o zhes/ /gang la 'du shes de 'byung ba/ /des ni chos nyid mi shes pas/ /de ni bdud kyi zhags pas bcings/ /
198b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sangs rgyas mthong ngo zhes/ /gang la 'du shes de 'byung ba/ /de la de ma thag tu ni/ /bdud rtsi dug gi btung bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ /rtogs par 'dod
198b7(dkon brtsegs): dam nyan thos sam/ /rgang rgyal byang chub rtogs 'dod pa/ /de ni tshul 'di bsam par gyis/ /rnam grol ye shes dpag med kyang / /gcig pa nyid du bstan pa mdzad/ /dman pa'i smon lam
199a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod mi bya/ /byang chub dam pa don du gnyen/ /gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i sku/ /mtshan gyis brgyan ba ci 'dra ba/ /de 'dra 'dod pa de yis ni/ /byang
199a2(dkon brtsegs): chub mchog la gnas par gyis/ /chos kun rgyu las 'byung ba ste/ /byed pa po ni dmigs su med/ /chos rnams brten nas byung ba ste/ /yang dag rang bzhin yong min zhes/ /bgyi
199a3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di 'dra bka' stsal pa/ /dpa' chen khyod ni ngo mtshar lags/ /'od srung / de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis bar snang de las tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras pa'i tshe/ /rgyal po mu khyud
199a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i grong khyer ba dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / zhabs 'bring gnyug ma rnams dang / steng gi bar snang la lhag gang dag 'dus te 'khod par gyur pa de dag las srog chags brgyad khri
199a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi stong gsum bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag gis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs yongs su bsgrub pa'i rgyu
199a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par gyur to/ /'od srung / de nas khye'u chos dang / chos bzang gnyis par snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i zhabs la gtugs
199a7(dkon brtsegs): nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / dam pa'i chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun ni la skyabs su mchi'o/ /bla na
199b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / sems kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub kyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs par yang bgyid lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dir
199b2(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa de ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /'dir sems bskyed pa de ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa kho na lags
199b3(dkon brtsegs): so| |de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la mngon par zhen pa mchis pa de la ni skye ba 'ga' zhig mchis gda'i/ gang la mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa de la ni skye ba 'ga' yang ma mchis pa'i slad
199b4(dkon brtsegs): du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags pas/ skye ba nyid skye ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /ci'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi zhe na/ de la skye ba'i gzhi 'jug pa ma mchis pas de'i slad du
199b5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/ skye ba ma mchis pa de la ni/ brjod pa de yang brjod par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ji tsam du brjod pa ma mchis pa de tsam du skye ba dang 'gag pa mchis
199b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi| de ltar ye shes shin tu rnam par dag pa gang lags pa de la ni skye ba yang ma mchis/ 'gag pa yang ma mchis la/ gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa de ni bas ba
199b7(dkon brtsegs): ma 'tshal ba ste/ gtan du bas pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags pas bdag cag gnyis ni mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
200a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs shing chos 'ga' la yang dmigs par mi bgyid/ chos 'ga' yang thob par mi bgyid/ chos 'ga' yang thob
200a2(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid du stsol bar mi bgyid de/ mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa de kho na rjes su rtogs par bgyid par bas kyi/ chos 'ga' yang rjes su rtogs par ni mi bgyid lags so/ /de
200a3(dkon brtsegs): ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /'od srung / de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis de skad smras pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' khris ni
200a4(dkon brtsegs): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /rgyal po mu khyud kyang bu stong po de dag dang lhan cig /rgyal po lnga stong de dag dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
200a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /'od srung / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas/ lhung bzed bzhag ste phyag bcabs nas/ rgyal po mu
200a6(dkon brtsegs): khyud dang / skye bo phal po che de dag la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad
200a7(dkon brtsegs): nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /'od srung / de nas khye'u chos dang / chos bzang gnyis kyis pha ma la gsol ba btab nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par legs pa kho
200b1(dkon brtsegs): nar rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir mngon par byung ngo / /de gnyis rang gi grong khyer chen po nas mngon par byung ba'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rab byung sangs rgyas rnams kyis
200b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngags/ /nges 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags/ /khyim gnas nyon mongs gnas pa ste/ /dkar chos rnam par 'jig par byed/ /gang zhig dkar po'i chos rnams ni/ /nyams
200b3(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur 'phel 'dod pa/ /rab tu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten mgon thad myur du song / /bskal pa bye bar rab spyod kyang / /'dod pa rnams la ngoms pa med/ /khyim na
200b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa 'dod rnams kyi/ /mi ngoms bzhin du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho chu klung rnams/ /'bab pas ngoms par mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin byis pa 'dod rnams la/ /bsten
200b5(dkon brtsegs): pas nam yang ngoms mi 'gyur/ /dper na me ni rtswa dag dang / /shing gis nam yang ngoms pa med/ /de bzhin byis pa 'dod rnams la/ /bsten pas ngoms par 'gyur ba med/ /'jig rten
200b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'dren rnams kyis/ /'dod pa 'di dag chags par gsungs/ /de phyir chags pa yongs spangs te/ /rab tu 'byung phyir mngon byung zhig /'jig rten mgon po bla na med/ /snga ma 'ga'
200b7(dkon brtsegs): yang gang gi phyir/ /khyim gyi gnas na gnas mdzad nas/ /bla med byang chub brnyes pa med/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon/ /gang su mya ngan 'das gyur pa/ /kun gyis dgon pa
201a1(dkon brtsegs): rab dgon du/ /bla med byang chub brnyes par 'gyur/ /de phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ /bsten pa'i dgon pa de slobs la/ /khyim gnas sred pa
201a2(dkon brtsegs): spongs byos dang / /de ni bde legs nyid du 'gyur/ /gang zhig khyim na gnas nas ni/ /stong gsum thams cad rin chen gyis/ /rab tu bkang ste 'jig rten gyis/ /mgon la yon du
201a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bul byed la/ /mkhas pa gang zhig yid byung zhing / /nyes pa shes nas khyim spangs te/ /sangs rgyas rjes su slob byed la/ /rab tu 'byung ba tshol byed cing / /rab tu 'byung ba btsal byas
201a4(dkon brtsegs): nas| |g.yel ba med pa 'dod rnams dang / /khyim gyi gnas la mi lta bar/ /gom pa bdun ni 'dor byed na/ /bsod nams phung po de la ni/ /snga mas rin gyi char mi chog /de phyir sangs
201a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bsngags pa yi/ /rab tu 'byung phyir myur du deng / /gang la chags pa yod min pa'i/ /shes pas rtag tu ngoms med na/ /chags pa kun las rnam 'das pa'i/ /sangs rgyas dam pa nyid
201a6(dkon brtsegs): 'thob 'gyur/ /myur du dgon par gnas byed na/ /'dod pa'i sred pa spong 'gyur zhing / /nyes pa ji bzhin rnam rig nas/ /de dag las ni sems ldog 'gyur/ /khyim ni myur du spangs nas
201a7(dkon brtsegs): su| |dgon pa la ni gnas gyur pa/ /mkhas pa yang dag mthong ba rnams/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su slong / /gang dag byang chub phyir brtson pa/ /de dag dben pa bsten byed cing / /de dag
201b1(dkon brtsegs): dgon par dga' 'gyur gyi/ /de dag khyim la dga' mi 'gyur/ /de ni sangs rgyas rnam dag gi/ spyod yul gnas dang spyod pa ste/ /gang zhig la ma 'dir 'jug 'gyur pa/ /de la byang chub rnyed
201b2(dkon brtsegs): dka' min/ /chags la sogs pas gzir ba yi/ /sems can grol byed su 'dod pa/ /de ni khyim na gnas pa yis/ /skrag cing dgon pa kun du bsten/ /gang zhig bdud las rgyal ba dang / /'chi
201b3(dkon brtsegs): med go 'phang rtogs pa dang / 'khor lo dam pa bskor 'dod pa/ /des ni dgon pa bsten par gyis/ /'od srung / /de ltar khye'u chos dang chos bzang gnyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smra zhing / grong
201b4(dkon brtsegs): khyer chen po de nas phyir byung nas bcom ldan 'das me tog sna tshogs gal ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la
201b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gnyis bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po 'thob par 'gyur ba lags sam/ 'od
201b6(dkon brtsegs): srung / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des khye'u de gnyis kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ khye'u de gnyis rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad do/ /'od
201b7(dkon brtsegs): srung | de nas rgyal po mu khyud kyis khye'u de gnyis rab tu byung ba thos nas bu thu bo rgyal srid la bzhag ste/ bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba rnams dang yang lhan cig/ bud med brgyad khri bzhi
202a1(dkon brtsegs): stong dang lhan cig / rgyal po lnga stong tsam po dag dang yang lhan cig/ skye bo phal po che gzhan dag dang yang lhan cig tu thams cad khyim gyi gnas
202a2(dkon brtsegs): la mi lta bar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par legs pa kho nar rab tu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir mngon par byung bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe na srog chags bye ba tham pa mngon par byung bar gyur te/
202a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de
202a4(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob par 'gyur lags
202a5(dkon brtsegs): sam| 'od srung / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des sems can de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ skye bo'i tshogs de dag thams cad rab tu phyung zhing
202a6(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de/ dge slong gi dngos po la rab tu bkod do/ /'od srung / de nas rgyal po mu khyud kyis bu thu bo rgyal srid la bzhag pa gang yin pa de yang zhag bdun
202a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa dang / gcig pu dben par song nas 'du shes kyi rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes te/ bdag la rgyal srid kyis ci bya/ dbang phyug gis kyang ci bya ste/ bdag 'dod pa lhur
202b1(dkon brtsegs): len cing 'dod pa'i 'ching bas bcings nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su spang bar ni mi bya'o snyam nas/ das de'i mong la rab tu byung ba'i sems chen po bskyed
202b2(dkon brtsegs): de/ de tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya ba'i tshe/ gling chen po bzhi po dag tu rgyu ba'i tshe na des tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /kho bo'i pha ma phu nu dang / /rtsa lag rnams kyang rab byung phyir/ /nges
202b3(dkon brtsegs): par byung ste chos don phyir/ /srog chags bye ba tham pa byung / /nga la khyim gyis ci bya ste/ /bdag kyang der ni 'gro bar bya/ /gal te khyed cag 'dod 'gyur na/ /nga ni khyod kyi yongs 'dren te/ /gang
202b4(dkon brtsegs): dag rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir/ /sems bskyed byed pa de dag ni/ /khom ldan shin tu rnyed dka' bas/ /nga dang 'grogs te myur du 'dong / /gang dag khyim nas khyim med par/ /rab byung sems bskyed
202b5(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa/ /de dag 'dren chos gnas kyis la/ /khyim ni legs par bsrung gyis shig /'od srung / de ltar rgyal po gzhon nu des tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras pa na gling chen po bzhi po de dag
202b6(dkon brtsegs): nas khang khyim na gnas pa la sems dga' ba'i sems can ni gcig kyang byung bar ma gyur te/ thams cad rab tu byung ba'i sems dang ldan zhing rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba dang / mngon par byung
202b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bsam pa dang bcas te gnas par gyur to/ /'od srung / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des sems can de dag thams cad kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ gling
203a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa
203a2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag sprul pa mdzad do/ /'od srung / de nas gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ sems can gcig kyang khyim na gnas par ma
203a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ de dag thams cad dad pas khyim nas khyim med par legs pa kho nar rab tu byung ngo / /de ltar rab tu byung ba de dag la ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru dag kyang byung bar
203a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| dpag bsam gyi shing dag las dpag bsam gyi ras bcos bu gos rin po che dag kyang byung bar gyur cing / lha rnams kyang de dag gi g.yog dang bsnyen bkur byed do/ /'od srung / dge
203a5(dkon brtsegs): slong chos dang / chos bzang de gnyis de ltar rab tu byung nas kyang brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas par gyur te/ de gnyis lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa gsum gyi bar du nam yang rmugs pa dang /
203a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyid kyis kun nas non par ma gyur cing / nam yang zas za ba ma gtogs par 'dug par ma gyur te/ 'gro ba dang ldog pa kun du yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed cing / thams
203a7(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de la yang rlom sems byed par ma gyur to/ /lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa gsum po de dag la kun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i gnas dang ldan pa
203b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang bsgrubs par gyur te/ de gnyis sa'i phyogs gang dang gang du 'dug pa dang / skyil mo krung bcas par gyur ba'i sa'i phyogs de dang de dag thams cad rdo
203b2(dkon brtsegs): rje'i rang bzhin du kun du gnas par gyur to/ /phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis chos ston pa rnams kyang thos shing bzung ngo / /de ltar thos shing
203b3(dkon brtsegs): bzung nas kyang gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par yang gyur to/ /'od srung / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag las nyan thos kyi theg pa bar gyur
203b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems can gang dag yin pa de dag las sems can gcig 'ga' tsam yang so so'i skye bor gyur bzhin 'chi ba'i dus byas par ma gyur te/ gang dag thams cad kyi nang na le lo can du gyur
203b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag kyang phyir mi 'ong bar gyur cing / de dag de nas shi 'phos nas kyang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/ /gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
203b6(dkon brtsegs): pa bar gyur pa de dag ni de nas shi 'phos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa gzhan dag tu skyes par gyur cing / der yang de dag phyug po'i khyim chen po dag tu skyes
203b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ /der skyes nas kyang dbang po 'phel ba dang yongs su smin pa dag kyang rjes su thob nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis yang dag par bskul te/ thams cad dad pas khyim nas khyim
204a1(dkon brtsegs): med par legs pa kho nar rab tu byung ngo / /de dag de ltar rab tu byung nas kyang zhag bdun 'das nas thams cad kyis rang byang chub rjes su thob ste/ de
204a2(dkon brtsegs): dag gis kyang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag gi don byas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa par gyur pa de dag gis ni mngon
204a3(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa lnga dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bsgrubs shing / mi 'phrogs pa'i spobs pa nyid kyang thob par gyur/ gzungs kyang thob par gyur to/ /'od srung / de'i tshe de'i dus na
204a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po mu khyud ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar gyur na/ 'od srung khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi'i
204a5(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba der gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni rgyal bu gzhon nu thu bor gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
204a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ni/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /'od srung / de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chos dang / chos bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa de gnyis gzhan
204a7(dkon brtsegs): dag cig yin snyam du khyod de snyam sems na/ 'od srung khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chos zhes bya bar
204b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ /khye'u chos bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i snying po yin te/ 'od srung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de sems can dag
204b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyi gnas su gyur cing ji tsam du mdzes par gyur pa la ltos/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos
204b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de ni sku tshe'i tshad yun ji srid cig tu gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung / de
204b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog sna tshogs de ni bskal pa brgyad kyi bar du bzhugs par gyur to/ /'od srung / de bzhin gshegs pa me tog
204b5(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa gcig gi bar du gnas par gyur to/ /de'i sku gdung rnams kyang rgyas par gyur cing / de dag lha rnams kho nas mchod
204b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur te/ de na mi khyim par gnas pa ni 'ga' yang med do/ /'od srung / dge slong chos dang / chos bzang gnyis bya ba nyung ba dang / bdag gi don la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas shing /
204b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung rnams la yang mchod par mi byed/ ri mor mi byed la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mchod rten gyi drung du yang mi 'gro'o/ /'od srung / de nas lha 'bum phrag
205a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mang po dang / dge slong las dang po pa gang dag yin pa de dag /dge slong chos dang / chos bzang gnyis la 'di gnyis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
205a2(dkon brtsegs): gdung rnams la mchod pa yang mi byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bskor ba yang mi byed pa las na/ ma dad pa dang / ma gus ba yin no zhes kha zer bar gyur to/ /'od srung /
205a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas dge slong chos dang / chos bzang gnyis kyis dge slong dang / lha 'bum phrag mang po 'dus par gyur pa'i dge slong gi 'khor dang / lha'i 'khor mang po de dag la smras pa/ grogs
205a4(dkon brtsegs): po dag / 'di ji snyam du sems/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'gyur zhing / rgyu gang gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung sems pa mi mnga' ba rnams kyis mchod
205a5(dkon brtsegs): pa brnyes par 'gyur snyam/ dge slong dang lha de dag gis smras pa/ sku gdung 'di dag ni tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol
205a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ye shes mthong bas rab tu phye ba yin pas na/ de'i phyir 'di dag ni mchod par 'os pa yin no/ /dge slong chos dang / chos bzang gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs
205a7(dkon brtsegs): po dag / 'o na tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dag nyid mchod pa'i 'os pa yin gyi/ sku gdung dag ni
205b1(dkon brtsegs): mchod par 'os par mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam/ dge slong dang / lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /de ni de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /dge slong chos dang / chos bzang
205b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyis smras pa/ grogs po dag /'o na tshul khrims kyi mtshan nyid ni gang yin/ ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dag gi
205b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid kyang gang yin/ dge slong dang / lha de dag gis smras pa/ tshul khrims ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol
205b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rnam par grol pa'i ye shes mthong ba dag kyang mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no/ /'od srung / de nas dge slong chos dang / chos bzang gnyis kyis dge slong dang / lha
205b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag /'o na mngon par 'du byed pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa mchod par nus sam/ dge slong dang / lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /de
205b6(dkon brtsegs): ni mi nus so/ /dge slong chos dang / chos bzang gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag /de lta bas na khyed kyang bdag tu mngon par 'du ma byed cig dang / des ni mchod pa byas par
205b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa la ni sangs rgyas mthong ba yang med na mchod pa'i las lta smos kyang ci dgos te de ni gnas med do/ /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'dod
206a1(dkon brtsegs): pas ni/ bdag nyid mchod par bya'o/ /dge slong dang / lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'dod pas bdag nyid
206a2(dkon brtsegs): mchod par bya/ dge slong chos dang / chos bzang gnyis kyis smras pa/ grags po dag /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mchod
206a3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang gis bdag nyid sems can thams cad kyi mchod pa'i gnas su 'os par mchod pa de ltar bdag nyid mchod par bya'o/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bslabs pa de ltar bslab
206a4(dkon brtsegs): par bya zhing / bslabs pas rlom sems su yang mi bya'o/ /chos rab tu dbye bar bya zhing rab tu phye nas kyang chos 'ga' yang bsam par mi bya ste/ gang gi tshe khyed cag de ltar bdag nyid
206a5(dkon brtsegs): mchod par byed pa de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa yang mchod par 'gyur ba/ khyed cag nyid kyang mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la mchod
206a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod pas ni bdag nyid mchod par bya ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bdag nyid mchod par mdzad pa de ltar mchod pa bya zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yon tan
206a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag dang ldan pas mchod pa rnyed par gyur pa'i yon tan de dag bdag nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ste/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'gyur ro/ /gang 'du shes dang
206b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma bskyed par mi byed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no/ /gang bdag tu rtog par mi byed pa dang / rnam par rtog par mi byed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no//
206b2(dkon brtsegs): gang 'jig rten pha rol du mi 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten 'dir mi 'ong ba dang / gang tshu rol la yang mi gnas/ pha rol la yang mi gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no/ /gang
206b3(dkon brtsegs): la chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang / gang la 'dzin pa med pa dang / spong ba med pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no/ /gang la 'bri ba med pa dang / 'phel ba med pa dang / gang
206b4(dkon brtsegs): la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / gang la zad pa med pa dang / mi zad pa med pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no/ /gang la sems med pa dang / sems las byung ba'i
206b5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams med pa dang / yid la byed pa rnams med pa dang / bdag gi med pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / tshor ba med pa dang / 'thab pa med pa dang / rtsod pa med pa dang / 'gal ba
206b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang / gnyis su med par 'jug pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no/ /gang la 'dus byas med pa dang / bgrangs pa med pa dang /
206b7(dkon brtsegs): bgrang du med pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no/ /gang la lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi mngon par 'du byed pa'i bya ba med pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid mi dmigs pa de ni de bzhin
207a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mchod pa yin no/ /gang la 'das pa'i 'du shes mi 'jug pa dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ong ba'i 'du shes mi 'jug pa dang / gang rten par mi byed pa
207a2(dkon brtsegs): dang | mngon par zhen par mi byed pa dang / mtshan mar mi byed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas su 'du shes mi 'jug pa dang / chos su ma yin/ dge 'dun du
207a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ gang zag tu ma yin/ bdag tu ma yin/ gzhan du ma yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no// //bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma/ grogs po de dag/
207a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ de ni skye bas mchod par sla ba ma yin no/ /grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i
207a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid yin pas de ni mngon par 'du byed pas mchod par sla ba ma yin no/ /grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ de ni gnyis
207a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis mchod par sla ba ma yin no/ /grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni zag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas de ni zag pa med pa mngon par 'du bya bas mchod par sla ba ma
207a7(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsgos pa yin pas/ de ni bdag tu lta ba'am/ /sems can du lta ba'am/ srog tu lta ba'am/ gang
207b1(dkon brtsegs): zag tu lta ba'am/ chad par lta ba'am/ rtag par lta ba'am/ ngar 'dzin par lta ba'am/ nga yir 'dzin par lta ba'am/ 'byung bar lta ba'am/ 'jig par lta bas mchod par sla ba ma yin no/ /
207b2(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ de ni mtshan ma'i spyod yul gyis mchod par sla ba ma yin no/ /grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs
207b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku ni smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ de ni smon pa la gnas pas mchod par sla ba ma yin no/ /grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/
207b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni dngos po'i 'du shes la gnas pas mchod par sla ba ma yin no/ /grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni g.yo ba med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ de ni g.yo zhing 'gul ba'i blo
207b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis mchod par sla ba ma yin no/ /grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ de ni 'dus byas la gnas pas mchod par sla ba
207b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no/ /grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ de ni 'dod chags spyod pas mchod par sla ba ma yin no/ /grogs po dag /de bzhin
207b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku ni zhe sdang dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ de ni gnod sems dang tha ba'i nyes pa la gnas pas mchod par sla ba ma yin no/ /grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
208a1(dkon brtsegs): ni gti mug dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ de ni shes rab 'chal ba dang / rmongs pa dang / mi shes pa rnams kyis mchod par sla ba ma yin no/ /grogs
208a2(dkon brtsegs): po dag / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas yongs su bsgos pa yin
208a3(dkon brtsegs): pas| de ni tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / brjed ngas pa dang / shes rab 'chal ba dang / rnam par ma grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ma yin pa rnams kyis mchod par
208a4(dkon brtsegs): sla ba ma yin no/ /grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis yongs su bsgos pa yin pas/ de ni gnod sems kyi
208a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dang ldan pa dang / snying rje med pa dang / dga' ba'i sems med pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems yid la byed pa rnams kyis mchod par sla ba ma yin no/ /grogs po dag /
208a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyis yongs su bsgos pa yin pas/ de ni ser sna
208a7(dkon brtsegs): can dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / gnod sems dang / tha ba'i nyes pa dang / khong khro ba mang ba dang / le lo can dang / brjed ngas pa dang / shes rab 'chal ba rnams kyis mchod
208b1(dkon brtsegs): par sla ba ma yin no/ /'od srung / de ltar dge slong chos dang / chos bzang gnyis kyis 'khor de dag la de lta de ltar chos bstan pa na/ 'khor de las byang chub sems dpar bzhi khri nyis
208b2(dkon brtsegs): stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ni shes pa dang / mthong ba bskyed cing / 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang / phyir mi 'ong ba
208b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang rjes su thob par gyur to/ /sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i srog chags nyi khri sum stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /'od srung / dge slong
208b4(dkon brtsegs): chos dang / chos bzang gnyis kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang ldan par gyur pa la ltos/ 'od srung / skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag gis zab mo la bzod pa de dang / thabs la mkhas pa de
208b5(dkon brtsegs): la bslab par bya'o/ /'od srung / de ltar skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis dge slong dang / lha de dag zab mo'i bzod pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas/ de phyin chad de dag thams cad bdag
208b6(dkon brtsegs): gi don la sbyar ba'i rjes su brtson pa dang / bya ba nyung ngur gnas pas gnas par gyur cing / phyin chad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams kyi drung du'ang mi 'gro /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
208b7(dkon brtsegs): sku gdung rnams la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson par yang mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gi sems chos zab mo bla na med pa yang dag pa nyid la zhugs par gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /'od
209a1(dkon brtsegs): srung | de nas zhag bdun 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag thams cad kyang sa la nub par gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag
209a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang sprog mar blugs pa bzhin nam/ snod du blugs pa bzhin du de nyid du mi snang bar gyur te/ 'od srung / de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa de dag gi rjes su bslab par bya'o/ /'od
209a3(dkon brtsegs): srung | yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa/ sems ma bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/ shes
209a4(dkon brtsegs): rab ma bsgoms pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi mchod pas 'tsho bar sems kyi/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ma yin zhing / 'dod chags
209a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba'i phyir ni ma yin no/ /de dag ni bdag nyid tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / brjed ngas pa dang / shes rab 'chal ba dang / rnam par ma grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye
209a6(dkon brtsegs): shes mthong ba ma yin bzhin du 'tsho ba tsam gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i
209a7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mthong bas yongs su bsgos pa dag la bkur sti bya ba dang / ri mo bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar sems so/ /de dag ni bdag nyid 'dod chags dang bcas pa dang / zhe sdang dang
209b1(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa dang / gti mug dang bcas pa yin bzhin du 'tsho ba tsam gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang
209b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba'i sku gdung dag la bkur sti bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar sems so/ /de dag ni bdag nyid ser sna can dang / 'jungs pa dang / gnod
209b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / tha ba'i nyes pa mang ba dang / le lo dang ldan pa dang / brjed ngas pa dang / shes bzhin med pa yin bzhin du 'tsho btsam gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin bdag chen po yang
209b4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i gnas la rab tu gnas pa mnyam par gzhag pa thugs rtse gcig pa'i sku gdung dag la bkur sti bya ba dang / ri mo bya ba dang / mchod pa bya bar sems so/ /'od srung / nga ni rigs kyi
209b5(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo las dang po pa dag gi sems mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir/ sku gdung rnams byin gyis rlob par mdzad de/ gang dag de dag la mchod pa byed pa de dag ni/ lha dang
209b6(dkon brtsegs): mi'i phun sum tshogs pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing / de yang de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ba yin na/ mi blun po de dag ni bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung nas
209b7(dkon brtsegs): ngas dge sbyong gi las su gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni de dag gis bor zhing btang la/ bdag nyid gso ba'i don dang / mdza' shes kyi khyim dang / slong mo ster ba'i khyim dag yongs su smin par bya
210a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i don dang / lhung bzed dang chos gos yongs su btsal ba'i don dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti mngon par bsgrub pa'i don dang / snyan pa dang / sgra dang / grags
210a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang / mchod rten la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i las kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang / mchod
210a3(dkon brtsegs): rten dag la bkur sti nye bar sgrub par byed do/ /'od srung / de la dge sbyong gi las gang zhe na/ 'od srung / ngas las gnyis po bsam gtan dang / kha ton bya ba bstan pa gang dag yin
210a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag ste/ las de gnyis kyang lam la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir bstan par zad kyi/ de dag kyang shin tu mthar thug pa dang / shin tu mthar phyin pa ni ma yin no/ /'od srung / las gang
210a5(dkon brtsegs): las zad par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa de ni dge sbyong gi las yin te/ bya ba med pa dang / nyes pa mi byung ba dang / log par mi byed pa dang / dran pa med pa dang / yid la byed pa med pa dang / nyams pa med
210a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum po dag mngon du byed pa dang / khams gsum du mtshams sbyor ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa gang yin pa de ni
210a7(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong gi las zhes bya ba yin na/ mi blun po de dag ni dge sbyong gi las de lta bu de dag spangs te/ las gzhan dang gzhan dag yongs su tshol bar byed do/ /de dag ni ngas khyim na gnas
210b1(dkon brtsegs): pa gos dkar po can rnams kyis bslab par gsungs pa gang yin pa de tsam la yang slob par mi byed de/ khyim na gnas pa gos dkar po can rnams kyang re zhig de bzhin gshegs pas
210b2(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa rnams slob pa byed pa na/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur na mi blun po de dag ni bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung nas rnam par grol ba dang rjes su mthun pa tsam
210b3(dkon brtsegs): yang bsgom par mi byed na 'thob par lta ga la 'gyur te/ de ni gnas med do/ /'od srung / yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma de la ming gis zil gyis non cing / kha dog dang / rtags
210b4(dkon brtsegs): dang | dbyibs kyis dge slong du 'gyur gyi/ tshul khrims kyis ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyis ma yin/ shes rab kyis ma yin pa dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi
210b5(dkon brtsegs): gsang sngags dang / sman dag gis gos la 'debs shing bgo bar byed la/ gang gis gos de gyon pa na zhag bdun nam/ zhag brgyad kyis de'i lus me lce gcig tu gyur cing kun du 'bar
210b6(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa la la zhig yod par gyur cing / des gos de gsang sngags dang sman dag gis btab cing yongs su bgos nas mi mdza' ba la la zhig la 'di lta ste/ mdza' bshes kyi tshul gyis
210b7(dkon brtsegs): ster bar gyur la/ de nas mi des kyang gos de mdzes pa yin par rig nas len par byed cing blangs nas gos de gyon par gyur na/ de zhag bdun nam zhag brgyad kyi bar du ni gos de las dga' ba
211a1(dkon brtsegs): nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas zhag bdun nam/ zhag brgyad 'das nas mi de khyim du song ngam/ lam po cher song ba na/ gos de rab tu 'bar bar gyur cing /
211a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas mi de gzhi de las tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal skyes par gyur te/ tshig par gyur/ shi bar gyur na/ 'od srung / 'di ji snyam du sems/ gos de las ro myang ba ni ji tsam zhig yod/
211a3(dkon brtsegs): nyes dmigs ni ji tsam zhig yod snyam/ 'od srung gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ro myang ba ni chung lags kyi/ nyes dmigs ni dpag tu ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
211a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung / de bzhin du nga'i gos ngur smrig tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas bsgos pa gang dag yin
211a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag kyang bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa nas legs par spyad pas yang dag par bsgrubs pa yin no/ /mi blun po dge sbyong ltar bcos pa de dag ni drang srong gi rgyal mtshan gyon nas/
211a6(dkon brtsegs): grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu 'jug par 'gyur zhing / de nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa rnams kyis de dge sbyong
211a7(dkon brtsegs): yin no snyam nas bkur sti byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed par 'gyur zhing de dag gos ngur smrig gi gzhi de las mchod pa rnyed par 'gyur bas/ de dag des dga' ba
211b1(dkon brtsegs): nyams su myong bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de dag lus zhig nas ni sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur zhing / de dag der lcags kyi glegs ma 'bar ba gyon par 'gyur/ lcags kyi thu lum za bar 'gyur/
211b2(dkon brtsegs): lcags kyi khu ba bskol ba 'thung bar 'gyur/ mal stan rab tu 'bar ba dag gi steng na nyal bar 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / de dag ni rang gi las des lus zhig nas sems can dmyal bar
211b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar zad kyi/ gzhi gang las mi blun po de dag gis kyang bde bar sbyar ba rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i gos ngur smrig gi dpal dang gzi brjid de 'dra ba la ltos/ 'od srung /
211b4(dkon brtsegs): ngas kyang de la dgongs nas 'di skad ces lcags kyi glegs ma 'bar ba dag gyon pa ni sla'i/ tshul khrims 'chal bas gos ngur smrig bgo ba ni de lta ma yin no/ /lcags kyi thu lum dag
211b5(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba ni sla'i/ tshul khrims 'chal bas bsod snyoms dag la yongs su longs spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'od srung / de la ro myang ba ci tsam yod pa dang / de la nyes
211b6(dkon brtsegs): dmigs ji tsam yod pa la ltos/ 'od srung / de lta bas na ci nas kyang tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa 'chags par 'gyur ba de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /'od srung /
211b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ji snyam du sems/ lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ mi'am mi ma yin pa sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
212a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sku gzugs bya bar nus snyam mam/ 'od srung gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni de lta ma lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni zla ma mchis
212a2(dkon brtsegs): pa| sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags pas de'i slad du de dag gi sku gzugs bgyi ba ni sla ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na
212a3(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya tha ma la dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa/ sems ma bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni ras bcos bu dang /
212a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsig pa dang / ra ba dag gi ngos la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dag 'dri bar 'gyur zhing / de dag gis 'tsho bar sems par yang 'gyur te/ las des bdag nyid rlom sems
212a5(dkon brtsegs): su byed/ bstod par byed cing / gzhan dag la brnyas pa dang / smod par yang byed do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad
212a6(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byas na bsod nams 'di tsam du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes
212a7(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung / de ni de bzhin te/ rgyal po gsal rgyal ni khyim pa gos dkar po gyon pa yin pas des de bzhin gshegs
212b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku gzugs byed du bcug na/ de ni de la mchod pa byed par 'gyur bar zad kyi/ gzhi des chos gos sam/ bsod snyoms sam/ rnyed pa cung zad kyang 'dod par mi byed do/ /'od srung / mi blun
212b2(dkon brtsegs): po de dag ni gzhi des 'tsho bar 'gyur bar sems te/ de dag gis don bya'o snyam du sems la/ don med pa kho na byed pa yin no/ /'od srung / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo bsod nams 'dod
212b3(dkon brtsegs): pa kho na yin pa gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du bcug na ni/ de dag la bsod nams dpag tu med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
212b4(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa rnams kyi lus gzugs 'tshong pa yang legs pa ma yin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'tshong ba lta smos kyang ci dgos na/ mi blun po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
212b5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs byed du bcug nas/ khyim pa'i lag tu 'tshong bar byed cing / des 'tsho bar sems par byed do/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi byis pa dang 'dra ba shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin
212b6(dkon brtsegs): can la la zhig yod par gyur la/ des bdud rtsi yongs su spangs nas dug za bar byed pa de bzhin du/ 'od srung / mi blun po gang dag zang zing gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs byed du
212b7(dkon brtsegs): bcug nas/ bdag nyid dug dang bcas par byed pa de dag kyang de lta bu yin pa snyam du nga sems so/ /'od srung / legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la dug ces bya ba de ni/ 'di
213a1(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ rnyed pa yin na de la mi blun po khro bas zil gyis non pa gcig la gcig 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'dru bar byed pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs
213a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la mchod pa bya'o zhes zer zhing / bdag nyid sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar byed do/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi thabs la mi mkhas pa la la zhig g.yul ngor zhugs pa na
213a3(dkon brtsegs): rang gi mtshon gyis rang la 'debs par byed pa de bzhin du/ 'od srung / mi blun po de dag kyang dam pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / rigs kyi bu
213a4(dkon brtsegs): bu'am| rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ shin tu zin par byas pa/ byi dor legs par byas pa/ chu zheng du ri rab tsam yod pa
213a5(dkon brtsegs): byed du bcug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de lta bu dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal
213a6(dkon brtsegs): lam| 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing ltar 'dab chags su yongs su bkang bar gyur na/ 'od srung / 'di ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod
213a7(dkon brtsegs): nams mang po bskyed par 'gyur snyam mam/ 'od srung gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sor mo'i phyogs tsam zhig bgyid du stsal na yang bsod
213b1(dkon brtsegs): nams mang du bskyed lags na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs ri rab tsam du bgyid du stsal pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung
213b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyi khong du chud par bya ste/ de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rab tu rtog par byed pa na/ tha na se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig
213b3(dkon brtsegs): chos zab mo rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur na de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do/ /de bas kyang gang zhig tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas shing / tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig
213b4(dkon brtsegs): bzung nas tshigs su bcad pa de'i don gang yin pa de yang rtog par byed la/ sems can gcig tsam la ston par yang byed na de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung /
213b5(dkon brtsegs): de la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rab tu brtag par bya zhe na/ 'od srung / 'di la byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po'i rjes su bslab par bya ste/ 'od
213b6(dkon brtsegs): srung / sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa/ ches grangs med pa/ ches shin tu grangs med pa/ rgya che ba tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa
213b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar 'od ces bya ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
214a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shig 'jig rten du byung ste/ 'od srung
214a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig bram ze'i
214a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu zhig gi bur skyes par gyur to/ /'od srung / de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dge slong gang dag rab tu byung bar gyur pa de dag las bya ba
214a4(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs kyis sbags pas sbags pa ni phal che'i/ yang dag par zhugs pa ni nyung bar gyur te/ 'od srung / dge slong de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs byed
214a5(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug cing / ras bcos bu dang / dar dang / khang pa'i rtsig ngos dag la ri mo 'drir 'jug par yang byed do/ /de'i tshe na dge slong zhig gis dar la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs
214a6(dkon brtsegs): legs par byas pa/ shin tu zin par byas pa zhig bris nas/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po'i pha'i rgyal po'i pho brang du khyer ro/ /'od srung / de nas byang chub sems dpa'
214a7(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus chen po des/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de mthong nas 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di yang 'di tsam du blta na sdug pa yin no/ de bzhin
214b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bdag kyang lus 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur na ci ma rung snyam nas dga' ba dang /
214b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skyes par gyur te/ de de'i tshe na khyim thams cad la mngon par mi dga' bar gyur cing / de 'di snyam du khyim gyi gnas na gnas pas lus 'di lta bu
214b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub par mi nus pas/ de'i phyir bdag mngon par 'byung bar bya'o snyam du sems par yang gyur to/ /'od srung / de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po skyes nas lo bcu drug
214b4(dkon brtsegs): lon la/ dbang po rnams rgyas shing yongs su smin pa yang rjes su thob nas rang gi pha ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rang gi pha ma gnyis kyi rkang pa dag la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces
214b5(dkon brtsegs): smras so/ /yab yum/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la khyim nas khyim ma mchis par legs par legs pa kho nar rab tu 'byung bar ci gnang / pha mas smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod de skad
214b6(dkon brtsegs): ma zer cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ded gnyis la bu gcig pa/ sdug pa/ phangs pa yid du 'ong ba khyod las med pas gal te khyod ma mthong na/ 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /khye'us
214b7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bdag gis khyed gnyis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur la/ bdag kyang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi lags so/ /pha mas smras pa/ gzhon nu ji ltar bya/ khye'us smras pa/
215a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag deng slan chad ji srid du mngon par byung bar ma gyur pa de srid du 'tshal ma yang mi 'tshal/ mal du yang mi 'jug /mar sar dang / 'bru mar gyis kyang
215a2(dkon brtsegs): mi nyug / skom pa yang mi 'tshal/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i tshig 'ga' yang mi smra lags so/ /'od srung / de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po des/ sa phyogs byi
215a3(dkon brtsegs): dor ma byas pa zhig tu 'dug ste/ cang mi smra bar gyur cing nyin gcig zan yang ma zos so/ /de nas de'i pha ma gnyis kyis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas thogs te/ gzhan tshig tu ma
215a4(dkon brtsegs): brjod cing nyin mtshan thog thag tu de la gsol ba btab kyang de tshig tsam yang mi smra bar gyur to/ /'od srung / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de cang mi smra bar zhag
215a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyi bar du zan ma zos pa dang / de nas ma'i nye du lnga brgya tsam dag gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas thogs te/ gzhan ni tshig tu mi brjod cing nyin mtshan thog thag tu gsol ba btab
215a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang | de dag gi gdong du yang mi lta na/ tshig smra ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'od srung / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de cang mi smra bar zhag gsum gyi bar du zan ma
215a7(dkon brtsegs): zos pa dang / de nas pha'i nye du lnga brgya tsam dag gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas thogs te/ gzhan tshig tu mi brjod cing nyin mtshan thog thag tu gsol ba btab kyang / de dag gi gdong
215b1(dkon brtsegs): du yang mi lta/ tshig kyang mi smra'o/ /'od srung / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de cang mi smra bar zhag bzhi'i bar du zan ma zos pa dang / de nas de'i ne'u ldangs lnga brgya
215b2(dkon brtsegs): dag gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas thogs te/ gzhan tshig tu ma brjod cing nyin mtshan thog thag tu gsol ba btab kyang / de dag gi gdong du yang mi lta na tshig smra ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/

215b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / sa le sbra ma dang / dngul dang / gzhan yang rin po che dang / gos dang / rgyan sna tshogs ji snyed yod pa de dag thams
215b5(dkon brtsegs): cad phyogs gcig tu bzhag ste/ na chung lha'i bu mo 'dra ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yang bkug ste phyogs gcig tu bkod do/ /'od srung / mdor na rgyal po'i pho
215b6(dkon brtsegs): brang de na nye bar spyod pa'i longs spyod ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad de'i mdun du bzhag ste/ de'i pha ma gnyis kyis ma'i nye du lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / pha'i nye du lnga brgya tsam po de dag
215b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / ne'u ldangs lnga brgya tsam bo de dag dang / na chung brgyad khri bzhi stong po dag dang / skye bo phal po che de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de'i mdun du bkod
216a1(dkon brtsegs): nas| ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas thogs te gzhan tshig tu ma brjod cing / nyin mtshan thog thag tu gsol ba 'debs te/ de la 'di skad ces gzhon nu longs
216a2(dkon brtsegs): la zan zo/ khyim 'dir 'dug la sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig /bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig /bud med 'di dag dang lhan cig tu dga' ba dang / rtsed mo dang / dga' mgur spyad pa
216a3(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang gyis la/ rgyal po'i khyim 'di lta bu yongs su ma btang zhig ces kyang smras so/ /'od srung / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de skye bo phal po che de ltar 'dus
216a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag la mig kyang mi lta/ phyir yang mi smra bar de bzhin du cang mi zer bar 'dug cing / zhag drug gi bar du zan yang ma zos par de sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang 'brel ba'i yid la
216a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan thams cad dang bral zhing kha zas kyi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed do/ /'od srung / de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de'i pha ma
216a6(dkon brtsegs): de gnyis dang / skye bo phal po che de dag dang / ne'u ldangs de dag dang / nye du'i tshogs chen po de dag dang / bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag thams cad kyis bzhin la mchi ma'i rgyun
