216a7(dkon brtsegs): blags shing skad phyung ste dud mos btab nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs kyang / de de dag gi gdong du yang mi lta'o/ /'od srung / de nas rgyal po'i pho brang de na
216b1(dkon brtsegs): lha zhig gnas par gyur pa gang yin pa de steng gi bar snang la cho 'phrul chen pos 'dug nas/ skye bo phal po che de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang dag byang chub phyir brtson pa/ /de dag
216b2(dkon brtsegs): lhun po 'dra bar ni/ /mthu brtan rab tu mi g.yo ste/ /yid dam gtong bar mi byed do/ /sa rnams thams cad g.yo yang srid/ /me ni chur yang 'gyur srid kyi/ /grogs dag 'di ni gnas 'di
216b3(dkon brtsegs): las| |bskyod par nus pa ma yin no/ /'di la mi dga' phyis mi bya/ /sdig pa'i las rnams ma byed cig /phyin chad dmus long 'dra bar ni/ /bskal pa bye bar 'khyams sa re/ /'di ni
216b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la/ /phan phyir byang chub zhugs pa ste/ /mngon par byang chub brtson rnams ni/ /byang chub dam pa rnyed mi dka'/ /'dod pa'i phyir dang longs spyod phyir/ /byang chub
216b5(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa mi spyod kyi/ /sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi/ /ye shes tshol rnams ji ltar bde/ /stong gsum rin chen rnams dang ni/ /gos dang yul gzhan lha rdzas kyis/ /chal bar bkang
216b6(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur kyang ni/ /de dag chags par bya mi nus/ /mi shes pas ni gang byas pa'i/ /sdig pa'i las ni bshags par gyis/ /mkhas pa nyes pa bshags nas ni/ /las dang lhan cig mi gnas
216b7(dkon brtsegs): so| |'od srung / de ltar lha des bskul na/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de'i pha ma de gnyis dang / mdza' bshes dang / gros grogs dang / nye du dang / rgan rabs de dag
217a1(dkon brtsegs): dang | skye bo phal po che dag gis nyes pa la nyes par bshags nas/ gzhon nu de la 'di skad ces smras te/ gzhon nu khyod ji ltar bsam pa bzhin song
217a2(dkon brtsegs): zhig |rab tu yang byung zhig / zan yang zo zhig /zas ma zos pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur ta re zhes byas so/ /'od srung / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po
217a3(dkon brtsegs): des zhag bdun gyi bar du zan bcad du zin kyang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang 'brel pa yid la byed pa dang / zhag bdun gyi bar du lha rnams kyis de'i lus la mdangs bcug pas
217a4(dkon brtsegs): na dbang po rnams gzhan du gyur par yang ma gyur/ bzhin gyi mdangs yongs su nyams par yang ma gyur to/ /'od srung / byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po des/ de ltar zhag
217a5(dkon brtsegs): bdun gyi bar du zan bcad de khyim gyi gnas la mi lta zhing / rgyal srid chen po de mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du bor nas/ bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong po da dag dang / pha ma dang / nye
217a6(dkon brtsegs): du'i tshogs de dag gdong mchi mas gang ste/ ngu bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de khyer te/ rang gi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas dgon pa mi med pa gcan zan gdug pa
217a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i nags shig tu bzhugs so/ /de der bzhugs nas ras bcos bu'i gzhi gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de bris pa'i ras bcos bu'i gzhi de bres nas/ ras
217b1(dkon brtsegs): bcos bu'i gzhi de nyid kyi mdun du rtswa'i gding ba bting ba'i steng du skyil mo krung bcas nas lus drang por bsrang ste 'dug nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de la rtog par byed
217b2(dkon brtsegs): do| |de de la rtog par byed pa na 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di yang 'di tsam du mdzes pa yin na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta smos kyang ci
217b3(dkon brtsegs): dgos te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de de tsam du mdzes pa ni ngo mtshar bas/ gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba de dag ni dpal yon can yin no snyam mo/ /de 'di snyam du ji ltar
217b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar bya snyam du yang sems par yang gyur to/ /de nas nags khrod de na lha zhig gnas par gyur pa gang yin pa des byang chub sems dpa' de'i sems kyi rtog
217b5(dkon brtsegs): pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar bya snyam du rnam par rtog par byed pa gang
217b6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di ji lta ba de bzhin du blta bar bya zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa
217b7(dkon brtsegs): yang blta bar bya ste/ de ltar mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar bltas na
218a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di la ji ltar blta bar bya snyam nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar
218a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di sems par mi byed/ rnam par shes par mi byed pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyang sems par mi byed/ rnam par shes par mi byed de/ de
218a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di ming du btags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang ming du
218a4(dkon brtsegs): btags pa tsam du zad la/ ming de yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa dang / rang bzhin gyis g.yo ba med pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no/ /ji ltar de bzhin
218a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di la thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa dang / shes pa med pa dang / mngon sum du bya ba med pa dang / 'bras bu med pa dang / 'bras bu rtogs pa med pa
218a6(dkon brtsegs): dang | gnas med pa dang / rten med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang /
218a7(dkon brtsegs): sgra med pa dang / tshul med pa dang / tshul ma yin pa med pa dang / 'dod chags zad pa med pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa med pa dang / gti mug zad pa med pa dang / phung po rnams med pa dang / khams
218b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams med pa dang / skye mched rnams med pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' med pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' med pa dang / dbus med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bzhin gshegs
218b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di g.yo ba med pa dang / spyod pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bzhin
218b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu kho na yin no/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di lta bar mi byed/ nyan par mi byed/ snom par mi byed/ myang bar mi byed/ reg
218b4(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed/ sems par mi byed/ nyal bar mi byed/ ldang bar mi byed/ dbugs 'byung bar mi byed/ dbugs rngub par mi byed/ rnam par shes par mi byed pa de bzhin du chos thams
218b5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ chos thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di 'dod pa'i
218b6(dkon brtsegs): khams su gtogs pa yang ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang
218b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di la tshu rol yang med/ pha rol yang med/ bar yang med/ thog ma
219a1(dkon brtsegs): yang med/ tha ma yang med/ 'jig pa yang med/ rgyu ba yang med/ spyod pa yang med/ blang ba yang med/ dor ba yang med/ bya ba yang med/ byed pa yang
219a2(dkon brtsegs): med| ltung ba yang med/ bden pa yang med/ rdzun pa yang med/ bden pa mngon par shes pa yang med/ kun du 'dod chags chags pa yang med/ yid 'byung ba yang med/ 'khor
219a3(dkon brtsegs): ba yang med/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ chos thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de
219a4(dkon brtsegs): lta bu yin no snyam mo/ /'od srung / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'jug pa de lta bu des rab tu rtog par byed pa na nyin mtshan du skyil mo krung zhig par ma gyur cing / des nyin
219a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan de la mngon par shes pa lnga dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang / spobs pa thogs pa med pa dag kyang bsgrubs par gyur nas ting nge 'dzin kun du snang ba zhes bya ba yang
219a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs par gyur nas/ de la snang ba yang byung bar gyur te/ snang ba byung bar gyur pa des lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las shin tu 'das pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
219a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag kyang mthong ngo / /lha'i rna ba sgrib pa med pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa thams cad kyang thos te/ de bzhin gshegs
219b1(dkon brtsegs): pa gcig gis chos bstan pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pas chos bstan pa la sgrib par ma gyur cig thams cad kyang mnyes par byas so/ /'od srung / byang chub sems dpa' brtson
219b2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus chen po zla ba bdun gyi bar du 'chag cing 'dug par gyur te/ shes pa'i zas ma gtogs par zas gzhan yang mi za zhing / lha rnams kyis de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rig nas de'i lus
219b3(dkon brtsegs): la mdangs bcug par yang gyur to/ /'od srung / byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po des gos dur smrig dag kyang ma bgos/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang mngon sum du ma mthong /
219b4(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang ma blangs mod kyi/ 'on kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjes su thob cing / de ltar bslab par 'dod par gyur pa la ltos/ 'od srung / byang chub sems dpa'
219b5(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu rnam par 'byed de/ ci nas kyang 'phel bar mi byed pa dang / 'bri bar mi byed pa de ltar rab tu rnam par 'byed do/ /'od srung / byang chub sems
219b6(dkon brtsegs): dpas ni/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la bsnyen bkur byas pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la bsnyen
219b7(dkon brtsegs): bkur bya'o/ /des de ltar bsnyen bkur byas shing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog par byed pa na ye shes chen po'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag kyang skyed par gyur te/ ye shes kyi rnam pa
220a1(dkon brtsegs): des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang mthong bar gyur/ de dag chos ston pa dag kyang thos par gyur
220a2(dkon brtsegs): to| |'od srung / de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de nags khrod de nas phyir byung ste/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho
220a3(dkon brtsegs): brang 'khor dag tu zhugs nas/ sems can rnams la chos ston par byed cing / des srog chags nyi khri ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod do/ /
220a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bsod nams dag la bkod par gyur to/ /pha ma de gnyis dang / btsun mo'i 'khor de dag
220a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'khor gzhan thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par byas so/ /'od srung / de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen
220a6(dkon brtsegs): po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod nem nur dang / yid gnyis dang / the tshom za bar gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus
220a7(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya ba der gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /'od srung / de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
220b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po brtson 'grus chen po de dang / de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyi rjes su bslab par bya'o/ /
220b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung / yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pa/ brkam pa/ 'dod pas zil gyis non pa
220b3(dkon brtsegs): kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni ras bcos bu dang / rtsig ngos la bris pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs gzhan dag la mchod pa byas pas dngos grub dang / rdzu
220b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul 'thob par sems shing / de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa yin gyi/ gzhan dag ni mchod pa byed pa ma yin no snyam du rlom sems su
220b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ de dag dge ba cung zad tsam po des bdag la bstod par byed/ gzhan la smod par byed cing gzhi des 'tsho bar sems par yang 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / de'i tshe na gang dag gis
220b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du bcug pa dang / 'dus pa dang / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag ma gtogs par de ltar lung mnod pa
220b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su tshol bar mi 'gyur/ kha ton mi byed/ bsam gtan mi sgom/ nang du yang dag 'jog la gces par sems par mi 'gyur te/ de dag de'i tshe na khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dag
221a1(dkon brtsegs): gis mchod pa dang / ri mo bya ba dang / shes pa dang / shin tu yongs su shes par yang 'gyur zhing / gzhi des de dag gi chos gos dang / bsod snyoms
221a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag kyang rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi las su 'di lta ste/ tshul
221a3(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi phung po la gnas te/ mang du thos pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o zhes bstan na/ de dag ni de'i tshe na tshul khrims 'chal pa kho nar gnas shing / chos yongs su btsal pa
221a4(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson par 'gyur zhing / gzhi des 'tsho bar sems pa la ltos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
221a5(dkon brtsegs): la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi sgyu dang / g.yo dang /
221a6(dkon brtsegs): gya gyu de dag mang du bka' stsal pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ ngo mtshar lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa
221a7(dkon brtsegs): dag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu thos nas/ su zhig tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su sbyong bar mi bgyid lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus
221b1(dkon brtsegs): na rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa/ bdag cag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas
221b2(dkon brtsegs): gzigs pas na/ bdag cag yul 'di lta bu la spyod pa las phyir ldog par bya'o zhes kun du skyo ba skye bar 'gyur zhing / rab tu spyod par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
221b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas chos kyi rnams grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
221b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung / de bzhin gshegs pa gnas rnam pa 'di lta bu gang ci ston pa dang / yang dag par ston par mdzad pa de dag thams cad ni rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyid kyi ched
221b5(dkon brtsegs): du ste/ 'di ltar de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur zhing / thos nas kyang skyon de dag yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
221b6(dkon brtsegs): stsal nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong
221b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs
222a1(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa byams pa seng ge'i sgra chen po'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu gsum pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / pradz+nyA warma dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/
222a2(dkon brtsegs): Ar+ya bi na ya bi nish+tsa ya u pa li pa ri pr-id ts+tshe nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po mdo/ /bam
222a3(dkon brtsegs): po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
222a4(dkon brtsegs): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong tha ma pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom
222a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /khyed cag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus
222a6(dkon brtsegs): na| dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
222b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub 'di yang dag par gzung ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs dang / tshul dang / bsam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyang bar su spro/ de nas byang chub
222b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
222b3(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du/ de bzhin
222b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yang dag par 'dzin par spro lags so/ /byang
222b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' seng ges gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni thabs dang / tshul dang / bsam pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams yongs su skyong bar spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa'
222b6(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can rnams ngan song du mchi ba las yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lags so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/
222b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can rnams kyis gang zag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ye shes tog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
223a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ bdag ni sems can ma 'tshal ba rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tog gis gsol pa/ bcom
223a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ bdag ni chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i tog gis gsol pa/ bcom 'das/ bdag
223a3(dkon brtsegs): ni yon tan rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i tog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni theg pa bde
223a4(dkon brtsegs): bas sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' bag tsha ba med pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can gyi khams mtha'
223a5(dkon brtsegs): yas pa dag yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni ming 'bras bu mchis par
223a6(dkon brtsegs): sgrogs pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi bzad pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni smon lam rgya chen
223a7(dkon brtsegs): pos sems can gyi khams bas par ma 'tshal ba rnams yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan
223b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das| bdag ni bde pa'i yo byad thams cad kyis sems can rnams rab tu 'god par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' mig bzang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
223b2(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can rnams kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba'i rtsa bar nye bar bsgrub par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
223b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni ngan song dang ngan 'gro dag las sems can rnams yongs su skyob par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni ngan
223b4(dkon brtsegs): song dag las ma brgal ba'i sems can rnams sgrol bar spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshogs chen gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can ma dul pa rnams
223b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i shul nye bar ston par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' yid bzang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can dman pa la mos pa rnams yongs su smin par
223b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' des pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can shes rab dman pa rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags
223b7(dkon brtsegs): so| |byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid phung pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags
224a1(dkon brtsegs): so| |byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa med pa rtogs par khong du chud pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni shul yang dag par ston pas sems
224a2(dkon brtsegs): can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthong dgas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad tshad ma
224a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dag nye bar bsgrub par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbang po bzang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sdug bsngal dran par bgyid pas/ sems can rnams yongs
224a4(dkon brtsegs): su smin par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang dag par zhugs pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni bsam pa tsam
224a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis yi dwags kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
224a6(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can yongs su ma smin pa rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems
224a7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid stobs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni
224b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi shul 'gums par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' yid gnyis spong gis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can dman pa la mos pa
224b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams sgrol bar spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' bag tsha ba med par gnas pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can rnams bsdu ba'i slad du legs so zhes bgyi ba
224b3(dkon brtsegs): stsol bar spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin
224b4(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsal ba dpag med kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can rnams la 'dus ma bgyis kyi shul nye bar ston
224b5(dkon brtsegs): par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la bag tsha ba med par gnas pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams
224b6(dkon brtsegs): la mos pa ji lta ba bzhin yang dag par ston par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can rnams la rin po che'i phung
224b7(dkon brtsegs): po kun du ston par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni gzugs sdug pa ston pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par
225a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dri med gzi brjid kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni gcugs pas sems can rnams yang
225a2(dkon brtsegs): dag bar 'dzin cing yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' nor bu bzang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par bgyid
225a3(dkon brtsegs): pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams 'od zer gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni yang dag pa'i smon lam
225a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis sems can rnams 'dren par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can rnams sdug bsngal dag las gtan
225a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can rnams rin po che dag gis bde bar bgyid
225a6(dkon brtsegs): par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can dbul po rnams kyi dbul ba ma mchis par bgyid par spro lags so/ /
225a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyid
225b1(dkon brtsegs): par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'od kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can rnams la shul bzang po nye bar ston par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems
225b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' yon tan gzugs ston gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni bsam pa thams cad rab tu dga' bar bgyid pas sems can rnams yongs su thar bar bgyid par spro lags
225b3(dkon brtsegs): so| |byang chub sems dpa' chos mngon par 'phags kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par sbyang ba ston par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems
225b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can rnams sgrib pa dag las yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos 'byung gis
225b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni chos kyis sems can rnams yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ci yang min gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
225b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das| bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dug thams cad gzhil bar spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
225b7(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can rnams la chos kyi phyogs rab tu ston par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng ge blo gros kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can rnams la
226a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sbyin pa stsol bar spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu 'od kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can rnams dman
226a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas nas yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni shul bzang po ston
226a3(dkon brtsegs): pas sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi shul 'gog par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni lus ston pas
226a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can don
226a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa rnams kyi don bgyid par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can rnams kyi sems can
226a6(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba'i sgo 'gums par spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdud rtsi 'chang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can rnams 'khor ba las sgrol
226a7(dkon brtsegs): bar spro lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od gzhon nur gyur bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na 'od bstan pas
226b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid par spro lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
226b2(dkon brtsegs): go cha la 'jug pa bstan pa de lta bu thos nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung bar 'dzin par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ kye ma ji tsam du byang chub sems
226b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing / brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa dang / ji tsam du sems can thams cad kyis
226b4(dkon brtsegs): thul bar dka' ba dang / gting dpag par dka' ba dang / bsnyen par dka' ba dang / rdzi bar dka' ba dang / zil gyis mi non pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/ bcom
226b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ gzhan yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid zil gyis mi non pa rnams kyi drung du mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig slong ba dag
226b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis te/ dngos po thams cad slong bar bgyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kun du zhum par mi bgyid/ sgyid lug par mi bgyid cing rab tu spro bar bgyid pa ni
226b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag ngo mtshar du 'dzin lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag 'di snyam du sems lags te/ sems can gang su dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
227a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la gnod par bgyis te/ nang dang phyi'i dngos po dag slong bar bgyid pa de dag thams cad ni rnam pa thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa'i byang
227a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag tu 'gyur bar sems lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces
227a3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / thabs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyi spyod yul ni de lta bu yin no//
227a4(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yul de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems
227a5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kun tu ston par byed kyang byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid las mi g.yo'o/ /
227a6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can khyim bdag gis rgyags pas myos pa rnams la dbang phyug gis rgyags pa bsal ba'i
227a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir| khyim bdag gi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do/ /sems can spro bas rgyags shing myos pa rnams la spro ba'i rgyags pa'i rgyags pa bsal ba'i phyir/ tshan po che chen po'i
227b1(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang / sred med kyi bu'i spro ba'i stobs nye bar ston par byed do/ /sems can mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba rnams la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam sna tshogs nye bar ston
227b2(dkon brtsegs): par byed do/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/ nyan thos kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed
227b3(dkon brtsegs): do| |rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do/ /byang
227b4(dkon brtsegs): chub don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed de/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar
227b5(dkon brtsegs): n a byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rab tu 'god par byed
227b6(dkon brtsegs): do| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam par thar pa ma gtogs par sems can rnams kyi rnam par thar
227b7(dkon brtsegs): ba gzhan med de/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin 'di thugs su chud de/ de'i phyir
228a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / gdags pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams la rnam par rig par mdzad de/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
228a2(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / sems can bcings pa rnams la
228a3(dkon brtsegs): thar pa nye bar ston par mdzad pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / sems can lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams la lam bzang po nye bar ston par mdzad pas/ de'i
228a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / stong pa nyid gsung ba dang / stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/
228a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnam par rmongs pa rnams la yang dag pa'i chos rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa ji lta ba bzhin
228a6(dkon brtsegs): du| rnam par rig pa sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa nye bar ston par byed kyang byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid las mi g.yo'o/ /rim gyis byang chub kyi snying po thob par bya ba'i
228a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir sems can rnams la sgyu ma'i bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang nye bar ston to/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa khyim na gnas
228b1(dkon brtsegs): pas ni sbyin pa gnyis la gnas par bya'o/ /gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos sbyin pa dang / zang zing sbyin pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
228b2(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa khyim na gnas pas ni rjes su chags pa med pa dang / khong khro ba med pas sbyin pa de gnyis la gnas par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab
228b3(dkon brtsegs): tu byung bar gtogs pas ni sbyin pa chen po bzhi la gnas par bya'o/ /gzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ smyu gu sbyin pa dang / snag tsha sbyin pa dang / glegs bam sbyin pa dang / chos sbyin pa
228b4(dkon brtsegs): la ste| shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pas ni sbyin pa bzhi po de dag la gnas par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
228b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas ni gtong ba gsum la gnas par bya'o/ /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gtong ba dang / gtong ba chen po dang /
228b6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu gtong ba'o/ /de la gtong ba ni rgyal srid yongs su gtong ba'o/ /de la gtong ba chen po ni chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo yong su gtong ba'o/ /shin tu gtong ba ni mgo
228b7(dkon brtsegs): dang | lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / pags pa dang / rus pa dang / rkang yongs su gtong ba ste/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos
229a1(dkon brtsegs): la bzod pa thob pas ni yongs su gtong ba gsum po de dag la gnas par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
229a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams 'dod chags kyis mi 'jigs lags sam/ zhe sdang / gti mug gis mi 'jigs lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub
229a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba chen po dang bcas pa'i nyes pa ni gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/
229a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba chen po dang bcas pa'i nyes pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de la 'dod chags ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa chung la/ 'bral
229a5(dkon brtsegs): ba bul ba yin no/ /zhe sdang ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che la/ 'bral ba myur ba yin no/ /gti mug ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che la/ 'bral ba bul ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir
229a6(dkon brtsegs): zhe na| shA ri'i bu/ 'dod chags ni 'khor ba'i 'khri shing kun du 'dzin pa'i phyir nying mtshams sbyor ba'i sa bon yin pa dang / zhe sdang ni myur du yongs su spong ba'i phyir ngan song du
229a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i rgyur gyur pa yin pa dang / gti mug ni rnam par grol ba dka' ba'i phyir sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad du rab tu ltung ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/
229b1(dkon brtsegs): de la byang chub sems dpas nyes pa dang po'i lci ba ni tshogs bcu la dang por bshags par bya'o/ /bud med kyi lag pa nas 'dzin pa'i lag pa'i nyes pa lci ba ni tshogs lnga la
229b2(dkon brtsegs): bshags par bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis mig gis bltas pa'i nyes pa ni gang zag gcig gam gnyis kyi mdun du bshags par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpas
229b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa'i nyes pa dang / bud med kyi nyes pa dang / khye'u'i nyes pa dang / lag pa'i nyes pa dang / mchod rten gyi nyes pa dang / dge 'dun gyi nyes pa dang / de
229b4(dkon brtsegs): las gzhan pa'i nyes pa lci ba rnams ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa lnga'i spyan sngar gcig pus nyin mtshan du bshags par bya'o/ /de la bshags pa ni 'di yin te/
229b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ /chos la skyabs su mchi'o/ /dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
229b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje snying pos rab tu 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu dbang gi
229b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal dgyes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen me la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mthong ba don
230a1(dkon brtsegs): yod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pa la phyag
230a2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pas byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chu lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chu lha'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tsan dan dpal la phyag 'tshal
230a3(dkon brtsegs): lo| |gzi brjid mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mya ngan med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /me tog
230a4(dkon brtsegs): dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'od zer rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i
230a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dran pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan dpal shin tu yongs
230a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin tu rnam par gnon pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /g.yul las shin tu
230a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par gnon pas gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun nas snang ba bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen pad mas rnam
230b1(dkon brtsegs): par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad mo la rab tu bzhugs pa ri dbang gi rgyal po la
230b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed
230b3(dkon brtsegs): cig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gis skye ba 'di dang / skye ba thog ma dang / tha ma ma
230b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa nas/ 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag tu sdig pha'i las bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba'am/ mchod rten gyi dkor
230b5(dkon brtsegs): ram| dge 'dun gyi dkor ram/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor phrogs pa dang / 'phrog tu stsal ba dang / 'phrog pa la rjes su yi rang ba'am/ mtshams ma mchis
230b6(dkon brtsegs): pa lnga'i las bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba'am/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blang ba la zhugs pa dang / 'jug tu stsal pa
230b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'jug pa la rjes su yi rang ba'am/ las kyi sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs nas/ bdag sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su mchi ba'am/ yi dwags
231a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi yul du mchi ba'am/ yul mtha' 'khob tu skye ba'am/ kla klor skye ba'am/ lha tshe ring po rnams kyi dang du skye ba'am/ dbang po ma tshang bar
231a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'am/ lta ba log pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba'am/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba la mnyes par mi bgyid par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad
231a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ye shes su gyur pa/ spyan du gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa/ mkhyen par gzigs pa de dag gi spyan sngar mthol lo/ /'chags
231a4(dkon brtsegs): so/ /mi 'chab bo/ /mi sped do/ /slan chad kyang sdom par bgyid lags so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gis skye ba 'di dang /
231a5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag tu sbyin pa tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa la zas kha ma gcig tsam stsal ba gang lags
231a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / tshul khrims bsrungs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gis sangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gis sems
231a7(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin par bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gi byang chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gi bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi dge
231b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bzlums te/ bsdoms nas bla na ma mchis pa dang / gong na ma mchis pa dang / gong ma'i yang gong mar yongs su bsngo bas
231b2(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su bsngos pa dang / ji ltar ma
231b3(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams da ltar yongs su bsngo bar mdzad pa de ltar
231b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis kyang yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /sdig pa thams cad bshags so/ /bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo / /sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs so/ /bdag
231b5(dkon brtsegs): gi ye shes bla na med pa'i mchog tu gyur cig / mi mchog rgyal ba gang dag da ltar bzhugs pa dang / /gang dag 'das pa dag dang de bzhin gang ma byon/ /yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas
231b6(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho 'dra kun la/ /thal mo sbyar ba bgyis te skyabs su nye bar mchi/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa lnga po de dag la sogs pa de
231b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya'o/ /de ltar sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa de la sangs rgyas bcom
232a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de dag nyid kyang sems can rnam par thar bar bya ba kho na'i phyir zhal nye bar ston par mdzad do/ /de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo 'khrul pa
232a2(dkon brtsegs): r nams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir tshig 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs nye bar ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo la sems can mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams mos
232a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ rnam par thar bar bya ba'i phyir smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po'i ting nge
232a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi
232a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba nye bar ston par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bkod pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/
232a6(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya
232a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gzugs nye bar ston par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid drag po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni
232b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i gzugs nye bar ston par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtse gcig pa'i ting nge
232b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis su
232b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
232b4(dkon brtsegs): po zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do/ /byang chub sems
232b5(dkon brtsegs): d pa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs
232b6(dkon brtsegs): nye bar ston par byed de/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na skyes bu dam pa rnams ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ la lar ni brgya byin gyi gzugs/ la lar ni tshangs pa'i gzugs /
232b7(dkon brtsegs): la lar ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gzugs nye bar ston par yang byed la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can
233a1(dkon brtsegs): y ongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par rig pa'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs nye bar ston par
233a2(dkon brtsegs): byed kyang de la bdag tu dmigs pa yang med/ sems can du dmigs pa yang med la/ sems can rnams la 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi gzugs nye bar ston par yang byed pa'i phyir
233a3(dkon brtsegs): ro| |shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge'i sgra skad gang yin pa de/ byi las bzod par nus snyam mam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
233a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni mi bzod lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ spos kyi glang po che'i khal gang yin pa de bong bus bzod par nus
233a5(dkon brtsegs): snyam mam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni mi bzod lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ /brgya byin
233a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshangs pa dag gi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de mi dbul pos bzod par nus snyam mam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ de ni mi bzod lags
233a7(dkon brtsegs): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gi pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de/ bya rgod kyi phru gus bzod par
233b1(dkon brtsegs): nus snyam mam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni mi bzod lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams
233b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis sems dpa' ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa las byung zhing shes pa las rnam par byung ba'i nyes pa gang yin pa dang / nyes pa 'gyod pa'i gnas sangs rgyas mthong ba'i
233b3(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa thob pas rnam par sbyong ba gang yin pa de ni sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis rnam par sbyong
233b4(dkon brtsegs): bar mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan 'dzin cing yongs su brjod pa dang phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyin lan gsum
233b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan lan gsum brjod pas nyes pa bgyid pa'i gnas la nges par 'gyur zhing ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ / //bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o/ /de'i tshe
233b6(dkon brtsegs): na tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
233b7(dkon brtsegs): te| bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad
234a1(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di na bdag gcig pu dben par mchis nas nang du yang dag par bzhag pa na sems la yongs su rtog pa 'di lta bu
234a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skyes lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams la ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa/ lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yongs su
234a3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa bcas la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyis ni srog gi phyir yang bslab pa yongs su mi gtong ngo zhes gsungs lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/
234a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das sam bzhugs kyang rung ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ji ltar brjod par bgyi/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi so
234a5(dkon brtsegs): sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ji ltar brjod par bgyi/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ji ltar brjod par bgyi/ bcom ldan
234a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bdag ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog lags par bka' stsal na/ ci nas kyang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las 'dul ba la mkhas pa mngon sum du thos shing
234a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du bzung nas mi 'jigs pa thob cing 'khor rnams la rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba de ltar/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan du gsol
234b1(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi lags so snyam ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gcig pu dben par gnas nas nang du yang dag par bzhag pa na/ sems la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar mchis la 'dul ba
234b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par gtan la dbab pa yongs su zhu'o/ /snyam pa de lta bu'i yongs su rtog pa skyes par gyur lags na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong gi 'khor dang / byang chub sems
234b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i 'khor chen po 'dus pa la 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa rgya cher bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces bka'
234b4(dkon brtsegs): stsal to/ /nye bar 'khor/ de'i phyir khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni sbyor ba gzhan dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa gzhan gyis yongs su dag pa yin par smros shig /theg pa chen po la
234b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yang sbyor ba gzhan dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa gzhan gyis yongs su dag pa yin par smros shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye
234b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'khor/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyor ba yang gzhan/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang gzhan la/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba yang
234b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan| lhag pa'i bsam pa yang gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro/ /nye bar 'khor/ de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
235a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang / shin tu 'tshal ba'i tshul khrims nyid yin la/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i
235a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang / shin tu 'chal pa'i tshul khrims nyid yin no/ /de ci'i
235a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor/ 'di la nyan thos kyi theg pa ni de'i skad cig tsam yang srid par skye ba len par mi byed do/ /de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa nyid yin la/ de ni theg
235a4(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang / shin tu 'chal ba'i tshul khrims nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /nye bar 'khor/ theg pa chen po la yang
235a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang / shin tu 'chal pa'i tshul khrims
235a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid du gyur pa gang zhe na/ nye bar 'khor/ 'di la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa tshad med grangs med par srid par skye ba len kyang sems yongs su mi skyo
235a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing yongs su mi skyo ba de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa nyid yin la/ de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa
235b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang / shin tu 'chal pa'i tshul khrims nyid yin no/ /nye bar 'khor/ de lta bas na khyod kyis theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba
235b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa yin par smros shig / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba med pa yin par smros shig /theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
235b3(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa ni bcos su yod pa yin par smros shig / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcos su med pa yin par smros shig /theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
235b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bslab pa ni ring du rjes su zhugs pa yin par smros shig / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni mthar chags pa yin par smros shig /nye bar 'khor/ 'di la ji ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag
235b5(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa rjes su bsrung ba dang bcas pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa rjes su bsrung ba med pa yin zhe na/ nye bar 'khor/ 'di la
235b6(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi sems kyi rjes su 'jug par bya dgos la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa
235b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni mi dgos te/ nye bar 'khor/ rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba dang bcas pa yin la/
236a1(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba med pa yin no/ /nye bar 'khor/ ji ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub
236a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa bcos su yod pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa bcos su med pa yin zhe na/ nye bar 'khor/ 'di la theg pa chen po la yang dag par
236a3(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te snga dro'i dus kyi tshe nyes pa byung la/ gung tshigs kyi dus kyi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na/ theg
236a4(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin no/ /gal te gung tshigs kyi dus kyi tshe nyes pa byung la/ phyi dro'i dus kyi
236a5(dkon brtsegs): t she thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na
236a6(dkon brtsegs): yin no| |gal te phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe nyes pa byung la mtshan mo'i thun dang po la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par
236a7(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin no/ /gal te mtshan mo'i thun dang po la nyes pa byung la/ mtshan mo'i gung thun la thams
236b1(dkon brtsegs): c ad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na
236b2(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /gal te mtshan mo'i gung thun la nyes pa byung la/ mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par
236b3(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin no/ /nye bar 'khor/ de ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
236b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bslab pa ni bcos su yod pa yin te/ de la ni byang chub sems dpas 'gyod pa'i kun nas ldang ba ha cang bskyed par mi bya zhing / ha cang yid la gcags par yang mi bya'o/ /nye bar 'khor/ de la
236b5(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa yang dang yang du nyes pa byung na ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po nyams pa dang / rab tu nyams pa dang / yongs su gtugs pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir
236b6(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pas ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spang pa'i phyir mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bur bya dgos pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su mya
236b7(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcos su med pa yin no/ /nye bar 'khor/ ji ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ring du
237a1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su zhugs pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa mthar chags pa yin zhe na/ nye bar 'khor/ 'di la gal te theg pa chen po la yang dag
237a2(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga' mgur spyad pa byas kyang byang chub
237a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems mi gtong na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar
237a4(dkon brtsegs): ' khor| theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems de nyid kyis legs par yongs su zin pa ni rmi lam na yang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis
237a5(dkon brtsegs): kun tu reg par mi 'gyur ba'i dus kyang yod/ skabs kyang yod par 'gyur ba dang / nye bar 'khor/ yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni
237a6(dkon brtsegs): srid pa gcig gis nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par mi byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dag ni rim gyis zad par 'gyur
237a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bur byed pas ni de'i skad cig tsam yang srid par skye ba bskyed par mi bya ba'i phyir te/
237b1(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'khor/ de ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni ring du rjes su zhugs pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi
237b2(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa ni mthar chags pa yin no/ /nye bar 'khor/ de lta bas na khyod kyis theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba
237b3(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa dang / bcos su yod pa dang / ring du rjes su zhugs pa yin par smros shig /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba med pa dang / bcos su med pa dang /
237b4(dkon brtsegs): mthar chags pa yin par smros shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni tshogs chen po dang ldan pa yin pas na/ theg pa chen po la
237b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu skyobs ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med par mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor bar sla pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/ nye bar 'khor/
237b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis don gyi dbang de gzigs pas na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
237b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la gcig tu skyo ba'i gtam mi gsung / gcig tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gtam mi gsung / gcig tu yid 'byung ba'i gtam mi gsung bar dga' ba dang / mchog tu
238a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gtam gsung ngo / /zab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang / phra ba dang / brtags pa dang / 'gyod pa med pa dang / kun
238a2(dkon brtsegs): nas ldang ba med pa'i gtam gsung ngo / /thogs pa med pa dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi gtam gsung ste/ de dag gis gtam de dag thos nas mngon par dga' zhing
238a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa med pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
238a4(dkon brtsegs): pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nongs ba gang lags pa de dag las kha cig ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags/ kha cig ni zhe
238a5(dkon brtsegs): sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags/ kha cig ni gti mug dang mtshungs par ldan par gsungs pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de dag las ci 'dod chags dang mtshungs par
238a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'am/ 'on te zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa'am/ 'on te gti mug dang mtshungs par ldan pa'am/ gang zhig theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
238a7(dkon brtsegs): nongs pa shin tu lci bar 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nye bar 'khor/ gal te theg
238b1(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byung bar gyur la/ zhe sdang dang mtshungs par
238b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa de ni gcig gcig byung bar gyur na yang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa tshad mar byas na zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang
238b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa de dag pas ches nyes pa lci bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor/ zhe sdang ni sems can yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ba yin la/ 'dod chags ni sems can
238b4(dkon brtsegs): sdud par 'gyur ba yin te/ nye bar 'khor/ de la sems can sdud par 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgyu bag dang / 'jigs pa med la/ sems can yongs su gtong
238b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgyu bag dang / 'jigs pa yod pa'i phyir ro/ /nye bar 'khor/ yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod chags ni 'bral ba bul
238b6(dkon brtsegs): la| kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa chung ba dang / zhe sdang ni 'bral ba myur la/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che ba dang / gti mug 'bral ba bul la/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che bar gsungs pa gang yin pa de la/ nye
238b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'khor/ 'bral ba bul la kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa chung ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa ma yin par blta'o/ /'bral ba myur la kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che ba
239a1(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa yin pas/ rmi lam na yang 'dod par mi bya'o/ /nye bar 'khor/ de lta bas na khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'
239a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa gang de dag yin pa de dag la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgyu bag dang / nyes pa med pas de dag thams cad ni nyes pa ma yin par smros
239a3(dkon brtsegs): shig| zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa gang dag yin pa de dag la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgyu bag dang / nyes pa yod pas de dag thams cad ni nyes pa yin par smros shig/ nye bar
239a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor| de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag thabs la mi mkhas pa de dag ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa dag 'jigs par byed la/ zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan
239a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dag gis ni 'jigs par mi byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag thabs la mkhas pa de dag ni zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa dag gis 'jigs par byed la/ 'dod
239a6(dkon brtsegs): chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag gis ni 'jigs par mi byed do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
239a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shin tu dul ba'i chos thams cad la 'dul ba ci zhig mchis/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
239b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal/ gal te byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis chos thams cad shin tu dul bar shes na ni de bzhin gshegs pa yang dang yang du 'dul ba 'cha' bar mi
239b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa zhig na/ gang gi phyir sems can rnams kyis mi shes pa de'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang chos thams cad shin tu dul ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rim gyis bya ba'i 'dul ba 'cha' bar mdzad
239b3(dkon brtsegs): do| |de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan
239b4(dkon brtsegs): pa bshad pa 'di la ci yang mi ston lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di bstan pa 'ga' zhig legs par ston par mdzad du
239b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol| de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal/ dge slong nye bar 'khor 'dul ba la mkhas pa nyan par 'dod kyi/ shin tu dul
239b6(dkon brtsegs): ba las rtsoms la khyod spobs par gyis shig / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa nye bar 'khor/ chos thams cad ni shin tu dul ba
239b7(dkon brtsegs): ste| rang gi sems gdul ba'i phyir shin tu dul ba kun du ston to/ /chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste/ bdag mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'gyod pa 'dul ba kun du ston to/ /chos thams
240a1(dkon brtsegs): cad ni phyin ci ma log pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir shin tu dul ba kun du ston to/ /chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi mtha'i sgo yin
240a2(dkon brtsegs): te| bslab pa la rlom sems med par bya ba'i phyir bslab pa yongs su dag pa kun du ston to/ /chos thams cad ni rnam par mi rtog pa dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa ste/ bsam
240a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pas chags pa med pa nyid du kun du ston to/ /chos thams cad ni chags pa med pa dang / gnas med pa ste/ yun ring du mi gnas pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag pa
240a4(dkon brtsegs): kun du ston to/ /chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i mtha' la gnas pa ste/ dngos po dang bral ba'i phyir rang bzhin med pa nyid kun du ston to/ /chos thams cad ni tha dad du bya ba med par gyur
240a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kun du ston to/ /chos thams cad ni gdags pa dang bral ba ste/ sems
240a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid du spyod pa'i phyir the tshom spang pa kun du ston to/ /btsun pa nye bar 'khor/ de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rjes su rtogs pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu dul ba
240a7(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos nyid 'di la ma mos pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa las ring du gyur pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
240b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni gang dang gang ston pa de dag thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa kho na
240b2(dkon brtsegs): las brtsams te ston lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nye bar 'khor/ 'jam dpal gzhon
240b3(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa'i chos ston pa ni rnam par grol ba'i rgyu mthun pa yin te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid la ma brten par rnam par grol ba med pas na/ de'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
240b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / sems pa la mos pa lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi lhag pa'i nga rgyal med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
240b5(dkon brtsegs): la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong sems gang dang mtshungs par ldan na lhag pa'i nga rgyal can lags/ de skad ces gsol pa
240b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nye bar 'khor/ 'di la dge slong gal te 'dod chags spang bar sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la
240b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yin no/ /gal te zhe sdang spang ba dang / gti mug spang bar sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te 'dod chags kyi chos kyang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang
241a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan no zhes de snyam du sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te zhe sdang gi chos kyang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang gzhan pa dang / gti
241a2(dkon brtsegs): mug gi chos kyang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang gzhan no zhes de snyam du sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te dga' ba la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa
241a3(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /bya ba la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /rnam par grol ba la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /stong pa nyid la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod
241a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ /mtshan ma med pa la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /smon pa med pa la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sems
241a5(dkon brtsegs): na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /skye ba med pa la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /dngos po med pa la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te chos
241a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams yod do snyam du sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /chos thams cad mi rtag go snyam du sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /chos thams cad stong pa la
241a7(dkon brtsegs): yang bya ba ci yod ces de snyam du sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i lhag pa'i
241b1(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal gang zhe na/ gal te bdag gis thams cad las khyad par du 'phangs pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la sems bskyed do zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te pha rol
241b2(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung ba yin par sems te/ de snyam du sems
241b3(dkon brtsegs): na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ gal te 'di ni zab pa'o/ /'di ni zab pa ma yin no zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te 'dis ni rnam par dag par
241b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur la/ 'dis ni rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ro zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so//
241b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te 'di ni rigs so/ /'di ni mi rigs so zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin
241b6(dkon brtsegs): no| |gal te 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can yin no/ /'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te 'di ni lam yin no/ /'di
241b7(dkon brtsegs): ni lam ma yin no zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes de snyam sems
242a1(dkon brtsegs): na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te chos thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas 'di la bsam par bya ba med do zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i
242a2(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas bsam par bya ba ci yang med do zhes de snyam sems na
242a3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa chen po yin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor
242a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam gyis na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis pa lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar
242a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nye bar 'khor/ dge slong gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis rgyu mthun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid la mngon par zhen par mi byed
242a6(dkon brtsegs): na| de ni shin tu lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa de nyid rgya cher ston cing de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /
242a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag bsam yas chos rnams 'di shes pa'i/ /mi rnams de dag rtag tu bde ba yin/ /chos dang chos min rnam rtog med pa ste/ /thams cad sems kyi spros pas phye ba
242b1(dkon brtsegs): yin/ /thams cad bsam yas thams cad byung min pas/ /dngos dang dngos med shes pa rnam par zhig /byis pa gang dag sems kyi dbang song ba/ /de dag srid pa bye ba brgyar sdug
242b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal/ /dge slong gang dag bsam yas yod min pa'i/ /sangs rgyas mi mchog de sems tshul bzhin min/ /rtog pa'i dbang gis sangs rgyas rnam par brtags/ /rtog pa de yang nam yang byung
242b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ /gang dag chos rnams stong la sems byed pa'i/ /byis pa de dag lam ngan zhugs pa yin/ /chos rnams stong pa yi ges brjod pa ni/ /de dag yi ge med par ye shes bstan/ /gang
242b4(dkon brtsegs): dag zhi zhing rab zhi'i chos sems pa'i/ /sems dpa' de yang nam yang byung ma yin/ /spros kun sems kyi rnam par rtog yin te/ /de phyir chos rnams bsam yas rtogs par gyis/ /
242b5(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di thams cad sems med sems pa med/ /ji srid mi sems de srid stong pa yin/ /mi gang stong la sems par byed 'dod pa/ /bsam yas kun la phyir zhing sims pa
242b6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ /mig ni thams cad ldan na mthong 'gyur te/ /mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba gang yin pa'ang / /mtshan mo rkyen rnams med na mthong mi 'gyur/ /de phyir ldan dang
242b7(dkon brtsegs): bral ba rnam rtog yin/ /mig ni snang lam brten te yid 'ong dang / /yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs gzugs mthong bas/ /de ltar ldan las brten te mthong bas na/ /de phyir mig gis nam yang
243a1(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba med/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sgra grags gang yin pa/ /de yang nam yang nang du zhugs pa med/ /der 'gro dmigs su yod pa ma yin te/ /rtog pa'i dbang gis sgra
243a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams byung ba yin/ /chos rnams 'di dag yi ge'i sgra skad kyis/ /grangs dang tha snyad gdags par bstan pa yin/ /chos dang chos min nam yang yod min yang / /skye bo byis pa rnams
243a3(dkon brtsegs): la de mi snang / /sbyin pa'i bsngags pa 'jig rten ngas brjod kyang / /ser sna'i chos de'ang dmigs su yod ma yin/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams bsam yas te/ /de yang dmigs med de
243a4(dkon brtsegs): yang mthong ba med/ /tshul khrims bya pa dag pa ngas bshad kyang / /'chal pa'i tshul khrims mkha' la lag pa bzhin/ /tshul khrims ngan pa thams cad mkha' 'dra ste/ /gang dag tshul
243a5(dkon brtsegs): bzang de yang de dang 'dra/ /bzod pa gya nom nga yis bshad byas kyang / /de yi rang bzhin na ma yang mthong ba med/ /'di na chos 'ga'ang 'khrug pa yod min yang / /bzod pa de yang rgyal
243a6(dkon brtsegs): bas rab tu bshad/ /nyin mtshan bag yod bya phyir nga yis ni/ /mi nyal dam pa bsngags pa brjod byas te/ /bskal pa brgya snyed brtson 'grus bskyed byas kyang / /'phel bar mi 'gyur
243a7(dkon brtsegs): zad pa yod ma yin/ /bsam gtan rnam thar ting 'dzin gya nom pa'i/ /ji bzhin sgo dag 'gro la bstan byas te/ /'di la chos 'ga'ang zad pa yod min yang / /de dag cha shas phye
243b1(dkon brtsegs): ste rab tu bstan/ /shes rab chos rnams shes par gyis shig ces/ /shes rab lhag mthong blo gros ngas bstan kyang / /rang bzhin rang bzhin med pa nam du yang / /shes par mi nus de
243b2(dkon brtsegs): yang nges par bstan/ /rab dben mchog shes sbyangs la dga' gyis zhes/ /dka' thub ngan pa 'jig rten ngas bshad kyang / /mchog shes yongs su mi 'thob gang yin pa/ /chos de
243b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dir ni dmigs su yod ma yin/ /sems dmyal 'jigs pa nga yis bstan byas te/ /sems can stong phrag du ma skyob byas kyang / /gang dag shi 'phos ngan song drag 'gro ba'i/ /'gro ba de
243b4(dkon brtsegs): dag nam yang yod ma yin/ /gang dag ral gri mda' chen mtshon 'byin pa'i/ /gnod pa byed pa yod pa ma yin te/ /rtog pa'i dbang gis ngan song de dag na/ /lus la 'bab mthong de na
243b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshon cha med/ /sna tshogs yid dga' me tog kha bye zhing / /gser gyi khang mchog 'bar ba yid 'ong ba/ /'di na de la'ang byed pa 'ga' med de/ /de dag rtog pa'i dbang gis bzhag
243b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ /rtog pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten rnam brtags te/ /'du shes 'dzin pas byis pa rnam par bye/ /'dzin dang 'dzin med de yang byung min te/ /yongs su rtogs pa sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin/ /
243b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro don byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed ces/ /spyod mchog khyad par 'phags pa bstan byas kyang / /byang chub nam yang dmigs su yod min te/ /'dod pa gang yin de yang yod ma yin/ /sems
244a1(dkon brtsegs): ni rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam dag cang / /rngul med rngul bral dri ma med par gsungs/ /byis pa yod pa min la rnam rtog pa/ /chags gyur sdang bar 'gyur zhing
244a2(dkon brtsegs): rmongs par 'gyur/ /mnyam gzhag gya nom chos ni thob 'gyur na/ /'dod chags yod min sdang med rmongs pa'ang med/ /'dod chags bral zhing rnam par grol ba'i chos/ /kun gzhir
244a3(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur mya ngan 'das pa thob/ /mkha' 'dra'i chos rnams 'di dag shes gyur na/ /zhing brgya rnams su thogs med 'gro 'gyur zhing / /de dag yid kyang chags pa med 'gyur bas/ /de
244a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir thogs med lam ni bskyed par gyis/ /bskal pa brgya phrag mang por spyad byas shing / /sems can brgya phrag mtha' yas grol byas kyang / /nam yang sems can dmigs su yod
244a5(dkon brtsegs): min zhing / /zad pa'ang yod min mtha' yas gyur pa'ang med/ /ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis 'jig rten na/ /sems can brgya phrag mang po sprul byas te/ /sprul pa de dag thams cad bsad
244a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang / /sgyu ma de dag bsad pa yod min ltar/ /'gro ba 'di kun sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te/ /'di la mtha' ni nam yang dmigs su med/ /gang dag de ltar mtha' yas mos
244a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa| |de dag 'jig rten na ni tshor ba med/ /gang dag rang bzhin med chos 'di shes pa/ /dpa' bo de dag 'jig rten mya ngan 'da'/ /'dod pa'i yon tan spyod kyang chags med cing /
244b1(dkon brtsegs): chags pa rnam spangs sems can 'dul bar byed/ /'di na sems can 'ga' med srog med kyang / /mi dbang rnams ni sems can phan pa mdzad/ /sems can yod ma yin yang don mdzad pa//
244b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag rnams kyi de ni dka' ba che/ /ji ltar chang pa bcangs te byis pa la/ /ston cing lag tu yod ces brjod byas nas/ /de yis chang pa stong pa mthong nas ni/ /byis pa de ni cho nges ngu ba ltar/ /
244b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /sems can tshul la mkhas shing mkhyen pa rnams/ /chos rnams 'di dag gsob gsog mkhyen gyur nas/ /'jig rten dag la dngos po bstan
244b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ston/ /shin tu dga' ba'i bstan pa 'di la ni/ /khyim pa'i rtags spangs rab tu 'byung gyis la/ /'bras bu yod pa'i mchog tu 'gyur gyis zhes/ /thugs rje can gyis de skad bstan pa'ang
244b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ /khyim pa'i rtags spangs rab tu byung gyur nas/ /'bras bu thams cad thob par 'gyur yang ni/ /chos kyi rang bzhin dag la gzhal byas na/ /'bras bu kun med 'bras bu thob pa'ang
244b6(dkon brtsegs): med| |'on kyang 'bras bu thob pa thob gyur pa/ /kye ma mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa yi/ /rgyal bas rigs pa shin tu legs bshad ces/ /de dag ngo mtshar che ba skye bar 'gyur/ /de ltar
244b7(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i chos rnams de dag la/ /'di dag dbang po bsam gtan rnam dag dang / /stobs dang byang chub yan lag zhi ba zhes/ /ming dang tshig stong snyed kyi bstan pa mdzad/ /dbang po
245a1(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' yang ma skyes stobs kyang min/ /byang chub yan lag zhi ba'ang ma skyes te/ /chos 'di gzugs can ma yin gzugs med kyang / /'jig rten dag la
245a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i stobs kyang bshad/ /'gro ba rnams la thob pa ngas bshad pa/ /de kun mtshan ma rnam par spangs pa yin/ /'di na gang dag bdag gis thob sems pa/ /de ni ma thob thob par
245a3(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems byed/ /'jig rten dag na gang dag ngoms med pa/ /de la thob pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin/ /thob dang thob med 'gro la ston mdzad pa/ /gang gis de ltar shes pa de thob yin/
245a4(dkon brtsegs): kun las khyad zhugs 'bras bu thob pa yi/ /sems can de ngas sems can med par bstan/ /de la sems can nam yang dmigs med de/ /sems can med na gang gis 'thob
245a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /zhing dngos gang la sa bon yod min pa/ /de la myu gu skye ba med pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems can nam yang dmigs su med/ /sems can med la thob pa ga la yod/ /sems
245a6(dkon brtsegs): can 'di kun mya ngan 'das pa ste/ /'di la rtsa ba nam yang dmigs su med/ /gang zhig chos tshul 'di la mos gyur pa/ /de ngas lhag med mya ngan 'das par bstan/ /sangs rgyas
