245a7(dkon brtsegs): brgya mang yang dag 'das gyur pa/ /de dag gis kyang sems can kun ma btul/ /gal te sems can 'ga' 'dir byung gyur na/ /de dag nam yang mya ngan 'da' mi 'gyur/ /
245b1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar lam 'di sgrib pa yod min te/ /de la nam yang chags pa yong ma yin/ /gang dag chos nyid 'di la mos gyur pa/ /de dag yid ni sred la chags mi 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das
245b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshigs su bcad pa bsgrubs pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /byang chub
245b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' drug khris ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos
245b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor/ de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dul ba rnam par gtan

245b6(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'khor dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri
245b7(dkon brtsegs): zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi le'u stong phrag brgya pa
246a1(dkon brtsegs): las/ 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu bzhi pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po
246a2(dkon brtsegs): dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA barma dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya Ad+h+yA sha ya san
246a3(dkon brtsegs): tso da na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
246a4(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das wA ra NA si na drang srong lhung ba ri dwags kyi nags na dge slong stong tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
246a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya phal cher dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa/ las kyi sgrib pa bsal ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' kha
246a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig 'du 'dzi la dga' bar gnas shing gnyid la dga' ba dang / las la dga' ba dang / smra ba la dga' ba dang / spras pa la dga' ba dang / spags pas spags par gyur pa dang / rigs pa

246b1(dkon brtsegs): yon tan ma yin pa'i spyod pa 'di lta bu 'di dang ldan par mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams ba 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni

246b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par mgu bar bya ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas byang chub sems
246b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci rigs kyi bu dag/ khyed dge ba'i chos rnams kyis 'phel ba'am/ yongs su nyams par ma gyur tam/ de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
246b6(dkon brtsegs): pa byams pa/ bdag cag ni dge ba'i chos rnams las yongs su nyams te 'phel bar ma gyur to/ /bdag cag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ram mi 'gyur snyam pa'i the tshom gyis
246b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang bdag cag gi sems kun nas dkris shing 'dug go / bdag cag log par ltung ba'i chos can yin nam/ log par ltung ba'i chos can ma yin zhig gu snyam pa'i 'gyod pas kyang
247a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag gi sems kun nas dkris shing 'dug ste/ bdag cag ni dge ba'i chos rnams la yang 'dun pa mi skye'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub
247a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu dag /khyed tshur shog bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

247a6(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das la yan lag lngas yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas gdong
247a7(dkon brtsegs): la mchi ma zag cing mgo ma bteg go / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
247b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /

248a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyags pas myos pa dang / thos pa'i rgyags pas myos pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa la mngon par zhen pa dang / dge slong
248a2(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba gnyis la 'di ltar rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i rgyu dang / mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slong mo ster ba'i khyim gyi gzhi las phrag dog dang / ser sna dang ldan pas 'khrig
248a3(dkon brtsegs): pas skur pas skur te/ chos smra ba'i dge slong de gnyis kyi mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slong mo ster ba'i khyim du gyur pa gang yin pa de dag kyang khyed kyis phye ste/ the tshom skyed
248a4(dkon brtsegs): cing ma dad par byas la/ dge slong chos smra ba de gnyis kyi mi snyan pa mang po dag kyang smras/ sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bcad cing dge ba la sgrib par byas te/

248a6(dkon brtsegs): nyi khrir ni sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag tu skyes so/ /lo brgyad stong du ni sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha bar skyes so/ /khyed de nas shi 'phos nas mi'i lus rnyed pa rnyed
248a7(dkon brtsegs): nas tshe rabs lnga brgyar mig med de/ dmus long du gyur to/ /khyed las kyi sgrib pa de nyid kyis bsgribs nas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dag thams cad du sems brtul ba dang / brjed

249b6(dkon brtsegs): cig gis deng slan chad brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs pa 'di'i slad du/ rgyal srid thob pa'am/ nor thob pa'am/ lus dang srog dang yang ma bsngos na/ bdag cag gis de bzhin

250a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag ni ches drag gi/ de dag ni de lta ma yin no snyam na/ bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal

250b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bslus par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de dag la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu
250b2(dkon brtsegs): dag/ legs so/ /legs so/ /tshig de khyed kyis legs par smras so/ /yang dag par blang ba 'di khyed kyis legs par byas so/ /khyed yang dag par blang ba 'di la gnas na/ las
250b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgrib pa rnam par byang bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
250b4(dkon brtsegs): byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo las kyi sgrib pa sbyang bar 'dod pas ji ltar rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis byas pa de bzhin du yid dam bca'o/ /
250b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci rigs kyi bu 'di dag yi dam 'di yongs su rdzogs
250b6(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid par 'gyur lags sam/ 'on te yongs su gtong bar 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni yi dam 'di lus dang srog gi phyir yang spong
250b7(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg
251a1(dkon brtsegs): pa pa'i gang zag chos du dang ldan na/ lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe ma snad cing ma smas la bde ba yongs su thar par
251a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa/ byang
251a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag chos bzhi dang ldan na/ lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe ma snad cing ma smas la bde bar yongs su thar par 'gyur
251a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gi 'khrul pa la so sor rtog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng ba dang / mdza' bshes kyi khyim
251a5(dkon brtsegs): dang | slong mo ster ba'i khyim la mi lta ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig spong ba ste/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/
251a6(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe ma snad cing ma nyams la bde bar yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /byams pa/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
251a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gang zag chos bzhi dang ldan na/ lnga brgya ba tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe ma snad cing ma smas la bde bar yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos
251b1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyung ba'i sems can yongs su spong ba dang / 'khor mi bsdu ba dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal la brten pa dang / bdag dul ba dang zhib dang zhi gnas kyi sbyor ba la brtson pa ste/ byams
251b2(dkon brtsegs): pa| byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe ma snad cing ma smas la bde bar yongs
251b3(dkon brtsegs): su thar par 'gyur ro/ /byams pa/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe ma
251b4(dkon brtsegs): snad cing ma smas la bde bar yongs su thar par 'gyur bar 'dod pa/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par byed par 'dod pas/ 'du 'dzi la mi dga' ba dang / dgon pa dang / nags
251b5(dkon brtsegs): dang | bas mtha' la gnas pa dang / sems can rig pa med cing mi brtson pa yongs su spang ba dang / bdag gi 'khrul pa la rtog cing gzhan gyi 'khrul pa mi tshol ba dang / mi smra ba
251b6(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par dga' bar bya'o/ /gal te de la sems can gzhan dag la brda sprad par 'dod pa'i sems skyes na/ des zang zing
251b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i sems la gnas te chos kyi sbyin pa byin par bya'o/ /byams pa/ nyi shu po 'di dag ni zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa rnyed pa dang bkur sti mi 'dod par chos kyi sbyin
252a1(dkon brtsegs): pa byin pa gang yin pa de'i phan yon yin te/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba
252a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / blo dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / brtan pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab rjes su rtog
252a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / 'dod chags chung bar 'gyur ba dang / zhe sdang chung bar 'gyur ba dang / gti mug chung bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyis de la glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ba
252a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dgongs par 'gyur ba dang / mi ma yin pa rnams de la bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams de la gzi byin bskyed par 'gyur ba
252a5(dkon brtsegs): dang | mi mdza' ba rnams kyis de la glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / de'i mdza' bshes rnams mi phyed par 'gyur ba dang / tshig btsun par 'gyur ba dang / des mi 'jigs pa
252a6(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ba dang / yid bde ba mang bar 'gyur ba dang / mkhas pas bsngags par 'gyur ba dang / de'i chos kyi sbyin par de yang rjes su dran par bya bar 'os par 'gyur
252a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ byams pa/ nyi shu po de dag ni zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa rnyed pa dang bkur sti yongs su spangs shing / gos dang zas la re ba med par phan pa'i dngos po sngon du 'gro
252b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyis rgyun mi 'chad par yang dang yang du chos kyi sbyin pa byin pa gang yin pa de'i phan yon yin no/ /byams pa/ zang zing med pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la
252b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang phan yon nyi shu yod de/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ de'i spobs pa ma skyes ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i spobs pa skyes pa chud mi za bar 'gyur ba dang / gzungs thob par bya ba'i phyir
252b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i sems drang por 'gyur ba dang / tshegs chung ngus sems can mang po dag gi don byed par 'gyur ba dang / tshegs chung ngus sems can rnams de la gus par byed/ rim gro byed par
252b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / lus kyi sdom pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / ngag gi sdom pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / yid kyi sdom pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa las 'da' bar
252b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / rab tu dga' bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba dang / phas gyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang / de'i gzi brjid sems
252b6(dkon brtsegs): can rigs mthon po dag gis kyang mi bzod na phal pa dag gis lta ci smos pa dang / dbang po zil gyis mi non par 'gyur ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa 'dzin
252b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong thob par 'gyur ba dang / dka' ba spyad pa dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa las yongs su nyams
253a1(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ba dang / dam pa'i chos kun du srung bar 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa myur du non par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
253a2(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad la mthun par gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa/ nyi shu po de dag ni zang zing med pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i phan yon yin no/ /byams pa/ phyi
253a3(dkon brtsegs): ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i zang zing dang bcas pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la ches yi rang bar 'gyur la/ zang zing med pa la ni ma yin te/ shes rab 'chal bar
253a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de dag la ltos/ de dag 'di ltar mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slong mo ster ba'i khyim la brten cing / ji ltar bdag la dad cing bkur stir byed par 'gyur snyam
253a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems de lta bus chos kyi sbyin pa byin par byed de/ de dag gis zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa bor nas/ gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad kyi gsos
253a6(dkon brtsegs): sman dang / yo byad kyi phyir gzhan dag la chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /byams pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi la la zhig la khyi ro'am/ mi ro 'am/ spre'u'i ro yang rung ste/ shi ba/
253a7(dkon brtsegs): rul ba/ mnam po zhig mgul bar btags na/ gtsang spra 'dod pa'i phyir ngo tsha zhing mi dga' la yongs su spong bar byed do/ /de bzhin du de dag zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin
253b1(dkon brtsegs): pas ngo tsha zhing mi dga' bar byed de/ mnog med par shes nas skyo ste 'dor zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi phyir bdag cag la gos dang zas mi sbyin par sems pas na/ bdag
253b2(dkon brtsegs): cag gi chos kyi sbyin pa ni don med pa yin te/ bdag cag ni 'di na don med par mi dga' zhing 'dug go zhes zer nas/ de dag lus brgyan pa ched cher bya ba'i phyir slob ma sdud
253b3(dkon brtsegs): par byed kyi/ sems can bsdu ba ched cher bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin no/ /de dag 'di skad du bdag cag ni snying rje bas 'khor sdud par byed kyi/ bdag cag la ni bsnyen bkur byed pa
253b4(dkon brtsegs): ci yang dgos pa med do/ /bdag cag ni phan pa'i dngos pos sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal
253b5(dkon brtsegs): po'i pho brang dag tu 'gro bar zad do zhes skye bo mang po de dag shes par byed de/ de dag gi sems ni gos dang zas la song bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa/ nga ni sems zang zing dang bcas
253b6(dkon brtsegs): pa la sems can yongs su smin par byed pa zhes mi smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bdag nyid kyang yongs su ma smin na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa lta ci smos te/
253b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas 'di ni thob par sla ba'i ngo bo ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa/ nga ni bsnyen bkur lhur len cing lus kyi bsnyen bkur gyi bde ba'i sbags pas sbags par gyur pa la phan pa'i
254a1(dkon brtsegs): dngos po nyid du mi smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni lus la bde bar bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'khor sdud par byed kyi/ nan tan du bsgrub pa la gnas
254a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa/ nga ni tshul 'chos pa la dgon pa na gnas pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni bsod nams chung du la 'dod pa chung ba zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni kha zas bzang
254a3(dkon brtsegs): po 'dod pa la bsod snyoms pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni gos sdug gu 'dod pa la phyag dar khrod pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang 'dres pa la ma 'dzings pa zhes mi
254a4(dkon brtsegs): smra'o/ /nga ni g.yo sgyu can la sangs rgyas byung ba dang phrad pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni gzhan gyi 'khrul pa tshol ba la rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni khong khro ba mang ba la tshul
254a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni nga rgyal can la mang du thos pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni phyogs 'dzin pa la 'dul ba 'dzin pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni rgod pa la
254a6(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni khyim pa dang 'dres pa la zhal ta byed pa yongs su dag pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni yon gnas dam pa la zang zing med par yongs su gtong ba zhes mi
254a7(dkon brtsegs): smra'o/ /nga ni lan du phan 'dogs su re ba la bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga
254b1(dkon brtsegs): ni ma dad pa mang ba la rab tu byung ba zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni pha rol la shes par byed pa la bslab pa 'dod pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni ma gus pa la chos sbyin pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni 'jig
254b2(dkon brtsegs): rten pa'i gsang sngags la brtson pa la chos la dga' ba zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni stong pa nyid la ma brtson pa la nges par 'byung ba zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni mngon par mi sgrub pa la las mngon
254b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'du byed pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni de mi sgrub pa la byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni dmigs pa can la mngon par rtogs pa zhes mi smra'o//
254b4(dkon brtsegs): nga ni mthu med pa la bzod pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni ma gces pa la bzod pa'i stobs kyi go cha zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags chung ba la tshangs
254b5(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa la gnas pa dka' ba byed pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni sbyor ba la mi gnas pa la ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa la
254b6(dkon brtsegs): log par ltung bar 'gro ba zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni shes rab spyod pa la 'dzings par spyod pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni thabs dang ldan par gyur pa la g.yo sgyu can zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni rnyed pa dang
254b7(dkon brtsegs): bkur sti mi 'dod pa la brdzun du smra ba zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni bar ma dor gnas pa la chos spong ba zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni dam pa'i chos kun srung bar 'dod pa la lus dang srog la chags
255a1(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes mi smra'o/ /nga ni sems zhum pa la nga rgyal med pa zhes mi smra'o/ /byams pa/ g.yo sgyu'i tshig gang dag lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa'
255a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dmu rgod du 'gyur ba dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpas khong du chud par bya zhing / khong du chud nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya ba ni de dag yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
255a3(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci byang chub sems dpa' drug cu po 'di dag nyi tshe las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs
255a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ram/ 'on te gzhan dag kyang bsgribs par 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces
255a5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to/ /byams pa/ lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa' phal cher las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur te/ de dag las byang chub sems dpa' kha cig ni las
255a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgrib pa zad par byed do/ /kha cig ni 'phel bar byed do/ /byams pa/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' drug cu po 'di dag las byang chub sems dpa' nyi shu las kyi sgrib pa chung
255a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing | las kyi sgrib pa phra ba lnga brgya pa tha ma la skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rigs chen po sna tshogs dag tu mkhas pa/ khong bzo ba/ yid
255b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhungs pa/ shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa/ sems mnyen pa/ phan pa'i dngos po phun sum tshogs pa/ snying rje che ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ dge ba mi spyoms pa/ yon
255b2(dkon brtsegs): tan sbed pa/ spyod pa brtan pa dag tu 'gyur ro/ /de dag rigs sna tshogs las rab tu byung nas/ bskal pa grangs med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa
255b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di kun tu srung zhing 'dzin par byed de/ lus dang srog dang yang bsdos nas dgon pa dang / nags khrod dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal bsten cing rnyed pa dang / bkur sti mi 'dod par
255b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ rtag tu brtson cing rab tu brtson la sems can gyi spyod pa la 'jug pa la mkhas pa/ gsang sngags dang bstan bcos la mkhas pa/ mgo smos pas go ba/ lhag mthong la
255b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa/ spobs pa chags pa med pa dag tu 'gyur ro/ /gzungs mi zad pa thob pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor bzhi po dag la chos ston
255b6(dkon brtsegs): cing / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /
255b7(dkon brtsegs): gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang / gtan la dbab
256a1(dkon brtsegs): pa bstan pa'i mdo sde dag la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /der byang chub sems dpa' thabs pa mkhas pa nyi chu po gang yin pa de dag slob dpon gyi lung
256a2(dkon brtsegs): brjod cing / mkhan po'i lung brjod par 'gyur te/ slob dpon che ge mo zhig dang / mkhan po che ge mo zhig las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis kun chub par byas so/ /zhes
256a3(dkon brtsegs): brjod cing skyes bu dam pa de dag gi sems kun nas dkris te 'dug par mi 'gyur ro/ /der byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mi mkhas pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni/
256a4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba spyoms pas gnas shing spobs pas de la mi lta bar skye bo mang po de dag shes par byed de/ de dag gis dam pa'i chos 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di skad du yang 'phya bar
256a5(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ khyed ni rang gi spobs pas chos ston par byed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ni ma yin no/ /chos 'di ni khyed kyis rang dgar byas pa yin no/ /khyed kyis
256a6(dkon brtsegs): chos gang dag bstan pa ni rang bzor gzhung du byas pa yin gyi/ khyed kyis 'di la ni gus par bya ba yang med/ ri mor bya ba yang med do zhes zer te/ der sems can mang po
256a7(dkon brtsegs): dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar byed de/ de skad smras pas skye bo mang po 'dun pa las bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /'di skad du yang dge slong de dag ni sbyin pa la sogs pa zang zing
256b1(dkon brtsegs): kun tu spyod pa yin gyi/ mdo las 'byung ba dang / 'dul ba las 'byung ba'i chos mi ston to/ /'di ni chos ma yin gyi/ 'di la ri mor bya ba ma skyed cig ces zer te/ skyes bu blun po de dag
256b2(dkon brtsegs): gis ni legs par smras pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin par de ltar mi shes so/ /de dag gis bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis dge slong chos 'dzin pa
256b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi chos de spangs pas chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed do/ /chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byas pas log par ltung bar 'gro
256b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos kun du srung bar 'dod pas thabs la mkhas par bya ste/ ci nas sems can mos pa tha dad pa de dag gi
256b5(dkon brtsegs): khong khro ba'i sems mi skye bar kun tu bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
256b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab 'chal ba de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ spobs pa yang tshol la/ spobs pa la
256b7(dkon brtsegs): mog bar yang mi bgyid pa dang / gzungs kyang tshol la/ dge slong chos 'dzin pa rnams kyi chos la yang sun 'byin par bgyid pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper
257a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi na/ mi la la zhig gis chab mig gam/ khron pa'am/ mtsho las chab 'tshal bar 'tshal la/ des der sla tshwa bor te sla tshwa bor nas chab 'tshal bar
257a2(dkon brtsegs): bsams te/ de'i sna'i dbang pos chab de mnams nas bdag nyid kyis nongs par glo bar ma chud de/ 'di ltar kye ma chu 'di ni mnab mo zhes chab la skyon 'dogs par sems so/ /
257a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ de la sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos kyi tshul 'di la spobs pa'i dge slong chos smra ba gang lags pa de dag ni chab mig gam/ khron pa'am/ mtsho ji lta ba de bzhin du blta
257a4(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa' 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams ni ji ltar byis pa'i rang bzhin can gyis chab mig zhig gam/ khron pa'am/
257a5(dkon brtsegs): mtsho'i nang du sla tshwa bor nas chab 'tshal bar 'tshal ba de chab la skyon 'dogs pa bzhin te/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can de dag chos smra ba de dag dang / chos la yang sun 'byin
257a6(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid de/ sun phyung nas kyang de dag nyid las chos kyi ro 'tshal bar sems te/ bdag nyid kyis nongs par glo bar mchud nas/ rna ba'i dbang po skyon dang ldan pas dge slong
257a7(dkon brtsegs): chos 'dzin pa de dag la sting zhing khyad du gsod la/ 'di skad du 'di ltar dge slong chos smra ba 'di dag ni nyes pa mang pos sun phyung ba yin no zhes mchi ste/ dge slong chos smra
257b1(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag gi chos kyi ro la sun 'byin cing 'khrul pa tshol te/ skyo nas 'dor zhing mchi bar sems lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
257b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po byams pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byams pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /ji ltar yang 'khrul pa mi tshol zhing skyon thams cad dang bral ba khyod kyis bshad pa 'di'i dpe
257b3(dkon brtsegs): de legs par smras so/ /byams pa/ gzhan yang rgyu bzhis na spobs pa thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs par rig par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ byams pa/ 'di la spobs pa
257b4(dkon brtsegs): don dang ldan pa yin gyi don dang mi ldan pa ma yin pa dang / chos dang ldan pa yin gyi chos dang mi ldan pa ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa zad par byed pa yin gyi nyon mongs pa 'phel
257b5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa ma yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan dang phan yon ston pa yin gyi/ 'khor ba'i nyes pa 'phel bar byed pa ma yin pa ste/ byams pa/ rgyu bzhi po 'di dag
257b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na spobs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gsungs par rig par bya'o/ /byams pa/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang su yang rung
257b7(dkon brtsegs): ste| rgyu bzhi po 'di dag gi spobs pas spobs pa'am/ spobs par 'gyur yang rung ste/ de la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can dag gis de dag la sangs rgyas su 'du
258a1(dkon brtsegs): shes bskyed par bya zhing / ston par 'du shes bskyed par byas nas dam pa'i chos mnyan par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa/ legs par smras
258a2(dkon brtsegs): pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa/ de la gang zag la sdang ba'i phyir 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin
258a3(dkon brtsegs): no zhes spobs pa bzhi po de dag spong zhing de dag la ma gus pa bskyed par byed pa des ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i spobs pa thams cad spangs pa yin te/ chos spangs nas chos
258a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa/ de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang chos kyis
258a5(dkon brtsegs): phongs par 'gyur ba'i las las yongs su grol bar 'dod pas gang zag la sdang ba'i phyir chos la sdang bar mi bya'o/ /byams pa/ spobs pa bzhi po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas rnams
258a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis spangs pa yin te/ byams pa/ bzhi gang zhe na/ spobs pa don med pa yin gyi/ don dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / chos dang mi ldan pa yin gyi/ chos dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang /
258a7(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa 'phel bar byed pa yin gyi/ nyon mongs pa zad par byed pa ma yin pa dang / 'khor ba'i nyes pa 'phel bar byed pa yin gyi/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan dang /
258b1(dkon brtsegs): phan yon mi ston pa ste/ byams pa/ spobs pa bzhi po de dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis spangs shing ma gnang ba yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems
258b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te 'khor ba 'phel bar bgyid pa'i spobs pa sangs rgyas kyis ma gnang ba lags na/ byang chub kyi yan lag
258b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan 'dogs pa lags par bstan cing 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin
258b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsngags pa yang bka' stsal pa 'di ji lta zhig lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ spobs pa 'di sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa ma lags par mi 'gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das
258b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa phan 'dogs pa
258b6(dkon brtsegs): yin par ngas bstan cing 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa bstan pa gang yin pa de don dang ldan pa yin nam/ 'on te don dang ldan pa ma yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
258b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ yang dag par smra bar smra bar bgyid na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ nyon mongs pa la dga' ba ni don dang ldan
259a1(dkon brtsegs): pa lags shing / chos dang ldan pa lags zhes mchi na yang dag par smra ba smra ba lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis
259a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ nyon mongs pa phan 'dogs par 'gyur bar bstan pa dang / 'khor ba
259a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa ni legs par smras pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa/ don gang la byang
259a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dbang phyug thabs la mkhas pa rnams kyi dbang bya ba dang / gang na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yod pa ma yin pa de ni nyon mongs par
259a5(dkon brtsegs): blta bar mi bya ste/ nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa ma yin no/ /byams pa/ de lta mod kyi nyon mongs pa gzhan dag la phan par mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs
259a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don mi 'gyur ba dang / don dang ldan pa yang ma yin pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu'i rgyur yang mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' lus dang srog dang
259a7(dkon brtsegs): yang bsngo bar bya'i/ nyon mongs pa de'i dbang du 'gro bar ni mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa'i nyon mongs pa bstan pa
259b1(dkon brtsegs): yang gzhan yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs bskyed pa ma yin pa'i sa la chags pa rnams kyi yang gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
259b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang las kyi sgrib pa
259b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du mi bgyid bar 'tshal ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa sbyang bar 'tshal ba dang / ma snad cing ma smras la bde bar yongs su thar par 'tshal pas lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub
259b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la mos par bgyi'o/ /the tshom ma mchis par mang bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan gyi 'khrul pa mi tshol ba dang / phan yon yongs su bzung ba dang / snying po btsal
259b5(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams la the tshom med pa mang bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams
259b6(dkon brtsegs): pa| byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spyod pa rnams kyi spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa/ dper na/ rgyun du zhugs pa ni so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa na
259b7(dkon brtsegs): yang snang la/ byis pa so so'i nyes pa dag gis kyang gos par mi 'gyur te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gang dag gis byis pa so so skye bo rnams log par ltung bar 'gro
260a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug de dag nyid kyis rgyun du zhugs pa log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar
260a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs yongs su rtogs pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spyod pa rnams ni bag chags ma spangs pa'i phyir chags shing sdang la rmongs
260a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur du zin kyang / de dag gis yang gzhan la/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis yang gzhan no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gi bag la nyal ni sems la kun nas dkris shing
260a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa gang gis byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa' sems brtul zhing nges par 'byung ba la mi mkhas pa rnams dang mnyam par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i
260a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro/ /byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab spyod pa rnams ni nyes pa thams cad kyi nang na lci ba byung du zin kyang shes rab kyi stobs kyi rdul du rlog
260a6(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ de'i rgyus log pa ltung bar 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /byams pa /dper na/ me'i phung po 'bar ba la ni shing gi tshogs chen po bsnan na ji lta ji ltar bsnan pa de lta de ltar de phyir zhing
260a7(dkon brtsegs): cher 'bar bar 'gyur gyi / me shi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byams pa/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spyod pa'i shes rab kyi me 'bar ba de la ni nyon mongs pa'i len pa ji lta ji ltar bsnan
260b1(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta de ltar de'i shes rab kyi me 'bar bar 'gyur gyi/ shi zhing zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /byams pa/ de bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spyod
260b2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun par rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol
260b3(dkon brtsegs): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa thob par 'tshal bas chos gang dag ni yongs su
260b4(dkon brtsegs): spang bar bgyi/ chos gang dag ni kun tu bstan par bgyi/ chos gang dag yongs su spong zhing kun tu bstan par bgyid na/ shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa ma skyes pa ni skye bar 'gyur la/
260b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa yang rnam par 'phel zhing yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa
260b6(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pas khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba dang / shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa dang / rnyed pa
260b7(dkon brtsegs): dang bkur sti yongs su spang pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i nyes pa mthong bar bya'o/ /'du 'dzi la dga' ba yongs su spang ba dang / 'du 'dzi la dga' ba'i nyes pa mthong bar bya'o/ /smra
261a1(dkon brtsegs): ba la dga' ba yongs su spang pa dang / smra ba la dga' ba'i nyes pa mthong bar bya'o/ /gnyid la dga' ba yongs su spang ba dang / gnyid la dga' ba'i nyes pa
261a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar bya'o/ /las la dga' ba yongs su spang ba dang / las la dga' ba'i nyes pa mthong bar bya'o/ /spros pa la dga' ba yongs su spang ba dang / spros pa la dga' ba'i nyes pa
261a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa yongs su spang ba des ni 'dod pa chung ba bsgom par bya'o/ /'du 'dzi la dga' ba yongs su spangs pas ni gcig pur
261a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba yongs su bsten par bya'o/ /smra ba la dga' ba yongs su spang bas ni don la rtog pa kun tu bsten par bya'o/ /gnyid la dga' ba yongs su spangs pas ni nam gyi cha stod dang /
261a5(dkon brtsegs): nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal ba kun tu bsten par bya'o/ /las la dga' ba yongs su spangs pas ni sems can thams cad la byams pa kun du bsten par bya'o/ /byams pa/ las dang po
261a6(dkon brtsegs): p a'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa rjes su thob par 'dod pas yongs su spang bar bya ba'i chos rnams ni yongs su spang
261a7(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o/ /kun tu bsten par bya ba'i chos rnams ni kun tu bsten par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa/ ye shes kyang rkyen la rag las pa yin la/ mi shes pa yang rkyen la
261b1(dkon brtsegs): rag las pa yin te/ de ni rkyen ma tshogs par thob par sla ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// //bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems
261b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpas rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i skyon ji ltar mthong bar bgyi/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i nongs dmigs
261b3(dkon brtsegs): ni gang lags/ byang chub sems dpas gang dag la brtags na 'dod pa chung du la dga' zhing yongs su mi gdung bar 'gyur ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ byang chub sems
261b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni 'dod chags bskyed pa yin par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni dran pa 'joms par byed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed
261b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bkur sti ni rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pas khengs pa dang 'dud par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni gti mug bskyed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni bdag gi
261b6(dkon brtsegs): don bsgrub pas khyim la ser sna byed pa dang / chags par byed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni g.yo bskyed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni 'phags pa'i
261b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs bzhi yongs su spong pas ngo tsha med pa dang / khrel med pa bskyed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma gnang bar brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa
262a1(dkon brtsegs): dang bkur sti ni nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa bskyed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni bla ma rnams la khyad du gsod par brtag
262a2(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni bdud kyi phyogs su brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni gcig tu bag med pa'i rtsa ba yin par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni
262a3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phrog par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni glog dang / 'khor lo dang / lce 'bab pa lta bur brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni spags pa mang pos
262a4(dkon brtsegs): spags par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slong mo ster ba'i khyim la blta bar brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni yid mi bde ba bskyed
262a5(dkon brtsegs): par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni blo rnam par 'khrul par byed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni sdug pa'i dngos po 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir mya ngan
262a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi brjed par byed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni dkar po'i chos nyam chung bar byed
262a7(dkon brtsegs): par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su nyams par byed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni pha rol gyi dad pa'i bar chad byed
262b1(dkon brtsegs): par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni rdzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa nyams par byed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni sngar bkur sti byed la phyis bkur sti mi byed par
262b2(dkon brtsegs): brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni mi mdza' ba dag dang gnas par byed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni mdza' bo spong bar brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur
262b3(dkon brtsegs): sti ni pha rol 'drid pa'i phyir smad 'tshong ma dang 'dra bar brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa yongs su spong bar brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa
262b4(dkon brtsegs): dang bkur sti ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ltung bar byed par brtag par bya'o/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni lhas byin dang /
262b5(dkon brtsegs): lhag spyod kyi go cha dang mthun par brtag par bya'o/ /byams pa/ byang chub sems dpas rnyed pa dang bkur sti la nyes dmigs gang dag brtag par bya ba ni 'di lta bu 'di dag go /
262b6(dkon brtsegs): brtags nas kyang 'dod pa chung bar bya'i/ /yongs su gdung bar ni mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa chung ba la skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag med
262b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir te/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bar chad med pa yin/ khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dag yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ lha dang mi rnams yongs su dag par bya ba'i
263a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir gnas pas rjes su bsrung bar 'os pa yin/ ngan 'gro log par ltung ba thams cad kyis skrag pa med pa yin/ sdig pa dang bral bas zil gyis
263a2(dkon brtsegs): mi non pa yin/ bdud kyi yul las yongs su grol bas mi 'phrog pa yin/ sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa yin/ lha dang mi rnams kyi mngon par 'dod par bya ba yin/
263a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan la goms par byed par gnas pas gsal ba yin/ g.yo dang sgyu spangs pa dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la skyon du lta bas bag yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i rigs
263a4(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pas ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa yin/ mkhas pa rnams dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis 'dod pa yin te/ byams pa/ phan yon 'di lta bu 'di dag
263a5(dkon brtsegs): shes nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mkhas pa rnyed pa dang bkur sti yongs su spangs pas/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad spangs pa'i phyir/ lhag pa'i
263a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam pas 'dod pa chung ba la gnas par bya zhing 'dod pa chung ba la kun tu bsten par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems
263a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du 'dzi la dga' ba'i skyon rnams ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ 'du 'dzi la dga' ba'i
263b1(dkon brtsegs): skyon de dag ni gang lags/ byang chub sems dpas gang dag la brtags na gcig pur dga' ba la dga' zhing yongs su skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
263b2(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'du 'dzi'i nyes dmigs ni nyi shu po 'di dag yin te/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa/ 'di la lus kyis ma bsdams pa yin/ ngag gis ma bsdams pa yin/ yid kyis
263b3(dkon brtsegs): ma bsdams pa yin/ 'dod chags che ba yin/ zhe sdang che ba yin/ gti mug che ba yin/ 'jig rten pa'i gtam gyis kyang gos pa yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtam las yongs su
263b4(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa yin/ chos la ma gus pa la brten pa yin/ chos yongs su spangs pa yin/ de la bdud kyis glags rnyed pa yin/ bag med pa la brten pa yin/ bag med pa dang ldan pa yin/ de rtog pa
263b5(dkon brtsegs): dang dpyod pa shas che ba yin/ mang du thos pa las yongs su nyams pa yin/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mi 'thab pa yin/ myur du tshangs par spyod par mi 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas la dga'
263b6(dkon brtsegs): ba las yongs su nyams pa yin/ chos la dga' ba las yongs su nyams pa yin/ dge 'dun la dga' ba las yongs su nyams pa yin te/ byams pa/ nyi shu po de dag ni 'du 'dzi la dga'
263b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nyes dmigs yin par rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpas gang dag la brtags na gcig pur dga' ba la dga' zhing yongs su skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ba yin no/ /de nas
264a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang rab spangs nas/ /rnal 'byor can
264a2(dkon brtsegs): ni 'du 'dzi mi gnas te/ /de ni de la gzhol zhing de la 'bab/ /nyes pa des na dga' bar byed mi 'gyur/ /rgod dang 'gyod dang de bzhin rnam rtog pa/ /'di dag thams cad 'du
264a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzi rnams las byung / /snying po med pa'i 'du 'dzi su byed pa/ /de ni lang long spyod cing ma bsdams yin/ /byis pa dag ni 'jig rten smra la dga'/ /byis pa de dag mchog gi lam
264a4(dkon brtsegs): las nyams/ /zhe sdang 'di la rnam rtog shas kyang che/ /nyes pa des na de la mi chags so/ /rigs pa ma yin smra la dga' bskyed nas/ /dge slong thos pa rnam par 'phel mi byed/ /
264a5(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas ni mi rigs smra spongs la/ /chos la gcig tu dga' ba thob par gyis/ /byang chub mngon par 'dod phyir nga yis ni/ /rang gi yan lag lan stong snyed du btang / /chos
264a6(dkon brtsegs): nyan pas ni nga la ngoms med na/ /de dag chos nyan pa na skyo bar 'gyur/ /tshig bzhi pa yi tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir/ /nga ni chung ma bu la dga' ma gyur/ /rgyal srid dag dang longs
264a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod ngas spangs na/ /mkhas pa ji ltar chos ni nyan mi byed/ /rigs min smra dang dam pa min smra ba/ /rnam pa kun tu yongs su spang bar bya/ /bskal pa brgya phrag du mar gang
264b1(dkon brtsegs): dkon pa/ /chos kyi dam pa de la dga' bskyed cing / /thar par 'dod pa yon tan don gnyer bas/ 'jig rten bya ba yongs su btsal mi bya/ /gang zhig zas dang gos kyi don tsam
264b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod/ /de ni mchog dang gtso bor bsngags pa yin/ /gang zhig 'dri zhing dge slong legs par 'ongs/ /stan yang gding gi tshur shog 'dug par gyis/ /mi yi rnyed pa rab
264b3(dkon brtsegs): dkon rnyed gyur gyi/ /gcig la gcig ni chos kyi gtam yang bya/ /lung nod kha ton bya dang bsam gtan rnams/ /khyod kyi dkar po'i phyogs rnams 'phel gyur tam/ /gal te
264b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni 'dod na dri bar gyis/ /khyod la'ang bdag 'dri skabs ni dbye bar gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan yongs 'das nas/ /bstan pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba na/ /
264b5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag ni rgod cing khengs pa dang / /dgon pa bor nas 'du 'dzir dga' bar 'gyur/ /rnyed pa dang ni de bzhin zas ched du/ /nyin dang mtshan rnams su yang gtam byed la/ /
264b6(dkon brtsegs): byis pa dag ni gnyid log gyur na yang / /lo tog skye ba'i rmi lam rmi bar 'gyur/ /byis pa 'di kun shes pa rab tu nyams/ /ngan song ngan 'gro gsum du gzhol 'gyur gyi/ /
264b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang ni mos pa bskyed nas kyang / /bse ru lta bur rtag tu nags gnas kyi/ /yon tan 'dod pa nags na gnas pa yis/ /pha rol dag gi skyon la brtag mi bya/ /bdag
265a1(dkon brtsegs): ni khyad par 'phags shing bdag mchog ces/ /de snyam du ni sems bskyed mi bya'o/ /rgyags 'di bag med kun gyi rtsa ba ste/ /dge slong dman la brnyas
265a2(dkon brtsegs): par yongs mi bya/ /bskal pa gcig gis thar pa thob mi 'gyur/ /'di ni bstan pa 'di ni go rim bzhin/ /de ltas dge slong yon tan 'dod gyur ba/ /dpa' bos mi rigs brjod
265a3(dkon brtsegs): pa spangs nas kyang / /dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ba yis/ /bse ru lta bur dgon par gnas par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
265a4(dkon brtsegs): po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar dkar po'i chos yongs su spong ba'i slad du 'du 'dzi nongs pa mang po'i skyon chags shing yon tan ma mchis
265a5(dkon brtsegs): la gnod pa dang ldan te/ 'du 'dzis nyon mongs pa 'phel bar bgyid cing / spyod pa bzang po ma lags pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' mkhas
265a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dge ba 'tshal ba su zhig gcig pur dga' ba la mngon par dga' bar mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpas smra ba la dga' ba'i skyon rnams ji ltar brtag
265a7(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpas gang rtogs na don rnam par nges pa la dga' zhing don la rtogs pa yongs su gdung bar yang mi 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol
265b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas smra ba la dga' ba'i nyes
265b2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs nyi shu yod par brtag par bya'o/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa/ 'di la dge slong smra ba la dga' ba ni mang du thos pas rgyags shing dregs pas gus pa med par 'gyur ba dang /
265b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsod pa'i smra ba lhur len pas phyogs la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba dang / nang du tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang bral bas dran pa brjed par 'gyur ba dang / lus dang sems shin tu ma
265b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs pas shes bzhin med par spyod par 'gyur ba dang / chos la bzod pa las nyams pas khengs pa dang 'dud par 'gyur ba dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongs su spangs pas
265b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi rgyud dmu rgod du 'gyur ba dang / smra ba'i spags pas spags pas dus ma yin par smra bar 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i shes pa ma thob pas ma bsdams par 'gyur ba
265b6(dkon brtsegs): dang | lha dang klu rnams kyis mi bkur bar 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa rnams kyis brnyes par 'gyur ba dang / lus mngon sum du gyur pa rnams kyis spyo bar 'gyur
265b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bsgrub pa la mi gnas pas yid la gcags par 'gyur ba dang / the tshom ma spangs pas rab tu mi brtan par 'gyur ba dang / sgra lhur len pas thos pa dang bye brag phyed pa nyams par
266a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul can yin pas 'dod pa'i yon tan la chags par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog par
266a2(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pas myur du chos spong bar byed pa dang / gzhan dang gzhan rtsom pas mi brtan zhing rten med par 'gyur ba dang / sems yongs su ma dul bas bkur sti med par thob par 'gyur
266a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / chos kyi dbyings khong du ma chud pas gzhan gyi dring 'jog par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams yongs su ma shes pas nyon mongs pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa/ nyi shu po
266a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' smra ba la dga' zhing sgra lhur len la don la rtog pa dang bral ba'i nyes dmigs yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di
266a5(dkon brtsegs): dag bka' stsal to/ /thos pas rgyags nas gus par mi 'gyur te/ /rnam par 'gyed pa'i smra ba rnams la chags/ /brjed par 'gyur zhing shes bzhin med par 'gyur/ /smra la
266a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go / nang gi sems las shin tu ring bar 'gyur/ /lus dang sems kyang rab sbyangs ma yin 'gyur/ /khengs pa dang ni 'dud pa mang bar 'gyur/ /smra
266a7(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go / byis pa dam pa'i chos bsam rab tu nyams/ /sems ni mi mnyen shin tu rtsub par 'gyur/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong dag dang rab tu ring / /smra la
266b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go / rtag tu bla ma dag la gus pa med/ /spags pa'i gtam dag la ni dga' ba bskyed/ /snying po med la gnas shing shes rab nyams/ /smra la dga' ba'i
266b2(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa 'di dag go / de ni lha tshogs rnams kyis mi bkur zhing / /de tshe de la'ang 'dod pa mi bskyed la/ /so so yang dag rig las nyams 'gyur te/ /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go /
266b3(dkon brtsegs): gang dag lus ni mngon sum bag yod pa/ /mkhas pa de dag gis ni spyo bar 'gyur/ /de yi srog ni don med 'gyur ba ste/ /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go /bdag ni sgrub nyams da
266b4(dkon brtsegs): ni ci bya zhes/ /'chi ba'i dus tshe byis pa mya ngan byed/ /gting rnyed ma gyur shin tu sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go /rtswa bskyod bzhin du 'gul zhing g.yo ba ste/ /de
266b5(dkon brtsegs): ni de ltar the tshom 'gyur du nges/ /de ni nam yang blo brtan mi 'gyur te/ /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go /gar la lta ba'i khrod na 'dug pa zhig /dpa' bo gzhan gyi yon tan brjod
266b6(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin/ /bdag nyid nan tan nyams par 'gyur ba ste/ /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go /de yi sems ni rna ba'i rnam shes la/ /rab tu chags shing sgras rgyags shes rab
266b7(dkon brtsegs): nyams/ /log par sems shing lam ngan 'gro bar 'gyur/ /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go /de ni g.yo ldan yang zhing re chad 'gyur/ /phyi phyir zhing ni rnam par 'gyed par rtsom/ /
267a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa rnams kyi chos las rab tu ring / /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go /mthu chung bsti stang gis ni dgar 'gyur te/ /mi shes ldan pa g.yo
267a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'gyur ba yin/ /spre'u ltar de yi sems ni g.yo bar 'gyur/ /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go /rang gi blo ni shes pas dman pa'i phyir/ /rmongs pa de ni gzhan gyi dring la
267a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jog / de ni nyon mongs phyogs kyi dbang du 'gro /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go /mig kyang 'khrul cing de bzhin rna ba'ang 'khrul/ /sna yang 'khrul cing de bzhin lce yang
267a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul/ /lus kyang 'khrul cing yid kyang 'khrul bar 'gyur/ /smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go /yun ring dus nas smra la dga' bas na/ /de ni bdag nyid dga' ba mi thob bo/ /
267a5(dkon brtsegs): tshig gang dga' ba mtha' yas thob 'gyur ba/ /tshig gcig tsam zhig bsam pa mchog yin no/ /bu ram shing shun snying po ci yang med/ /dga' bar bya ba'i ro ni nang na 'dug /shun
267a6(dkon brtsegs): pa zos pas mis ni bu ram ro/ /zhim po rnyed par nus pa ma yin no/ /ji ltar shun pa de bzhin smra ba ste/ /ro lta bu ni 'di la don sems yin/ /de lta bas na smra la dga' spongs te/ /
267a7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu bag yod byos la don sems shig /smra ba'i nyes pa 'di 'dra rtogs 'gyur zhing / /don gyi yon tan mchog 'di shes nas ni/ /'di ni byang chub mkhas pa gang yin pa/ /des
267b1(dkon brtsegs): ni don bsam pa la dga' bar gyis/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar smra
267b2(dkon brtsegs): ba la dga' ba'i skyon rnams dang / don la sems pa'i yon tan rnams de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
267b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' snying po btsal ba rnams kyis ni don bsam pa btang ste/ snying po ma mchis pa'i smra ba la dga' bar bgyid pa'i rngo mi thogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
267b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen pos gnyid kyi dga' bas dga' ba'i skyon ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ byang chub sems dpas ji ltar brtags na rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyi nongs dmigs mthong nas brtson 'grus
267b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsom zhing yongs su skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'di la gnyid la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs ni rnam pa nyi shur brtag par bya
267b6(dkon brtsegs): ste| byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na brtson 'grus rtsom pa la dga' zhing skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gnyid che
267b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ni rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis non te le lo che bar 'gyur ba dang / lus sha che ba dang / mdog yongs su ma dag pa dang / de'i 'byung ba chen po rnams nad gzhis non par 'gyur ba dang /
268a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i me'i khams chung bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i kha zas legs par 'ju bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de'i lus la 'bras dang phol mig 'byung bar 'gyur
268a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / le lo can du 'gyur ba dang / de'i gti mug gi dra ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur pa dang / de'i shes rab nyam chung bar 'gyur ba dang / de kha zas 'dod pa las yi ga 'chu
268a3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba dang / de gti mug gi mun pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / de la mi ma yin pa rnams bkur sti mi byed pa dang / sems brtul bar 'gyur ba dang / mi ldang ba mang
268a4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems bag la nyal gyis kun nas dkris shing 'dug par 'gyur pa dang / de dge ba'i chos la 'dun par mi 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad las
268a5(dkon brtsegs): nyams par 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa zhum par gyur nas brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams kyi spyod pa la smod pa dang / 'khor gyi nang du song na brnyas par 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa/ nyi shu
268a6(dkon brtsegs): po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyid la dga' zhing rmugs dang / gnyid mang ba'i nyes dmigs yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na brtson 'grus rtsom pa la
268a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing yongs su skyo bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur
268b1(dkon brtsegs): ba| |de yi lus ni sha che mkhregs ma yin/ /le lo de tshe blun zhing mthun mi byed/ /de yi mdog kyang dag par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur pa/ /bad kan
268b2(dkon brtsegs): rlung dang de bzhin mkhris par rnams/ /de dag de yi lus las shas cher 'byung / /de yi khams rnams rab tu 'khrug par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /kha
268b3(dkon brtsegs): zas nyes pas lto ni ma dag cing / /lus kyang lci la zo mdog pa de ma yin/ /de yi tshig kyang gsal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /de yi lus la phol
268b4(dkon brtsegs): mig mang po 'byung / /de ni nyin dang mtshan du bde bar nyal/ /de la rma rnams mi bzad mang bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /le lo byed cing brtson
268b5(dkon brtsegs): 'grus yongs su nyams/ /de ni bde las nyams shing nor rnams 'grib/ /de ni rtag tu zhen cing sems kyang rmongs/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur pa/ /gti mug
268b6(dkon brtsegs): dra ba chen po 'phel 'gyur zhing / /de ni the tshom can de lta ba thob/ /de ni lta bar gyur pa mang bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /de yi shes rab shin tu
268b7(dkon brtsegs): nyam chung 'gyur/ /de yi blo yang yongs su nyams par 'gyur/ /ye shes las ni rtag tu de nyams 'gyur/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /mi shes le lo snyoms las
269a1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab 'chal/ /mi ma yin pa dag gis glags rnyed de/ /nags na gnas pa'i tshe ni 'tshe bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la
269a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' 'gyur ba/ /sems kyang rtul zhing de yi dran pa rmongs/ /lung nod kha ton byed la de mi gnas/ /chos smra na yang de ni rtag tu thogs/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga'
269a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba/ /de yi nyon mongs kun nas ldang bar 'gyur/ /rnam par 'khor zhing g.yo la rmongs pa dang / /de yi sems ni rtag tu gdung bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig rmugs dang
269a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /de yi bya ba mang po nyams shing 'gags/ /lus kyang gdungs shing yid kyang yongs su gdungs/ /bag la nyal ba 'phel bar des mi shes/ /gang
269a5(dkon brtsegs): zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /de ni dge sems rtag tu mi 'dod de/ /de ni chos la 'dun pa skye mi byed/ /phyir zhing chos ma yin la de dga' 'gyur/ /gang zhig
269a6(dkon brtsegs): rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /de ni rmongs shing chos la 'dun pa nyams/ /byis pa yon tan kun nas yongs su nyams/ /dkar po 'joms shing mun par 'gro bar
269a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /'jigs par 'gyur zhing sems kyang rab tu zhum/ /de ni rtag par mchog tu dga' mi 'gyur/ /gnyid kyis
269b1(dkon brtsegs): non pa lus kyang lhod par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /bdag nyid mi shes le lo can gyur nas/ /brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan la phrag dog byed/ /brtson
269b2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus ldan pa rnams la mi snyan smra/ /nyes pa 'di 'dra de dag rtogs gyur nas/ /mkhas pa su zhig rmugs gnyid dga' bar byed/ /shin tu gti mug lta ba mang po'i rgyu/ /don bzang
269b3(dkon brtsegs): dam chos yon tan chud gson pa/ /gnyid 'di brtson 'grus 'phrog par rtogs gyur nas/ /mkhas pa yon tan ldan pa su der dga'/ /sdug bsngal kun dang mun pa sel byed cing / /ngan
269b4(dkon brtsegs): song yongs su spong ba'i gzhir gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'i brtson 'grus 'phags/ /gang yin de ni rtag tu brten pa bgyis/ /'jig rten 'di na bzo gang ci yod dang //
269b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'das bzo gang dag ci yod pa/ /brtson 'grus brtsams la rnyed par mi dka' na/ /mkhas pa su dag brtson 'grus stobs kyis skyo/ /gang dag sangs rgyas byang chub zhugs
269b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa/ /de dag rmugs gnyid skyon rnams mthong nas ni/ /rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la gnas par byed/ /'di ni nga yis de dag bskul byas yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang
269b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyi skyon 'di lta bu 'di
270a1(dkon brtsegs): dag thos nas spong bar mi bgyid cing skyo bar mi bgyid pa de dag dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa mi bskyed pa de dag de tsam du rmongs par 'gyur ba ni ngo
270a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' slob par 'tshal ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
270a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba su zhig yang dag pa'i gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na/ le lo bgyid cing dge ba'i chos rnams bskyed par mi bgyid/ brtson 'grus kyi yon tan
270a4(dkon brtsegs): dang | phan yon 'di lta bu thos na byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du zhig brtson 'grus rtsom par mi bgyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnyid
270a5(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba'i nongs dmigs dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i phan yon 'di dag legs par bka' stsal lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpas las la dga'
270a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'jig rten pa'i spags pas spags pa'i nongs dmigs ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpas gang dag la brtags na 'dod pa chung zhing bgyi ba nyung la/ dam
270a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos btsal ba'i slad du rtag tu brtson zhing sbyor ba la gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
270b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen pos las la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs nyi shur brtag par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na 'dod pa chung zhing bya ba nyung la dam pa'i chos btsal ba'i
270b2(dkon brtsegs): slad du rtag tu brtson zhing skyo ba la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las la dga' ba 'jig rten pa'i las rnams la brtson par
270b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / las ngan pa thams cad la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton la brtson pa dag gis brnyas par 'gyur ba dang / nang du yang dag 'jog la dga' ba
270b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis smad par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i las brtsams par 'gyur ba dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa rnams kyi yon sbyong bar
270b5(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa dang / de'i sems dngos por 'dzin pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / chags pa mang bar 'gyur ba dang / khyim so rnams la rgyun du sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang / dbang byed
270b6(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ba dang / bzlog byed kyi ngang tshul can yid smon mang po la rgyun du gnas pa dang / khyim gyi bya ba dag la brtson pa dang / de ro dag la shas cher 'dun cing chags pa
270b7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang / len pa med par mi dga' ba dang / kun nas mnar sems mang ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rgyun du mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la rton
271a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / de'i zas kyi rnam par rtog pas nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i bya ba dag gi rgyun du 'dri bar byed pa
271a2(dkon brtsegs): dang | mi rigs pa'i smra ba dag la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / zhal ta byed pa'i rgyags pas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dbang phyug gis tshar gcod par byed
271a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / pha rol gyi 'khrul pa la rtog cing bdag gi 'khrul pa la mi rtog par 'gyur ba dang / don dang ldan zhing rnam par nges pa'i gtam dag la skyo nas brnyas par 'gyur ba ste/
271a4(dkon brtsegs): byams pa/ nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' las la dga' zhing zhal te byed pa'i spags pas spags pa'i nyes dmigs yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la
271a5(dkon brtsegs): rtog na 'dod pa chung zhing bya ba nyung bar 'gyur la/ 'jig rten pa'i bya ba spangs nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba la brtson par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
271a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /de ni las ngan dag la gnas 'gyur zhing / /las mchog dag las de ni rgyang yang ring / /'dir ni rnyed pa che las ring bar
271a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /rnam par chags sems nyes pa 'di dag yin/ /dge slong lung nod kha ton dga' rnams kyis/ /de la brnyes zhing 'dod pa mi byed la/ /bsam gtan byed pa rnams
271b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis smad par 'gyur/ /rtag tu las gnas skyon ni 'di dag yin/ /'khor ba'i las la mngon par brtson pa dang / /thar pa las ni rgyang ring bcings par gnas/ /de ni yul 'khor zas
271b2(dkon brtsegs): la mi rigs spyod/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa yin/ /rtag tu dngos po dag ni len par byed/ /yongs su 'dzin pa la ni dga' mi bskyed/ /nor med nor ni don du gnyer bar
271b3(dkon brtsegs): byed| |nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'i yin/ /khyim du rgyu ba dag ni chags par 'gyur/ /'du 'dzin dga' bas thams cad 'jig par byed/ /gzeb kyi nang du bya bcug bzhin
271b4(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyur/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'i yin/ /khyim pa'i las la de rtag mya ngan byed/ /yongs su gdungs par gyur kyang yid mi 'byung / /nam yang tshig ni btsun par mi
271b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ /nyes pa 'di dag las dga' ba'i yin/ /bla mas bskul na dga' blo mi bde zhing / /rjes su bstan pa mthun par 'dzin mi byed/ /de ni myur du tshul khrims nyams
271b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/ /khyim na gnas pa'i las rnams rtag sems pas/ /de ni rtag tu 'dod par 'gyur ba ste/ /bsam gtan dang ni spong ba de mi
271b7(dkon brtsegs): byed| |nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/ /de yi 'dod chags shas ni che bar skye/ /de ni ro bro rnams la chags shing zhe na/ /de ni ngan ngon tsam gyis dga' mi 'gyur/ /nyes
272a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/ /de ni 'khor mang phal cher dgar 'gyur te/ /de nyams na ni shin tu sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /de ni bong bu bzhin du lang
272a2(dkon brtsegs): long 'gyur/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/ /de sems rtag tu gnod sems ldan par 'gyur/ /las rnams 'phel zhing zad par mi 'gyur te/ /sred pa'i 'khri shing
272a3(dkon brtsegs): dag gis dam du bcings/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/ /de ni rtag tu bla ma rnams mi bsten/ /phyogs 'dod khyim pa la ni sten par byed/ /tshul khrims gnas pa
272a4(dkon brtsegs): dag la'ang phrag dog byed/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/ /nyin dang mtshan du sems gzhan med par ni/ /zas dang gos la rgyun du sems par byed/ /de ni rtag tu
272a5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan 'dod ma yin/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/ /de ni 'jig rten pa yi bya ba 'dri/ /rigs pa min pa'i smra ba rnams la dga'/ /rigs pa'i smra la de ni
272a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' mi 'gyur/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/ /sdom brtson rnams la de ni rtag tu gshe/ dbang phyug nyes pas de dag nges tshar gcod/ /mi sdug las rnams
272a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du byed de/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/ /de ni rtag tu gzhan gyi skyon rtog cing / /bdag la yod pa'i skyon rnams mi mthong la/ /yon tan ldan pa
272b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la 'khrul pa tshol/ /nyes pa 'di dag las dga' ba'i yin/ /byis pa de ni gzhan gyis myur du brnyas/ /de ni pha rol dag la chos ston tshe/ /blo nyams pas na mngon par shes
272b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ /nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/ /gnod 'gyur nyes pa 'di dag mthong nas ni/ /las ngan dag la su zhig dga' bar byed/ /dpa' bo dag ni rtag tu las mchog
272b3(dkon brtsegs): byed| |byis pa gang yin chud ni gson mi byed/ /lan stong brjod kyang tshig gcig mi 'dzin pa/ /de ni blo can dag gis spyo ba yin/ /gang zhig las ngan dag ni byed pa la/ /dam pa dag gis
272b4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar rtag tu smad/ /de lta bas na mkhas mis de rtag tu/ /las ngan dag ni rnam par spangs nas kyang / /thub dbang rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags pa yi/ /bzang po'i las rnams
272b5(dkon brtsegs): gang yin de dag bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'
272b6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas las ngan pa rtsom pa de dag ni shes rab shin tu chung zhing shes rab kyis dman par 'gyur ba lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang /
272b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa/ de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin
273a1(dkon brtsegs): t e| byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas las ngan pa rtsom pa de dag ni shes rab shin tu chung zhing shes rab kyis dman
273a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba yin no/ /byams pa/ gzhan yang khyod mos par bya'o/ /byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la sbyor ba med cing bsam gtan med la/ spong ba med cing 'don pa
273a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / mang du thos pa yongs su tshol ba med pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba ma yin no/ /byams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni bsam
273a4(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang spong bas phye ba dang / ye shes kyis 'dus byas pa dang / ye shes kyis mnyam par bzhag pa dang / brtson pas phye ba yin gyi/ khyim pa'i las dang / zhal ta byed pas phye ba ni
273a5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin te/ 'di ltar zhal ta byed pa'i las de ni mi rigs pa la sbyor ba rnams dang / 'du byed la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i bya bas spags pa ste/ byang chub sems
273a6(dkon brtsegs): dpas de la 'dod pa bskyed par mi bya'o/ /byams pa/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pa rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen
273a7(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bkang na des ni nga mnyes par byas pa ma yin/ ri mor byas pa ma yin/ bkur sti byas pa ma yin gyi/ byams pa/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' tha na pha
273b1(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ 'chad pa des ni nga la bkur stir byas/ bla mar
273b2(dkon brtsegs): byas| ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni mang du thos pa las byung ba yin gyi/ dngos por yongs
273b3(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin pa las byung ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa la
273b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa/ zhal ta byed pa'i spags pas spags par byed na bsod nams 'dod pa des ni bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po chen po bskyed par 'gyur te/ las kyi sgrib pa yang yongs
273b5(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi gsum po gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni shes rab las byung ba'i phyir ro/ /byams pa/ de lta bas na byang
273b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' zhal te byed pa la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang kha ton byed pa la brtson pa'i bar chad mi bya'o/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'di zhal ta byed pas yongs
273b7(dkon brtsegs): su gang bar 'gyur ba'i zhal ta byed pa de dag thams cad kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa la brtson pa gcig la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /
274a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa la brtson pa 'dzam bu gling gang ba snyed kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' nang du yang dag 'jog
274a2(dkon brtsegs): la brtson pa gcig la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /de ltar byas na de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su yi rang ba dang gnang ba yin te/ de dag ni bsnyen bkur ni legs par byas
274a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ /gang zhig shes rab spyod pa la mos nas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni tshad med par skyes par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
274a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar shes rab kyi las de ni dka' ba'i las dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags shing mngon par
274a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par brtson pa don du gnyer zhing / brtson 'grus rtsom par 'dod pas shes rab la brtson par
274a6(dkon brtsegs): bya zhing / shes rab yongs su btsal ba la brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad
274a7(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du 'dzi la dga' ba dang / las la dga' ba rnams kyi nongs dmigs rnams ni bka' stsal lags na/ bcom
274b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpas spros pa la dga' ba'i nongs dmigs rnams ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpas gang dag la brtags na nye bar zhi ba la gnas
274b2(dkon brtsegs): shing rtsod pa ma mchis par gnas par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpas spros pa la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs rnams mdor bsdu
274b3(dkon brtsegs): na nyi shu po 'di dag tu brtag par bya'o/ /rgyas par ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtha' yas par bstan te mthar thug par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa/ byang chub
274b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' spros pa la dga' ba tshe 'di nyid la sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba mang bar gnas pa dang / bzod pa las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba dang / de'i mi mdza' ba rnams
274b5(dkon brtsegs): yi rang bar 'gyur ba dang / de la bdud kyang mgu bar 'gyur ba dang / de la bdud kyi 'khor kyang dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skye ba mi 'gyur ba dang /
274b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa rnams med par 'gyur ba dang / 'thab pa dang 'khon du 'dzin pa dang 'gyed pa mang bar 'gyur ba dang / 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i
274b7(dkon brtsegs): las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ba dang / bag med par 'gyur ba'i lam rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / de'i lce'i dbang po rtsub par 'gyur ba dang / de'i lung mnos pa'i
275a1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams legs par gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang / mdo sde lung ma mnos pa rnams rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
275a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis yongs su spang bar 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po rnams dang myur du phrad par 'gyur ba dang / dka' ba'i lam gyis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
275a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyun mi 'chad par yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig thos par 'gyur ba dang / gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der the tshom du 'gyur ba dang / de la mi khom pa brgyad po de dag nye bar 'gyur
275a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rtag tu de'i dkar po'i phyogs la brtson pa la bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa/ nyi shu po de dag ni spros pa la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs rnams mdor bsdus
275a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ de dag yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /de ni tshe 'dir bde bar mi 'gyur te/ /bzod dang
275a6(dkon brtsegs): ring zhing khro ba'i phyogs la gnas/ /de yi dgra rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba ste/ /spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go /bdud kyang de la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur/ /bdud kyi
275a7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyang de la dga' bar 'gyur/ /de yi dge ba'i chos skyes chud zar 'gyur/ /spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go /de ni nam yang dge ba mi skyed de/ /'chi kar tha dad rgyu
275b1(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa dang / ngan song 'gro ba'i las ni byed par 'gyur/ /spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go /mi mdzes pa dang blta na mi sdug dang / /de ni rtag tu rus rigs dma' bar 'gyur//
275b2(dkon brtsegs): de yi lce yi dbang po rtsub 'gyur te/ /spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go /lung mnos chos rnams legs par mi gnas shing / /lung mnos ma byas mdo sde thos mi 'gyur/ /dge
275b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang rnam par spong / /spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go /sdig pa'i grogs po dag dang phrad par 'gyur/ /dka' ba'i theg pas rnam par dga' 'gyur
275b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing | |mi 'dod pa yi tshig rnams rgyun du thos/ /spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go /byis pa'i blo can de ni gar skyes der/ /yin nam ma yin snyam du de rtog cing / /rtag tu des ni the
275b5(dkon brtsegs): tshom rnyed par 'gyur/ /spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go /de ni mi khom brgyad dang ring mi 'gyur/ /de ni dal ba ldan zhing mchog mi 'gyur/ /de la 'dod pa 'di dag rtag 'byung
275b6(dkon brtsegs): ste| |spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go / de yi dge ba dag la bar chad mang / /bgegs su 'gyur bas myur du 'thob mi 'gyur/ /brtson dang ldan yang de la dgra rnams 'byung / /
275b7(dkon brtsegs): spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go /mkhas pas nyes 'di yang dag rig nas ni/ /spros pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya/ /spros spyod dag ni gnod pa rnyed pa sla/ /de lta bas na spros
276a1(dkon brtsegs): la dga' mi bya/ /gang na spros pa'am rtsod pa yod pa las/ /dpag tshad brgya yi pha rol 'gro ba mchog /gang na nyon mongs yod pa de dag tu/ /
276a2(dkon brtsegs): yud tsam zhig kyang gnas shing 'dug mi bya/ /rab byung don 'dod yon tan 'dod pa rnams/ /sdang ba'i sems kyis rtsod par ma byed cig /khyed la zhing med zhing las tshong byar
276a3(dkon brtsegs): med| |gang la nor phyir 'di dag 'byung bar spros/ /khyed la chung ma bu dang bu mo med/ /khyim dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyang yod ma yin/ /bran pho bran mo med cing dbang phyug med/ /rab
276a4(dkon brtsegs): tu byung nas rtsod par ma byed cig / zhi zhing rab tu zhi bas bsten pa yi/ /ngur smrig gos rnams dad pas blangs nas ni/ /zhi zhing rab zhi nye bar zhi bar byos/ /spros pa rnam par
276a5(dkon brtsegs): spongs la bzod pa bskyed/ /mi bzad sems ni sbrul gdug 'dra ba srungs/ /spros la spyod pa sems can dmyal ba dang / /dud 'gro gshin rje'i yul dang mi ring 'gyur/ /de
276a6(dkon brtsegs): lta bas na bzod dang brtson 'grus bskyed/ /tshogs pa gcig phyir spros par byed na ni/ /sdug bsngal gsod dang 'ching ba ci yang rung / /go rar brdeg dang bsdigs pa de
276a7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni/ /'jig rten 'di na gnas pa rnams la 'byung / /tshogs par gyur la nyes pa 'di dag dkon/ /tshogs gyur bag la nyal la 'phel ba med/ /tshogs gyur rnams la
276b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar 'byung 'gyur na/ /mkhas pa su zhig tshogs pa bskyed mi byed/ /glags tshol dag gis skyon rnams rnyed mi 'gyur/ /nam yang 'khor rnams phyed par mi 'gyur te/ /de yi mdza'
276b2(dkon brtsegs): bshes dag kyang rgyun du 'byung / /spros pa spangs pa'i phan yon 'di dag yin/ /theg pa'i stobs 'di yis ni dag 'gyur zhing / /las kyi sgrib pa ma lus byang nas ni/ /stobs dang bcas
276b3(dkon brtsegs): shing bzhon bcas bdud thul cig / brtan pa gang yin des ni bzod pa bskyed/ /spros pa rgyas pa la ni skyon mang chags/ /nyes pa de dag ngas ni bstan mi nus/ /rtag tu spros med bsngags
276b4(dkon brtsegs): pa mtha' yas 'gyur/ /su zhig don gnyer des ni bzod pa bskyed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
276b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ kun nas nyon mongs pa de tsam du gleng ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs te ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub
276b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyis tshig gi mchog 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na skyo bar 'gyur zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa yang spong bar 'gyur lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/
276b7(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams tshig gi mchog 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na skyo bar 'gyur zhing / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa lang
277a1(dkon brtsegs): spong bar 'gyur ba 'byung ba de dag ni nyung ngo / /byams pa/ gang dag sems kyi rgyud khengs par 'gyur zhing gus pa med pa dang / mngon
277a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nga rgyal la gnas pa dang / gcig la gcig the tshom za ba mang bdag ni phal che/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde zab mo bstan pa'i yon tan dang /
277a3(dkon brtsegs): phan yon zab pa dag lung nod par mi byed/ kha ton du mi byed/ 'chang bar mi byed/ kun chub par mi byed de/ /de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa de shas ches pas yon tan de dag
277a4(dkon brtsegs): dang | phan yon de dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de dag dad pa med pa des mdo sde de dag la the tshom za bar 'gyur te/ phyis kyang lung nod par mi byed/ 'chang bar mi
277a5(dkon brtsegs): byed| kun chub par mi byed de/ de dag gi drung du bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha lugs su 'dug nas 'di skad du/ mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa yin te/ 'di dag
277a6(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mdo sde 'di dag las yon tan dang / phan yon bshad pa gang yin pa de dag khyed kyi 'di las mi 'byung zhing
277a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir ro zhes mos pa bzlog par byed do/ /de dag de ltar mos pa bzlog pas mdo sde zab mo dag mi 'dod cing the tshom du 'gyur te/ lung nod par mi byed/ kha ton du mi byed de/
277b1(dkon brtsegs): mi blun po de dag gis yon tan de dag thos na/ 'di ltar chos spong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa ni sbyang bar mi nus so snyam du shes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang
277b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi yon tan de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
277b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang lags pa 'di dag las gang gis sems bskyed pa gang yang rung ba zhig yid la bgyid cing / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med yid la bgyid pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing der
