277b4(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems bskyed pa de dag gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
277b5(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa/ sems bskyed pa gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye
277b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur bar byed pa de dag ni byis pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin/ skyed bu dam pa ma yin pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin te/ byams
277b7(dkon brtsegs): pa| sems bskyed pa ni bcu po 'di dag yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ byams pa/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la zhe 'gras pas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag
278a1(dkon brtsegs): med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar mi nus te/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / 'tshe ba yongs su spangs te sems can
278a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la snying rje'i sems bskyed pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / zab mo'i bzod pa la nges par gyur pas dam pa'i
278a3(dkon brtsegs): chos la mngon par zhen pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur stis ma gos pas bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / brjed pa med pas thams cad
278a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid la rin po cher sems bskyed pa dang / zhum pa med pas sems can thams cad la bla ma bzhin du gus pa bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag la nges pas nyi tshe
278a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bsam gtan gyi ro myang bar mi bya ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / ma 'dres pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sems bskyed pa dang / mtshan ma yongs su spangs te sangs
278a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/ byams pa/ sems bskyed pa bcu po ni de dag yin te/ sems bskyed pa bcu po de dag las sems bskyed pa gang yang
278a7(dkon brtsegs): rung ba'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni sems bskyed pa de dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
278b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni ngo mtshar lags
278b2(dkon brtsegs): so| |de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ kun dga' bo/ legs so/ /legs so/ /kun dga' bo/ de'i
278b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir khyod kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung zhig / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
278b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs
278b5(dkon brtsegs): te| bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ lhag pa'i bsam pa
278b6(dkon brtsegs): bskul ba zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la
278b7(dkon brtsegs): sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / //rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su bA hu pa ri br-its+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag bzang gis
279a1(dkon brtsegs): zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis
279a2(dkon brtsegs): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe byang
279a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzang zhes bya ba g.yog dang bcas te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas ga la
279a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs
279a5(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzang gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
279a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
279a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzang la 'di skad ces bka'
279b1(dkon brtsegs): stsal to/ /lag bzang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos myur du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag rtag par rgyun
279b2(dkon brtsegs): du yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
279b3(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ lag bzang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol
279b4(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag rtag par rgyun du yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /lag bzang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
279b5(dkon brtsegs): par byed ce na/ lag bzang / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos kyis longs spyod pa rnams yongs su tshol gyi/ chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no/ /mnyam pa
279b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid yin gyi mi mnyam pas ni ma yin no/ /de srog chags gzhan dag dang / sems can gzhan rnams la gnod pa mi byed/ nyam nga ba mi byed par sbyin pa byin te/ brjod pa dang sgra
279b7(dkon brtsegs): dang tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'dzem pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'jigs pa'i phyir ma yin/ lan du phan 'dogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin/ mtho ris kyi phyir ma yin/ tshul 'chos
280a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin/ kha gsag byed pa ma yin/ brnyas pa ma yin no/ /sbyin gnas sam sbyin gnas ma yin pa'am/ mngon par grags pa'am mngon par grags pa
280a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am tshul khrims 'chal ba'am/ 'dris pa'am ma 'dris pa'am/ mdza' ba'am mi mdza' ba yang rung ste/ bkur stir byed/ bla mar
280a3(dkon brtsegs): byed| rim gro byed/ mchod par byed cing 'dun pa drag po dang / dga' ba drag po dang / dad pa drag pos de nyung du bdog na'ang rung nyung du sbyin/ mang du bdog na yang mang du sbyin
280a4(dkon brtsegs): bzang du bdog na yang bzang du sbyin/ ngan pa bdog na yang ngan pa sbyin/ gya nom pa bdog na yang gya nom ba sbyin no/ /lag bzang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong sbyin
280a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rlabs po che'i sems dang / rangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de bzhin du/ ka kA ni tsam yang sbyin zhing rlabs po che'i sems dang rangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin no/ /de zas
280a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams la sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla na med pa'i stobs kyis brtan pa thob par bya ba'i phyir zas sbyin no/ /skom 'dod pa rnams la ni sems
280a7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i skom pa thams cad bsal ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir skom sbyin no/ /gos 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod
280b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gos thob par bya ba'i phyir gos sbyin no/ /bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med pa thob
280b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir bzhon pa sbyin no/ /spos 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi dri bsung thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir spos sbyin no/ /me tog 'dod pa rnams
280b3(dkon brtsegs): la ni sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir me tog rnams sbyin no/ /phye ma 'dod pa rnams la ni sems
280b4(dkon brtsegs): can nyes par spyod pa'i dri nga ba'i dri ma gzhom pa'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir phye ma sbyin no/ /byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyes pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / spyod
280b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byug pa thob par bya ba'i phyir byug pa sbyin no/ /gdugs 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir
280b6(dkon brtsegs): gdugs sbyin no/ /lham 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i bde ba mngon par shes pa thob par bya ba'i phyir lham sbyin no/ /mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni sems
280b7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad lha dang / tshangs pa dang / 'phags pa'i gnas pa'i mal cha'i bde ba sbyar ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir mal cha sbyin no/ /stan 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can
281a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad byang chub kyi snying por bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis mi phyed par dpa' ba'i stan thob par bya ba'i phyir
281a2(dkon brtsegs): stan sbyin no/ /gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad skyabs dang / gnas dang / mgon dang / dpung gnyen du gyur pa'i lus thob par bya ba'i phyir gnas sbyin no/ /phru
281a3(dkon brtsegs): tog dang / bum pa dang / 'tshog chas 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad chos kyi rdzing lta bu'i lus thob par bya ba'i phyir phru tog dang / bum pa dang / 'tshogs chas sbyin
281a4(dkon brtsegs): no| |sems can thams cad zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun
281a5(dkon brtsegs): la dka' thub kyi nags tshal sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu thob par bya ba'i phyir mchod
281a6(dkon brtsegs): rten rnams la rgyan sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i spyan mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir mun khrod kyi mchod rten nam/ lam rnams
281a7(dkon brtsegs): la mar me sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i snyan mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas la mchod pa rnams sam/ chos la mchod
281b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams sam/ dge 'dun la mchod pa rnams la rol mo'i dbyangs sgra'i sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad cha byad dang / tshul khrims dang / spyod pa mdzes pa bla na med pa thob par
281b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir lhung bzed dang / chos gos sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba sbyin pa'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir snod chags sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams
281b3(dkon brtsegs): cad shes rab chen po'i tshogs yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir smyu gu dang / snag tsha dang / glegs bu dang / chos kyi khri stan sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
281b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nad thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad byang chub rnam pa gsum gyis dang / bdud rtsi dbyings kyis thob par bya ba'i phyir sa
281b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhi sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad slob dpon med pa'i chos mthon po thob par bya ba'i phyir mchod rten mthon po dang / sku gzugs mthon po byed do/ /bdog pa lta na sems
281b6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad mngon par shes pa myur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir myur zhing yongs su nyon mongs par ma gyur par sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad bar du gcod pa med par rdzogs
281b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir rung ba sbyin gyi/ rung ba ma yin pa ni ma yin no/ /sems can thams cad spobs pa chen po yongs su mi 'chad pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su mi gcod
282a1(dkon brtsegs): par sbyin pa sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad snying rje chen po mtshungs pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la mnyam par sbyin pa
282a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin no/ /sems can thams cad bdud dang mu stegs byed pa thams cad kyis tshar mi chod pa dang / gnod par mi nus pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir
282a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la mi gnod par sbyin pa sbyin no/ /lag bzang / gal te byang chub sems dpa' la sbyin pa 'di dag sbyin du nor med cing 'byor pa med par gyur na/ de 'jig rten gyi khams
282a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du sems can thams cad la sbyin pa mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa 'di dag sbyin par yid kyis 'dod cing smon la smon lam 'debs te/ lag bzang / byang chub
282a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de sbyin pa 'di dag byin pa'i nus pa dang ldan yang rung / nus pa dang mi ldan pa yang rung ste/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems can thams cad bdag gi
282a6(dkon brtsegs): bde bar sbyar ba nyid dang ldan pa dang / yang dag par ldan par 'gyur zhing 'bad pa med pa dang 'dod pa med par brang pa rnams/ thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi
282a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du shin tu yongs su rdzogs shing / bsam pa ma lus par yongs su rdzogs nas bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur bar bdag gi de bzang por gyur cig /bdag
282b1(dkon brtsegs): gi de dge bar gyur cig ces de ltar yid kyis 'dod cing smon lam smon lam 'debs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la rin po che'i rgya mtsho yang sbyin par
282b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod cing smon la smon lam 'debs so/ /dbyig gi ri dang / gser gyi ri dang / gos kyi ri dang / yo byad thams cad kyi ri dang / bza' brgya mtsho dang / btung ba rgya mtsho dang / gnas legs
282b3(dkon brtsegs): par byas pa/ legs par gnas pa/ mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa dag kyang sbyin par 'dod cing smon la smon lam 'debs so/ /'khor ba'i srid pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi
282b4(dkon brtsegs): khams thams cad kyi sems can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong ba gang yin pa zang zing sbyin pa'am/ mi
282b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa sbyin pa'am/ chos sbyin pa ma lus pa de dag thams cad la tha na dus gsum du yang mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang ngo / /gal te de la bslangs la nor sbyin mi nus na
282b6(dkon brtsegs): yang rang gi zos skal sbyin pa'am/ grogs su 'gyur ba'am/ kun du btsal ba'i thabs kyang de la ston par 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi gtam gyis de'i 'dod pa sel bar byed do/ /de sbyin
282b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod par gyur pa na yang sbyin pa de sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can
283a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i
283a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir| bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /sbyin pa dag byin nas kyang sbyin pa de sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad
283a3(dkon brtsegs): dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs
283a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /gal te sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong
283a5(dkon brtsegs): ba de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang chags pa dang / ser sna dang / sbyin pas 'jigs
283a6(dkon brtsegs): pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /dus dus su'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong ba la slob pa dang / mngon
283a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing skyid lug par mi 'gyur ro/ /lag bzang / byang
283b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon
283b2(dkon brtsegs): lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag sbyin pa chen po dang / gtong ba chen po dang / rnam par gtong ba chen po grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta
283b3(dkon brtsegs): ste| 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la dam pa'i chos kyi char sbyin par 'dod pa dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi char sbyin par 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi
283b4(dkon brtsegs): char gtong bar 'dod pa dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi char gtong bar 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi char rnam par gtong bar 'dod pa dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi char rnam par
283b5(dkon brtsegs): gtong bar 'dod pa de ni sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong ba thams cad kyi nang na mchog yin no/ /de ni dam pa yin no/ /lag bzang / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid
283b6(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung du dang / sdug bsngal chung dus myur du skyen par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /lag bzang / byang chub sems dpa' ni slong ba
283b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis bslangs pa na yan lag dang nying lag gcod dam/ bcad nas slong ba rnams la sbyin par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag nyid kyi sems can dmyal ba chen por
284a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / mi dge ba'i las chen po rgya che ba yongs su ma sdod ba'i phyir ro/ /sems can gzhan gyi phyir ram/ sems can gzhan gyi ched la de rang gi
284a2(dkon brtsegs): yan lag dang nying lag yongs su mi gtong ba ni ma yin no/ /lag bzang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni slong bas bdog pa thams cad bslangs na pha ma la gnod pa
284a3(dkon brtsegs): byas shing spangs te sdug bsngal bar byas/ bu dang / chung ma dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba la gnod pa byas shing spangs te sdug bsngal bar byas
284a4(dkon brtsegs): nas| bdog pa thams cad slong ba rnams la sbyin par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad la mtshungs par snying brtse ba yin te/ ji ltar pha ma
284a5(dkon brtsegs): la gnod pa mi byed cing mi spong la sdug bsngal bar yang mi byed pa dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba la gnod pa mi byed cing
284a6(dkon brtsegs): mi spong ste/ sdug bsngal bar mi byed par sbyin pa yang sbyin pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la mtshungs par gso bar byed do/ /de ni sems can gzhan gyi phyir ram/ sems can
284a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi ched la bdog pa thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba yang ma yin no/ /lag bzang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems can la gnod pa'i sbyin pa'i bsngags pa gsung ba
284b1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yan lag bcad pa lta la de ltar ga la 'gyur/ lag bzang / byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
284b2(dkon brtsegs): byed ce na/ lag bzang / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni srog gi phyir yang srog chags gzhan dag dang / sems can gzhan rnams la mi brdeg /mi gsod cing / gsod pa la rjes su
284b3(dkon brtsegs): yi rang bar mi byed do/ /srog gi phyir yang ma byin par mi len la ma byin par len du mi 'jug cing ma byin par len pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do/ /srog gi phyir yang 'dod pa la log
284b4(dkon brtsegs): par g.yem pa mi byed la/ 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa byed du mi 'jug cing / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do/ /srog gi phyir yang rdzun mi smra la
284b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzun zer du mi 'jug cing / rdzun smra ba la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do/ /srog gi phyir yang chang mi 'thung la chang 'thung du mi 'jug cing / chang 'thung ba la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed
284b6(dkon brtsegs): do| |de bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po de dag la ring du gnas shing brtan por gnas la dam por gnas te mi lhod par gnas shing bsgrub bo/ /de bzhin du zhing rmed pa dang / zhing rmed
284b7(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug pa dang / 'ching ba dang 'ching du 'jug pa dang / go rar gzhug pa dang / go rar gzhug tu 'jug pa dang / brdeg pa dang / brdeg tu 'jug pa dang / gcod pa dang / gcod du
285a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dag spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar 'bad pa byed do/ /de de ltar bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dag la ring du gnas shing brtan por gnas la
285a2(dkon brtsegs): dam por gnas te mi lhod par gnas shing bsgrub po/ /de bzhin du phra ma'i tshig dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa spang pa dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar 'bad par byed do/ /de
285a3(dkon brtsegs): srog chags thams cad dang / sems can thams cad ni bdag gi pha ma ji lta ba bzhin no/ /bu gcig pa phangs pa ji lta ba bzhin te/ ji ltar pha ma dang / bu gcig pa phangs pa bdag
285a4(dkon brtsegs): la 'khu yang slar 'khu bar mi bya la/ lag pa'am/ bong ba'am/ dbyug pa'am/ ral gri'am/ mdas brdegs kyang slar brdeg par mi bya/ gsod kyang slar gsad par mi bya
285a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing | ji ltar pha ma dang bu gcig pa phangs pa 'khu yang slar 'khu bar mi bya ba de bzhin du bdag srog chags thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyis lag pa'am/ bong
285a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'am/ dbyug pa'am/ ral gri'am/ mdas brdegs kyang slar brdeg par mi bya/ gsod kyang slar gsad par mi bya'o zhes de ltar slob po/ /dper na pha'am/ ma'am/ bu gcig
285a7(dkon brtsegs): pa phangs pa yun ring por yul rgyu ste 'ongs pa mthong na dga' zhing yid bde bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lag bzang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang srog chags
285b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang / sems can thams cad mthong na dga' ba dang / yid bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i srog gcod pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul
285b2(dkon brtsegs): khrims srog gcod pa spang pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i ma byin par len par spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims ma byin par len pa spang
285b3(dkon brtsegs): ba la dgod pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims tshangs par spyod pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro/ /
285b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims brdzun du smra ba spang ba la dgod pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i chang 'thung ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims
285b5(dkon brtsegs): ni| sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims chang 'thung ba spang ba la dgod pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i zhing rmed pa dang / zhing rmed du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems
285b6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i 'ching ba dang / 'ching du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
285b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bcing ba thams cad gcad pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i go rar 'jug pa dang / go rar gzhug tu 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba lnga dgag pa dang
286a1(dkon brtsegs): bsal ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i brdeg pa dang / brdeg tu 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i
286a2(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis zil gyi mi non pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i gcod pa dang / gcod du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can
286a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kun du bsrungs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i phra ma'i tshig spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni g.yog nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po mi
286a4(dkon brtsegs): phyed pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i tshig rtsub po spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ yan lag lnga pa'i ngag gi lam dang ldan pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i tshig kyal
286a5(dkon brtsegs): pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ tshig bzung bar 'os par thogs pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i 'chi bas 'jigs skrag pa yongs su skyob pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems
286a6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa rab
286a7(dkon brtsegs): tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i gzhan gyi nor dang yo byad 'jig cing chud za ba yongs su skyob pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi nor bla na
286b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i gzhan gyi bud med la 'dzin pa gtong bar byed pa dang / gtong bar byed du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni/ 'khrul pa med pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i
286b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro/ /de'i 'gug pa gtong bar byed pa dang / gtong bar byed du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni/ rang gi sems la dbang thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i 'ching ba 'grol ba dang / 'grol
286b3(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni/ dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por bdud kyi dmag dang / nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i khyim nas 'byung ba'i tshul
286b4(dkon brtsegs): khrims ni/ sems rnam par grol ba sgrib pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i brdeg pa 'chags pa'i tshul khrims ni/ mi 'jigs pa rnam pa bzhis 'jig pa yang dag par gzhom pa
286b5(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i gcod pa bzlog pa'i tshul khrims ni/ kun du bsrung ba'i chos bzhi thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i mi slu ba'i tshig smra ba'i tshul khrims ni dpa' bo'i stan
286b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying por bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis mi slu ba'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i bye ba rnams kyi sdums byed cing mdza' ba
286b7(dkon brtsegs): brtan par byed pa'i tshul khrims ni g.yog 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyi dge bdun chen po mi phyed pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i tshig snyan pa dang 'jam po smra ba'i tshul khrims ni/
287a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi rnar bde zhing snying du 'ong la/ bden pa'i ngag thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i kun du mthun pa smra ba'i tshul khrims ni/
287a2(dkon brtsegs): tshar mi chod cing bzung bar 'os la 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i tshul khrims ni/ 'phags pa'i
287a3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge 'dun gyi g.yog 'khor chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge
287a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams la dus gsum du yan lag lngas gtugs te phyag 'tshal
287a5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por mi phyed cing sra la shin tu brtan pa'i dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang /
287a6(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab mchog gi chos nyid dam pa lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten thams cad la rim gro byed pa'i tshul khrims
287a7(dkon brtsegs): ni| sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du chos kyi yon tan brjod pa smra ba'i tshul khrims ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnas med
287b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bla na med pa bskor ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du dge 'dun gyi yon tan brjod pa smra ba'i tshul khrims ni/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun mi phyed pa'i g.yog 'khor chen po thob par
287b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad la skyabs bla na med pa sbyin pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum
287b3(dkon brtsegs): du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dkon mchog gsum dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis stongs par mi 'gyur bar gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ bde bar
287b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba gcig tu nges par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas thams cad la bskal par chos ston par gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul khrims ni/
287b5(dkon brtsegs): sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du sdig pa thams cad so sor 'chags pa dang / sdig pa thams cad so sor 'dor ba dang / sdig pa thams cad la smod pa'i
287b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ni/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i tshul
287b7(dkon brtsegs): khrims ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /
288a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tu gtogs pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad dang / sems can
288a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba thams cad du song ba 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su
288a3(dkon brtsegs): yi rang ba'i tshul khrims ni/ byang chub kyi tshogs mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa bsags pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon
288a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims ni/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par nges pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i dus gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par yongs
288a5(dkon brtsegs): su bsngo ba'i tshul khrims ni/ gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i pha ma dang / bla ma dang / rgan pa dang / slob dpon
288a6(dkon brtsegs): dang | mkhan po la yongs su spyad par byed pa'i bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshul khrims ni/ zil gyis mi non pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa
288a7(dkon brtsegs): dang | nyam thag pa dang / mgon med pa dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul khrims ni/ dris pa thams cad la mi skyo bar lan 'debs pa la mkhas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i rgyal po
288b1(dkon brtsegs): dang | chom rkun dang / me dang / chu dang / bgo skal la spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi nang du chud pa rnams yongs su bskyab cing grogs bya ba'i tshul khrims ni/ gnas dang / sa dang / pha rol tu
288b2(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa chen po yongs su bsrung ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rjes
288b3(dkon brtsegs): su bsngags pa'i tshul khrims ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i pha rol gyi sems rjes su bsrung ba dang mthun pa'i lus kyi las kyi
288b4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang / pha rol gyi sems mngon par dga' ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i lus kyi las kyi tshul khrims dang / pha rol gyi sems rjes su bsrung ba dang mthun
288b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ngag gi las kyi tshul khrims dang / pha rol gyi sems mngon par dga' ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i ngag gi las kyi tshul khrims ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha
288b6(dkon brtsegs): rol kyi sems mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i tshe 'di'i don dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi don dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i don dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
288b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa'i don rnams la bag med pa dang / brjed pa rnams kyi dran pa yang dag par bskyed pa'i tshul khrims dang / dran pa 'byung bar byed pa'i tshul
289a1(dkon brtsegs): khrims ni/ brjed pa med pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i chos nyan pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos goms
289a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos nye bar ston pa'i tshul khrims ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i tshul khrims
289a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par len par 'dod pa dang / lhag par spyad par 'dod pa na yang lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de thams cad sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems
289a4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs
289a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / lhag par spyod pa dang / yang dag par blangs pa dang / lhag par spyad nas kyang sems can thams cad
289a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
289a7(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /gal te tshul khrims de ma zhig pa dang / ma ral ba dang / 'dren ma ma yin par slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par
289b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang mi dge ba spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ dus dus su'am/ cung zad
289b2(dkon brtsegs): cung zad du yang dge ba la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing
289b3(dkon brtsegs): sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro/ /lag bzang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang /
289b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu son pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin 'di nyid de dag gi dge ba'i tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dge ba'i tshul khrims la lhag par spyod pa
289b5(dkon brtsegs): grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims bskyed par 'dod pa
289b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi slob pa'i tshul khrims bskyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par bskyed par
289b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de ni dge ba'i tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dge ba'i tshul khrims lhag par spyod pa'i mchog yin no/ /de ni dam pa yin no/ /lag bzang / de ltar na byang chub
290a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid bde ba dang ldan zhing / tshegs chung ngu dang sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
290a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /lag bzang / byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzang / 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
290a3(dkon brtsegs): ni gzhan dag gis rang gi lus kyi srog gcod dam/ bdog pa thams cad 'phrog gam/ chung ma 'phrog gam/ brdzun du smra ba'am/ phra ma'am/ ngag rtsub po'am/ tshig kyal ba smra
290a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'am| gshe 'am/ gsod dam/ 'dzin nam/ brdeg gam/ gcod kyang slar gnod par mi byed cing slar mi khro ste/ shar gnyer zhing 'khon du 'dzin par mi byed do/ /de 'di ltar
290a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par slob ste/ bdag nyid kyis sngon gyi srid pa rnams dang / srid pa 'di la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las 'di dag byas shing bsags pa de dag gi 'bras bu ni 'di dag
290a6(dkon brtsegs): yin| de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin te/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu dang rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa rang gis myong ba la ci'i phyir gzhan la slar gnod pa bya zhing slar
290a7(dkon brtsegs): khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing 'khon du 'dzin par bya snyam du sems so/ /lag bzang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gal te bdag gi srog
290b1(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa'am/ bdog pa thams cad 'phrog pa'am/ chung ma 'phrog pa'am/ brdzun du smra ba'am/ phra ma'am/ ngag rtsub po'am/ tshig kyal pa smra ba'am/ gshe ba'am/ gsod pa'am/
290b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa'am/ brdeg pa'am/ gcod pa yang rung ste/ gzhan dag la slar gnod pa byas sam/ slar khro ba'am/ shar gnyer zhing khon du bzung na slar gnod pa byas pa dang / slar khros
290b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / shar gnyer zhing 'khon du bzung ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba de'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'dod pa/ mi sdug pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba 'dis bdag la las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / las
290b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyu mthun pa brgya 'gyur ram/ stong 'gyur ram/ de bas lhag par mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i sdug bsngal gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /lag
290b5(dkon brtsegs): bzang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ srog yod pas srog gcod par 'gyur/ rdzas yod pas rdzas 'phrog par 'gyur/ rna ba'i dbang po yod
290b6(dkon brtsegs): pas brdzun du smra ba thos par 'gyur/ phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa thos par 'gyur la/ lus yod pas 'dren pa dang / 'chi ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / brdeg pa dang / gcod
290b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ bdag nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi dngos po/ sdug bsngal gyi gzhi/ srog gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / lus blangs par gyur na/ ji ltar gzhan dag la slar gnod pa dang / slar khro
291a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'am/ shar gnyer zhing 'khon du bzung bar bya snyam mo/ /lag bzang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dper na/
291a2(dkon brtsegs): sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni sra ba ste/ de ni ngo bo nyid/ de ni chos nyid /de ni rang bzhin no/ /chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni gsher ba/ me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni tsha ba/ rlung gi khams
291a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtshan nyid ni yang zhing g.yo ba ste/ de ni ngo bo nyid/ de ni chos nyid/ de ni rang bzhin no/ /de bzhin du srog thams cad kyang zad pa'i chos can/ 'god pa'i chos can/ 'gog
291a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos can no/ /dbang po thams cad kyang sdug bsngal gyi chos can/ sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos can/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos can/ lus thams cad kyang sdug bsngal
291a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi chos/ sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos te/ de ni ngo bo nyid/ de ni chos nyid/ de ni rang bzhin no/ /srog gi dbang po zad pa'i chos can/ 'god
291a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos can/ 'gog pa'i chos can/ zad cing dngos la 'gog pa dang / dbang po drug sdug bsngal gyi chos can/ sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos can/ sdug bsngal myong
291a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos can rnams la/ sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pas ji ltar gzhan dag la slar gnod pa'am/ slar khro ba'am/ shar gnyer zhing 'khon du gzung bar bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
291b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni ngo bo nyid/ 'di ni chos nyid/ 'di ni rang bzhin no snyam mo/ /lag bzang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ bdag gi mig dang / rna ba dang / sna
291b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang bdag med cing bdag gi med pa yin la/ gzhan dag gi mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang bdag med cing bdag gi med
291b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin na/ mkhas pa rig pa dag mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bdag med cing / yid bdag gi med pa la mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus
291b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / yid bdag med cing / bdag gi med pas ji ltar dga' ba'am/ rjes su chags pa'am/ yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'am/ brdeg pa'am/ slar gnod par byed pa'am/
291b5(dkon brtsegs): slar khro ba'am/ shar gnyer zhing 'khon du 'dzin par 'gyur snyam mo/ /lag bzang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar slob ste/ 'di lta ste/ mir skye ba'i sdug bsngal
291b6(dkon brtsegs): ni nyung zhing chung gi / yi dwags kyi sdug bsngal ni ches mi bzad la ches bzod par dka' ba yin/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal
291b7(dkon brtsegs): yang ches mi bzad cing bzod par dka' ba yin na/ bdag gis ji ltar sdug bsngal chung zhing nyung ba tsam gyi phyir gzhan dag la slar gnod pa dang / slar khro ba dang / shar gnyer
292a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'khon du gzung bar bya snyam mo/ /lag bzang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang bdag gcig pu'i
292a2(dkon brtsegs): don 'dod pa dang / bdag gcig pu la phan par 'dod pas/ gzhan dag la phyir gnod par byed cing phyir khro ste/ shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin pa yang mi rigs te/ cha ma yin na
292a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'jig rten thams cad kyi don 'dod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la phan par 'dod pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ yid dam bcas pa chen pos yid dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen
292a4(dkon brtsegs): po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po yongs su bskang bar 'dod pa lta la smos kyang ci dgos te/ mi bzod pa dang / phyir gnod pa byed pa dang / phyir
292a5(dkon brtsegs): khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing 'khon du 'dzin pas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag gsog pa dang / 'phel ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur gyi/ gzod pa dang / phyir gnod
292a6(dkon brtsegs): pa mi byed pa dang / phyir mi khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing 'khon du 'dzin pa mi byed pas sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag gsog cing 'phel te yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur snyam mo/ /

292b2(dkon brtsegs): snyan pa byas kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs shin tu dri ma med cing dag la dkar ba thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len
292b3(dkon brtsegs): no| |de drud bshal tam/ bcings sam/ bzung yang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / skad cig gcig la ma rig pa'i sgrib pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs gzhom pa'i phyir bzod
292b4(dkon brtsegs): cing dang du len to/ /de brdegs kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'chags pa dang / khong khro ba bzlog pa'i phyir bzod cing dang du

293a1(dkon brtsegs): pa bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba'i chos kyi lag pa sbyin pa thob par bya ba'i phyir

293b7(dkon brtsegs): med cing dpag tu med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i bzod pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i

297b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'dzud do/ /'dul lo/ /'god do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'os pa rnams ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la'o/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa

297b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin dam pa'i chos kyi rgyu dang / dam pa'i chos kyi ched dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi ched dang / dge ba'i rgyu dang / dge ba'i ched la grang ba yang khyad
297b7(dkon brtsegs): du gsod la/ tsha ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg pa dang / gzhan gyis ngan du smras pa dang / ngan du brjod pa'i
298a1(dkon brtsegs): tshig gi lam dang / ngal ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / gnyid dang / mi dga' ba dang / lus dang srog kyang khyad du gsod do/ /mkhas pa le lo med pa ni mdud
298a2(dkon brtsegs): thung dag gis bzlog kyang de rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched la lha'i sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do/ /lha ma yin gyi sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do//
298a3(dkon brtsegs): mi'i sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do/ /yi dwags kyi sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang khyad du
298a4(dkon brtsegs): gsod do/ /mkhas pa le lo med pa ni mdud thung dag gis bzlog kyang de mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba dang / spyod lam dang pha rol
298a5(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtan zhing rtul ba brtan no/ /de brtson 'grus 'di dang / rtul ba 'di mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang /
298a6(dkon brtsegs): brtsam par 'dod pa na yang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
298a7(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /mngon sum du byed pa dang / rtsom pa dang / mngon sum du byas pa
298b1(dkon brtsegs): dang | brtsams nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
298b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /gal te brtson 'grus 'di ma nyams pa dang / skyon med pa dang / 'dren ma ma
298b3(dkon brtsegs): yin par slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na/ de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste dus su'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang snyoms las dang / le lo spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar
298b4(dkon brtsegs): rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /dus dus su'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang brtson 'grus dang rtul ba la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /
298b5(dkon brtsegs): srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro/ /lag bzang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi
298b6(dkon brtsegs): sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi brtson 'grus dge ba dang / rtsol ba dge ba
298b7(dkon brtsegs): ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i brtson 'grus bskyed par 'dod pa dang /
299a1(dkon brtsegs): zag pa med pa'i brtson 'grus yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i brtson 'grus bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i brtson 'grus yang
299a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni brtson 'grus dge ba dang / rtsol ba dge ba thams cad kyi mchog yin no/ /de ni dam pa yin no/ /lag bzang / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang
299a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung du dang / sdug bsngal chung dus myur du skyen par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// //bam
299a4(dkon brtsegs): po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o/ /lag bzang / byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzang / 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
299a5(dkon brtsegs): mig gis gzugs rnams mthong na mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te/ gang gi phyir mig gi dbang po sdom pas ma bsdams par gnas pas 'jig
299a6(dkon brtsegs): rten na brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la sems rjes su zag pa de dag bsdam pa'i phyir nan tan byed cing bsrung ste/ mig gi dbang pos mig
299a7(dkon brtsegs): gi dbang po sdom par byed do/ /de bzhin du rna bas sgra rnams thos pa dang / snas dri rnams tshor ba dang / lces ro rnams myong ba dang / lus kyis reg bya rnams reg pa dang / yid kyis
299b1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams rnam par shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin zhing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te/ gang gi phyir yid kyi dbang po sdom pas ma bsdams par gnas pas 'jig rten na brnab
299b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / yid mi bde ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la sems rjes su zag pa de dag bsdam pa'i phyir nan tan byed cing bsrung ste/ yid kyi dbang pos yid kyi dbang po sdom pa byed
299b3(dkon brtsegs): do| |de 'gro'am/ 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam/ nyal lam/ cang mi smra bar gyur kyang rung ste/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas dang / zhi ba'i gnas kyi gnas mi 'dor ro/ /rnam par mi 'dor ro/ /de
299b4(dkon brtsegs): lag mi rgod pa dang / mu cor mi smra ba dang / tshig mi mang ba dang / mig mi g.yeng ba dang / dbang po mi g.yeng ba dang / mi rgod pa dang / tom col med pa dang / lus 'khrul pa med pa
299b5(dkon brtsegs): dang | ngag 'khrul ba med pa dang / sems 'khrul pa med pa dang / dben yang rung / mi dben yang rung / spyod lam mi nyams pa yin no/ /bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang /
299b6(dkon brtsegs): stan dang / gnas dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad ji lta bu yang rung ba dag gis chog shes shing gso sla ba dang / dgang sla ba dang / rim gro bya sla ba dang / cho ga dang spyod yul dge
299b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'du 'dzi las dben pa'i spyod yul yin/ thob pa dang ma thob pa la mnyam zhing 'gyur pa med do/ /ma khengs ma dud pa yin/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / stod pa dang smod pa
300a1(dkon brtsegs): dang | grags pa dang ma grags pa dang / 'tsho ba dang 'chi ba la mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med de/ ma khengs mi 'dud pa yin/ mdza' bo dang dgra dang / dge
300a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mi dge ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang mthun pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba dang mi mthun pa dang / 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams dang / dben pa dang lang
300a3(dkon brtsegs): long rnams la mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med de/ ma khengs mdud pa yin/ gzugs sdug pa dang mi sdug pa rnams la yang mthun pa dang mi mthun pa med pa yin/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang /
300a4(dkon brtsegs): reg bya dang / chos sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa rnams la yang mthun pa dang mi mthun pa med pa yin no/ /de 'dod pa rnams ni rang gi sems kyis kun du bslang nas log par rnam
300a5(dkon brtsegs): par rtog pas ro myang ba yin pas keng rus lta bur yid la byed do/ /'dod pa rnams ni dgra mang ba'i phyir sha sna gu lta bur yid la byed do/ /'dod pa rnams ni blangs na sdug
300a6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal la yongs su btang na bde ba'i phyir rtswa me lta bur yid la byed do/ /'dod pa rnams ni gnod pa mang ba'i phyi shing gi rtse mo'i shing tog lta bur yid la byed do/ /'dod pa rnams ni
300a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir slong ba lta bur yid la byed do/ /'dod pa rnams ni skad cig tsam zhig nor bas dga' ba'i phyir rmi lam lta bur yid la byed do/ /'dod pa rnams ni
300b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes pa phyin ci log gis bskyed pa'i phyir mdze lta bu yid la byed do/ /'dod pa rnams ni shes par spyod pa thams cad kyi dngos po yin pa dang / ngan 'gro
300b2(dkon brtsegs): log par ltung ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i mtha' yin pas mchil pa lta bu yid la byed do/ /'dod pa rnams ni ngoms par mi byed pa dang / skom pa 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir tshwa
300b3(dkon brtsegs): chu lta bur yid la byed do/ /de 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i
300b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod
300b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas zhing
300b6(dkon brtsegs): dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ bsam gtan
300b7(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma
301a1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de sems can thams cad la bde ba'i 'du shes yid la byed
301a2(dkon brtsegs): pas byams pa tshad med pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de sems can thams cad la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas snying rje tshad med pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de sems can
301a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la dga' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas dga' ba tshad med pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de sems can rnams la sdug bsngal yang med/ bde ba yang med pa yid la byed pas btang
301a4(dkon brtsegs): snyoms tshad med pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de gzugs la rags pa'i 'du shes yid la byed cing / nam mkha' la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
301a5(dkon brtsegs): mched bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par shes pa la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de ci yang med pa la zhi
301a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de 'du shes med 'du shes med min la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas 'du shes med 'du
301a7(dkon brtsegs): shes med min skye mched rdzogs par bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rang gi dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba ji ltar gnas shing ji ltar 'dug pa de bzhin du rgyun thung ba rnams la yang rgyun
301b1(dkon brtsegs): thung ba'i 'du shes dang / rgyun ring ba rnams la yang rgyun ring ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba dran pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de sems can gyi lus rnams la
301b2(dkon brtsegs): mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de 'chi ba'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas 'chi ba'i 'du shes bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de na ba dang /
301b3(dkon brtsegs): rga ba'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de kha zas yongs su tshol ba dang 'gyur ba la nad kyi rgyu dang gnod pa'i rgyur yid la byed pas kha zas
301b4(dkon brtsegs): la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs kyi 'jig rten thams cad la 'byor ba dang 'brel ba'i mtshan mar yid la byed pa dang /
301b5(dkon brtsegs): nags tshal rmad du byung ba dang / kun dga' ra ba rmad du byung ba dang bral ba'i mtshan mar yid la byed pas 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes bsgrubs te gnas so//
301b6(dkon brtsegs): de nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol kyi gzugs chung du kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po bsgrubs te
301b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas so/ /de nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs gzhan med pa kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye
302a1(dkon brtsegs): mched gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de shi ba'i lus bsregs pa de la rlung ngam chus thal ba yang med par byed pa'i 'du shes dang / zhigs pa la phye
302a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yang med pa dang / rdul du gyur pa la rdul kyang med pa'i 'du shes su rnam par 'jig pa bsgoms shing bsgrubs te/ nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs
302a3(dkon brtsegs): chung du kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de de bzhin du nang gzugs med
302a4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs tshad med pa kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa bsgrubs
302a5(dkon brtsegs): te gnas so/ /da de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po tshad med pa yid du 'ong ba rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon
302a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skye mched lnga pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po tshad med pa yid du 'ong
302a7(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa dang / bdun pa dang / brgyad pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /des 'di mtha' yas so zhes mtshan mar
302b1(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pas zad par sar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa mtha'
302b2(dkon brtsegs): yas so zhes mtshan mar yid la byed pas zad par chu dang / zad par me dang / zad par rlung dang / zad par sngon po dang / zad par ser po dang / zad par dmar po dang / zad par dkar po dang /
302b3(dkon brtsegs): zad par nam mkha' dang / zad par rnam par shes pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de snyoms par 'jug pa na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dmigs pa la sems nye bar 'dogs te/ snying rje
302b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po la dmigs pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba la dmigs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par bya ba la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku dang /
302b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyan la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung tshangs pa'i dbyangs la dmigs pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la dmigs
302b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'jig rten rnam par sbyang ba la dmigs pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i bkod pa la dmigs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon
302b7(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa gzhom pa la dmigs pa la sems nye bar 'dogs so/ /de bsam gtan byed pa na rnam par shes pa'i gnas bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan byed do/ /sa'i khams la mi gnas
303a1(dkon brtsegs): chu'i khams la mi gnas/ me'i khams la mi gnas/ rlung gi khams la mi gnas/ nam mkha'i khams la mi gnas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi
303a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas/ 'jig rten 'di la mi gnas/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas par bsam gtan byed do/ /de ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bla na med pa thams cad thob par bya ba'i
303a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir bsam gtan la gnas shing bsam gtan la dga'o/ /de bsam gtan de dang / ting nge 'dzin de la bsam gtan byed par 'dod pa dang / snyoms par 'jug par 'dod
303a4(dkon brtsegs): pa na yang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /
303a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /bsam gtan byed pa dang / bsam gtan byas pa dang / langs nas kyang sems can thams
303a6(dkon brtsegs): cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
303a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /gal te bsam gtan de dang / ting nge 'dzin de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar
303b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang sems rnam par g.yeng ba dang / ting nge 'dzin ma yin pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /dus
303b2(dkon brtsegs): dus su'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dang / sems mnyam par gzhag par slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par
303b3(dkon brtsegs): bya bar rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro/ /lag bzang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems
303b4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems sgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi sems
303b5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par gzhag pa dge ba dang / sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams
303b6(dkon brtsegs): cad la zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam par gzhag pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i sems mnyam par gzhag pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam par
303b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i sems mnyam par gzhag pa yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni sems mnyam par gzhag par dge ba dang / sems rtse gcig tu
304a1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba mtha' yas mu med pa yin no/ /lag bzang / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang /
304a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal chung ngus bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /lag bzang / byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
304a3(dkon brtsegs): byed ce na/ lag bzang / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang / gang zag gang dag thos pa mang ba/ thos pa 'dzin pa/ thos pa bsags pa/ don shes pa/ bshad
304a4(dkon brtsegs): pa shes pa/ dpyod pa can ji ltar thos pa'i don la yongs su rtog pa/ de dag la bsnyen cing brten te/ bsnyen bkur byed do/ /de thos pa'i ched dang / bshad pa'i ched dang / don gyi ched
304a5(dkon brtsegs): dang | don la yongs su rtog pa'i ched dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i ched la/ grang ba yang khyad du gsod/ tsha ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / sha sbrang
304a6(dkon brtsegs): dang | sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg pa dang / gzhan gyis ngan du smras shing / ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam dang / lus kyi tshor ba drag pa/ rtsub pa/ mi
304a7(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa/ srog 'chad par 'gyur ba yang khyad du gsod do/ /de chos rnams la ni rin po che'i 'du shes nye bar gnas/ chos smra ba rnams la ni rin po che'i gter du 'du shes/ chos
304b1(dkon brtsegs): nyan pa la ni dkon pa rnyed par 'du shes/ chos 'dzin pa la ni don yod par 'du shes/ srog phyogs par 'du shes/ chos kyi yon tan mang du byed pa la ni srog don yod par 'du
304b2(dkon brtsegs): shes/ chos la yongs su rtog pa la ni tshe rabs brgyar mi rnyed par 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin la/ mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/ khams rnams
304b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang rab tu shes/ phung po rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / dus dang / theg pa rnams dang / dge ba bsags pa yang rab
304b4(dkon brtsegs): tu shes so/ /khams rnams ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/ khams ni gnyis te/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ste/ khams gnyis po de dag go /'dus byas kyi khams ni gang /

305a2(dkon brtsegs): sdang med pa dang ldan pa dang / gang ci yang rung ste/ gti mug med pa dang / gti mug med pa dang ldan pa de ni/ dge ba'i khams zhes bya'o/ /gang ci yang rung ste/ chags pa dang / chags

311a2(dkon brtsegs): byed| mya ngan las 'das pas rlom sems su mi byed/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni bdag gi'o snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do/ /mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' bar mi byed do/ /

311a4(dkon brtsegs): pa khong du chud par byed cing rnam par 'jig go/ de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed
311a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas/ ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas/ skye mched drug 'gag

311b1(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'gog pa yang dag par rjes su mthong yang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'gog pa mngon sum du yang mi byed de/ de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'gog

311b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar byung ba'i dus te/ de dag ni dus gsum rnams zhes bya'o/ /'du byed gang la la 'gags pa de ni 'das pa'i dus zhes bya'o/ /'du byed gang la la ma 'ongs shing ma skyes pa de ni ma 'ongs pa'i

311b5(dkon brtsegs): bshung ste nges par spong ngo / /ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bdag gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rdul tsam la yang gcig tu rnam par smin par mthong / mi sdug par rnam par smin par mthong / yid du mi 'ong

311b7(dkon brtsegs): pas bsdams/ yid sdom pas bsdams/ dbang po drug po sdom pas bsdams so/ /de 'das pa'i dus kyi bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang
