317b5(dkon brtsegs): kun la yang / /'jig rten thams cad rab tu dgod par bgyi/ /de de ltar ni bdag dang gzhan dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rab tu shes so/ /de shes rab de dang / ye shes des mngon
317b6(dkon brtsegs): sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang yid la bya bar 'dod pa na yang / sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /
317b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /mngon sum du byed pa dang / yid la byed pa
318a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / mngon sum du byas pa dang / yid la byas nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad
318a2(dkon brtsegs): dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /gal te shes rab
318a3(dkon brtsegs): de dang / ye shes de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang 'chal ba'i shes rab dang / mi shes
318a4(dkon brtsegs): pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang / brtsal bar rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du'ang shes rab dang / ye shes la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba
318a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro/ /lag bzang / byang chub sems dpa'
318a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa
318a7(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi shes rab dge ba dang / ye shes dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du
318b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i shes rab bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i shes rab bskyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i shes rab yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa
318b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi slob pa'i shes rab yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni shes rab dge ba dang / ye shes dge ba thams cad kyi mchog yin no/ /de ni dam pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /lag bzang
318b3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
318b4(dkon brtsegs): par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /chos kyi rnam
318b5(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag theg pa gsum dang / mtho ris su skye ba'i don byas par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
318b6(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzang dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang /
318b7(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi
319a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ lag bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa drug pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan
319a2(dkon brtsegs): po d+ha na shI la dang / dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de zhang ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar
319a3(dkon brtsegs): skad du/ AR+Ya su ra ta pa ri pr-i ts+tshA nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa des pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gcig pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
319a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
319a5(dkon brtsegs): ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ 'khor bzhi dang / rgyal po
319a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / blon po dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / ljongs kyi mi rnams kyis bkur stir byas /bla mar byas/ rim gror byas/ mchod pa byas so/ /de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi grong khyer na grong khyer gyi dbul
319a7(dkon brtsegs): po des pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/ chos la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/ dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs
319b1(dkon brtsegs): su bzung ba/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas te sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/ snying rje la gnas te yid yongs su skyo ba med pa/ dga' ba la gnas
319b2(dkon brtsegs): te chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa/ gtang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis mi bskyod pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs
319b3(dkon brtsegs): pa| sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pa/ thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / dbul por ming du chags pa zhig gnas te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i
319b4(dkon brtsegs): mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas/ grong khyer gyi dbul po des pa shin tu 'dod pa chung ba/ chog shes pa/ tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang ldan pa/ yid 'khrug pa med pa/ rtag
319b5(dkon brtsegs): tu bzhin 'dzum pa/ gzhan gyi 'khrul ba dag la skyon du mi lta ba/ sems can thams cad kyi sems bsrung ba/ brkam pa med pa/ shes bzhin du spyod pa/ chog shes shing dgang sla ba/
319b6(dkon brtsegs): gso sla ba/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/ g.yo med pa/ nga rgyal med pa/ bka' blo bde ba/ mthun par 'dzin pa/ rtag tu gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ lag na shing lo'i
319b7(dkon brtsegs): snod thogs pa/ rtsa bting ba la nyal ba/ gos ngan pa gyon pa/ rnyed kyang mi len pa/ bzang yang rung / ngan yang rung / bgo bsha' byas nas za ba/ dus gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa la
320a1(dkon brtsegs): blta ba/ chos nyan par 'dod pa/ gtam sna tshogs byung ba la spobs pa dang ldan pa/ sems can rnams kyis mthong na dga' ba de mthong ngo / /mthong nas 'di snyam du
320a2(dkon brtsegs): sems te/ ci grong khyer gyi dbul po 'di yid dam la brtan nam ma brtan pa bdag gis brtag go snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mi mang po mngon par sprul nas/ grong khyer gyi
320a3(dkon brtsegs): dbul po des pa la tshig ngan pa dag gis gshe zhing spyo bar byed do/ /bong ba dang / dbyug pa dang / mtshon cha dag kyang bstan na des pa de'i bzod pa'i stobs kyis dang du len par byed de/
320a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrug cing gnod sems mi bskyed do/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mi gzhan dag cig sprul nas des pa de'i mdun du bzhag ste/ des pa de la dga' ba'i tshig gis kho bo
320a5(dkon brtsegs): cag ni khyod kyi don byed par 'dod pa yin gyi/ ci ste khyod 'dod pa lta na/ khyod la sdigs pa'i dgra gang yin pa de dag kho bo cag gis tshar gcad par bya'o zhes smras so/ /des pas
320a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ grogs po dag thong / de skad ma zer cig/ gal te mi 'di dag gis kho bo'i lus dum bu brgyar dum bur dum bur btubs su zin kyang / kho bo ni mi 'di dag la sdig pa'i sems
320a7(dkon brtsegs): mi bskyed do/ /grogs po dag/ 'jig rten dag ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i phyogs gnyis la gnas la/ de'i 'gro ba ni gnyis kho na ste/ dge ba'i phyogs kyi ni bde 'gro'o/ /mi dge
320b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyogs kyi ni ngan 'gro'o/ /de bas na kho bo ni sems can pha rol tshig pa za bar byed pa yang mi 'dod na gtse ba lta ci smos/ de nas de'i tshe tshigs su gcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sa bon tsha ba
320b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis ni/ /'bras bu tsha ba skye bar 'gyur/ /sa bon mngar ba rnams kyis ni/ /'bras bu mngar ba skye bar 'gyur/ /dpe zlar bya ba 'di yis ni/ /sdig pa'i rnam smin tsha ba dang / /dkar po'i
320b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu mngar ba dang / /mkhas pa'i mis ni shes par 'gyur/ /rtag tu lus dang ngag yid kyi/ /sdig pa rnam gsum mi bya zhing / /gzhan dag byed kyang mkhas pa yis/ /rjes su
320b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba mi bya'o/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis/ /dkar po rnam gsum rtag tu byas/ /gang dag dge ba spyod byed pa/ /gzhan dag la yang yi rang bya/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
320b5(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis dus gzhan zhig na/ des pa la dbyig dang / gser mang po bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /des pa/ 'o ni las khyer la sbyin pa dag byin cig/ bsod nams dag gyis shig/
320b6(dkon brtsegs): gos dang rgyan dag kyang thogs shig/ khyod ngan zhing dbul bas ci zhig bya/ des pas smras pa/ grogs po dag/ sngon sems can rnams la lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / ngag dang
320b7(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis nyes par spyad pas/ 'dir dbul po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de bas na kho bo ni ma byin par len pa de byed par mi 'dod do/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ des pa khyod da ltar je bde
321a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'tsho bar gyis shig/ 'jig rten pha rol bsam pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ des pas smras pa/ grogs gang tshe 'di ched cher 'dzin pa 'di ni byis pa'i chos yin
321a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi| mkhas pa rnams ni tshe phyi ma ched cher 'dzin to/ /'dod pas zil gyis non pa dang / zhe sdang gis zil gyis non pa dang / gti mug gis zil gyis non pa dang / 'dod chags kyis
321a3(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis non pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni brkam pa ma yin no/ /gsog 'jog ched cher 'dzin pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag
321a4(dkon brtsegs): ni gsog 'jog mi byed do/ /bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas shing yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni bdag tu mi 'dzin cing yongs
321a5(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin par mi byed do/ /lus dang srog la lta ba dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni lus dang srog la mi lta'o/ /ngoms mi shes shing chog mi shes pa dag ni
321a6(dkon brtsegs): ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni ngoms shes shing chog shes pa yin no/ /'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni 'tsho ba
321a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa yin no/ /las ma mthong ba dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni las mthong ba yin no/ /rnam par 'tshe ba ched cher 'dzin pa dag ni ma byin
321b1(dkon brtsegs): par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni rnam par mi 'tshe ba ched cher 'dzin to/ /byams pa'i sems med pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni byams pa'i sems dang ldan
321b2(dkon brtsegs): no| |phyin ci log bzhis sems bslad pa ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni sems phyin ci ma log pa yin no/ /gzhan yang sems can dbul po gang yin pa de dag kho bos tshigs
321b3(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa dag gis bshad kyi nyon cig/ bye ba phrag stong gter yod kyang / /gang dag la ni gtong med pa/ /de dag 'jig rten 'dir dbul zhes/ /thos mang rnams kyis de skad bshad/
321b4(dkon brtsegs): gang la zad cing med bzhin du/ /de ni gtong la rab gnas na/ /de ni 'jig rten nor che zhes/ /yang dag gzigs pa rnams kyis bshad/ /gang la sdig med 'phags pa ni/ /rnam pa kun
321b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis mdzes pa yin/ /byis pa sdig pa byed pa ni/ /shin tu brgyan kyang mdzes ma yin/ /mkhas pa dag gis spyos sla yi/ /byis pas bsngags pa de lta min/ /byis pas sdig la bsngags par
321b6(dkon brtsegs): byed/ /mkhas pa dag ni sdig la smod/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dus gzhan zhig na mi gzhan zhig tu sprul to/ /de nas mi des gser mang po khyer te/ des pa la 'di skad ces
321b7(dkon brtsegs): smras so/ /kye des pa gser khyer la kho bo mi gzhan zhig dang rtsod pa de la khyod gcig pus che bzhi bya bar kho bos byas kyi/ der kho bo'i che bzhi gyis shig/ des pas smras pa/ grogs
322a1(dkon brtsegs): po thong / khyod de skad ma zer cig/ kho bo ni rdzun zer du mi 'dod do/ /kye grogs po/ brdzun du smra ba ni bdag la yang slu zhing pha rol la yang slu la/ 'phags pa la
322a2(dkon brtsegs): yang slu ba yin te/ grags pa nyams par byed pa dang / yid mi ches pa dang / yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa dang / brnyas par byed pa dang / sems yongs su gdung bar byed pa yin no/ /
322a3(dkon brtsegs): kye grogs po/ brdzun du smra ba ni kha mnam par byed pa dang / lus smad par byed pa dang / lha'i yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa yin no/ /kye grogs po/ brdzun du smra ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
322a4(dkon brtsegs): la rku ba dang / dran pa rmugs par byed pa dang / mtho ris kyi lam la sgrib pa yin no/ /kye grogs po/ brdzun du smra ba ni 'phags pa rnams kyis brtson par mi bya ba dang / yang dag par
322a5(dkon brtsegs): smra ba rnams kyi nang du tshig mi mdzes pa dang / mkhas pa rnams kyis smad pa dang / sdig pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba dang / brtul zhugs yongs su skong ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa dang / ngan 'gro
322a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur ba yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbul po des pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /brdzun du smra ba'i kha nas ni/ /rul ba'i dri yang mnam
322a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /dgon par ji ltar bcom pa bzhin/ /sngon gyi dkar rnams spong bar byed/ /rmongs pas bdag dang lha rnams dang / /'phags rnams yid kyang 'byung bar byed/ /mi
322b1(dkon brtsegs): ni gang zhig rdzun zer ba/ /de ni rtag tu dogs par 'gyur/ /brdzun du smra ba byed pa de/ /sdig pa kun gyi rtsa ba dang / /dka' thub can gyi rtsa gcod dang / /ngan 'gror 'gro ba zhes kyang bya/ /gal
322b2(dkon brtsegs): te 'dzam gling gang ba yi/ /gser dag khyod kyis byin na yang / /kho bo chos ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /rtag tu rdzun ni smra mi byed/ /de nas brgya byin gyis sprul pa'i mis des pa rdzun zer du gzhug
322b3(dkon brtsegs): ma nus nas song ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu mo nyi 'od dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyed gnyis song la brtul zhugs dang dka'
322b4(dkon brtsegs): thub byed pa 'di ci 'dod pa la longs spyod pa zhig gam/ 'on te 'dod pa don du mi gnyer ba zhig yin pa rtogs shig/ de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs dang / lha'i bu mo nyi
322b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od nam langs nas phyogs gang na des pa 'dug pa'i phyogs der song nas/ des pa la tshig snyan pas smras te/ des pa bzhengs/ bdag cag gnyis ni khyod kyi bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags
322b6(dkon brtsegs): so| |des pa/ bdag cag gnyis kyi gzugs phun sum tshogs pa la gzigs/ sha tshugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / lus byugs pa dang / rgyan dang / chas dang / lhab lhub
322b7(dkon brtsegs): la gzigs/ na tshod dang lang tshol bab pa la gzigs/ /des pa khyod kyi bsnyen bkur bgyid pa 'di 'dra bdag nyid kyi bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa la gzigs/ des pas
323a1(dkon brtsegs): bltas nas smras pa/ khyed gnyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du zhugs pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur byed
323a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin gyi/ lha dang mir zhugs pa dag gi ni ma yin no/ /khyed gnyis kyi lus ni sgyu ma dang / rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur kho bos mthong ngo / /khyed gnyis kyi gzugs ni lbu ba dang /
323a3(dkon brtsegs): chu bur dang / smig rgyu lta bur mthong ngo / /khyed tsan dan gyi lde gus byugs pa ni pags pa rlon pa shas g.yogs pa lta bur mthong ngo / /khyed kyi rgyan dang / lhab lhub ni mi slu ba'i sgyu
323a4(dkon brtsegs): ma byas pa lta bur mthong ngo / /khyed kyi lang tsho ni mi rtag pa dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can du mthong ngo / /bsod nams ma yin par mthong ba'i phyir/ khyed gnyis la kho bo mi chags so/ /
323a5(dkon brtsegs): khyed gnyis ni spre'u dang / bud med kyi sems lta bur gyur pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur byed pa yin gyi/ sems dran pas kun nas bsrung ba dag gi ni ma yin no/ /che zhe dag/ 'dod
323a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la bsten pa ni mi sdug pa'o/ /'dod pa la bsten pa de ni dri nga ba'o/ /'dod pa la bsten pa ni rul ba'o/ /'dod pa la bsten pa ni shin tu sdug bsngal ba'o/ /'dod pa la bsten
323a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ni bde ba thams cad yongs su 'grib par byed pa'o/ /'dod pa la bsten pa ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la bsten
323b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /'dod pa la bsten pa ni ngan 'gro na gnas pa'o/ /'dod pa la bsten pa ni 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dag la bstan pa'o/ /'dod pa la bsten pa ni mi mthun pa dang / go ra na gnas
323b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'o| |'dod pa la bsten pa ni phyin ci log skyed pa'o/ /'dod pa la bsten pa ni sred pa'i bag la nyal ba la gnas pa'o/ /'dod pa la bsten pa ni rnam par rmongs shing shin tu rmongs la kun tu
323b3(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa'o/ /'dod pa la bsten pa ni nye bar gzir cing rnam par gzir la rab tu gzir ba'o/ /'dod pa la bsten pa ni kun du gdungs shing rnam par gdungs la yongs su gdungs pa'o/ /'dod pa
323b4(dkon brtsegs): la bsten pa ni mi dge ba'i rjes su 'jug cing / dge ba yongs su nyams par byed pa'o/ /'dod pa la bsten pa ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/ /'dod pa la bsten pa ni mi dge ba'i sprin gyi dra
323b5(dkon brtsegs): bas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /'dod pa la bsten pa ni srin mo dang 'dris par byed pa dang / gzugs mi sdug pa dang 'dris par byed pa dang / sha za mo dang 'dris par byed pa'o/ /'dod pa la bsten
323b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni ba glang dang / bong bu dang / khyi dang / phag dang / rnga mo dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / lug dang / wa la bsten pa'o/ /'dod pa la bsten pa ni skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa la bsten pa'o/ /
323b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la bsten pa ni tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong ba yongs su 'dor ba la bsten pa'o/ /'dod pa la bsten pa ni brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub 'dor ba'o/ /'dod pa la bsten
324a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni shin tu bag med pa'o/ /'dod pa la bsten pa ni nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar phyed pa'o/ /'dod pa la bsten pa ni shin tu bar du gcod par byed pa'o/ /de
324a2(dkon brtsegs): nas de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbul po des pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'dod pa mi rtag rtag tu smad pa ste/ /shin tu sdug bsngal bde ba 'jig par byed/ /rtag tu ngan song
324a3(dkon brtsegs): sa rnams khyim du gyur/ /sems rmongs gyur pa dag gis rtag tu bsten/ /'thab rtsod can te mi bde mtshang du gyur/ /rtag tu 'gyed cing mi mthun go rar gnas/ /'di dag phyin
324a4(dkon brtsegs): ci log bskyed bzhi yin te/ /'dod bsten sred pa 'phel byed bde ba med/ /rnam rmongs rab rmongs de bzhin kun tu rmongs/ /'dod bsten rtag tu gzir cing gnod pa ste/ /'di ni
324a5(dkon brtsegs): kun gdungs rnam gdungs yongs su gdungs/ /sdig par sbyor zhing dge ba chud gson pa/ /'di ni mi dge kun gyi rtsa ba ste/ /'dod bsten dper na sprin gyi dra ba 'dra/ /'dod bsten
324a6(dkon brtsegs): sha za mo dang srin mo dang / /bud med gzugs mi sdug dang 'dris byed bzhin/ /'di ni ba lang bong bu rta dag dang / /phag dang khyi dang wa dang rnga mo dang / /glang chen lug rnams kyis
324a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang bsten pa ste/ /'dod pa skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis spangs/ /'dod bsten tshul khrims thos dang gtong ba dang / /dka' thub brtul zhugs rnams ni 'joms pa ste/ /'di la
324b1(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu bag med nyes pa 'phel/ /de phyir thar 'dod rtag tu bud med spong / /gal te 'jig rten 'di dag khyed 'dra ba'i/ /mdangs ldan gzugs can dag gis gang gyur kyang / /yon tan
324b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa kho bo'i sems gcig kyang / /'dod chags la ni nam yang rton mi 'gyur/ /de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs dang / lha'i bu mo nyi 'od song nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la
324b3(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ des ni 'di na bud med rnams kyi skyon yang dag/ gang lags de dag shin tu mthong bar dogs ma mchis/ /ji ltar de yi sems ni yul las log gyur pa/ /
324b4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar 'dod pa rnams la sems ni chags ma mchis/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin grong khyer gyi dbul po des pa'i thad du song nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ci zhig don gnyer
324b5(dkon brtsegs): des pa chos spyod pa/ /brtul zhugs de ni spyod pa rnams dag smros/ /'di yis nyi zla 'am yang na dbang po'am/ /tshangs pa'am lha rgyal ci zhig khyod slong byed/ /des pas smras pa /
324b6(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma zla ba de bzhin brgya byin dang / /tshangs pa'am rgyal po'am 'di na gzhan dag kyang / /'gro ba rgya chen gang yod de dag kun/ /gar byed lta bzhin mi rtag mi brtan na/ /mkhas pa su
324b7(dkon brtsegs): zhig de la dga' bar byed/ /gang la skye med rga med 'chi ba med/ /sdug dang mi sdug rnams dang phrad pa'ang med/ /'gro ba grol mdzad sangs rgyas 'gyur bya zhes/ /de thob bya phyir sems
325a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa nges/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ phan byed khyod kyi tshig la rjes su yi rang ste/ /khyod kyis smon lam btab pa legs par grub gyur cig /bdud rnams sder bcas
325a2(dkon brtsegs): myur du nges par bcom nas ni/ /shAkya seng ge rgyal ltar byang chub thob gyur cig/ de nas grong khyer gyi dbul po des pas dus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa zhig rnyed nas/ de
325a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du sems te/ nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i gling na mchog tu gyur pa 'di bdag gis mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang yin pa de la sbyin pa gor ma chag go /
325a4(dkon brtsegs): snyam nas/ de grong bar du song ste/ thams cad kyi nang na dbul po su yin pa de la rin po che 'di sbyin no zhes sgra bsgrags pa dang / dbul po mgon med pa phal po che der 'dus te/ bdag
325a5(dkon brtsegs): cag dbul po yin gyi/ bdag cag la byin cig ces 'dzer to/ /des pas smras pa/ khyed ni dbul po ma yin gyi/ mnyan yod 'di na ches dbul po gzhan zhig yod kyi/ de la sbyin no/ /
325a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis smras pa/ gang yin/ des pas smras pa/ rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di yin no/ /de dag gis smras pa/ khyod de skad ma zer zhig/ rgyal po gsal rgyal ni phyug cing nor mang
325a7(dkon brtsegs): la longs spyod che ba yin gyi/ bdag cag ni dbul zhing mgon med pa yin no/ /des pas smras pa/ nor mang gi ni ci zhig bya/ /rgya mtsho la ni klu rnams bzhin/ /gang dag la ni chog med
325b1(dkon brtsegs): pa| |ma bsdams de dag dbul po yin/ /gang dag 'dod pa rab 'phel zhing / /yang yid ni skye 'gyur ba/ /rmongs pa de dag tshe 'di dang / /pha rol tu yang dbul bor 'gyur/ /de nas grong khyer
325b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbul po des pa skye bo phal po che dag gis yongs su bskor cing / nor bu rin po che de khyer nas/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi don bya ba'i sa ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal
325b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis kyang tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag rigs dang ldan pa'i mchog lnga brgya tsam zhig g.yon chung ngu'i phyir bdog pa thams cad phrogs so/ /grong khyer gyi dbul po des pas nor bu rin
325b4(dkon brtsegs): po che de rgyal po la phul te/ rgyal po chen po/ nor bu rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad ri ba bdag gis rnyed pa 'di la bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/
325b5(dkon brtsegs): mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang lags pa de la stsal to snyam mo/ /de la bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ khyod ni 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po lags
325b6(dkon brtsegs): so snyam bgyid kyi/ kye nor bu rin po che 'di bzhes su gsol/ de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal yul yul por gyur cing ngo tsha bar gyur nas/ grong khyer gyi dbul po des pa la 'di skad
325b7(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so/ /des pa /ci| nga khyod pas kyang ches dbul lam/ des pas smras pa/ lha/ de lta lags te/ bdag pas ches khyod dbul ba lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ rnam grangs
326a1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis dbul/ des pas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang gi 'dod pa rab mang rnam par 'phel zhing longs spyod dag gis cho ga ma 'tshal/ /gnod pa
326a2(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa'i slad du rgyal srid 'khrug cing bdag nyid kyang ni 'dor bgyid pa/ /de ni 'di na 'jig rten mi bsrung yon tan chung ngu dag la mchog tu 'dzin/ /de phyir 'di na de la rtag
326a3(dkon brtsegs): tu chos 'dod rnams ni dbul po lags par sems/ /gang zhig byams pa rab tu bsgoms te sems can rnams la tha ba ma mchis shing / /rtag par rgyun du ngan don tsam gyis
326a4(dkon brtsegs): chog par 'dzin cing 'dod pa ma mchis la/ /nyam thag mthong na rtag tu snying rje bgyid cing shar gnyer bgyid pa ma mchis pa/ /de ni phyug cing nor bzang shin tu nor che dad pa la sogs
326a5(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod gnas/ /gang zhig 'gro ba 'di na dbang phyug rgya chen ldan la chos srung mi bgyid dang / /gang zhig 'di na skye bo dman zhing sdug bsngal gzir ba bzung nas chad
326a6(dkon brtsegs): pas gcod/ /gang zhig chung ma dag gis mdun bltas dga' zhing 'jig rten pha rol mi lta ba/ /de ni chos srung mi bgyid shin tu dbul zhing dman pa'i mi zhes rig par
326a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid/ /dad pas bsam pa dri ma med cing rab brtan tshul khrims dag la yang dag gnas/ /rtag tu ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod thos pa 'dzin te gtong la dga' ba dag /
326b1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi ni mthar phyin blo gros ldan zhing 'jig rten kun la blta bgyid pa/ /de dag tu ni mi dbul thob cing chos 'dod rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa lags/ /gang dag longs spyod rnams
326b2(dkon brtsegs): la rab chags bde la dga' zhing gtong ba ma mchis la/ /lus dang srog la snying por 'dzin cing rtag par snying po don du mi gnyer dang / /gang dag glang chen myos pa lta bur rtag tu yid myos
326b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rgyu ba dang / /lha gcig gang dag dran pa ma mchis de dag dbul ba nyid ni thob pa lags/ /gang dag dkon mchog gsum po dri ma med la gus pa shin tu che ba dang / /lus dang
326b4(dkon brtsegs): srog dang nor rnams las ni rtag tu snying po sgrub pa'i mkhas pa dag/ rtag tu mi brkam sdang bar mi bgyid glen pa ma lags rab tu rgyags ma mchis/ /lha gcig gang dag chos kyis
326b5(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa de dag nor che skyes bu dam pa lags/ /lha gcig me ni rtag tu nags kyi sban spun skam po bsregs pas chog ma 'tshal/ /lha gcig 'di na rgya mtsho chu klung rnams kyi chu 'dzin pas
326b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang chog ma 'tshal/ /'di na nyi ma zla ba 'di dag mkha' la mthar gyis rgyu bas chog mi 'tshal/ /rgyal po brkem phyir rtag tu longs spyod dag gis chog mi mkhyen pas brlag par 'gyur//
326b7(dkon brtsegs): zhugs ni gum par gyur pas rtswa mang dag gis slar yang 'bar bar yong mi bgyid/ /de bzhin mkhas pa shes rab chog par mi 'dzin nyon mongs rnams kyis 'bar mi bgyid/ /chu yi thigs pa
327a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rgyal srid dag kyang mi brtan 'jig par rab phyogs na/ /gnod pa'i rtsa bar gyur cing dge ba 'joms pa'i rgyal srid de ni su zhig 'tshal/ /de nas
327a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po gsal rgyal sems 'khrugs nas/ grong khyer gyi dbul po des pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /des pa/ de ltar nga ni dbul la/ khyod ni phyug par khyod la dpang su yod/ /des
327a3(dkon brtsegs): pas smras pa/ lha/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyan yod 'di nyid na bzhugs pa khyod kyis ma gsan nam/ rgyal pos smras pa/
327a4(dkon brtsegs): ngas mthong yang mthong ngo / /des pas smras pa/ lha/ de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mig tu gyur cing tshad mar gyur pa ste/ de ni bdag gi dpang lags so/ /rgyal pos
327a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ song la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de spyan drongs shig dang / des ji skad du lung bstan pa bzhin du ngas gzung bar bya'o/ /des pas smras pa/ ston pa de la ngan bu'am/
327a6(dkon brtsegs): pho nya gzhan gtang 'os ma lags/ /'dir ni bdag gis bsam bgyis na/ /de mkhyen nas ni gshegs par 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'di 'am pha rol na/ /des ni mi mkhyen
327a7(dkon brtsegs): cang mi mnga'/ /thugs kyis bsam pa mkhyen nas kyang / /'dren pa de ni gshegs par 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas/ /de la nga rgyal skyon mi mnga'/ /sems
327b1(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la legs dgongs pas/ /shin tu rab tu 'ang gshegs 'gyur gyi/ /rgyal chen bdag gis gsol ba la/ /da ni legs par thugs rjes mdzod/ /gang gis ston pa 'dir
327b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i/ /bden pa'i byin rlabs bgyi bar 'tshal/ /me tog spos dang me tog phreng / /rgyal mtshan gdugs dang byug pa dang / /sil snyan sta gon mdzod cig dang / /'dren pa de ni
327b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs par 'gyur/ /des pas thal mo sbyar nas kyang / /phrag pa gcig tu gos gzar 'dug/ pus mo sa la btsugs byas nas/ /'di skad ces ni tshig kyang smras/ /kun mkhyen pa ni
327b4(dkon brtsegs): gang gis su/ /bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen ce na/ /bden pa'i tshig ni 'di nyid kyis/ /thub pa bdag gi mdun du bzhugs/ /de nas tshig 'di smras nas kyang / /sa ni rab tu g.yos par
327b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur/ /sa gzhi rnam par brtol nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byung bar gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul dag dang ldan pa yi/ /nyan thos lnga brgyas yongs su bskor/ /brgya phrag bcu gnyis snyed dag gi/
327b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni/ /skyong ba dang ni lha klu dang / /brgya byin tshangs pas mdun gyis bltas/ /de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul mthong nas ni/ /de tshe 'jig rten ngo mtshar 'dzin/ /rgyal po
327b7(dkon brtsegs): dpung bcas blon por bcas/ /ston pa'i zhabs la 'dud par byed/ /der ni srog chags stong dag gis/ /ston pa la ni mchod pa byas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod byas nas/ /
328a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub don du yid btud do/ /de nas grong khyer gyi dbul po des pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
328a2(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag mnyan yod 'di na 'khyam zhing mchis mchis pa la/ nor bu rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa zhig rnyed nas/ de la
328a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/ mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang lags pa de la stsal lo snyam nas/ de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/ rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di ni
328a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi nang na ches dbul ba ste/ 'di ni pha rol gyi nor 'phrog par bgyid pas ni ngoms ma 'tshal ba lags so/ /slar zhing don du gnyer bar bgyid pas na chog ma 'tshal
328a5(dkon brtsegs): ba lags so/ /gzhan gyi longs spyod dag gis ngoms ma 'tshal ba lags so/ /sdug bsngal ba rnams la rnam par mtho 'tsham pa lags so/ /skyid pa rnams thal mar 'byin pa
328a6(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /dbul po rnams rab tu phung bar bgyid pa lags so/ /phyug po rnams tshar gcod pa lags so/ /shin tu rab tu myos pa lags so/ /rgyal po'i longs spyod rnams
328a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sred pas rnam par bcings pa lags so snyam nas de la bdag gis stsal na len par mi bgyid par/ 'di skad du de ltar nga ni dbul la/ khyod ni 'byor par khyod la dbang
328b1(dkon brtsegs): su yod ces kyang mchi'o/ /de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs snyoms pa/ ngos bzlog gi spyod pa ma mnga' ba/ tha ba dang / dri ma dang / khong khro ba mi mnga' ba
328b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di legs par lung bstan par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyed ni tshe 'di'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi longs

328b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dang ba dang / dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa

329a1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi 'og tu gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag 'di ltar khyod dag 'dra bar nor dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag ni/ des bas gom pa bdun bor ba'i bar

329a4(dkon brtsegs): rnyed lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yul na sems can yon tan gyis che ba nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag mang du gnas so/ /de nas

329a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di kun khyod sbyin kho bo dbung dang bcas/ /khyod kyi slob ma yin gyi khyod kyis bdag slobs shig/ kho bo yun ring dag tu nga rgyal gyis kyang bslus/ /sdig pa'i grogs po dag gis
329a7(dkon brtsegs): bskor cing bzung ba las/ /des pa khyod nyid las ni chos 'di thos pa na/ /rab tu bsdams te kho bos chos bzhin spyad par bya/ /khyim na gnas pa brgya phrag lnga po 'di dag ni//
329b1(dkon brtsegs): nor gyi ched du kho bos go rar bcug pa ste/ /kho bos thams cad btang gi bde bar 'khod par gyis/ /phyin chad 'di 'dra ba dag kho bos yod mi byed/ /lnga brgya btang bar gyur pa gang yin de
329b2(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang / /des pa la ni zhes legs par bskyed nas kyang / /sems ni skyo bar gyur cing ci la'ang mi blta bar/ /bde ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam btab/ /nga ni dbul po ma yin khyod

329b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu des pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bas chog ma 'tshal ba lags na /

329b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des pa/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ yid ches pa dang / dad pa dang / phangs
329b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzin pa dang / gus pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no/ /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku
330a1(dkon brtsegs): mthong na bdag kyang 'di 'dra bar gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni slu bar
330a2(dkon brtsegs): mi mdzad pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag par sems bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad la chos ston cing cher na rab tu grol bar bya pa'i phyir yang sems bskyed
330a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar yang sems de bskyed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa
330a4(dkon brtsegs): legs par mthong ba yin no/ /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ gzugs dben par mthong ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa shes pa dben par mthong ba dang /
330a5(dkon brtsegs): khams bzhi nam mkha' dang 'dra bar mthong ba dang / skye mched grong stong pa lta bur mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no/ /
330a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bdag med pa'i phyir bdag rnam par dag pa dang / sems can med pa'i phyir sems can rnam par dag pa dang / srog med pa'i phyir srog rnam par dag pa
330a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang zag med pa'i phyir gang zag rnam par dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no/ /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ lha'i mig mngon
330b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'du byed pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi mig kun tu spyod pa dang / chos kyi mig gi so sor rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan rjes su rtogs par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin
330b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no/ /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi
330b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa'i phyir shes rab kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / de'i rnam par grol ba mthong
330b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa ste/ des pa/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no//
330b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar 'khor dang bcas te bar snang la gshegs
330b6(dkon brtsegs): so| |de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rigs kyi bu des pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /des pa khyod nam de bzhin gshegs pa la bltar 'gro ba de'i tshe kho bo la yang sbron
330b7(dkon brtsegs): cig dang / kho bo yang de bzhin gshegs pa la bltar 'gro'o/ /des pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de ltar bgyi'o/ /bdag ni khyod bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po la
331a1(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa'i 'khor dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gzigs su gshegs par 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag
331a2(dkon brtsegs): gcig pu la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor phal chen mdzes so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ des pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gang
331a3(dkon brtsegs): yin| des pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / gdul ba'i slad du sems can thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po
331a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po/ gzhan yang theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du gzhan dag kyang byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i
331a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ sems can g.yon can 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ phyir mi
331a6(dkon brtsegs): ldog par 'gyur ba'i 'dun pa drag po ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ sems can ser sna can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa ni
331a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ sems can tshul khrims 'chal ba yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims ni byang chub sems
331b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ sems can gnod sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen
331b2(dkon brtsegs): po| sems can le lo can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ sems can sems rnam par g.yengs
331b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ sems can 'chal ba'i shes rab can yongs su smin par
331b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyid par 'gyur ba'i shes rab ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i byams pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i
331b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'khor ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i snying rje ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos
331b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba'i btang snyoms ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags
331b7(dkon brtsegs): so/ /rgyal po chen po/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/
332a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po
332a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po/ bdud kyi las thams cad yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /
332a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po/ tshig btsun par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / mi rtsub pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ slobs pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i
332a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'phya ba dang / thing slad mi bgyid pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ brjed ngas par mi 'gyur ba'i thos pa'i yo byad gsog pa ni byang chub sems
332a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i slad du slob dpon dang / mkhan po la gus pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen
332a6(dkon brtsegs): po| dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i thos pa 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa yang
332a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'dzin par 'gyur pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
332b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ sems can ma dad pa dad par 'gyur ba'i 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
332b2(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bsgrub par 'gyur ba'i bag yod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal dga' zhing mgu
332b3(dkon brtsegs): la yi rangs te rab tu dag zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas rgyal po la 'os pa'i ras bcos bu zung stong chos la dga' ba'i phyir des pa la byin no/ /des pas smras pa/ rgyal
332b4(dkon brtsegs): po chen po/ bdag la bkur sti dang / mchod pa mdzad pas 'tshal to/ /gang gis bdag la 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gos ras rul ba'i dum bu brgya btsems pa bdag la mchis kyi/
332b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas shing / yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i gos rnams mi 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po chen po/ dpyid gyi dus na ras rul pa'i dum bu'i gos 'di shing
332b6(dkon brtsegs): gi yal ga la bkal te/ dgung gcig gam/ dgung gnyis sam/ dgung bcu'am/ dgung brgyar mchis kyang de la su yang len ba ma mchis shing / de la su yang chags pa'i
332b7(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa ma mchis te/ bdag kyang de bor nas mi lta bar mchi ba'i dus de mchis so/ /rgyal po chen po/ bdag ni bdag gi 'dzin pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i
333a1(dkon brtsegs): gos rnams mi 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpas ni gang la bdag nyid kyang 'dod pa spong bar 'gyur zhing / gzhan yang 'dod pa'i sems
333a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gos bcad par bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ des pa/ gal te de ltar ras bcos bu zung 'di dag khyod mi len na/ kho bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rkang pas
333a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzis shig/ des pas/ lha/ de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras nas/ ras bcos bu zung de dag la rkang bas brdzis te song ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ des pas ras bcos bu zung khyod kyi rkang
333a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dman mar gyur pa 'di rnams ji ltar bya/ des pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ sems can dbul po gcer bu gos ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag la stsol cig/ rgyal
333a5(dkon brtsegs): pos/ des pa/ de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/ rgyal pos mi rnams la bsgo ste/ de dag gis kyang ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du byas so/ /ras bcos bu zung de dag dbul po de dag gis bgos
333a6(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/ bdag cag gis des pa la ji ltar lan glan par bya snyam pa las/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / des pa'i smon lam gyi stobs
333a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis de dag gis bar snang las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos so/ /'dod pa bzhin du lan ni glan bya ba/ /me tog dang ni spos dang byug pa dang / /zas skom nor rnams kyis
333b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi nus te/ /byang chub sems kyis des pa dga' bar 'gyur/ /des pa zas dang gos 'dod ma yin te/ /rnyed dang bkur sti grags pa 'dod ma yin/ /des pa byang chub sems las chos 'dod
333b2(dkon brtsegs): de/ /byang chub sems kyis des pa dga' ba skye/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na rigs kyi bu des pa dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ 'khor dang
333b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa dang / mnyan yod kyi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dong ngo / /de nas mnyan yod
333b4(dkon brtsegs): na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar du lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'khor gyi khyams chen po bkra ba blta na sdug pa/ yangs shing mtho ba la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'di lta ste/
333b5(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi khang bzang rnam par rgyal ba lta bu zhig sprul te/ dbus su shing yongs 'dus brtol sprul lo/ /yongs 'dus brtol gyi drung du yang /
333b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri bkra ba blta na sdug cing chu zheng gab pa la/ lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba mngon par sprul to/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams
333b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi stan drug khri dag kyang mngon par sprul to/ /lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs la sogs pa/ lha'i bu mo khri nyis stong yang me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang /
334a1(dkon brtsegs): byug pa dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag khyer nas/ sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag byed cing des pa'i g.yog bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i
334a2(dkon brtsegs): khri rgyan par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag 'ong bar thugs su chud nas/ gtsug lag khang nas byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan
334a3(dkon brtsegs): thos rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas dri za'i bu gtsug phung lnga pas lha'i bu mo nyi 'od la smras pa/ bzang mo/ tshur shog/ des pa'i
334a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yog bya ba'i phyir rgyud kyi sgra dang / glu'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya'o/ /de nas lha'i bu mo nyi 'od kyis/ lha'i bu mo lnga brgya tsam dang thabs gcig tu rgyud kyi
334a5(dkon brtsegs): sgrar sbyar ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod pa/ khyod kyis bskal pa brgyar ni sngan chad dka' thub spyad/ /khyod ni bsdu ba dag dang dul dang sbyin la dges/ /khyod kyi sku gsung
334a6(dkon brtsegs): thugs rnams yongs su dag pa ste/ /srid gsum 'jig rten bla ma la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /khyod ni tha ba mi mnga' bzod dang byams la dges/ /khyod ni brtson 'grus brtan dang
334a7(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyi pha rol gshegs/ /khyod ni bsam gtan blo dang tshul rnams snang la dges/ /dri ma gsum gyi nyes pa sel la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /khyod ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti
334b1(dkon brtsegs): mug sil la dges/ /khyod kyi thugs ni zhi zhing snyoms la thugs rjer ldan/ /khyod ni yang dag gsung zhing dam pa'i don yang mkhyen/ /srid pa gsum po thar par mdzad la bdag phyag 'tshal//
334b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi the tshom sel bar mdzad/ /khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi skyon rnams mtha' dag sel/ /khyod ni mthong ba rnams la mchog tu dga' bar mdzad/ /bdag ni rgyal la
334b3(dkon brtsegs): srog gis skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/ /lha yi bu mo mchog ni 'dod chags chags gyur pa/ /gang gis mthong ba de yang chos la dga' bar 'gyur/ /dga' bas dran pa shin tu rgya chen thob
334b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ /dga' bas sdug la 'dod pa'i dga' dang bral bar 'gyur/ /mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis dag gi rgyan rnams kyis/ /legs par brgyan pa gsal ba'i yon tan mchog
334b5(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ba/ /gsung mchog mi yi dam pa gsung ni rnam par dag/ mtshungs pa med pa'i 'od mnga' khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /'phags pa 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser mdog phyag
334b6(dkon brtsegs): mthil sdug/ /thub pa'i sku stod seng ge'i 'dra zhing glang chen stabs/ /smin tshugs legs shing shangs legs tshems snyoms thags bzang mdzes/ /dpal gyi snying po shAkya thub mchog
334b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod la 'dud/ /rgyal ba yon tan brgya phrag dag gis rgyas gyur pa/ /bde gshegs shin tu dga' ba skyed mdzad bstod pa yi/ /bsod nams yon tan mtha' yas bsgrubs pa gang
335a1(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ /de yis 'dir ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas mnyam gyur cig/ de nas rigs kyi bu des pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag gis yongs su bskor nas/
335a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis
335a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu des pa la khri'u stan bzang po bdag nyid kyis byin te 'di la 'dug cig ces byas nas/ rigs kyi bu des pa khri'u stan pa bzang po de la 'dug go /rgyal po gsal rgyal
335a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang bcas pa yang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas rang rang gi stan la 'khod do/ /de nas rigs kyi bu gang dag gis des pa sngon ma mthong ba
335a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'di skad du/ dbul po gos ngan pa gyon pa 'di la/ 'di lta bur mchod pa byed do zhes 'dzer to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras
335a6(dkon brtsegs): so| |grogs po dag/ 'di la brnyas par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di'i yon tan gyi che ba nyid ji snyed dang ldan pa de ni kho bo'i mngon sum du gyur to// grogs po dag/ khyod re
335a7(dkon brtsegs): zhig sdod cig dang / rigs kyi bu 'di'i yon tan gyi bkod pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rigs kyi bu des pas lha'i bu de dag gi bsam pa rtogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das
335b1(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i bkod pa'i thabs dang / ye shes kyi bkod pa'i thabs bcom ldan 'das kyis
335b2(dkon brtsegs): bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od phyung ste/ 'od des des pa'i lus la reg nas/ lha'i rgyal bo brgya byin gyi gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ci 'dra ba de
335b3(dkon brtsegs): las 'bum gyur pas kyang ches lhag par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag ya mtshan du 'dzin par gyur te/ des pa la me tog dag gis gtor to/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs
335b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu des pa la bka' stsal pa/ des pa/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje lta bu'i mthu la gnas pa'i tshe yang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dman par ston cing /
335b5(dkon brtsegs): dman pa'i mthu la gnas kyang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ mchog tu ston par byed pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no/ /ye shes la gnas kyang mi shes par ston cing /
335b6(dkon brtsegs): mi shes par ston kyang / shes par snang ba 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no/ /ye shes ma thob pa rnams la yang lus kyi spyod pa dang / spyod lam gyis dad pa skyed par byed cing / ye shes
335b7(dkon brtsegs): thob pa rnams la yang spyod pa thams cad yang dag par ston pas/ rdzu 'phrul ston par byed pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no/ /rtag tu sems la dbang byed pas ngan cing dbul bar
336a1(dkon brtsegs): ston cing / tshangs pas kyang mchod pa dang / mchog gi bkod pa la gnas kyang / skye bo phal gyis kyang mchod pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no/ /sems can bsdu ba'i
336a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir ngan cing dbul bar yang nye bar ston la/ sems can rnams la mngon par 'byung ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ longs spyod rgya chen po dang ldan yang mngon par 'byung ba ston pa 'di ni de'i
336a3(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu des pas ji srid cig nas byang chub kyi phyir
336a4(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu des pa ni sangs rgyas bye ba mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ sngon gyi tshul phun sum
336a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa/ bzod pa gsum thob pa/ spobs pa thob pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse bar byas pa/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mkhas pa ste/ ngan cing dbul bas
336a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dis ngan cing dbul ba 'dis sems can ji snyed cig btul lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
336a7(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ lha'i bu 'bum phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas te/ mi rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /kun dga'
336b1(dkon brtsegs): bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji srid cig na ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa
336b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni ci 'dra zhig tu 'gyur/ ming ni ji skad ces bgyi ba zhig tu 'gyur ba lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/
336b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can don la brtson dang brtul zhugs brtan pa dang / /grags pa rgya chen dag gis bsam pa khyab byas dang / /byang chub yon tan gnas pa'i spyod pa ci 'dra ba/ /ngas ni khyod la bshad
336b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi kun dga' khyod nyon cig/ 'di na rgyal la mchod mchog phyir ni gus byed cing / /dam pa'i chos ni bsrung phyir rab tu brtson byed pa/ /des pa yi ni spyod pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa/ /de dag
336b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dir ni bgrang ba nus par mi 'gyur ro/ /pha rol phyin pa 'di dag la ni legs par bslabs/ /mngon par shes pa dag gis sngan chad rtse bar byas/ /tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyis ni
336b6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' mar phyin par song / /thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa dag la legs par bslabs/ /'dir ni de yis 'dus byas skyon rnams legs par mthong / /sangs rgyas byang chub kyang ni mngon
336b7(dkon brtsegs): sum gyur par byas/ /'dis ni sems can ji lta ji ltar thar gyur pa'i/ /rnam par smin pa'i mtshan nyid la yang legs par bslabs/ /'jigs pa med cing blo dang rtogs dang dran dang
337a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan/ /spobs pa dang ni gzugs rnams dang yang ldan pa ste/ /bdud kyi lcags kyu nyon mongs rdzab las nges byung zhing / /sangs rgyas spyod yul don chen la
337a2(dkon brtsegs): ni rab tu gnas/ /'jig rten chos rnams mang po dag gis ma gos la/ /chags pa la sogs rnams kyis brag ltar yongs mi g.yos/ /su yi drung du mi 'gro ring du byed pa'ang
337a3(dkon brtsegs): min/ /nam mkha' lta bur bcings dang grol ba med pa yin/ /snying rjes gnas shing sems kyang yongs su skyo ba med/ /shin tu bsdams shing nem nur can la byams sems ldan//
337a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can kun la bdag dang 'dra bar sdug par blta/ /skyon la mi lta 'khrul pa dag dang ldan ma yin/ /ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa rnams la gnas/ /'di ni ji skad
337a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa bzhin du spyod par byed/ /chos nyid la ni chos kyi tshul gyis legs par bslabs/ /stong pa nyid la mos shing gnyis las rnam par grol/ /bzod pa gsum thob skye ba'i
337a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul ma yin to/ /sangs rgyas tshul dang yon tan dag la rab tu gnas/ /'di ni 'jig rten gang du rgyu ba byed pa na/ /der ni skye bo mang po rnam par grol bar byed/ /sangs
337a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi ni sras 'di gang du gnas pa der/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni stongs pa ma yin te/ /de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten ma lus pas/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas
337b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'di la gus par gyis/ /nga ni mya ngan 'das nas nyams pa'i dus bab tshe/ /des pa 'di ni sangs rgyas spyod pa spyad nas kyang / /sngon chad gnas pa mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig
337b2(dkon brtsegs): rten khams/ /mi 'khrugs 'jig rten nyid du phyir yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /brtan po srog chags rnams la phan par bya ba dang / /zhing gi 'byor pa dag ni yongs su brtsal ba dang / /byang
337b3(dkon brtsegs): chub tu ni sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum du spyad pa spyod par byed/ /de yi 'og tu de ni skyob pa rgyal bar 'gyur/ /ming ni 'jig rten rgyal po dbang
337b4(dkon brtsegs): phyug ces kyang bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba yi/ /zhing dang de yi 'jig rten du ni mtshungs ma yin/ /'jig rten khams de legs par sprul pa zhes bya ste/ /
337b5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan thams cad dang ni ldan par 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi tshe mi tshad ni lo khri thub par 'gyur/ /de yi dge 'dun shin tu mang ste bgrang las 'das/ /nyan thos theg pa can
337b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi dge 'dun nyung bar 'gyur/ /phal cher byang chub don du brtson pa byas nas su/ /de dag thams cad ye shes stobs dang rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /rnam par thar pa rnams dang ldan zhing 'jigs
337b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med/ /gcig tu nges par chos ni legs par bshad rnams kyis/ /'jig rten khams der rtag tu sgra chen sgrogs par 'gyur/ /de na bdud rnams med cing srid par chags pa med//
