344b4(dkon brtsegs): mtsho ltar dgang dka' ba dang / sbrul gyi gzeb ltar nan tan gyi bag bya ba dang / byis pa chung ngu ltar rtag tu yongs su bskyang dgos pa dang / snod chag pa ltar rtag tu bag bya dgos
344b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / yul ngan pa ltar rtag tu gnod pa 'byung ba dang / zas dug can ltar rtag tu yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / re zhig dgos pa'i phyir snod brnyan ma lta bu dang / khur bkur
344b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir shing rta lta bu yin pa 'ba' zhig tu blos gzung bar bya'o/ /khyim bdag rnams/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas lus 'di yi thog ma dang / tha ma'i rgyu la so sor brtag
344b7(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /pha ma'i khu chu dang / khrag 'dus pa las 'byung ste/ 'di la khu chu dang / khrag ni lus kyi thog ma'i rgyu yin no/ /tha ma'i rgyu ni zas 'ju ba la sogs pa ste/ kham gyi bza'
345a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i zas zos ma thag tu bad kan gyi gnas su 'gro'o/ /bad kan gyi gnas su phyin nas/ bad kan gyis rkyang rkyang por byas te/ shin tu mi gtsang bar 'gyur ro/ /
345a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'og tu mkhris pa'i gnas su 'gro ste/ mkhris pa'i gnas su phyin nas/ zhu zhing skyur por 'gyur te/ rlung gi gnas su 'gro'o/ /zhus te rlung gi gnas su phyin nas/ rlung gis tshigs
345a3(dkon brtsegs): ma logs shig/ dwangs ma logs shig tu rnam par 'byed de/ tshigs ma las ni gcin dang ngan skyugs la sogs te/ dri ma rnams 'byung / dwangs ma las ni khrag tu 'gyur te/
345a4(dkon brtsegs): khrag las sha'o/ /sha las tshil lo/ /tshil las rus pa'o/ /rus pa las rkang ngo / /rkang las khu chu'o/ /khu chu las lus 'di lta ste/ de ltar thog ma dang / tha ma'i rgyu mi gtsang
345a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/ lus mi gtsang bar byang chub sems dpas bsam par bya'o/ /lus la mi gtsang bar lta ba na/ byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bsam par bya ste/ lus zhes bya ba
345a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rus pa sum brgya drug cus khog pa bslang pa/ shing ngan pa'i khyim ltar tshigs sum brgyas sbyar ba/ rtsa'i dra ba bzhi brgyas klags pa/ sha spar tshad lnga brgyas g.yos
345a7(dkon brtsegs): pa| sdom rtsa drug gis khebs pa/ rtsa bdun brgyas gang ba/ rgyus pa bdun brgyas sbrel pa/ chu ba bcu drug gis brtan pa/ chu ba gnyis kyis khyab par dkris pa/ rgyu ma 'dom
345b1(dkon brtsegs): phyed dang bzhis nang khrol byas pa/ long ka dang / pho ba dang 'brel ba'i gnyer ma rim pa bcu drug tu 'khyil ba/ rtsa phran nyis stong lnga brgyas skar khung byas pa/ gshis brgya rtsa bdun gyis
345b2(dkon brtsegs): snod chag pa ltar shig shig por gyur pa/ spu'i khung bu byed ba brgya stong phrag brgyad cus rtswa ltar khebs pa/ dbang po lnga'i bu ga dgu yod pa/ gnas bdun dang ldan pa mi gtsang bas yongs
345b3(dkon brtsegs): su gang ba/ klad pa snyim pa gang dang / tshil snyim pa gang dang / zhag snyim pa gsum dang / bad kan snyim pa drug dang / mkhris pa snyim pa drug dang / rlung gis mtha' dag drangs pa dang /
345b4(dkon brtsegs): khrag bre gang dang / ngan skyugs phul gang dang / de dag thams cad kyis bang ba bar bcad pa ltar so sor yongs su gang ba/ pags pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ ro bro ba
345b5(dkon brtsegs): drug gis gso ba/ lus kyi me la ngan skyugs kyi sbyin sreg byed pa/ rtag tu mthar 'dzag pa/ lus kyi yan lag de dag thams cad kyis blta na mi sdug pa dri nga ba/ rnag gi rang bzhin
345b6(dkon brtsegs): yin na/ 'di la su zhig gus par byed de/ skad cig dgos pa'i phyir snod brnyan pa tsam du zad pa dang / khur bkur ba'i phyir shing rta lta bu 'ba' zhig yin par chos kyis blos
345b7(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar bya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'di ltar mi gtsang phung po'i lus la ni/ /gzugs sngon nga rgyal can gang gus byed pa/ /byis pa'i blo can de ni mngon bzhin du/ /mi
346a1(dkon brtsegs): shes ngan skyugs bum pa thogs shing 'gro/ de yi sna nas rnag gi rnam pa 'dzag/ kha nas dri mi zhim pa rtag tu 'byung / /mig rdul chags shing skye bo srin
346a2(dkon brtsegs): bu can/ /de la su zhig chags shing gus pa byed/ /dper na byis pa sol ba thogs nas su/ /'di ni dkar por bya zhes bdar byed kyang / /dkar po'i dngos por mi 'gyur zad par
346a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /byis blo phyin ci log gi nga rgyal can/ /de ltar mi gang gtsang sbra'i blo gros ldan/ /nga yis lus 'di gtsang mar bya zhes te/ /bskus phyis 'bab stegs brgyar ni khrus byas
346a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang / /'chi bdag dbang gis zad 'gyur gtsang mi 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang khyim bdag dpa' sbyin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la bka' stsal
346a5(dkon brtsegs): pa| khyim bdag rnams/ /'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod
346a6(dkon brtsegs): pas/ rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhis lus la brtag par bya ste/ rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khyim bdag rnams/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
346a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen pos lus yid du mi 'ong ba dang / rang bzhin gyis mi mthun pa ste/ smad par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rnag zag pa ste/ dri mi zhim par brtag
346b1(dkon brtsegs): par bya| byang chub sems dpas lus tha mar 'jig pa ste/ snying po med par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rgyus pa'i bog res sbrel ba ste/ nyam chung bar brtag par
346b2(dkon brtsegs): bya| byang chub sems dpas lus mi gtsang ba zag pa ste/ mi gtsang bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus yang dag pa ma yin pa ste/ sgyu ma lta bur brtag par bya/
346b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas lus skye bo mi mkhas pa so so'i skye bo rnams 'khrug par byed par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'jig pa dang / bu ga dgu'i sgo nas 'dzag
346b4(dkon brtsegs): par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod chags kyi mes kun tu 'bar bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus zhe sdang gi mes tshig par brtag par
346b5(dkon brtsegs): bya| byang chub sems dpas lus gti mug gi mes me lce gcig tu gyur par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams
346b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis ldong par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' lus 'dod chags kyi dra bas khebs shing srid pa'i dra bar chud par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus kun
346b7(dkon brtsegs): nas bu gas yongs su gang bas bu ga'i gnas su brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis gtses par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas
347a1(dkon brtsegs): lus srin bu'i rigs brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gnas su brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'chi ba'i chos 'di yin pas mi rtag pa brtag par bya/
347a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas lus chos la rmongs pas bems po yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus mthar gyis grub cing mtha' mar 'jig pas bum pa lta bur brtag
347a3(dkon brtsegs): par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus mya ngan gyis gnon pa mang pos gang bas nyam thag par brtag pa bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus tha mar rga shir 'gyur bas brtan pa
347a4(dkon brtsegs): med par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus g.yo dang sgyu'i nye bar spyod pa dag gis klags par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus dgang dka' bas sa'i
347a5(dkon brtsegs): gting lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus dga' ba'i gzugs dang / bde ba'i gzugs la zhen pas me long lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas
347a6(dkon brtsegs): lus 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis chog mi shes par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dag gis 'joms par brtag par
347a7(dkon brtsegs): bya| byang chub sems dpas lus bsti stang dang / gnod pa myong bas mi brtan par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus chu klung gi rgyun bzhin du gzhan 'byung bas rkyen
347b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dang gzhan du brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus tshul bzhin ma yin pa rnam pa sna tshogs yid la byed pa'i rnam pa rtog pa dag gis yid kyi sems pa yin par
347b2(dkon brtsegs): brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus tha mar dur khrod la thug pas byas pa mi gzo bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus spyang ki dang / lce spyang dang / khyi rjen sha za ba
347b3(dkon brtsegs): dag gi zas su brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rus pa dang / rgyus pa'i bog res sbrel bas 'khrul 'khor lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus bshang ba dang /
347b4(dkon brtsegs): gci ba dang / mchil ma dang / snabs dang / rnag dang / khrag gis yongs su gang ba ste/ blta ba'i 'os ma yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus zas dang skom las
347b5(dkon brtsegs): byung ba ste/ rang gi kha na las pa ma yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus mi rtag pa ste/ shin tu zad pa'i chos nyid yin pas don med pa'i glags pas glags par
347b6(dkon brtsegs): brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus phyir rgol ba mang po 'byung bas dgra lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus yang dang yang sdug bsngal myong bas gsod
347b7(dkon brtsegs): pa lta bur brtag par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpas lus sdug bsngal gsum gyis gtses te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid dang / 'gyur ba'i
348a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal nyid dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid kyis te/ sdug bsngal gyi snod yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus phung po lnga grub
348a2(dkon brtsegs): pas sdug bsngal gyi gong bu yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rkyen tha dad pa las byung bas bdag med pa dang / bdag po med par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems
348a3(dkon brtsegs): dpas lus skyes pa dang / bud med dang bral bas srog med par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams kyis stong par brtag par bya/ byang
348a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas lus rmi lam lta bu ste/ gsog tu brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yang dag pa ma yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas
348a5(dkon brtsegs): lus smig rgyu lta bu ste/ 'khrul par byed par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus brag ca lta bu ste/ slu bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus mig yor lta
348a6(dkon brtsegs): bu ste/ slu ba'i bdag nyid du brtag par bya ste/ khyim bdag rnams/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag gis lus la brtag par
348a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /de ltar rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus la lus su 'dun pa dang / lus la dga' ba dang / lus bdag gir byed pa dang / lus la srid
348b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / lus la gnas pa dang / lus la zhen pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad spong ngo / /srog la srog tu 'dun pa dang / srog la dga' ba dang / srog bdag gir byed pa dang / srog la
348b2(dkon brtsegs): sred pa dang / srog la gnas pa dang / srog la zhen pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo
348b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams dang / yo byad thams cad kyi bar dag la 'dun pa dang / dga' ba dang /
348b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gir byed pa dang / sred pa dang / gnas pa dang / zhen pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad spong ste/ de lus dang / srog la mi lta'o/ /de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang /
348b5(dkon brtsegs): chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams
348b6(dkon brtsegs): la mi lta bar pha rol tu phyin pa drug myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /khyim bdag rnams/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs
348b7(dkon brtsegs): nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lus rgya cher yongs su bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe
349a1(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /mir rnyed shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed pa la/ /lus kyi phyir ni sdig pa ma byed cig/ 'di ni dur khrod pa ste lce
349a2(dkon brtsegs): spyang zas/ /lus kyi phyir ni ya ngar ma 'jug cig/ g.yo ldan lus la sred pa bskyed nas ni/ /byis pa rtag tu rnam par rmongs te 'khyam/ /lus 'di byas pa mi gzo dngos yin pas//
349a3(dkon brtsegs): nyin dang mtshan du sdug bsngal tshor ba myong / /rtag tu nad 'dra sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor te/ /lus 'di ngan skyugs dang ni mchil mas gang / /bkres dang skom pas rtag tu mngon
349a4(dkon brtsegs): par gtses/ /mkhas pa su zhig lus la sred pa skye/ /lus ni sa gting 'dra ste chog mi shes/ /gshed ma mi mdza' 'dra yang byis pas gso/ /lus kyi ched du sdig pa'i las
349a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang byed/ /de phyir de dag sdug bsngal tshor ba myong / /lus 'di rdo rje lta bur sa ma yin/ /lus kyi ched du sdig pa ma byed cig/ 'chi bar rtogs nas bsod nams myur du byos//
349a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin sangs rgyas bstan la dad pa bskyed/ /zas dang skom dang byug pa gos rnams kyis/ /lus 'di ji srid yun ring bsnyen bkur te/ /brtan pa byas kyang 'jig pa 'gyur
349a7(dkon brtsegs): yin na/ /'di la 'bad pa don med ci phyir bya/ /bskal pa brgyar yang shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /thub pa 'byung 'di khyod kyis rnyed pa la/ /sangs rgyas bstan la de bzhin dad pa
349b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i ngan 'gror ma 'gro zhig /lo stong bye bar su zhig 'tsho 'gyur ba/ /des kyang chags pa yongs su spang bya na/ /su zhig lo brgya thub par mi 'gyur ba/ /
349b2(dkon brtsegs): de phyir dga' ba mi rnyed smos ci dgos/ /ma bsdams mi rnams kha cig 'di skad du/ /mir rnyed shin tu dka' ba rnyed pa la/ /gzhon tshe rtsed mo dag dang dga' bya zhing / /nor btsal
349b3(dkon brtsegs): bde ba myong ba bya zhes zer/ /nor tshol ba la bde ba ga la yod/ /bsrung ba'i phyir yang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ /de phyir mkhas pas chags pa yongs spangs la/ /ngan ngon
349b4(dkon brtsegs): tsam gyis chog shes thob par byos/ /longs spyod sgyu ma 'dra zhing rmi lam mtshungs/ /'di dag byis pa'i skye bo 'drid pa yin/ /skad cig 'byung zhing skad cig 'jig par 'gyur/ /
349b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa su zhig longs spyod sred pa bskyed/ /sgyu ma 'dra zhing gar mkhan lta dang mtshungs/ /dri za'i grong khyer sna tshogs ci 'dra ba/ /longs spyod de dag 'di 'dra byis pa 'drid/ /
349b6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar log pa 'tshol zhing byis pa 'khyam/ /sdug bsngal brgya yis longs spyod btsal btsal ba/ /lus la gnod pa mtshungs med bskyed byas nas/ /rgyal po'i mthu yis de dag
349b7(dkon brtsegs): phrogs gyur pa/ /de dag la ni mkhas gang dga' ba bskyed/ /bu dang chung ma'i dbang du mi 'gyur bar/ /rgyal pos nyes pa byung ba'i nor phrogs pa/ /nyes pa 'di 'dra de dag rigs
350a1(dkon brtsegs): nas su/ /mkhas pa rnams ni khyim la sred mi skyed/ /rtag tu brnab cing longs spyod tshol byed pa/ /de ni pha dang ma la mi gus shing / /bu dang chung ma la yang
350a2(dkon brtsegs): mi byams par/ /de dag rtag tu chags la 'jug par byed/ /bdag gi longs spyod 'grib par 'gyur 'ong zhes/ /brnab mo byas gzo nam yang rnyed mi 'gyur/ /g.yo dang sgyus
350a3(dkon brtsegs): ni nor rnams tshol byed pa/ /brnab mo dag la mkhas pa yid mi rton/ /sems can brnab mo g.yo ldan 'drid pa nyid/ /yid bzhin sems la tshig gis dga' bar byed/ /yid
350a4(dkon brtsegs): brtan kyang ni de la yid mi rton/ /'on kyang bu 'drar sdug par ston par byed/ /sems can brnab mo 'jig rten gang rgyu ba/ /sman dang bstan bcos dag la mkhas ston cing / /
350a5(dkon brtsegs): smad 'tshong lta bur tshig gis 'drid byed la/ /khong nas mi bde shin tu rtsub pa yin/ /brnab mo dag la mdza' bo nam yang med/ /nye du med cing snying slebs grogs kyang
350a6(dkon brtsegs): med| / 'on kyang de dag nor phyir ston par byed/ /skye bo brnab la mkhas pas yid mi rton/ /brnab mo longs spyod ched du bya min byed/ /shin tu mi zad sems ni kun du
350a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed/ /de phyir mkhas pa yang dag rtogs byas la/ /ngan ngon ci yang rung bas chog shes gyis/ /gser dang mu tig nor bu byi ru dang / /las dges de dag lbu ba las
350b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'byung / /de dag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ma rtogs nas/ /de dag phyir ni 'thab cing rtsod par byed/ /byams pa zhes bya gang zhig 'dir 'byung ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de ni byung ba'i
350b2(dkon brtsegs): tshe| |sa 'di gser gyis rab tu gang bar 'gyur/ /de yi tshe na de ni ga las 'byung / /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag 'byung bas ste/ /rdzun pa'i chos can 'khrul byed rmongs par byed/ dper
350b3(dkon brtsegs): na so ga'i nyi ma'i gung dus na/ /smig rgyu chur snang 'dod pa de bzhin no/ /bskal pa gcig lon nas ni 'jig rten 'di/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin nam mkhar 'gyur bar 'ong / /lhun
350b4(dkon brtsegs): po dag kyang tshig cing rnam par 'jig/ de dag gang nas 'ongs shing gang du 'gro/ chu mig mtshe'u dang rdzing dang rgya mtsho rnams/ /de dag med 'gyur skam 'gyur 'byung bar 'gyur//
350b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin 'dod pa gsog ste snying po med/ /mkhas pa su zhig de la dga' bar byed/ /mkhas pa su zhig blo yi stobs ldan pa/ /de dag rtag tu khyim gyi skyon la rtog /'di la ro
350b6(dkon brtsegs): myong byed pa su yod na/ /de dag ci yi phyir ni spong mi byed/ /'dren ma'i las kyis longs spyod tshol byed cing / /bu dang de bzhin chung ma gso bar byed/ /shin tu sdug bsngal gyur
350b7(dkon brtsegs): ba de dus na/ /bu dang chung ma skyabs su 'gyur ma yin/ /ji ltar sna tshogs las byas blangs pa bzhin/ /bu dang chung ma dag kyang 'dor bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid gcig pus sdug
351a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal myong bar 'ong / /de dag de tshe bdag gi skal mi len/ /mya ngan rnams kyis bde phyir de dag blangs/ /'di na de dag sdug bsngal mya ngan 'gyur/ /srid
351a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum 'jigs pa 'di na bshes kyang med/ /de bzhin bu dang chung ma rtsa lag med/ /pha ma spun dang bu dang chung ma dang / /bran dang nor dang rtsa lag tshogs kyi rnams/ /shi ba'i
351a3(dkon brtsegs): gshin phyir de dag 'gro ba med/ /las rnams rjes su 'brang zhing byis pa 'gro /las ni rjes su 'brang zhing mi kun 'dong / /las kyis gnas pa 'jig rten rnam par rgyu/ /skye 'di
351a4(dkon brtsegs): las kyi bdag nyid reg gyur nas/ /mkhas pa dag ni dge ba'i las rnams byed/ /mnar med song tshe de dag skyabs min pas/ /pha ma spun dang snying sdug bu rnams dang / /rtsa
351a5(dkon brtsegs): lag nye du snag gi gnyen mtshams dang / /de dag ched du mkhas pa sdig mi byed/ /las de yongs su zad pa ma gtogs par/ /rab tu mi bzad 'jigs las mi mi grol/ /de
351a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir sdig pas 'jigs pa'i mi rnams kyis/ /bsgrims te sdig pa yongs su spang bar bya/ /ji ltar las rnams byas pa ma gtogs par/ /gshin rje dang ni gshin rje'i rang
351a7(dkon brtsegs): rta dang / /mdza' bshes dag dang rtsa lag tshogs dang spun/ /pha ma bu dang chung ma srung mi byed/ /khyod kyis mi yi lus ni thob gyur la/ /thob nas sdig pa spangs pa ma byas pas//
351b1(dkon brtsegs): kye ma da ltar sdug bsngal mi bzad myong / /'di ni mi dge las kyi rnam smin yin/ /las kyi rnam par smin la yid ma ches/ /khyod ni rang gi sems kyis mi dge byas/ /'di la ngas ni ci
351b2(dkon brtsegs): yang ma lan zhes/ /de las chos rgyal gshin rje de skad smra/ /rang gis las byas rang la rnam par smin/ /rang gis las kyis khyod ni 'dir 'ongs kyi/ /ji ltar sngon chad mi 'dod
351b3(dkon brtsegs): las byas pa/ /sdug bsngal de ni nyid kyis myong bar gyis/ /de tshe pha ma rang gi chung ma rnams/ /sdug bsngal nyen pa yongs su thar mi byed/ /legs pa'i las byas pas ni grol bar
351b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /de ltar khyim ni yongs su spang bar bya/ /kho sgo dbyug pa ltung gi chad pa rnams/ /su zhig spong 'dod zhi ba don gnyer bas/ /khyim la 'jigs par gyis te spang byos la/
351b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhas pa'i bstan la chos spyod cing / /khyim ni rab 'bar sdug bsngal mang po'i rtswa/ /sems la 'byung ba rnams kyis rtag tu 'bar/ /me mur 'obs 'dra 'jigs par
351b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa la/ /mkhas pa su zhig de la sred pa bskyed/ /khyim gnas bu dang chung ma'i mya ngan byed/ /khyim gnas de bzhin longs spyod mya ngan byed/ /nyes pa 'di dang gzhan yang
351b7(dkon brtsegs): dpag med de/ /de ltas khyim ni rab tu spang bar bya/ /'dren pa rnams kyi bstan la dga' byed pa/ /ma btab ma rmos bde dang yid bde'i rgyu/ /sdug bsngal mang mo'i rtsa ba khyim
352a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di la/ /blun po dga' yi mkhas pa gzhar mi dga'/ /pags pa chu rgyus sha dang rus pa'i lus/ /'di ni nga yi chung ma 'du shes bskyed/ /byis pa rmongs pa
352a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags skyed par byed/ /bud med sgyu ma lta bur yong ma shes/ /shes rab ldan pa khyim gyi nyes rig nas/ /de phyir 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun spangs te/ /chos la sman gyi 'du
352a3(dkon brtsegs): shes bzhag byas nas/ /ma chags khyim nas myur du 'byung bar byed/ /de nas khyim bdag dpa' byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
352a4(dkon brtsegs): thos nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de dag bzod pa thob nas mchog tu dga' ba dang mgu bar gyur te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//
352a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos la 'dod gyur nas/ /gang dag gis ni sems bskyed pa/ /kye ma rnyed pa rnyed pa che/ /'di ni rnyed pa kun gyi mchog/ byang chub sems ni dga' ba ste/ /sems
352a6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad bde bgyid pa'i/ /sems 'dir su dag dga' bskyed pa/ /de dag 'tsho ba legs par 'tsho/ /sems can kun la phan bgyid pa'i/ /sems 'di gang dag bskyed
352a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa/ /de dag sems can thams cad dga'/ /de dag mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems la su dga' ba/ /de dag lus ni gser 'dra zhing / /mtshan gyis
352b1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu spras pa dang / /'jig rten snang ba byed par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni sems che ste/ /sems kun nang na dge ba mchog /yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs/ /nad kun rab
352b2(dkon brtsegs): tu zhi bar bgyid/ /sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams/ /byang chub sems ni 'dod mi bgyid/ /'khor ba la ni mi rtog pa/ /byang chub sems kyis skyo bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems
352b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsod nams gang / /de la gal te gzugs mchis na/ /nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste/ /de ni de bas lhag par 'gyur/ /gang+gA'i bye ma grangs snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas zhing
352b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams mi gang gis/ /rin chen dag gis rab bkang ste/ /'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas/ /gang gis thal mo sbyar bgyis te/ /byang chub tu ni sems btud na/ /mchod pa 'di ni
352b5(dkon brtsegs): khyad par 'phags/ /de la mtha' ni ma mchis so/ /byang chub sems ni ci 'dra ba/ /drang srong mchog gis bstan mdzad pa/ /de 'dra'i mchod pa gzhan ma mchis/ /dpal yang gzhan
352b6(dkon brtsegs): ni mchis ma lags/ /sman gyi dam pa nad ma mchis/ /byang chub sems ni yon tan ldan/ /nad kun rab tu zhi bar bgyid/ /sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid/ /me gsum
352b7(dkon brtsegs): dag gis gdungs pa yi/ /sems can sdug bsngal mthong nas ni/ /bskal pa dpag tu med par spyod/ /mkhas rnams skyo bar yong mi 'gyur/ /gang dag byang chub spyad spyod pa/ /
353a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bo sman pa'i rgyal po 'dra/ /de dag sems can sdug bsngal skyob/ /skyo ba rtag tu rnam par spangs/ /dpa' bo sangs rgyas chos 'tshal ba/ /'gro ba'i skye
353a2(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad du/ /sems de 'dor bar mi bgyid cing / /de dag brtul zhugs de yang ston/ /sems 'di la ni gang dga' ba/ /shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog/ sangs rgyas ci 'dra de 'drar
353a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /bdag cag rnyed pa legs par rnyed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad
353a4(dkon brtsegs): pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog sna tshogs/ kha dog du ma byung ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang /
353a5(dkon brtsegs): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag ste/ 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med dag khyab par byas nas/ tshangs
353a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste/ nyi zla rnams kyi gzi brjid zad par byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das
353a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom
353b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par ni de bzhin gshegs
353b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang
353b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ /rgyu ma mchis par rnam 'dren rgyal ba mchog/ sangs rgyas skyob pa 'dzum pa mi ston na/ /ci slad bcom ldan khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad pa/ /'jig rten phan dgongs thugs
353b4(dkon brtsegs): brtse bdag la gsungs/ /khyod kyis ci slad de ring 'dzum bstan gsungs/ /bka' mchid che ldan nor mchog sbyin mdzad pa/ /dbul por gyur pa nor dang ldan par mdzod/ /'jig
353b5(dkon brtsegs): rten ldongs la myur du mig kyang stsol/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis gang dag bla na
353b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du lhags pa'i khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom
353b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam 'di dag gis/
354a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ kun dga' bo/ khyim bdag 'di dag thams cad ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas
354a2(dkon brtsegs): pa| dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byed pa dag ste/ khyim bdag 'di dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ nam du yang ngan 'gro log
354a3(dkon brtsegs): par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing / phyis kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bde ba myong nas/ mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
354a4(dkon brtsegs): byams pa mnyes par byed cing / thugs byung bar mi byed de/ bsti stang byed par 'gyur/ btsun par byed par 'gyur/ rim gro byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /bskal
354a5(dkon brtsegs): pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang mnyes par byed cing / thugs byung bar mi byed de/ bsti stang byed par 'gyur/ btsun par byed par 'gyur/ rim gro
354a6(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyang nyan par 'gyur te/ thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par
354a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu bskal pa nyi shu rtsa lda na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
354b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar mtshan mthun par 'jig
354b2(dkon brtsegs): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ 'di lar rgya che ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das/
354b3(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ /'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/
354b4(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa bstan pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig /dpa' byin gyis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang gzung
354b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam
354b6(dkon brtsegs): de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog
354b7(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ khyim bdag dpa' byin gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// //
355a1(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po ji na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan
355a2(dkon brtsegs): la phab pa/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya u da ya na bad sa rA dza ba ri pr-i ts+tshA nA ma pa ri brta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i
355a3(dkon brtsegs): le'u/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ko'u sham+b+hi na dbyangs can gyi
355a4(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/
355a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe na ma du'i bu mo dpe med phrag dog dang / ser snas zin pas/ btsun mo sngo sangs can la lhag par dmigs nas/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la/ lha/ mkhyen par mdzad
355a6(dkon brtsegs): du gsol/ btsun mo sngo sangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya ni/ dge slong go'u ta ma dang lhan cig tu rab tu skyon chags par bgyid de/ de'i slad du bdag gis lha la
355a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba lags kyi/ ji ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin du mdzad du gsol/ zhes rdzun gyis tshig gis dbyen byas par gyur to/ /de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed/ ma du'i bu mo
355b1(dkon brtsegs): dpe med kyis dbyen byas pas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams la tha ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / khro ba skyes par gyur to/ /de yi ma rangs shing / khro ba dang rngam
355b2(dkon brtsegs): pas zil gyis non pas/ btsun mo sngo sangs can gsad pa'i phyir gzhu bdungs nas/ mda' ste'u ka nya rnga ma blangs te 'phangs so/ /de nas de'i mod la btsun mo sngo sangs can gyis/
355b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas shing / bcom ldan
355b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi bsngags pa brjod nas/ byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ mda' ste'u ka nya rnga ma de de nas phyir log ste/ bad
355b5(dkon brtsegs): sa'i rgyal po 'char byed de nyid kyi mgo bo'i drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu mched de/ 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur te/ phar 'gro/ tshur
355b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro zhing 'dug 'dug nas/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed da la ba der song nas/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyi g.yon rol logs su 'dug par gyur te/ de'i lus la ni
355b7(dkon brtsegs): ma phog go / lan gnyis lan gsum du de ltar gyur pa dang / de nas btsun mo sngo sangs can gyis/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/
356a1(dkon brtsegs): de lta lags pas/ gal te khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal na/ khyod la yang bde legs su 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bad sa'i rgyal po
356a2(dkon brtsegs): 'char byed 'jigs shing dngangs la/ sgyid lug cing spu zing zhes byed par gyur te/ sa la 'gyel nas btsun mo sngo sangs can la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod ni lha mo'am
356a3(dkon brtsegs): dri za mo/ /sha za mo'am srin mo'am/ /ngas ni ji ltar gzung bar bya/ /nga yis dris pa de smros shig/ gang la mtshon gyis mi gnod pa'i/ /bud med 'ga' yang yod min te/ /
356a4(dkon brtsegs): ngas ni 'di la gang du yang / /thos sam mthong ngam shes pa'ang med/ /nga ni stobs ldan brtson 'grus can/ /'phongs gi shes pa legs bslabs pas/ /nga yi mda' 'di
356a5(dkon brtsegs): gdon mi za/ /nam yang mi phog yong min te/ /spre'u'am yang na bya dang ni/ /mi'am yang na 'ben yang rung / /gang la nga yis mda' 'phangs pa/ /nam yang mi phog yod
356a6(dkon brtsegs): min na/ /de ring mda' 'di 'phangs pa ni/ /bzlog pa'i tshul du phyir 'ongs te/ /lus la gnod pa med pa ni/ /nga yi mdun du 'dug par gyur/ /gzhan gyi tshig ni mnyan nas
356a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang / /nga ni khyod la gsod 'dod na/ /nga ni khyod la skyabs su 'gro/ /sdug bsngal gyur pa nga la skyobs/ /phyin chad 'di 'dra mi byed kyi/ /sdug bsngal ba la deng bzod kyi/ /khyod
356b1(dkon brtsegs): sngon dga' ba dran byos la/ /dang bar gyis shing khro thul cig/ de nas btsun mo sngo sangs can gyis/ /bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag ni lha min
356b2(dkon brtsegs): dri za min/ /sha za mo min srin mo min/ /bdag ni btsun mo sngo sangs can/ /'jig rten mgon bo'i nyan thos ma/ /lha khyod la ni snying brtse bas/ /bdag gis sems ni mnyam gzhag

356b4(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dang / /bud med ngag ni mi gsod gsungs/ /gang zhig lo tog smin pa la/ /ser ltar yang dag ji bzhin mkhyen/ /bud med rnams kyis gnod med pa/ /de yi bstan la
356b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag dga' lags/ /'jig rten mgon po thams cad kyis/ /bud med rnams ni smad par gsungs/ /bud med rnams la mi lta ba/ /'jig rten mgon po rnams kyis bsngags/ /sangs
356b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams dang rang sangs rgyas/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos rnams/ /bud med bsten par mi mdzad de/ /de ni byis pa'i spyod yul lags/ /bud med rnams la brten pa ni/ /kun
356b7(dkon brtsegs): nas bdud kyi zhags par gsung / /sdig pa rnams la chags pa ni/ /kun 'joms dkrugs pa'i shul dang 'dra/ /mi mkhas bud med chags pa dang / /sdig pa'i las ni bgyid
357a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / /ye shes spong bar 'tshal ba yi/ /sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror khrid/ /mkhas pa thar par 'tshal ba yis/ /bud med bsten par mi bgyi ste/ /
357a2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs gtams du ba ma mchis pa'i/ /dong du mchong bar mi dong lags/ /yid 'ong bka' mchid bgyis pa dang / /bltas pas kyang ni 'ching bgyid cing / /mi bzad dmyal bar
357a3(dkon brtsegs): ltung bas na/ /khyod ni bud med tshig ma gsan/ /bdag ni khro ba ma mchis te/ /bdag gi yid ni rab tu dang / /khyab bdag 'jig rten mgon po la/ /thugs ni rab tu dang bar
357a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzod/ /rgyal po chen po bzhud mdzod de/ /khyod kyis rkang gnyis mchog gzigs la/ /de yis chos ni gang bstan pa/ /g.yel ma mchis par khyod kyis gson/ /de nas
357a5(dkon brtsegs): bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed btsun mo sngo sangs can gyis bskul bas/ rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / skye bo'i tshogs phal po ches yongs
357a6(dkon brtsegs): su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas brtad cing myur ba myur bar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang / des bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/ dang par gyur pa/ dbang po zhib/
357a7(dkon brtsegs): thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang / zhi gnas kyi mchog dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa/ bsam gtan dam pa rnams kyi pha rol tu gshegs pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon
357b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'phags pa/ dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa /dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang /
357b2(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'

357b4(dkon brtsegs): ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sngon ma mthong ba'i rmad du
357b5(dkon brtsegs): byung ba zhig mthong ba/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar ci gnang / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
357b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar smros shig/ zlos shig/ de nas bcom ldan
357b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das la bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i gzhi dang / 'dod pa la lhag par zhen
358a1(dkon brtsegs): pas/ deng ma du'i bu mo dpe med kyis tshig gis khros shing rngam pas zil gyis non nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la tha ba
358a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / zhe sdang gi sems kyang bskyed/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis mchis 'brang sdo sangs can dgum pa'i slad du/ mda' ste'u ka nya rnga ma zhig 'phangs na/ de bar snang la
358a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched de 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur nas/ bzlog pa'i tshul du slar log ste/ bdag gi g.yon rol logs su mchis par gyur cing /
358a4(dkon brtsegs): lus la ni ma phog nas/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis mchis 'brang sngo sangs can gyi sug ba rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ mchis 'brang sngo sangs can la 'di skad du/
358a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod lha mo zhig gam/ 'on te klu mo'am/ dri za mo'am/ sha za mo'am/ srin mo'am/ su zhig lags zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad du/ rgyal po chen po/ bdag
358a6(dkon brtsegs): ni lha mo yang ma lags/ klu mo yang ma lags/ dri za mo yang ma lags/ sha za mo yang ma lags/ srin mo yang ma lags kyi/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
358a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i nyan thos ma lags te/ khyod nyid la snying brtse ba'i slad du/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa lags so
358b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes mchi nas/ de nas mchis 'brang sngo sangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa rnam grangs du mas brjod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ de la bdag 'di snyam du bcom ldan
358b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i nyan thos ma 'di yang de lta bu'i snying rje'i bsam pa dang / de lta bu'i byams pa thob pa dang / de
358b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / de ltar mthu che ba dang / de ltar dbang che bar grags pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
358b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal snyam du sems par gyur lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag 'di ltar byis pa lta bu dang / 'di ltar rmongs pa dang / 'di ltar mi gsal ba dang /
358b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar mi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bdag gis tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems bskyed pa de/ bcom ldan 'das la bzod par
358b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol zhing / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi mdun du yang nongs par 'chags shing mchis na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gis nongs pa nongs par gshags pa de/ bcom ldan
358b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis legs par rjes su gzung bar gsol/ deng slan chad kyang sdom par 'tshal lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po khyod longs la rang gi stan gang
359a1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa la 'dug cig/ ces bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis nyes pa bshags pa rjes su gzung bar gnang ngo / /de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed
359a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis| bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la bad sa'i rgyal
359a3(dkon brtsegs): po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni gtum zhing gzu lums che la/ drag shul can lags pas/ bdag gis bud med kyi tshig gis
359a4(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i sug las mngon par 'du bgyis pa des/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag sems can dmyal bar mchi bar bdag gis yang dag par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das/
359a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ ci nas kyang bdag slan chad bud med kyi dbang du mchis nas/ sdig pa'i sug las mngon par 'du bgyid par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can
359a6(dkon brtsegs): dmyal bar mi ltung ba dang / bdag dang sems can thams cad la yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med kyi skyon
359a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag legs par yang dag par rab tu bshad cing / bud med kyi skyon rnams dang / bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams dang / bud med kyi sgyu rnams dang / bud med kyi g.yo rnams
359b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / bud med kyi gya gyu rnams dang / bud med kyi mi brtan pa rnams dang / bud med gyi 'gyur ldog rnams dang / bud med kyi bsten pa rnams dang / bud med kyi tshig rnams dang / bud
359b2(dkon brtsegs): med kyi 'khrul pa rnams yang dag par rab tu bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
359b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po/ gnas de lta bu yongs su zhus pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bcom ldan 'das la bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
359b4(dkon brtsegs): ci nas bdag bud med kyi dbang du mchis par gyur na/ bud med ni ma rungs ma/ 'khon can gtum mo/ drag shul can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bud med de ni/ bdag sems
359b5(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal bar mchis par bgyid 'tshal ba lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das las bdag don de nyid nyan par 'tshal lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan

359b7(dkon brtsegs): skyon rnams yongs su rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
360a1(dkon brtsegs): legs so/ /legs so/ /skyes pa skyon ji lta bu dag dang ldan na/ skyes pa bud med kyi dbang du mchis par 'gyur ba'i skyes pa'i skyon rnams/ bcom ldan 'das

360a4(dkon brtsegs): no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ skyes pa skyon gang dag dang ldan na/ skyes
360a5(dkon brtsegs): pa bud med kyi dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon ni bzhi po 'di dag yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po chen po 'di la skyes pa 'dod pa rnams la
360a6(dkon brtsegs): chags par gyur cing / de 'dod pa rnams la bag med par gyur nas/ phyir zhing bud med la blta 'dod de/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang
360a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag la blta bar mi 'dod cing / de tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag mthong
360b1(dkon brtsegs): na| bsnyen par mi byed/ bsten par mi byed/ bsnyen bkur mi byed pas/ de tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis yongs

360b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa/ sdig pa la gzhol ba/ bud med kyi thul 'og tu chud pa/ bud med kyis 'khol ba/ bud med kyi dbang du song ba/ bud med la gzhol ba/ bud med dang gnas pa/
361a1(dkon brtsegs): rma'i sgo'i spyod yul can/ rma'i sgo la rten pa/ rma'i sgo la gnas pa kha chu dang / snabs dang / mchil ma dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang / she'u rul dang /

361a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por zhugs pa ni bud med kyi skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag thos

361b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin dang / /shi ba dur khrod sa na shin tu smad pa ltar/ /de bzhin 'dod pa rnams kyang mchog tu smad pa yin/ /sbrang bu rma zhig mthong nas rgyug pa ci 'dra dang / /phag ni ngan skyugs
361b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas rgyug pa ci 'dra dang / /khyi ni sha yi don du shen sar 'gro ba ltar/ /de bzhin mi mkhas bud med dag la dga' bar byed/ /grags pa med cing mi snyan yon tan 'dri ba
361b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / /de las tshul khrims mtho la nyams par gyur pa dang / /mtho ris nyams shing dmyal ba dag tu ltung bas na/ /mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i skom la rten par byed/ /ji ltar
362a1(dkon brtsegs): ha la ha la'i dug ni zos pa na/ /lus ngag rmya zhing rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur ba ltar/ /de bzhin 'di na byis pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i rgyus/ /rang gi lus kyi
362a2(dkon brtsegs): dbyibs ni dug tu mi rig go / ji ltar sgyu ma shin tu bslabs pa'i mi zhig gis/ /rnam par 'phrul bas sems can brgya dag dga' byed ltar/ /de bzhin byis pa bdag la bde bar
362a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams/ /'dod pa dga' ba'i rgyu las ngan 'gror rab tu ltung / /zas skom ston mo bzang po tha dad pa dag dang / /glu bro sil snyan bzang po tha dad pa dag gis/ /khang pa
362a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog nas byung ba'i chung ma len pa ni/ /gnod pa rnyed pa yin zhing sdug bsngal gsog pa yin/ /'dod pa'i dga' la brkam pa dag ni gnod yin te/ /mi gtsang mchog 'dra
362a5(dkon brtsegs): rmongs gyur dag la bsngags pa brjod/ /'dod pa dman pa dag la bsngags shing bsten nas ni/ /dman pa de dag ngan 'gror rab tu ltung bar 'gyur/ /gnod pa 'dod pa
362a6(dkon brtsegs): dag gis yul rnams rab bsngags shing / /'dod pa gnod pa yin la dga' ba'i byis pa rnams/ /de dag don med 'tsho ba rnam par spangs nas ni/ /mi bzad g.yang sa chen por
362a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ltung bar 'gyur/ /nga rgyal rmongs pas bcom pa'i skye dgu 'di dag ni/ /rgya mtsho'i pha rol ma mthong ba yi bya bzhin du/ /lcags kyi me lce lnga po dag la chags gyur na/ /byis
362b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams ni rab tu 'bar zhing 'khyam par 'gyur/ /'di na byis pa myos shing shin tu rmongs pa rnams/ /shin tu mi mthong snod mchog yin par sems pa ltar/ /lam la rnam par rmongs
362b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'dod pa'i ched kyi phyir/ /rtag tu 'dir gnas 'di ni gya nom yin zhes 'dzer/ /gang phyir rnam pa sna tshogs las dag mi shes pas/ /'gro ba thams cad rab nyams gud pa
362b3(dkon brtsegs): yod min pas/ /pha dang ma dang bu dang bu mo dag la ni/ /don gyis mchod pa mi byed gnod pa thob pa yin/ /de dag rtag tu bud med 'dris pa rjod byed cing / /de 'dra'i las kyi tshul la rab

362b5(dkon brtsegs): shing / /pha dang ma yang yongs su rab tu spong bar byed/ /de dag mchod 'os rnams la mchod par mi byed cing / /smad par 'os pa'i 'dod pa dag ni tshol bar byed/ /phan tshun gdung bar
362b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba la ni gzhol byed cing / /rnam rtog mu yis nges bcom mi rnams nyon mongs pa/ /bkur sti yongs su tshol la dga' zhing ma 'phags rnams/ /chos ma yin par 'jig rten
362b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'dzud par byed/ /gzhi de las ni mtshon cha dag dang lcags rnams dang / /de bzhin 'ching ba dang ni 'thab cing rtsod pa dang / /nges par 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu myong ba
363a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /shi 'phos nas ni mnar med 'jigs su rung bar 'gro/ /tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin sdug bsngal 'byung 'gyur zhing / /nor nyams snying du sdug pa rab tu
363a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig 'gyur la/ /mtho ris nyams zhing dmyal bar rab tu ltung bas na/ /mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed/ /lcags las grub pa'i nags tshal sngon po'i
363a3(dkon brtsegs): khrod dag tu/ /mkhas pas bdag nyid khrod du bor ba de blang zhing / /mdzangs pa spu gri'i so yis bcad pa byas sla la/ /ral gri dag gi khrod du mal yang bcas sla zhing / /rab tu
363a4(dkon brtsegs): me 'bar thu lum bzung ba de sla la/ /de bzhin lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba za sla zhing / /me dong 'jigs su rung ba rnams la reg sla yi/ /lag pa gnyis ni nam yang bud med
363a5(dkon brtsegs): reg mi bya/ /mis ni ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa rnams bsten pa/ /de lta de ltar bde ba thams cad rab spong zhing / /'di ltar 'dod rnams gcig tu sdug bsngal mi gtsang bas/ /
363a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa sdug bsngal mi gtsang ba dag rnam par spongs/ /'dod pa sdug bsngal kun gyi gzhi bor gyur pa dang / /gang phyir nor ni chud zar 'gyur bar byed pa dang / /yid 'ong

363b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba/ /des ni rtag tu mtho ris lam yang rnam sbyangs shing / /des ni byang chub dam pa rnyed par dka' ma yin/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang mi'i pha ma dag ni dka' ba byed pa dag

363b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams skyed par byed/ khams rnams gso bar byed/ 'jig rten ston par byed/ 'dzam bu'i gling sna tshogs ston par byed/ don du 'dod/ phan par 'dod/ grub pa dang / bde bar

363b6(dkon brtsegs): blangs pa'i bud med de la chags shing myos pas sbyin pa'i gnas pha ma dag rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs la/ lus nyam chung zhing mig gis mi mthong ba dag brnyas shing longs
363b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod med pa dang / nor med par byas nas/ rang gi khyim nas phyung ste/ skrod par byed do/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di ltar pha ma dka' ba byed byed pa sbyin pa'i gnas la/ rtag tu rgyun mi
364a1(dkon brtsegs): 'chad par yang dag pa'i bde bas bsti stang du bya/ bla mar bya/ brjed par bya/ mchod par bya ba'i rigs na/ des de'i tshe pha ma dag rang gi khyim nas phyung /
364a2(dkon brtsegs): bskrad nas gzhan gyi khyim nas blangs pa'i bud med la/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing bsti stang du byed/ gces su byed/ rim gro byed la
364a3(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byed cing / yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed kyi/ pha ma la ni mi byed pa'i snying brtse ba med pa dang / mi lta ba dang / ngan pa'i sems dang ldan pa la ltos/ rgyal po
364a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po/ des bde 'gror 'gro ba'i chos gang yin pa de ni spangs la/ ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos gang yin pa de ni yang dag par blangs te 'dug pa'i mi de la yang ltos/ rgyal po

364a6(dkon brtsegs): no| |de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ /de dag rtag tu bde zhing yid kyang bder
364a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur la/ /'di la lha dang bcas pa dang ni dbang po dang / /de bzhin 'di la tshangs par bcas pa'i rigs su 'gyur/ gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ /de dag
364b1(dkon brtsegs): song nas phyir 'ong ba yang 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /rgya mtsho chen po nas kyang bde zhing legs 'ong ste/ /de ltar byed pa dag ni rab mchog rnyed pa yin/ /gang dag pa ma rgas pa gso bar

364b3(dkon brtsegs): so| |gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ /de dag khur rnams khyer ba'i rnga mo rnams dang yang / /yang na glang dang bong bu rtag tu mi 'gyur te/ /mi rnams de dag spu gri'i
364b4(dkon brtsegs): so la rdzi mi 'gyur/ /gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ /de dag chu bo rab med dang ni me mur dang / /spu gri'i so dang ldan pa la yang mi rgal te/ /de dag zangs khu bskol
364b5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'thung ba yong mi 'gyur/ /gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ /de dag nor dang 'bru ni mi nyung mang ba dang / /chung ma bu dang bu mo dam pa dag dang yang / /bai DUR+Ya dang
364b6(dkon brtsegs): rin chen sa le sbram yang rnyed/ /gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ /de dag rab 'phrul lha yi pho brang dag dang ni/ /rtsub 'gyur dang ni 'dres pa'i tshal yang mthong
364b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ /lha rnams du mas rtag tu mdun du bdar bar 'gyur/ /mi yi gtso bor gyur cing lha yi lhar gyur pa/ /thub pa chen po 'di 'dra'i gsung ni thos gyur na/ /rgas shing
365a1(dkon brtsegs): dbang po shin tu nyam chung gyur pa yi/ /pha ma sbyin gnas dam pa su zhig gso mi byed/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang skyes bu dam pa ma yin na/ skyes bu
365a2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa ma yin pa'i las byed cing / log par blta ba la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba gang yin zhes bdag gi don mi shes shing / mi brtan
365a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin pas skye bo mang po rnams mi dga' zhing / byis pa'i skye bos bsngags pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gis rmongs par gyur pa dang /
365a4(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu mdzangs pa dag gis smad pa dang / khro bas zil gyis non cing / sdig pa'i las byed pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su spangs
365a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / longs spyod kyi rgyags pas myos pa dang / ser sna can du gyur pa dang / gzhan la gnod par mngon par dga' zhing / chos goms pas mi dga' ba yin te/ rgyal po chen
365a6(dkon brtsegs): po| skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i las la mngon par dga' zhing / skyes bu dam pa'i las la mi dga' ba de la ltos/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'dod
365a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la sten cing ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni/ skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon gsum pa yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag skyes
365b1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to/ /'dod pa rnams kyi gzhis ni skyes bu rnams nyams shing / /gzhi de las ni sdig pa dag kyang rab tu byed/ /log par lta bas rmongs nas 'dir ni 'khyam 'gyur zhing / /
365b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni rnam par 'khrul pas ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ /log dang ldan pas yon tan kun gyis rnam spangs shing / /de ni rtog pa med cing blo yang nor ba yin/ /gang dag chu klung dag
365b3(dkon brtsegs): tu ut+pal rtswa tshol ltar/ /log par lta bas yongs su 'khor bar byed pa yin/ /bde ba'i don du bdag nyid yongs su skyong byed cing / /chos ma yin la chags pa'i mi rnams mang
365b4(dkon brtsegs): po dag/ de bzhin bde ba'i rgyu phyir 'dod pa rnams tshol ba/ /de dag gti mug rmongs pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ gang dag 'dod pa rnams kyi don du rtag tu ni/ /de
365b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin sems la gcags pa'i skyes bu tha ma dang / /'dod pa'i bdag nyid can dang skye bo sdig can dang / /'du shes log pa dag la bde ba ga la yod/ /mi rnams de dag
365b6(dkon brtsegs): byas pa mi gzo sdig bcas shing / /dad pa rnam nyams tshul 'chos gus pa med pa dang / /'phags pa'i tshogs kyis rtag tu rnam par spangs pas na/ /dmyal ba bzod brlag
365b7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu 'jigs su rung ba dang / /gzugs dang sgra dang ro la chags pa'i mi rnams ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang mkhas pa mi mchod cing / /log par lta bas
366a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyang nyan par mi byed la/ /lan 'ga' 'ang dge 'dun legs par mchod par mi byed pas/ /'phags pa rnams kyis rnam spangs ngan song ltung
366a2(dkon brtsegs): bas na/ /de phyir mi yi srid pa 'di ni rnyed pa la/ /sbyin dul yang dag sdom la nges par sten cig dang / /de las byang chub dam pa mchog kyang thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal po chen po/
366a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang skyes bu ni bzo'i gnas sna tshogs dang / las kyi mtha' sna tshogs dag gis 'tsho bar byed de/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di ltar yi ge'am/ rtsis sam/ grangs sam/
366a4(dkon brtsegs): lag rtsis sam/ mtshon cha'am/ rgyal po la zho shas 'tsho ba'am/ zhing las sam/ tshong byed pa'am/ ba lang 'tsho ba'am/ de lta bu'i bzo'i gnas sna tshogs dang /
366a5(dkon brtsegs): las kyi gnas sna tshogs dag gis 'tsho bar byed cing / 'di lta ste/ nor gyi phyir lam ma yin par yang 'gro bar byed/ lam ngan par yang 'gro bar byed/ gcong rong
366a6(dkon brtsegs): dang chu klung can gyi lam du yang 'gro bar byed/ mtshon cha'i lam du yang 'gro bar byed/ rgya mtshor 'jug par yang 'jug par byed/ grang ba'i dus na yang lhags
366a7(dkon brtsegs): pas gnod par byed/ dro ba'i dus na yang tsha bas gnod par byed cing / bkres pa dang skom pa dag gis gnod bzhin du 'gro ba la yang spro bar byed de/ longs spyod
366b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su tshol ba na/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal dag gis longs spyod yongs su btsal nas kyang / rang gi 'tsho ba dag gi phyir nye bar sgrub par byed pas/ dge sbyong dang / bram
366b2(dkon brtsegs): ze dag dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / slong mo ba dag la sbyin pa sbyin par mi bzod cing / bud med rnams kyi dbang du byas pa dang / bud med rnams kyi
366b3(dkon brtsegs): thul 'og tu chud pa dang / bud med rnams kyis bkol ba dang / bud med rnams la byams pa de nyid kyis bud med de dag nyid gso ba'i phyir sbyin pa byin pa dang / tshul khrims
366b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par len par mi nus shing / de de la chags la bud med kyis spyos pa bzod par byed cing / bud med kyis bsdigs pa dang / bltas pa dang / brgyabs pa dag kyang
366b5(dkon brtsegs): bzod par byed de/ de skyes par gyur kyang bud med kyis bsdigs pa dang du len cing / mi dgar med par de'i ngor lta bar byed pa ni/ 'dod pa'i gzhis bud med kyi dbang du song
366b6(dkon brtsegs): ba yin te/ rgyal po chen po/ bud med la bsten cing / ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni/ skyes pa bud med la bskam zhing ngan skyugs kyi sgo la 'du ba dang / mi gtsang ba la dga'
366b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / shes bzhin med par spyod pa'i skyes bu'i skyon bzhi pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po/ skyon de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes pa ni 'dod pa rnams kyi dbang du 'gro ba yin no/ /de nas
367a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'dod pa rnams ni tshol ba na/ /rab tu myos pa ga la bde/ /'dod pa dman pa rnams
367a2(dkon brtsegs): bsten pa/ /de ni gang gis bde bar 'gyur/ /skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i/ /las rnams byed cing mi sdom la/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags tshol byed pa/ /de dag rab nyams chud kyang za/ /mi
367a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams gang dag mi mkhas pa/ /rnga mo bong bu'i chos spyod cing / /bud med mthong na rab snyegs pa/ /ngan skyugs gnas la phag rnams bzhin/ /gang la byis pa gus bcas pa'i/ /'dod
367a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams dring mi gtsang yang / /'dod pa'i skyon rnams mi mthong ba/ /sa yi steng na dmus long bzhin/ /gzugs kyi 'ching bas bcings pa rnams/ /'dod pa'i 'du shes rab tu 'jug/
367a5(dkon brtsegs): byis pa 'dod rnams bsten pa dag/ khyi dang wa rnams ji bzhin no/ /sgra dri ro dang reg rnams kyis/ /gang la so so'i skye bo rnams/ /byis pa 'khor bar yongs 'khor bya/ /spre'u rnams
367a6(dkon brtsegs): phur la btags pa bzhin/ /byis pa ma rig khebs pa rnams/ /mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs gyur cing / /bud med rnams la chags pa ni/ /mi gtsang gnas pa khwa bzhin no/ /
367a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis ngan 'gror rab 'jug pa/ /de ni bdud kyi spyod yul yin/ /ro myang 'du shes chags gyur pa/ /ngan skyugs gnas la srin bu bzhin/ /gsad pa'i gshed ma rnams
367b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni/ /ji ltar mi zhig bor ba ltar/ /shes nas thar pa thob 'gyur zhing / /bud med dbang du 'gro mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa bud med lta byed pa'i/ /kun tu sbyor la 'jigs pa skye/ /byis pa mtshan

367b4(dkon brtsegs): ni za ba ltar/ /'dod brkam so so'i skye bo rnams/ /de bzhin bud med rnams kyis zos/ /mi gtsang bum pa khra bo zhig/ kha dog ldan par snang mos kyi/ /nang na ha la ha la'i dug/ drag po chen po yod
367b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ltar/ /de bzhin bud med brgyan pa dag/ gang dang gang na snang ba yang / /gcin dang phyi sas gang ba yi/ /rkyal pa rlung gis bkang ba bzhin/ /'bru mar gyis ni bdar ba'i mtshon/ /gos kyis dkris

371b5(dkon brtsegs): ste| mtshon cha spangs shing / dbyug pa spangs la/ ngo tsha mchis shing / srog chags 'byung po thams cad la snying brtse bar zhugs pa lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag
371b6(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag
371b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog
372a1(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ pad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus
372a2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyi shu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs
372a3(dkon brtsegs): pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya su ma ti dA ri ka pr-its+tshA nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du /
372a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

372a7(dkon brtsegs): khyer chen po na/ khyim bdag drag shul can gyi bu mo blo gros bzang mo zhes bya ba btsas nas lo brgyad lon pa 'dra ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes
372b1(dkon brtsegs): pa| blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas ba mchog dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas 'bum

372b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gang gis su ni mdzes par 'gyur/ /gang gis nor ni che ba dang / /mi phyed 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur/
373a1(dkon brtsegs): thub pas 'di ni bdag la gsungs/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar ni/ /gang gis brdzus te skye 'gyur zhing / /'dab ma stong ldan pad+ma la/ /mchis
373a2(dkon brtsegs): par yang ni gda' ba dang / /zhing rnams bye ba dpag yas par/ /sangs rgyas phyag bgyir mchis pa yi/ /rdzu 'phrul pha rol phyin 'gyur ba'i/ /spyod pa rgyal bas lung bstan
373a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ /dgra zla ma mchis gang gis 'gyur/ /tshig kyang btsun par 'gyur ba dang / /las kyi sgrib pa ma mchis dang / /bdud kyi las kun ma mchis dang / /'chi ba'i dus ni bgyid
373a4(dkon brtsegs): pa na/ /mngon sum sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /de las chos kyang nyan pa dang / /sdug bsngal tshor ba myong mi 'gyur/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bu

373b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dus su sbyin pa dang / 'gyod pa med par sbyin pa dang / yid du 'ong ba sbyin pa dang / rnam par smin pa la mi re bar sbyin pa ste/ bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa'

373b6(dkon brtsegs): las 'di byas pas na/ /rtag tu longs spyod chen po thob pa yin/ /bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/

378b3(dkon brtsegs): gros bzang mos smras/ 'jam dpal/ ma rtog cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci'i phyir slob
378b4(dkon brtsegs): dpon gyis bud med kyi lus las da dung ma bsgyur/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ni bud med do/ /'di ni skyes pa'o zhes bya ba de ni dmigs pa ste/ 'on kyang khyod
378b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi the tshom med par bya'o/ /bden pa gang gis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i bden pa des/
378b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag skyes par gyur cig /bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la/ de'i bud med kyi dngos po mi snang bar gyur nas skyes par gyur te/ chos gos
378b7(dkon brtsegs): dur smrig gyon nas/ des 'di skad du bden pa gang gis/ bdag gis byang chub thob pa na/ dge slong tshur shog ces byas pas rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi
379a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing der bdud kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan song gi ming yang med pa dang / bud med kyi skyon rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang /
379a2(dkon brtsegs): bden pa'i tshig des bdag dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo sum cu lon pa'i spyod lam ci 'dra ba de lta bur gyur cig /ces byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang pos
379a3(dkon brtsegs): tshig de skad smras ma thag tu de'i mod la/ de dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo sum cu lon pa'i spyod lam ci 'dra ba de lta bur gyur to/ /'jam dpal/ bden pa dang / bden
379a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig gang dang gang gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ sems can rnams kyi lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur ba dang / bsams pas bza' ba dang / btung ba 'grub
379a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ngan song gsum yongs su
379a6(dkon brtsegs): spang bar 'gyur ba dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa dang / rin po che'i dra bas yongs su bskor cing / rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma dag gis brgyan la/ steng rin po che'i bla re
379a7(dkon brtsegs): bres te/ 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci 'dra ba kho na dang mnyam zhing mi lhag pa de lta bur 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des 'khor 'di gser gyi kha dog can du

379b2(dkon brtsegs): du gyur to/ /de nas sa bla'i lha rnams kyi lha'i lus kyis gcig nas gcig tu sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis go bar byas te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros
379b3(dkon brtsegs): bzang po byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /zhes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal
379b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/
379b5(dkon brtsegs): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
379b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das yon tan rin chen dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ srog chags bye ba
379b7(dkon brtsegs): phrag sum cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa nyid la yang dag par gnas par gyur to/ /lha bye ba phrag brgyad cu ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul
380a1(dkon brtsegs): med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go / srog chags brgyad stong gis ni ye shes mngon par rtogs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa

380a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid mthong nas/ de dag rang rang gi bla gos bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol te/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos
380a4(dkon brtsegs): nas tshig 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig /ces smras so/ /dge
380a5(dkon brtsegs): slong de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos ma thag tu bskal pa dgu bcu'i 'khor ba bsnyil te bor nas/ bla na med pa yang
380a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gnas par gyur to/ /de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan te/ 'jam dpal/ dge slong 'di dag ni
380a7(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bcu gnyis na/ bskal pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa bzod par dka' ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du bskal pa
380b1(dkon brtsegs): gcig la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thams cad ming mthun
380b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la rdzu 'phrul

380b4(dkon brtsegs): la spyad la/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris nas/ zla ba phyed kyi bar du lan re bklags na/ bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas ni bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang
380b5(dkon brtsegs): mi phod/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /'jam dpal/ de lta bas na chos kyi
380b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di khyod la gtad kyi/ khyed 'dun par gyis la sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam las byung ba'i mdo 'di lta bu 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gzung zhig /kun chub par

381b1(dkon brtsegs): do| |'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa sum cu

381b5(dkon brtsegs): ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe grong khyer chen po mnyan yod na dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog ces bya ba zhig gnas so/ /de nas dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog mnyan yod nas byung nas/ rgyal
381b6(dkon brtsegs): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
381b7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog la/ gang+gA'i mchog khyod da gzod gang nas 'ongs zhes smras so/ /gang+gA'i mchog

385b5(dkon brtsegs): po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag

385b7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan
386a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum par mi mdzad na/ 'dzum par mdzad
386a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ ngas mngon par shes te/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa stong
386a3(dkon brtsegs): gis/ gang+gA'i mchog ces bya ba kho na'i dge bsnyen ma sha stag las brtsams te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do/ /dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad ni rab tu byung nas/ phung
386a4(dkon brtsegs): po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
386a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i
386a6(dkon brtsegs): ming ni dri ma med pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ni dri ma med pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/ dge slong bdun brgya dang / dge slong ma bzhi brgya len pa
386a7(dkon brtsegs): med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i me tog rnams dang / tsan+dan gyi
386b1(dkon brtsegs): phye ma rnams mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces/ 'di ltar grong khyer mnyan yod na/ dge bsnyen ma 'di lta bu gnas la/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dang
386b2(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig smra yang / de'i lus ngal bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yang gang+gA'i mchog 'di sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yun ring
386b3(dkon brtsegs): po nas dge ba spyad pa dang / yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to/ /zhes smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
386b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag /de de bzhin te/ 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ yun ring po tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pa'o/ /bcom
386b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom
386b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa
386b7(dkon brtsegs): gang+gA'i mchog gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ji na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi
387a1(dkon brtsegs): lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/
387a2(dkon brtsegs): AR+Ya a sho ka dat+ta byA ka ra Na nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gcig
387a3(dkon brtsegs): go / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya
387a4(dkon brtsegs): rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs
387a5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa/ stong pa nyid la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/ smon pa med pa la
387a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa/ mi dmigs pa'i chos la gnas pa/ mi gnas pa'i chos ston pa/ mi skye pa'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
387a7(dkon brtsegs): lhun po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes lhun po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen seng ge dang / byang chub sems
387b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' seng ge blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag bsgreng dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson dang / byang chub
387b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rtag tu 'dzum zhing rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang po las 'das pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu gdung dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin
387b3(dkon brtsegs): chen sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen thogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkra ldan dang / byang chub
387b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' kha lo sgyur dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha lo sgyur chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bden pa la dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /
387b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / skyes bu dam pa brgyad la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkon
387b6(dkon brtsegs): mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' phug sbas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang po'i lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' chu lha'i lha dang / byang chub sems
387b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' blo gros yangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros khyad par can dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'phel dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
388a1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na gnas shing bzhugs pa
388a2(dkon brtsegs): la rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / rgyal po'i bka' la gtogs pa dang / blon po dang / sna chen po la gtogs pa dang / zhang blon gyi bu tsha dang / zhabs drung na 'khod pa dang / pho
388a3(dkon brtsegs): brang 'khor gyi mi dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ de nas bcom ldan
388a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa 'di lta ste/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge
388a5(dkon brtsegs): ba| don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba rab tu ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
388a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams pa'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang
388a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa
388b1(dkon brtsegs): ma 'gags pa dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po rnams snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ chos gos dang / sham thabs bgos nas/ lhung bzed thogs te/
388b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /de nas nyan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por mthar chags su bsod snyoms
388b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi phyir rgyu zhing / mthar gyis rgyal po chen po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar 'khod do/ /yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang
388b4(dkon brtsegs): na| bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa zhes bya ba btsas nas/ lo bcu gnyis lon pa 'dra ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po/ rgyas pa mchog dang
388b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa
388b6(dkon brtsegs): de rang gi pha'i khang bzang na khri gser gyi rkang pa can yod pa la 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong nas/ khri de las ma langs
388b7(dkon brtsegs): te| bsur yang mi 'gro / phyag kyang mi byed/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan yang mi 'dings/ bsod snyoms kyang mi 'bul bar kha rog ste 'dug go /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ nyan
389a1(dkon brtsegs): thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ong zhes thos nas/ rang gi khang bzang gi snga khang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag la mchog
389a2(dkon brtsegs): tu sdug par 'dzin pas mngon par dga' zhing stan yang bting ngo / /rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong bzhin du kha rog ste
389a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa mthong nas/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
389a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i nyan thos chen po ste/ che ba nyid kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su
389a5(dkon brtsegs): thob pa| srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa/ snying brtse ba can yin te/ 'jig
389a6(dkon brtsegs): rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu bar khyod kyis mi shes sam/ ci na khyod kyis de dag mthong la/ mthong bzhin du khri las kyang mi ldang / bsu bar yang mi byed/
389a7(dkon brtsegs): phyag kyang mi 'tshal/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms la yang spyan mi 'dren/ dad pa dang / gus pa yang mi bskyed par/ ci'i phyir ma gus pa ston cing kha rog ste 'dug /
389b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong / de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas rang gi pha rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab/ 'di ji snyam du

389b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ yab/ ci| lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha gzhan dag la ldang ngam/ bsur mchi'am/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no/ /bu mos smras pa/ yab/ ci| mi mjed kyi

389b7(dkon brtsegs): ci| nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma'i tshogs srin bu me khyer gyi 'od 'dod pa gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no/ /bu mos smras pa/ yab/ ci| ri
390a1(dkon brtsegs): dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge ni/ wa la ldang ba'am/ bsur mchis pa gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo/ de ni ma yin no/ /

390a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag po don du gnyer ba na/ dge ba chung ba'i lha lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba'am/ ldang ba'am/ bsur mchi bar bgyid/ yang mi mjed kyi bdag
390a7(dkon brtsegs): po tshangs pa lta bu su zhig 'jig rten na tshangs pa'i snga khang bla na med pa don du gnyer ba na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i tshangs pa lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa'am/ ldang
390b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'am/ bsur mchi ba'am/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab/ su zhig ye shes rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos rtogs pa tshol ba na/ ba lang gi rmig
390b2(dkon brtsegs): rjes kyi chu lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa'am/ ldang ba'am/ bsur mchi ba'am/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab/ su zhig ri rab lta bu'i
390b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku don du gnyer ba na/ yungs 'bru lta bu ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang ldan pa'i nyan thos

390b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dag gi rnam par grol ba la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang
390b7(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos rnams la phyag mi 'tshal na/ bzhugs bzhin du lta ci smos/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ su zhig zla ba dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor btang ste/ srin bu me khyer la phyag 'tshal

391a2(dkon brtsegs): brten na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin po che'i sems bskyed pa dang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad
391a3(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so/ /'di ltar khyod nyan thos 'di dag mthong bzhin du/ mi ldang zhing bsur mi 'gro la/ phyag mi 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur mi byed de/ 'di dag stan dang / bsod

391a5(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab/ bdag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yab khyod grong khyer kyi dbul po rnams la mi bzhen pa/ bsur
391a6(dkon brtsegs): mi bzhud/ stan mi 'dings pa lags na/ khyod nyid lhag pa'i nga rgyal can lags pa snyam bgyid do/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo/ de dag ni nga yang mtshungs pa ma yin

391b2(dkon brtsegs): mos smras pa/ yab/ byang chub sems dpa' ni khon du 'dzin pa dang / tha ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / nyes pa spang ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin
391b3(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi ba'i slad du sems can thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /yab/ nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ni khon du 'dzin pa dang / tha ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems
391b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / nyes pa bsal bar bgyid ba ma mchis/ spang bar bgyi ba dang / dge ba 'phel bar bgyi ba yang ma mchis te/ yab/ nyan thos thams cad la ni sangs rgyas 'bum gyis/
391b5(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi tshul khrims ji snyed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa dang / shes rab ji snyed pas chos bstan du lags kyang / yab/ de dag la ni tshul khrims kyang ga las mchi/
391b6(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin kyang ga las mchi/ shes rab kyang ga las mchi/ rnam par grol ba yang ga las mchi/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang ga las mchi/ yab/ 'di lta ste/
391b7(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ bum pa chab kyis gang ba'i nang du char bab na/ de chab kyi thigs pa gcig kyang mi len la/ der gnas par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /yab/ de bzhin du nyan thos rnams la/
392a1(dkon brtsegs): gal te sangs rgyas 'bum gyis chos bshad du lags kyang / de dag 'dzin par mi 'gyur la/ tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang /
