392a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho chen po ni chu klung thams cad dang / char gyi rgyun thams cad 'dzin cing der gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni tshad ma mchis pa'i slad
392a4(dkon brtsegs): du'o/ /yab/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtsho lta bu de dag kyang de bzhin te/ chos bstan pa'i chu thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing / chos bstan pa
392a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad de la yang dag par gnas so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi
392a6(dkon brtsegs): snod de ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ma skyes dgra yi bu mor gyur pa ni/ /mya ngan med byin yon tan gzi brjid brgyan/ /nyan
392a7(dkon brtsegs): thos lnga brgya dag ni lhags gyur kyang / /de la phyag bya'i phyir ni de ma lang / /ma skyes dgra yis de la smras pa ni/ /bu mo don 'di nga las nyan par gyis/ /khyod kyi nyan thos lnga
392b1(dkon brtsegs): brgya mthong bzhin du/ /phyag bya'i phyir ni ci phyir ldang mi byed/ /bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin na re/ /nyan thos 'di dag bdag gis mthong ba na/ /ci phyir phyag 'tshal bsam pa mi
392b2(dkon brtsegs): skye ba/ /bdag mchis yab gcig tshig ni gsan par gsol/ /dper na mi zhig rgya mtshor mchis nas kyang / /rin chen 'byung khungs nas ni mching bu blangs/ /de bzhin bdag ni
392b3(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos thams cad kyang / /ye shes dbyings nas nyan thos blangs snyam bgyid/ /dper na rgyal po nor gyi dbang du phyug po/ /sa bdag 'khor los bsgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas/ /kar
392b4(dkon brtsegs): sha ba ni gcig tsam gsol na ni/ /de yis rgyal po bsten pa don ma mchis/ /gang gis 'khor los bsgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas/ /bye ba phrag stong gsol ba bgyis na ni/ /des ni
392b5(dkon brtsegs): dbul mang nor dang ldan par bgyid/ /des ni rgyal po legs par bsten pa lags/ /kar sha pa ni slong ba'i mi bzhin du/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas rnams/ /
392b6(dkon brtsegs): thos nas theg pa dman la 'dod skyed pa/ /nyan thos kun la bdag ni de snyam bgyid/ /nor rnams sgrub bgyid mi ni ji lta bu/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de 'dra ste/ /
392b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po mnyes bgyis shing / /byang chub re gnas sems can 'dul bar bgyid/ /dper na nad pa nad brgyas gzir rnams sman pa yis/ /grol bgyid de bzhin
393a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi sgra phyir 'brang ba yi/ /nyan thos nyon mongs rnams kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang / /byang chub sems dpa' sman pa lta bus grol bar bgyid
393a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can mang po grol bgyid sman pa btang nas ni/ /sos gyur sems can la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid/ /de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman par gnyer ba na/ /sos
393a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur nyan thos la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid/ /ji ltar nad pa sos par gyur ba thams cad la/ /sman pa dag gis gso bar nus par mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin nyan thos thams
393a4(dkon brtsegs): cad sos par 'gyur ba la/ /sangs rgyas sman pa dag gis gso bar mi spyod do/ /'di ni sman pa gang zhig bdag gis bdag nyid la/ /gso bar sems kyi sems can
393a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la ma lags te/ /de 'dra'i bdag nyid khengs par bgyid pa'i nga rgyal gyis/ /sman pa de dag la ni 'dod pa'i sems mi skyed/ /sman pa gang zhig snying rje bskyed
393a6(dkon brtsegs): nas bdag nyid ji lta bar/ /de bzhin pha rol rnams kyang nad las grol bgyid pa/ /de ni mchod par 'os shing bsngags par bgyi ba dang / /'jig rten kun gyis 'dud
393a7(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi ba'i gnas kyang lags/ /gang gis ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas/ /bdag nyid grol bar bgyid kyi sems can gzhan ma lags/ /de ni sman pa bdag
393b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid grol bar bgyid pa ltar/ /mkhas pa dag gis mchod pa bgyi ba'i gnas ma lags/ /gang gis ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas/ /sems can grangs med sdug
393b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal dag las grol bgyid pa/ /de dag byang chub mchog la 'dun ba skyed pa ste/ /de ni 'jig rten kun gyis bsngags par bgyi ba lags/ /e raN+Da yi shing sdong mdzes pa
393b3(dkon brtsegs): ma lags la/ /de dag rnams kyi grib ma'ang yangs pa ma lags te/ /e raN+Da yi shing 'dra nyan thos thams cad kyi/ /rnam par grol ba'i grib ma nye bar bsten ma lags/ /
393b4(dkon brtsegs): tsan+dan mchog gi sdong chen dag ni tsha ba yis/ /gdungs pa'i skye bo rnams kyi nye bar bsten pa lags/ /de bzhin bdag ni byung chub sems dpa' rnams la yang / /lha dang
393b5(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag gis don bgyid snyam/ /ba lang rmig rjes chu ni yangs ma lags/ /tsha bas gdungs ba zhi bar mi bgyid la/ /gang+gA'i klung ni sems can bye ba stong / /
393b6(dkon brtsegs): tshim par bgyis nas rgya mtsho chen por mchi/ /ba lang rmig rjes chu 'dra'i nyan thos kun/ /sems can kun gyi tsha bzhi mi bgyid/ /gang+gA'i klung 'dra'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
393b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can mtha' yas chos kyis tshim par bgyid/ /ji ltar rin chen char ni 'bab pa ni/ /dbul po dag ni 'gron bu len par bgyid/ /gang zhig nor mang de dag blangs nas
394a1(dkon brtsegs): ni/ /sems can dbul po nor dang ldan par bgyid/ /de ltar sangs rgyas rin chen chos char 'bebs/ /nyan thos rnams ni dam chos rin
394a2(dkon brtsegs): chen las/ /chung du 'dzin te byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /sems can don slad mang du len par bgyid/ /ji ltar sems can dag ni ri rab kyi/ /drung du mchis na gser
394a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi mdog tu 'gyur/ /ri bo gzhan la sems can rnams mchis na/ /gser gyi kha dog can du yong mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ri rab bzhin/ /gang
394a4(dkon brtsegs): dag mthus ni lhar bcas skye dgu rnams/ /rnam grol mdog tu kha dog gcig tu 'gyur/ /nyan thos rnams kyi ye shes 'dod mi bgyid/ /yab gcig ji ltar rtswa bran
394a5(dkon brtsegs): rtse mo yi/ /zil pa'i thigs pas lo tog rgyas mi bgyid/ /rab tu khebs pa'i sprin gyis sa steng 'di/ /tshim bar bgyid cing lo tog 'phel bar bgyid/ /nyan thos thams
394a6(dkon brtsegs): cad zil ba'i thigs pa bzhin/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab 'bebs sprin dang 'dra/ /snying rje mngon byas gang dag bsten na ni/ /stong gsum dam chos chu yis tshim par
394a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid/ /ka ra bi ra'i me tog dri mchog mi na/ /des ni skyes par bud med dga' ma 'gyur/ /tsam ba ka yi me tog dri la dga'/ /ut+pal bar shi ka yang de bzhin no/ /nyan thos ka ra
394b1(dkon brtsegs): pi ra'i dri bzhin te/ /de dag shes pas skye dgu dga' mi 'gyur/ /kun mkhyen dri can byang chub sems dpa' la/ /lha dang mi rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /gcig pu mchi ba de la
394b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshar ci mchis/ /gang zhig sems can mtha' yas khrid pa rmad/ /nyan thos mi reng gcig pu mchi ba bzhin/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ded dpon 'dra/ /mgron zhig
394b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyis stsal pa 'tshal ba dang / /skye bo kun la stsol bgyid kun mgron bzhin/ /sgra 'brang nyan thos kun ni mgron dang 'dra/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun la mgron bgyid
394b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin/ /gzings las brten pas chu bo chen po las/ /gzhan dag bsgral bar nus par mi 'gyur gyi/ /brtan bgyis gru yi nang du zhugs nas ni/ /sems can bye ba mang po sgrol
394b5(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyid/ /nyan thos gzings las brten pa lta bu ste/ /sems can gzhan dag sgrol bar ji ltar nus/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub grur zhugs byang chub sems/ /sdug bsngal mtsho
394b6(dkon brtsegs): las sems can sgrol bar bgyid/ /ji ltar g.yul ngor bong bu zhon na ni/ /dgra las rgyal bar nus par mi 'gyur gyi/ /glang chen rta dang shing rta zhon nas ni/ /g.yul du lhags
394b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dgra rnams choms par nus/ /nyan thos rnams ni bong bu zhon pa bzhin/ /byang chub sems dpa' glang chen zhon 'dra ste/ /sems can kun la phan dang bde slad du/ /de dag
395a1(dkon brtsegs): shing dbang drung du bdud rnams 'joms/ /ji ltar bar snang skar mas rgyas gyur kyang / /de dag gis ni mtshan mo mdzes mi 'gyur/ /zla ba rab tu rgyas pa
395a2(dkon brtsegs): shar bas ni/ /mtshan mo mkha' la thig le bzhin du mdzes/ /yab gcig nyan thos 'di dag skar ma 'dra/ /rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bzhin/ /gang dag sems can
395a3(dkon brtsegs): kun la sman slad du/ /ye shes shar bas skye bo snang bar bgyid/ /yab gcig srin bu me khyer tshogs 'od kyis/ /las rnams la ni 'jug par mi nus kyi/ /'dzam gling 'di na nyi
395a4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i 'od rnams kyis/ /bya ba snang tshogs brgya dag bgyid par 'gyur/ /nyan thos 'di dag srin bu me khyer 'dra/ /de dag shes 'od yang dag mthong mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnam grol nyi
395a5(dkon brtsegs): ma lta bu yi/ /shes rab ye shes kyis ni sems can 'grel/ /yab gcig wa brgya dag gis skad phyung yang / /ri dwags tshogs rnams 'drog par mi 'gyur gyi/ /seng+ge'i skad
395a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis glang chen ri dwags dang / /byar bcas rnams kyang phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur/ /yab gcig de ltar nyan thos wa 'drar gzigs/ /de dag skad kyis bdud rnams skrag
395a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ /rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod spyad pas/ /bdud dang de bzhin bdud rigs skrag par 'gyur/ /yab gcig rgyu 'di bdag gis mthong bas na/ /theg pa
395b1(dkon brtsegs): dman pa dag la 'dod mi skyed/ /su zhig bla med byang chub spangs nas ni/ /theg pa dman la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ /gang dag byang chub dam pa yongs spangs nas/ /theg pa dman
395b2(dkon brtsegs): la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ /de dag 'tsho ngan rnyed pa thob ma 'gyur/ /de dag mir skyes ba ni nyes par mchis/ /gang dag lhar bcas 'jig rten sman slad du/ /byang chub mchog la
395b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa skyed par bgyid/ /de dag legs 'tsho rnyed par legs par rnyed/ /de dag mi lus thob pa legs par mchis/ /gang dag lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang / /'jig rten
395b4(dkon brtsegs): sman slad las bgyid yid kyang rton/ /gang dag rtag tu sems can sman slad brtson/ /de dag u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bu mo mya ngan med
395b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin bas tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di dag thos nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma bu mo 'di spobs pa thogs pa med
395b6(dkon brtsegs): pa zhig na/ ci bzod pa thob bam/ ma thob pa bdag gis 'di brtag par byar nges so snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces

396a1(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /bu mo khyod ci zhig don du gnyer na/ 'di ltar seng+ge'i sgra sgrogs par byed/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gal te bdag chos
396a2(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' zhig don du gnyer na ni/ bdag seng+ge'i sgra ci yang mi sgrogs pa zhig na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar bdag ni chos gang yang don du mi gnyer te/ de'i phyir bdag
396a3(dkon brtsegs): seng+ge'i sgra sgrogs so/ /btsun pha shA ri'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du ci bu mo khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam zhes zer ba ni/ btsun pa shA ri'i bus
396a4(dkon brtsegs): chos gang mngon sum du byas pa'i chos de la/ ci nyan thos zhes bya ba'am/ rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i theg
396a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par bzhag pa yod dam/ gnas pa brtan shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo/ chos de la ni theg pa rnam par bzhag pa med de/ chos de ni 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan
396a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid gcig pa'o/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la don du gnyer ba ci zhig yod/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo/ chos de la ni don du gnyer
396a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ci yang med do/ /gnas brtan shA ri'i bus/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang so so'i skye bo'i
396b1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la bye brag ni ci yod/ tha dad du dbye ba ni ci yod/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ stong ba nyid dang / dben pa nyid la bye brag ni ci yod/ tha dad du dbye ba ci
396b2(dkon brtsegs): yod/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ni ci yang med do/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid la ji ltar bye brag med cing

396b4(dkon brtsegs): yang med do/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' dang / blag ba med pa la yang / bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu/

396b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ ci khyod de skad ces zer ba las na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
396b7(dkon brtsegs): ni shin tu ches lhag pa zhig tu mthong la/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams shin tu dman la mthong ngam ci na/ khyod nyan thos chen po rnams mthong na ldang bar yang mi byed/ phyag kyang mi
397a1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal/ bsur yang mi 'gro/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms la yang spyan 'dren par mi byed/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya
397a2(dkon brtsegs): ngan med kyis byin pas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun po mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi

397a5(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sems kyi

397b1(dkon brtsegs): rten na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'chags pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo/ de ni mi shes so/ /bu mos smras pa

398a2(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ ma nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal
398a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo/ de ni mi shes so/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ de dag dang / gzhan yang de'i gong du gang nyan

398a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla ma'i khyad par yin no/ /btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas khyod rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyi mchog tu
398a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan gyi/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
398a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ shing ljon
398b1(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad las tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i spos gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyad par 'gyur ba'i spos kyi ngad ldang ba yod pa der song zhig / gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen
398b2(dkon brtsegs): pos smras pa/ bu mo/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i ming yang de kho bos da gdod thos na/ sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir ji ltar 'gro bar bya/ de nas bu mo mya ngan med
398b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pas khri de las ma langs bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag
398b4(dkon brtsegs): tu nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa lta na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer des/ bdag
398b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ston par gyur cig /tsan+dan gyi dri de dag kyang nyan thos chen po 'di dag gis tshor bar gyur cig /ces byas so//
398b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ tshig de skad smras ma thag tu bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer gyis/
398b7(dkon brtsegs): de nyid kyi tshe 'od gang gis nyan thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos rab tu
399a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyed pa'i 'od zer de chos ston cing bzhugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od sku las bkye'o/ /chos bstan pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi
399a2(dkon brtsegs): mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir thos so/ /tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di khyab par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab

399a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /de nas
399a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bya rgod kyi phung po la gnas pas tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri tshor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
399a6(dkon brtsegs): to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tsan+dan sprul gyi snying po'i dri 'di ga las byung lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams
399a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'dis/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyi mdun du seng+ge'i sgra bsgrags te/ des nyan thos chen
399b1(dkon brtsegs): po de dag la bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sbos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer byang chub sems dpa' sems
399b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams la chos ston cing bzhugs pa yang bstan/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de'i tsan+dan sprul gyi snying po'i dri des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par
399b3(dkon brtsegs): byas so/ /de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po/ mkhas pa su zhig byang
399b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi cho 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu dag mthong ngam thos na/ nyan thos dman pa/
399b5(dkon brtsegs): zhan pa/ zhum pa/ nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la ldang ba'am/ bsur 'gro ba'am/ phyag 'tshal bar byed/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po/ 'jig rten gyi khams
399b6(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi 'od de ji tsam du thag ring ba shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo/ de ni mi shes so/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po/ gal te khyod 'dra
399b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rdzu 'phrul can sha stag gis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ dper na/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam /
400a1(dkon brtsegs): 'bras sA lu'i zhing bzhin du mtshams med par gang bar gyur nas/ de dag thams cad kyis bskal par brtsis kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya
400a2(dkon brtsegs): ba de| sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig 'das pa'i pha rol na 'dug pa/ bgrang ba'i thabs kyis rtogs par mi nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos
400a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'byed pa'i 'od zer gyis 'od de dag mi snang bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang mi snang bar mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos/ bu mo mya ngan
400a4(dkon brtsegs): med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de sngon
400a5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar nus sam/ de bzhin gshegs pas/ gang dag nga la gzugs su mthong / /
400a6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag nga la sgrar shes pa/ /log pas spong bar zhugs pa ste/ /skye bo de dag nga mi mthong / /sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid lta/ /'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku/ /chos nyid
400a7(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya min pas/ /de ni rnam par shes mi nus/ /zhes ma gsungs sam/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ gzhan yang bu mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
400b1(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de sngon mthong ngam zhes de skad zer ba ni/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
400b2(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi/ sha'i mig gis ma yin te/ gzugs su ma yin no/ /lha'i mig gis ma yin te/ tshor bar ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi mig gis ma yin te/ 'du shes kyis ma yin no//
400b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mig gis ma yin te/ 'du byed du ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi mig gis ma yin te/ rnam par shes par ma yin no/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ gzhan yang bdag gis
400b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ dper na/ gnas brtan gyis ma rig pa dang / srid pa la sred pa mthong ba bzhin no/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ gzhan yang bdag gis de
400b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ dper na/ gnas brtan gyis ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa mthong ba bzhin no/ /gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo/ 'di
400b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar ma rig pa dang / srid pa la sred pa dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa'i chos 'di gnyis ni med pa yin no/ /chos gang med pa de ni blta bar mi nus so/ /bu mo mya
400b7(dkon brtsegs): ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ de de bzhin no/ /chos thams cad ni med pa yin te/ de dag ni blta bar mi nus so/ /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo/
401a1(dkon brtsegs): ci sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang med dam/ bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang rung
401a2(dkon brtsegs): ste| chos 'ga' zhig yongs su grub par 'dod dam/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo/ kho bos ni so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yang yongs su grub par mi 'dod na/ sangs
401a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos rnams lta ci smos/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ chos gang dag yongs su grub pa med pa'i chos de dag ci yod pa yin nam/ 'on te med pa yin/
401a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo/ med pa de dag ni med pa yin no/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ de bas na chos thams cad ni med pa nyid do/ /med pa gang
401a5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de dag la ni lta ba rnam par sbyang bar bya ba med do/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas la lta ba rnam par sbyang bar 'dod
401a6(dkon brtsegs): pas ni bdag la lta ba rnam par sbyang bar bya'o/ /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo/ bdag la lta ba ji ltar rnam par dag par 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung
401a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po/ gang gi tshe bdag rang bzhin med pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa nyid du mos na/ de tsam gyis na bdag la lta ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung chen pos
401b1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bu mo/ bdag gis rang bzhin ci yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ bdag gis rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bdag dben
401b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang yin no/ /rang bzhin med pa des bdag dben no/ /rang bzhin med pa des chos thams cad dben no/ /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis su las chos thos na /
401b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar khyod kyi yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes par gyur/ bu mo/ yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes pa la ni rgyu gnyis dang / rkyen gnyis yod de/ gzhan gyi sgra dang / bdag nyid kyi tshul bzhin yid
401b4(dkon brtsegs): la byed pa las 'byung ngo zhes de skad gsungs so/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ gang dag gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes rab can de dag ni gzhan gyi sgra dang / bdag
401b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis tshul bzhin du so sor rtogs pa las lta ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ gang dag gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes rab can dag ni gzhan gyi
401b6(dkon brtsegs): sgra mi tshol lo/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ ji ltar na dge slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo/ gang gi tshe dge slong ji skad thos pa'i chos rnams
401b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi don la nye bar rtog par byed pa de ltar na/ dge slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no/ /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs
402a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dang lhan cig gnas kyang sems
402a2(dkon brtsegs): can du 'du shes skyed par mi byed pa de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad
402a3(dkon brtsegs): ni sngon gyi mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no/ /chos thams cad ni phyi ma'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no/ /chos thams cad ni da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no/ /
402a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba de lta bus sbyor bar mi byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no/ /'od
402a5(dkon brtsegs): srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo/ chos de dag la ji ltar sbyar bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ ji ltar de bzhin nyid la sbyor ba yang med/ mi sbyor ba yang
402a6(dkon brtsegs): med par mthong ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la sbyar par bya'o/ /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo/ ji ltar mthong na chos thams cad mthong ba yin/ bu mos smras pa /
402a7(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ chos thams cad la gnyis su med par mthong la/ mi byed cing 'jig par yang mi byed na/ de ltar na chos thams cad mthong ba yin no/ /btsun pa
402b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen po/ mthong ba zhes bya ba de ni/ mthong ba med pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo/ bdag ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung
402b2(dkon brtsegs): chen pos ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo/ kho bos ni bdag dang bdag gi ma mthong ngo / /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/
402b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bdag med cing bdag gi med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad blta bar bya'o/ /gtam de skad brjod pa'i skabs su gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa
402b4(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo khyod kyi spobs pa 'di 'dra ba ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ rnyed pa las
402b5(dkon brtsegs): ni spongs par mi 'gyur gyi/ gang gis ci yang ma rnyed pa de spobs pa dang ldan zhing / gang gis nang ngam phyi rol ci yang mi dmigs pa de spobs pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /rab 'byor
402b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ gang ma rnyed na spobs pa dang ldan pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang gis bdag ma rnyed cing gzhan ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba dang
402b7(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa ma yin/ zag pa med pa ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ 'jig rten ma yin/ 'jig
403a1(dkon brtsegs): rten las 'das pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin te/ 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ma rnyed na/ so so'i
403a2(dkon brtsegs): skye bo'i chos mi dmigs shing 'phags pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mi dmigs na/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ltar na gang gis ci yang ma rnyed pa'i
403a3(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ji ltar spobs par 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gyis ji ltar chos thams cad ma rnyed pa de bzhin
403a4(dkon brtsegs): du de spobs par 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang gis gnas brtan nyon mongs pa med pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid de ci brjod cing / smrar rung ngam/
403a5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa med pa de dang / chos kyi de bzhin nyid de la spobs pa ci yang yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa dang / de bzhin nyid ni bstan pa'am/
403a6(dkon brtsegs): brjod par mi nus so/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa yin na/ khyod kyis bu mo khyod spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ni khyod
403a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod ni 'di ltar med pa'i spobs pas ston to/ /bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan rab
403b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byor/ chos thams cad la brag ca lta bur mos sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ mos so/ /bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor/ ci brag ca la spobs pa ci yang yod dam/
403b2(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ de ni med de/ bu mo/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las sgra 'byung bar zad do/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ brten nas sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa de
403b3(dkon brtsegs): la rang bzhin gyis grub pa ci yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang brten nas byung ba de la ni skye ba ci yang med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ chos thams
403b4(dkon brtsegs): cad ni brten nas byung ba'o/ /bu mo smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de bas na chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ gal te
403b5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yin na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni 'ongs te gshegs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i
403b6(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma snyed ni ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni da ltar bzhugs so/ /zhes ci'i phyir bstan/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab
403b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byor/ mi skye ba ni skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings la ni skye ba'am nub par 'gyur bar mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras
404a1(dkon brtsegs): pa| bu mo khyod ni 'di ltar skye ba med pa don dam pa'i tshig ston to/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ bstan pa thams cad ni bstan du med
404a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /de'i phyir bstan pa thams cad bstan du med ce na/ de ni bstan kyang rung / ma bstan kyang rung ba dngos po ma yin te/ dngos po med pa dang / brjod du med pa'i mtha' mi
404a3(dkon brtsegs): spong ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod khyim na gnas bzhin du 'di lta bu'i chos la gnas shing / 'di lta bu'i rnam par dag pa ston pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to/ /bu
404a4(dkon brtsegs): mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni khyim pa'am/ rab tu byung ba zhes gzung bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni
404a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam pas phye ba yin/ shes rab kyis phye ba yin/ ye shes kyis phye ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa khyod kyis shes sam/
404a6(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis shod cig dang / kho bos mnyan to/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad
404a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na/ khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba zhes mi bya ste/ spyod lam gang dang gang gis gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ro/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ btsun pa rab
404b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
404b2(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi phyir ro/ /sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa'i phyir byams pa la gnas pa yang yin no/ /'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang spyod pa dang bral ba'i phyir snying
404b3(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po la gnas pa yang yin no/ /lus dang srog la mi lta ba'i phyir btang snyoms la gnas pa yang yin no/ /yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa shin tu rdzogs pa'i phyir thabs la
404b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa yang yin no/ /lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par 'byung ba yang yin no/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba tshol ba la brtson pas chog mi shes pa'i
404b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yang yin no/ /bzod pa shin tu thob pa'i phyir ma bstan par shes pa yang yin te/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
404b6(dkon brtsegs): chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ khyim pa'am/ rab tu byung ba zhes mi bya ste/ spyod lam gang dang gang gis gnas kyang thams cad du kha na ma thob med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
404b7(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo khyod mal khri gser gyi rkang pa can la 'dug cing stan shin tu mtho ba la
405a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dug nas/ nyan thos chen po dag dang gtam zer ba de ni rung ba ma yin par gnas pa yin no/ /bu mo min bar stan mthon po la 'dug pa
405a2(dkon brtsegs): la stan dma' pa la 'dug pas chos bshad par mi bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ci khyod kyis ma thos sam/ de skad ces smras pa/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa sgra
405a3(dkon brtsegs): gcan zin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa sgra gcan zin/ 'jig rten na gang dag ni rung ba yin/ 'jig rten na gang dag ni rung ba ma yin pa khyod kyis shes sam/ sgra
405a4(dkon brtsegs): gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo kho bos shes te/ gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la slob cing / bslab pa de las 'gal bar mi byed pa de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o/ /
405a5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag bslab pa de las 'gal bar byed pa de dag ni rung ba ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin thong / de skad ma
405a6(dkon brtsegs): zer cig / btsun pa sgra gcan zin/ gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la slob pa de dag ni rung ba ma yin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni rtog cing
405a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa sgra gcan zin/ gang dag mi rtog cing rnam pa mi rtog pa de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa sgra gcan zin/ rung ba zhes bya ba
405b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa rnams kyi tshig bla dwags yin te/ de dag ni bslab pa las 'gal bar mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos
405b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni bslab pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir te/ de dag ni phyir yang bslab par 'dod pa ma yin pas/ de dag ni rung ba yin no/ /de dag ni khams gsum du phyir
405b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'ong ba yin/ de dag ni bslab pa las yang dag par 'das pa yin te/ mi slob pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar na de dag gi bslab pa ni mi dmigs te khams gsum pas btags
405b4(dkon brtsegs): ba tsam du shes so/ /de'i phyir de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o/ /sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ rung ba dang / rung ba ma yin pa la tha dang du dbye ba ci zhig yod/ bu mos smras
405b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gser dul ma rgyan du byas pa dang / rgyan du ma byas pa la tha dad du dbye ba ci zhig yod/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo/
405b6(dkon brtsegs): tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin/ de bzhin du rung ba dang / rung ba ma yin pa la yang yi ge'i tha snyad mnyam pa nyid gyi phyir tha dad du dbye
405b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ci yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ci dang yang bral ba'i phyir te/ rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin no/ /btsun pa sgra gcan zin/ yang
406a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du/ stan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug ste chos nyan tam zer ba la/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rtsa gting ba la 'dug kyang shin tu mtho ba la
406a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa yin no/ /sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ rnam grangs gang gis khyod de skad smra/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems
406a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang la 'dug ste/ byang chub thob par 'gyur/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ rtswa bting ba la bzhugs nas byang chub thob bo/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin/ ci
406a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rtswa bting ba la 'dug pa la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na tshangs pa'am/ brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ngam/ de las gzhan
406a5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'og min man chad kyi lha gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis lus btud de/ thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la gtug par byed dam/ sgra gcan zin gyis
406a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bu mo/ de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin/ de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang / dper na/ byang chub sems
406a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtswa bting ba la 'dug kyang / stan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug pa yin gyi/ nyan thos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pa ni de lta ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /
406b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sras yin te/ bslab pa
406b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams kyi mchog yin na/ ci khyod kyis mi shes sam/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ yab thong zhig /thong zhig /'di ltar btsun pa sgra gcan zin bcom
406b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i sras yin zhes ma gsungs shig/ ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng+ge ral pa can cod pa na btags pa lta bus/ bu wa bskyed par 'gyur ba nam yang
406b4(dkon brtsegs): gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo/ de ni ma yin no/ /bu mos smras pa/ yab/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal lta bus gshegs
406b5(dkon brtsegs): pa| dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba zhabs 'bring ba ni/ nyan thos mdzes pa ma lags so/ /yab/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras gang yin zhes yang dag pa'i smra bas
406b6(dkon brtsegs): gang smra na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid yin no zhes de dag la yang dag pa'i smra bas smra'o/ /yab/ de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su khas len par 'tshal bas ni/
