440a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
440a6(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di bskal pa brgya stong phrag
440a7(dkon brtsegs): grangs med pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams med pa/ tshe'i tshad dpag tu med pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag
440b1(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i longs spyod pas shin tu lhag pa dang ldan pa/ yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
440b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bzhad cing 'dzum pa dri ma med pa tog gi rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pas bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du lung bstan pa
440b3(dkon brtsegs): thos nas/ dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba des ta la bye ba phrag brgyad cu srid du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/ bcom
440b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du rin po che'i gdugs dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa byin gyis brlabs te/ rin po che'i gdugs des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
440b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams 'di khebs so/ /de yang nam mkha' de nyid na rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa byas nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la bstod cing phyag 'tshal te bsti stang
440b6(dkon brtsegs): byas nas nam mkha' de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan stong bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la sogs pa bram ze lnga brgya po de dag
440b7(dkon brtsegs): gis byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu nas yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas bde ba dang yid bde
441a1(dkon brtsegs): ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas sgra skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gang
441a2(dkon brtsegs): dag sangs rgyas gus mchis dang / /gang dag sangs rgyas chos slad du/ /blo ni shin tu nges gyur pa/ /de dag rnyed pa chen po rnyed/ /sngon chad sdig pa'i las bgyis pas/ /bdag cag bram
441a3(dkon brtsegs): ze'i khyim du skyes/ /ston pa'i nyan thos mthong gyur na/ /bkra mi shes zhes tshig tu brjod/ /sangs rgyas sras dag mthong gyur nas/ /bkra mi shis zhes bgyis pa yi/ /tshig tu brjod
441a4(dkon brtsegs): pa gang mchis pa/ /btsun pa nongs par bshags par bgyid/ /tshogs kyi rgyal po mchog gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas gang dag ma mthong ba/ /mi de dag gis nongs pa rnyed/ /de dag kha zas
441a5(dkon brtsegs): ngan pa btsal/ /dri med byin pas mchod sbyin slad/ /bdag cag mgron du bos par gyur/ /ston pa'i nyan thos rnams mthong nas/ /ma gus pas ni sdod cing mchis/ /de la bdag
441a6(dkon brtsegs): cag rnams kyis dris/ /khyod kyis 'dren pa gang na mthong / /des smras btsas nas zhag bdun nas/ /kho mos sangs rgyas mtshan thos mchis/ /de yis sangs rgyas bsngags mang ba/ /de
441a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gzhan du mi 'gyur brjod/ /de yi tshig thos bdag cag kun/ /byang chub mchog tu yang dag zhugs/ /bdag cag sngon gyi bsod nams dang / /sangs rgyas zhes bgyi'i sgras
441b1(dkon brtsegs): bskul bas/ /shAkya seng ge'i zhabs la ni/ /phyag bgyi'i slad du lhags pa lags/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong phyag bgyis/ /chos kyi dam pa thob par gyur/ /rkang gnyis dam pa 'di mthong
441b2(dkon brtsegs): bas| |bdag cag sdug bsngal kun las grol/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /chos gang bshad pa mdzad pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi don slad du/ /bdag cag de la slob par bgyid/ /sangs
441b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas chos thob bgyi slad du/ /byang chub spyod pa thos gyur nas/ /bdag cag yang dag nan tan gyis/ /spyod pa de la bslab par bgyi/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang dang / /lam dang sgo yang
441b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa la/ /nan tan gyis ni gnas par bgyi/ /'jig rten rnams kyi mchod rten gyur/ /de dag lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas/ /thub pas de tshe 'dzum pa mdzad/ /thub chen lung bstan mdzad
441b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol zhes/ /sangs rgyas la ni kun dgas zhus/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' la/ /'di skad ces ni bka' stsal to/ /bram ze lnga bcu 'di dag dang / /bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de dang //
441b6(dkon brtsegs): de kun bskal pa gcig gi tshe/ /rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas lnga brgya tham pa la/ /tshe rabs snga mar mchod byas pa/ /de nas phyin chad spyod tshe yang / /sangs rgyas bye ba
441b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba brgyad cur ni/ /de dag ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/ /de dag bskal pa re rer yang / /sangs rgyas bye ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /de dag bskal pa gcig de la/ /
442a1(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog 'gyur te/ /'od byed ces bya'i bskal gcig la/ /tshangs pa'i sgra zhes bya bar 'gyur/ /de dag tshe tshad mtshungs 'gyur te/ /bskal
442a2(dkon brtsegs): pa bye ba brgyad cu thub/ /zhing mtshungs dge 'dun mtshungs 'gyur te/ /dge slong bye ba brgyad cu yod/ /sems can rnams kyi don spyod cing / /chos 'di la yang spyad byas nas/ /de dag
442a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mthar bgyis su/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba 'thob/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems
442a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bram ze de dag dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
442a5(dkon brtsegs): dang | dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u
442a6(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag brgya pa las/ dri ma med kyis byin pas zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra
442a7(dkon brtsegs): bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya gu Na rat+na sang ku su mi ta pr-its+tshA nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod
442b1(dkon brtsegs): skad du/ 'phags pa yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag
442b2(dkon brtsegs): gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong
442b3(dkon brtsegs): phrag rab tu mang por nams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grong khyer yangs pa'i li tsA byi gzhon nu yon tan rin chen me
442b4(dkon brtsegs): tog kun du rgyas pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dus par gyur te 'dug go / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
442b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te
442b6(dkon brtsegs): zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
442b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/ /da skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun du
443a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
443a2(dkon brtsegs): la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / zhu ba de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me
443a3(dkon brtsegs): tog kun du rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te
443a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de rnams kyi mtshan bzung na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta
443a5(dkon brtsegs): dag bzhugs lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa la 'di skad ces
443a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to/ /yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa legs so/ /legs so/ /yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa khyod da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
443a7(dkon brtsegs): skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la
443b1(dkon brtsegs): don 'di zhu bar sems pa ni/ yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa khyod yang legs so/ /de'i phyir yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhi
443b2(dkon brtsegs): dang | ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar 'chal lo zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pas bcom ldan
443b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa/ shar phyogs na chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i
443b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu zhes bya ba
443b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ /bskal pa de ni rgyas pa thams cad kun nas bsdus pa zhes bya'o/ /de na sems can rnams kyi tshe ni dpag tu med do/ /bcom ldan 'das
443b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor dpag tu med do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen dpag
443b7(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni bskal pa stong phrag drug cu'i 'khor ba bsnyil par byed do/ /tshe brjes
444a1(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang sgrib pa med par ston pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu rnams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
444a2(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par mdzad do/ /chos ston pa na bag tsha ba yang med par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di rjod byed pa/ /de la yon tan 'di rnams
444a3(dkon brtsegs): myur du 'byung / /de la bde bas lhag pa'i gzhan yang 'byung / /de la bla med byang chub dka' ma yin/ /yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa/ lho phyogs na yon tan rin chen bkod
444a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen dpal bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu zhes bya ba zhig
444a5(dkon brtsegs): da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ /bskal pa de ni yon tan rgyas pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
444a6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rin chen dpal bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni/ tshe brjes ma thag tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi
444a7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /tshe brjes ma thag tu skyes bu
444b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du smon lam 'debs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /skye ba gcig gis thogs
444b2(dkon brtsegs): pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi gang
444b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mtshan 'di rjod byed pa/ /de la ting 'dzin bsam yas de skyes shing / /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan lus 'thob la/ /de ni byang chub skye ba gcig thogs 'gyur/ /yon tan rin chen
444b4(dkon brtsegs): me tog kun du rgyas pa/ nub phyogs na mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad dang bral ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos
444b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ /bskal pa de ni shAkya mngon par mdzes pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
444b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni/ mtshon gyis
444b7(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /dug gis ma yin/ chus ma yin te/ mes kyang 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /brdzus te skye bar yang 'gyur ro/ /tshe brjes ma thag tu yang shugs
445a1(dkon brtsegs): brgya pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di rjod byed pa/ /'di la mi de'i lus mes mi 'chi
445a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing | |mtshon gyis min la chus min dug gis min/ /de ni brdzus te skye ba kho nar 'gyur/ /yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa/ byang phyogs na mun pa dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i
445a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa dpag med bkod pa yang dag par spyod pa'i blo zhes bya ba zhig da ltar
445a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ /bskal pa de ni grags pa chen po 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

445b1(dkon brtsegs): pa spyod pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams yongs su thar bar byed do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

445b3(dkon brtsegs): tshom med/ /de la the tshom med par gzungs skye'o/ /yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa/ shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs na shin tu mdzes pa bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin

446a1(dkon brtsegs): lta bu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bud med kyi tshe brjes nas kyang skyes pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshan 'di 'dzin
446a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'di dang gzhan/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rtag tu 'thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas mang po mthong / /yon tan rin chen

446a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /rgyu gang gis na sems can thams cad mchog tu 'gro bar byed ces bya zhe na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas chos ston par
446b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / de chos ston pa na ting nge 'dzin de'i chos nyid thob pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur
446b2(dkon brtsegs): te| dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid 'ong gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni sems can rnams gcig tu bde ba dang ldan zhing / sems can ngan
446b3(dkon brtsegs): song du skyes pa thams cad yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ de dag de nas yongs su grol nas lha dang mi yi lus 'thob par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges
446b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba bzhin no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gser mchog 'od dpal gyi ni mtshan 'dzin pa/ /de la gzi brjid dpal mdog stobs dbang po/ /tshe rabs kun du rnyed par dka' ma
446b5(dkon brtsegs): yin| |de la blo thogs med pa mtha' yas 'gyur/ /yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa/ nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs na sdig pa dang bral ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs
446b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid kyi rgyal po rnam mang dpal snang zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod de/ bskal pa de ni khyim rgyas pa zhes
446b7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid kyi rgyal po rnam mang dpal snang de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
447a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe ba rjes ma thag tu spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshegs chung dus de bzhin gshegs
447a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i chos ston
447a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang thos par 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /gang zhig rgyal ba de yi mtshan 'dzin pa/ /tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas zhing du de/ /de ni tshe dpag med
447a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan chos shes 'gyur/ /skye gcig thogs pas byang chub rdzogs 'tshang rgya/ /yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa/ byang shar mtshams kyi phyogs na mya ngan thams cad las
447a5(dkon brtsegs): brgal ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa bye ba grangs med par byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa zhes bya
447a6(dkon brtsegs): ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ /bskal pa de ni spobs pa bkod pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
447a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bskal pa grangs med pa byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe brjes ma thag tu rnam pa drug cu dang
447b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /sgra dbyangs
447b2(dkon brtsegs): yan lag drug cu phun sum tshogs/ /de ni kun du shes pa'ang pha rol phyin/ /rgyal ba bye ba brgyad cu mchod byed pa'i/ /bsod nams gang yin bsam yas de 'thob 'gyur/ /yon tan rin chen
447b3(dkon brtsegs): me tog kun du rgyas pa/ steng gi phyogs na yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
447b4(dkon brtsegs): gser bzang po dang nam mkha' nges par sgrogs pa bkod pa'i 'od ces bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ /bskal pa de ni tshad med len zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
447b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang po dang nam mkha' nges par sgrogs pa bkod pa'i 'od de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa
447b6(dkon brtsegs): can de ni tshul khrims kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang / shes rab kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung
447b7(dkon brtsegs): po dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /sa nas sa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshig bzung bar 'os pa nyid kyang
448a1(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /spobs pa bul ba med pa phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
448a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /yi ge dang sgra'i brda yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs mthon po dang / rigs chen po yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /mngon par
448a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa lnga yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang zhig
448a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i mtshan mchog 'dzin byed pa/ /de ni yan lag brgyad dbyangs phun sum 'thob/ /de ni sangs rgyas bral bar yang mi skye/ /mi de mi thogs byang chub 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/ /yon tan
448a5(dkon brtsegs): rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa/ 'og gi phyogs na tha dad pa med pa nyid la dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
448a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par 'phrul ba'i gzi brjid kyi 'od ces bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ /bskal pa de ni ye shes kun nas bsdus
448a7(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par 'phrul ba'i gzi brjid kyi 'od de'i
448b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe brjes ma thag tu sangs rgyas yongs su 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /skye ba gcig gis thogs
448b2(dkon brtsegs): pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i chos bstan pa yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /thos
448b3(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang thams cad kun du 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /sangs rgyas mtshan 'dzin sangs rgyas bye ba phrag /dgu bcu rnams kyi chos bstan thos 'gyur zhing / /skye ba
448b4(dkon brtsegs): gcig thogs bla na med pa yi/ /byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa dang /
448b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen thams cad dang ldan pa'i spobs pa'i skad kyis gzungs thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cus bla na med
448b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob bo/ /lha dang mi yi skye dgu sum khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das
448b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang /
449a1(dkon brtsegs): mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon
449a2(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs
449a3(dkon brtsegs): so|| ||rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya a tsi na t+ya bud+d+ha bi Sha ya ni ra de shA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen
449a4(dkon brtsegs): po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na
449a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra na dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/
449a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang yang thabs gcig go /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas
449b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskor te mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston no/ /yang de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go /lha'i bu dpal bzang yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus
449b2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur te 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal/ ngas khyod la bskul gyi/ khyod kyis chos dang ldan pa'i
449b3(dkon brtsegs): gtam las brtsams te/ lha'i 'khor 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la spobs par gyis shig /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ci las brtsams te/
449b4(dkon brtsegs): spobs par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul las brtsams te spobs par gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
449b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gang mig gi yul ma lags pa dang / gzugs kyi yul ma lags pa dang / rna ba'i yul ma lags pa dang / sgra'i yul ma lags pa dang / sna'i yul ma lags pa dang /
449b6(dkon brtsegs): dri'i yul ma lags pa dang / lce'i yul ma lags pa dang / ro'i yul ma lags pa dang / lus kyi yul ma lags pa dang / reg bya'i yul ma lags pa dang / yid kyi yul ma lags pa dang /
449b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi yul ma lags pa de sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yul khyad par ma mchis pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/
450a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud par 'tshal bas khong du chud pa ma mchis pa'i tshul du sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di ltar khong du chud par bgyi'o/ /
450a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa'i yul ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ lta bar 'gyur ba mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa nyid ni ngas byang
450a3(dkon brtsegs): chub thob pa'i yul lo/ /mtshan ma mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir mtshan ma med pa ni yul lo/ /khams gsum pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir smon pa med pa ni yul lo/ /'du byed mnyam pa nyid kyi
450a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni yul lo/ /'dus byas mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / 'du byed pa med pa ni yul lo/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
450a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das| 'dus ma bgyis kyi yul gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ sems med pa ni 'dus ma byas kyi yul lo/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems ma mchis
450a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lags te/ de la brjod pa ma mchis lags so/ /brjod pa ma mchis pa la bstan pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bstan pa ma mchis pa la mngon par brjod pa
450a7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mngon par brjod pa ma mchis pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas kyi yul
450b1(dkon brtsegs): gang du btsal bar bya/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las yongs su btsal bar bgyi lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
450b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongs su rtogs pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma lags kyi/ gang 'di sems can thams
450b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongs su rtogs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa'am/ ldog pa yod dam ce na/ 'di
450b4(dkon brtsegs): ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las yongs su btsal/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'jug pa ma mchis/ ldog pa ma
450b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jug pa med cing / ldog pa med na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams
450b6(dkon brtsegs): las yongs su shes/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jug pa ma mchis shing / ldog pa ma mchis pa de bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa de dag gi rang bzhin gang
450b7(dkon brtsegs): lags pa de yang 'jug pa ma mchis shing / ldog pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/

451a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin yang gzhan du gyur la/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin yang gzhan zhig lags na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par
451a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /zhes kyang bstan par mi 'gyur ba zhig la/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de nyid sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang
451a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin lags te/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /zhes ston lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/

451a6(dkon brtsegs): pa mnyam pa nyid gang gis gnas/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mnyam pa nyid gang la gnas nas 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug kun du

452b5(dkon brtsegs): yang ma lags/ 'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma lags/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa yang ma lags/ zhe sdang dang bral ba yang ma lags/ gti mug dang bcas pa yang ma lags/ gti mug dang
452b6(dkon brtsegs): bral ba yang ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag bdag la 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral bar yang dag par rjes su lta zhing /

453a1(dkon brtsegs): gang lags she na/ chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang bdag la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / zhe sdang dang

453a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ gang lam la zhugs pa de ni 'dus bgyis la zhugs pa lags te/ gang 'dus bgyis la zhugs pa de mnyam pa nyid du ga la 'gyur lags/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/

453b4(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci khyod 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin nam/ 'on te 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom
453b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags so/ /'phags pa ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags so/ /ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul
453b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa lags sam/ 'phags pa ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ sprul pa ni 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan
453b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma yin/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bstan lags sam/ bka'
454a1(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ de lta'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid lags la/ bdag kyang de'i rang bzhin
454a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi mtshan nyid lags te/ de'i slad du bdag 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ 'phags pa ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
454a3(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod ci dang ldan/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul mnyam pa nyid dang mi 'gal ba dang ldan pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis
454a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul rnyed dam/ gsol pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis brnyes na bdag gis kyang rnyed lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur
454a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi yul ma brnyes sam/ smras pa/ gnas brtan gyis nyan thos kyi yul gang yang rnyed dam/
454a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba'i yul yang med/ yul rnyed pa yang med do/ /smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
454a7(dkon brtsegs): grol ba'i yul yang med/ yul brnyes pa yang med do/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ni rjes su bsrung ba med par chos ston te/ khyod ni las dang po pa rnams rjes su mi bsrung ngo / /smras
454b1(dkon brtsegs): pa| de bas na gnas brtan nyid la yongs su dri'i/ khyed kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig /btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang sman pa mkhas pas nad pa
454b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsrung zhing kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / tsha ba'i sman ma byin pa na/ ci des nad pa de la nad med pa'i bde ba byin pa yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/
454b3(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin du gang chos smra bas las dang po pa yongs su bsrung zhing zab mo'i gtam bcabs te/ gtam sna tshogs bstan na des de yang dang yang du 'chi ba las thar
454b4(dkon brtsegs): par byas par mi 'gyur zhing / shin tu bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu bzhag par mi 'gyur ro/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las
454b5(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par grol lo/ /lha'i bu brgyad brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /lha'i bu bdun brgyas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spobs
454b6(dkon brtsegs): pa thos nas/ 'dod cing lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
454b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ nyan thos kyi theg pas sems can rnams 'dul na/ ci khyod nyan thos kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba yin nam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ kho
455a1(dkon brtsegs): po ni theg pa thams cad kyis rnam par grol te/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ kho bo ni nyan thos kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba yang yin no/ /kho bo ni rang sangs rgyas
455a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba'ang yin no/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ kho bo ni theg pa chen pos rnam par grol ba'ang yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci nyan thos sam/ 'on te rang sangs
455a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas sam/ 'on te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ kho bo ni nyan thos yin te/ pha rol las mnyan pa'i sgra la sbyor bar brtson pa ni ma yin no/
455a4(dkon brtsegs): kho bo ni rang sangs rgyas yin te/ snying rje chen po dang / mi 'jigs pa dang bral ba ni ma yin no/ /kho bo ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin te/ bya ba'i rgyun bcad pa ni ma yin
455a5(dkon brtsegs): no| |smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ji ltar nyan thos yin/ /smras pa/ chos ma thos pa mnyan pa sems can thams cad thos par byed de/ des na kho bo ni nyan thos yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam
455a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod ji ltar rang sangs rgyas yin/ smras pa/ kho bos chos thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar rtogs te/ des na kho bo rang sangs rgyas yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ji
455a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/ smras pa/ kho bos chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par khong du chud de/ des na kho bo yang dag par
455b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'am/ 'on te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa'am/ sa gang la nges pa yin
455b2(dkon brtsegs): par gzung bar bya/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ kho bo ni sa thams cad la nges pa yin par gzung zhig/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod so so'i skye bo'i sa la yang nges par gzung bar bya'am/
455b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa'o/ /nges pa der sems can thams cad kyang
455b4(dkon brtsegs): nges pa ste/ kho bo yang nges par der nges pa nyid do/ /des na kho bo so so'i skye bo sa la yang nges par gzung bar bya'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gal te chos thams cad yang dag pa nyid du
455b5(dkon brtsegs): nges par nges pa yin nam/ 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i sa'o/ /'di ni nyan thos kyi sa'o/ /'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/ /zhes
455b6(dkon brtsegs): sa rnam par bzhag pa gdags par ga la 'gyur/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' la 'di ni shar phyogs kyi nam mkha'o/ /'di ni
455b7(dkon brtsegs): lho phyogs kyi'o/ /'di ni nub phyogs kyi'o/ /'di ni byang phyogs kyi'o/ /'di ni shar lho'i 'o/ /'di ni lho nub kyi'o/ /'di ni nub byang gi'o/ /'di ni byang shar gyi'o/ /'di ni 'og gi'o/ /'di ni
456a1(dkon brtsegs): steng gi phyogs kyi nam mkha'o/ /zhes brjod kyang phyogs cha la tha dad pa yod kyi/ nam mkha' la ni tha dad pa med do/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin du chos thams
456a2(dkon brtsegs): cad yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la thabs mkhas pas 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i sa'o/ /'di ni nyan thos kyi sa'o/ /'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/ /'di ni byang
456a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i sa'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/ /zhes sa rnam par 'jog kyang / sa rnam par bzhag pa la tha dad pa yod kyi/ /yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la ni tha dad pa med do/ /smras pa/
456a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la zhugs sam/ smras pa/ zhugs pa yang yin la/ byung ba yang yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na khyod zhugs pa yang yin la/ byung ba yang
456a5(dkon brtsegs): yin| smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes blta bar bya ste/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di ni skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig bshad pa'i
456a6(dkon brtsegs): don dpes shes par 'gyur ba yod de/ de'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'phong gi slob dpon chen po zhig la sdug pa/ mdzes pa yid du
456a7(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba/ blta na sdug pa'i bu gcig pa zhig kyang yod/ de la mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba phyir rgol ba zhig kyang yod pa las/ des bu gcig pa de thag ring po lam gol ba'i phyogs shig na 'dug
456b1(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du de ni bdag la phyir rgol ba yin no snyam du sems skyes te/ des de gsad pa'i phyir mda' 'phangs nas 'phangs ma thag tu bu gcig pa yin pa'i 'du shes skyes
456b2(dkon brtsegs): te| de sngon goms par byas pas shin tu brgyugs te mda' de bu gcig pa'i lus la ma phog pa nyid du lag gis 'dzin pa 'di ni don rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir dper byas pa'o/ /'di
456b3(dkon brtsegs): la don du lta ba gang zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'phong gi slob dpon zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ bu gcig pa zhes bya ba ni sems
456b4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' bu gcig pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog pa yin no/ /gsod pa phyir rgol ba zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /
456b5(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa rab 'byor/ mda' zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po'i tshig bla dwags so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'phong gi slob dpon gyis mda'
456b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phangs la bu gcig pa'i lus la ma phog par shin tu brgyugs te 'dzin pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs bskyed
456b7(dkon brtsegs): pas 'du byed thams cad skye ba med par so sor rtog go / yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la rnam par bltas nas snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs bskyed pas yang dag pa'i
457a1(dkon brtsegs): mtha' mngon sum du byed kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi gnas kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang 'jud de/ /
457a2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi yul yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'jig rten na yang spyod la/'jig
457a3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi chos rnams kyis kyang mi gos shing / 'jig rten na yang snang la chos thams cad la snang ba med pas rab tu phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yul lo/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/
457a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa thams cad la yang snang la/ sa ngan pa la yang mi gnas pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sems can thams
457a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang pa'i phyir yang brtson la/ chos kyi dbyings zad par ni yang dag par rjes su mi lta ba dang / btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'dus byas las
457a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang bskyod la/ 'dus ma byas kyang yang dag par ma rnyed pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khor ba la skyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang du yang 'du shes
457a7(dkon brtsegs): la| mya ngan las 'das pa yang don du mi gnyer zhing bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdag med pa'i bzod pa yang thob la/
457b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i rang bzhin du yang shes
457b2(dkon brtsegs): la| sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la yang brtson pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par
457b3(dkon brtsegs): yang mthong la/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyan gyi phyir brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yul lo/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang
457b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o/ /smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi chos yongs su shes
457b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan yang 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da'
457b6(dkon brtsegs): ba la brtsams te spobs par gyis shig / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da'/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'jig rten zhes bya
457b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ni phung po lnga'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o/ /de la gzugs ni dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'o/
458a1(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o/ /'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni chu shing lta bu'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /dbu ba
458a2(dkon brtsegs): dang | chu'i chu bur dang / smig rgyu dang / chu shing dang / sgyu ma gang yin pa de la 'jig rten yang med/ 'jig rten du gdags pa yang med/ /phung po rnams kyang med/ phung por
458a3(dkon brtsegs): gdags pa yang med par gang phung po'i rang bzhin la de ltar mos pa de ni yang dag par bzhugs pa'o/ /gang yang dag par zhugs pa de 'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa'o/ /
458a4(dkon brtsegs): gang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa de 'jig rten gyi chos rnams las yang dag par 'da'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang rang
458a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis stong pa de la gnyis su med do/ /gang gnyis su med pa de la ngar 'dzin pa med/ nga yir 'dzin pa med do/ /gang la ngar 'dzin pa med pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa med pa de
458a6(dkon brtsegs): la chags pa med de/ chags pa med pa rnyed pa de ni 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da' 'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rkyen la rag lus pa'o/ /gang dag rkyen
458a7(dkon brtsegs): la rag lus pa de dag rag lus pa med pa'o/ /gang dag rag lus pa med pa de dag bdag po med pa'o/ /gang bdag po med pa de dag bdag gi ba med pa'o/ /gang dag bdag gi
458b1(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa de dag yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o/ /gang dag yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de la 'thab pa med pa'o/ /gang la 'thab pa med pa de la rtsod pa med do/ /gang la rtsod pa med pa de dag
458b2(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong gi chos rtsod pa med pa'o/ /gang dag dge sbyong gi chos mi rtsod pa de dag nam mkha' la lag pa dang mtshungs te/ chos thams cad kyang nam mkha' la lag pa dang mtshungs par shes
458b3(dkon brtsegs): nas 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ gzhan yang phung po lnga ni chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang dbyings med pa ste/ gang khams
458b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa de la mig gi khams med do/ /gzugs kyi khams med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /rna ba'i khams med do/ /sgra'i khams med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par
458b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i khams med do/ /sna'i khams med do/ /dri'i khams med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /lce'i khams med do/ /ro'i khams med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes
458b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams med do/ /lus kyi khams med do/ /reg bya'i khams med do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /yid kyi khams med do/ /chos kyi khams med do/ /yid kyi
458b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /gang khams med pa de la sa'i khams med do/ /chu'i khams med do/ /me'i khams med do/ /rlung gi khams med do/ /nam mkha'i khams med
459a1(dkon brtsegs): do| |rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /'dod pa'i khams med do/ /gzugs kyi khams med do/ /gzugs med pa'i khams med do/ /'dus byas
459a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams med do/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams med do/ /gang khams med pa de la bdag med/ sems can med/ /srog med/ gso ba med/ gang zag med/ shed las skyes pa med/
459a3(dkon brtsegs): shed bu med do/ /gang gis de dag rjes su rtogs pa'i tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa de 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da'o/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor de nas dge slong
459a4(dkon brtsegs): stong nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de dag sems rnam par grol nas rang rang gi bla gos kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bkab
459a5(dkon brtsegs): ste| tshig 'di skad du gang dag chos zab mo bstan pa 'di la mos pa med pa'i sems can de dag ni thob pa yang med/ mngon par rtogs pa yang med do zhes 'dzer to/ /de nas tshe dang
459a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag gis ci zhig thob cing ci zhig mngon par rtogs/ dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces smras
459a7(dkon brtsegs): so| |btsun pa rab 'byor/ dge sbyong ni thob pa med pa mngon par rtogs pa med pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thob pa zhes bya ba de ni g.yo ba nyid do/ /mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba de ni
459b1(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems nyid do/ /g.yo ba dang rlom sems gang yin pa de ni bdud kyi las so/ /lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag ni bdag gis thob bo/ /bdag gis mngon par rtogs so zhes 'di lta
459b2(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di dag gi tshul du rnam par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams shes sam/ smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mkhyen pa dang ldan pas
459b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen te/ bdag cag ni ji ltar sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid mi shes par bdag gis sdug bsngal yongs su shes so zhes smra ba/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya zhes kun 'byung ba'i
459b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lam gyi mtshan nyid mi shes par bdag gi lam bsgoms so zhes smra ba/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o snyam mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
459b5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid dang / kun 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lam gyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid de/ skye ba med pa'i mtshan
459b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /mtshan nyid med pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'o/ /chos thams cad kyang rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid de/ de la ni gang sdug bsngal yongs
459b7(dkon brtsegs): su shes so/ /gang kun 'byung ba spong ngo / /gang 'gog pa mngon du byed do/ /gang lam bsgom mo zhes bya ba gang yang mi dmigs te/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'di thos nas skrag pa
460a1(dkon brtsegs): de lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin par rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ gnas brtan rab
460a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ dge slong 'di dag gis ji skad bstan pa de de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor/ dge slong 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi gsung rab la
460a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid las zab mo'i chos bstan pa 'di lta bu thos te/ chos zab mo mnyam pa de nyid kyis rgyus 'di ltar mngon par shes pa myur bar gyur to/ /zab
460a4(dkon brtsegs): mo'i chos bstan pa 'di la yang rjes su mthun par gyur te/ mi mthun pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams ma gtogs
460a5(dkon brtsegs): p ar gang dag nga'i gsung rab 'di la chos zab mo bstan pa 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang lhag par mos pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la
460a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa gsum gyi grangs su gtogs par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni bzod pa gang yang rung ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de
460a7(dkon brtsegs): nas lha'i bu dpal bzang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod rgyun du 'dzam bu'i gling na chos ston tam/ 'jam dpal/ dga'
460b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan gyi gnas su bzhud do/ /der dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams la chos bstan du gsol/ de la lha'i bu sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yod de/ de
460b2(dkon brtsegs): dag yul phun sum tshogs pas bag med pa'i dbang gis bcom ldan 'das dang / khyod la chos nyan du mi 'ong bas na/ de dag chos mi nyan pas yongs su nyams par gyur te/ de dag
460b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod las chos thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe gang gis lha'i bu dpal bzang dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i
460b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de dag dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa dang / nyams dga' ba'i kun dga'i ra ba dang / nyams dga' ba'i tshal dang / nyams dga' ba'i rdzing
460b5(dkon brtsegs): dang | nyams dga' ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / rim pa bdun dang / brgyad dang / bcu dang / nyi shu pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ bsil khang dang / ba gam dang / stegs bu dang / rta babs
460b6(dkon brtsegs): dang | skar khung dang ldan pa de dag kyang snang ba dang / lha'i bu mo rkang lag 'jam zhing mnyen pa gser gyi dra ba ltar 'od rnam par dag pa/ smin ma legs pa/ dpral ba legs pa/ bzhin
460b7(dkon brtsegs): legs pa/ mig pad+ma 'dab ma brgya pa sngon po lta bur mdzes shing dri ma med pa shin tu yangs pa 'dod pa'i sems bskyed pa/ zla ba tshes pa ltar mngon par dga' ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa
461a1(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa/ de dag rgyud gcig pa dang / pi wang dang / sgra snyan dang / 'khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg rdob pa dang / rnga zlum dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga mnyam
461a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gling bu dang / glu dbyangs dang / rol mo'i sgra dbyangs dang / gar dang / bzhad gad dang / 'jo ba dang / sgeg pa dang / rtse bas rgyags shing dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang dga' mgur
461a3(dkon brtsegs): spyong pa dag kyang snang ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas so/ /de 'dra ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas lha'i bu dpal bzang gis/ rang gi
461a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa yang mthong / rang gi g.yog 'khor rnams kyang mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad
461a5(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ bdag cag 'di ltar myur du dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin te/ nyams dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba 'di dag dang zhes bya ba nas/ dga' ba dang / rtse
461a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dga' mgur spyod pa dang / bdag gi rang gi gnas 'di dang / rang gi g.yog ces bya ba'i bar du sbyar te 'di dag snang ba ngo mtshar to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
461a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis lha'i bu dpal bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu khyod ni 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di nas gang du yang ma g.yos la/ dga' ldan gyi gnas su yang ma phyin te/ lha'i
461b1(dkon brtsegs): bu| 'on kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di dag dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa dang / lha'i bu/ kho bo cag kyang dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par
461b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid kyis shes pa de ni/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
461b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu dpal bzang gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi
461b4(dkon brtsegs): stobs 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ 'di ltar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis phyogs 'di nas gang du yang ma g.yos par 'di snyam du bdag cag dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin
461b5(dkon brtsegs): to snyam pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig ngas shes pa las khyed
461b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis ji tsam zhig shes te/ lha'i bu/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad zhing
461b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu yang dag par ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag yod pa de dag gtsug phud kyis phug ste/ steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'jog go /sangs rgyas
462a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing de dag na/ rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ba'i chu'i phung po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad spu'i khung bu gcig tu blugs kyang chu yis sems can
462a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la gnod pa med de/ thams cad kyang rang rang gi rgya mtsho chen po na gnas par bdag nyid kyis shes so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na ri'i rgyal po ri rab gang dag yod pa de
462a3(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad ri gcig tu byin gyis brlabs te/ ri de dag yungs kar gyi 'bru'i nang du bcug kyang ri rab la gnas pa'i lha de dag la yang gnod pa med de/ thams cad kyang rang
462a4(dkon brtsegs): rang gi gnas na 'khod par bdag nyid kyis shes so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil
462a5(dkon brtsegs): du bzhag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde bar sbyar ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu dag de dag la bsgrub bo/ /gang yang sangs rgyas

462b1(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul las brtsams nas nga bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang chos ston te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
462b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di lta bu dang ldan no// //bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/ de nas bdud sdig can 'khor de nyid du 'dus
462b3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur nas 'dug ste/ des bdag nyid dge slong gi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
462b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul de bdag gis blta bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshig tsam du gsungs pas ci sman gyi/ bdag la mngon sum du gyur cig /de nas
462b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can du mkhyen bzhin du sems can tshad med pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
462b6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal/ ngas khyod la bskul gyi/ khyod kyis 'khor 'di dag la rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang cho 'phrul ston cig dang / sems can tshad med pa rnams kyi dge ba'i
462b7(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar shes nas/ chos thams cad sems kyis dbang bsgyur ba rnam par 'phrul
463a1(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos thams cad sems kyis dbang bsgyur ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting
463a2(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos 'phrul bcom
463a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du ma chad pa dang / ma lhag pa dang / mi mang bar mthong ngo / /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis cho 'phrul de mthong nas ngo mtshar
463a4(dkon brtsegs): du gyur te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba legs so/ /legs so/ /sangs rgyas byung ba ni sems can rnams la don chen por nye bar gnas so/ /de byung bas skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu 'di
463a5(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang 'jig rten du byung ba yin no/ /cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di yang 'jig rten na snang ba yin no/ /zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis cho

463b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ gal te bdud sdig can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur kyang de ltar mos pa'i sems can de la bar chad bgyi ba'i rngo mi thogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig can bdag
463b2(dkon brtsegs): ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa la glags lta zhing skabs tshol ba dang / sems can rnams la yang gtse bar sems pa dang / brtson pa'i gang zag rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa
463b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar chad bgyi ba'i slad du yang zhugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ deng slan chad grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor
463b4(dkon brtsegs): g ang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa de khor khor yug tu dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du mig gis mi rtsol bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag mi mchi bar bdag gi yi dam de lta bu blangs

464a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ chos smra ba gang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams kyi kun du gsungs pa de la bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bar chad bgyi ba ni gnas ma lags shing skabs ma

467a3(dkon brtsegs): rung bas yongs su dag pa dang / kha zas bsnyungs te lus 'tsho bas yongs su dag pa dang / dmigs pa la 'jog pas yongs su dag pa dang / sgra dang mtshan ma thams cad rnam
467a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'jigs pas yongs su dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang zang zing med par so sor yang dag par 'ged pas yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag /de ltar rnam pa brgyad
467a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis bsam gtan yongs su dag go / grogs po dag/ /de la rnam pa brgyad kyis shes rab yongs su dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po la mkhas pa'i rnam pas
467a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa dang / khams la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la
467a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / bden pa la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / dbang po la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par thar
467b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sgo gsum la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / bag la nyal dang kun nas dkris pa dang blta ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su
467b2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ste/ grogs po dag /de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis shes rab yongs su dag go /grogs po dag /de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis mngon par shes pa yongs su dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe
467b3(dkon brtsegs): na| 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa med par gzugs thams cad mthong bas lha'i mig yongs su dag pa dang / sgrib pa med par sgra thams cad thos pas lha'i rna ba yongs su dag pa dang / sems can thams
467b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta bas pha rol gyi sems shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sgrib pa med cing chags pa med par sngon gyi mtha' rjes su dran pas sngon gyi gnas rjes su
467b5(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro bas rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba yongs su dag pa dang / zag pa thams cad zad pa shes pas bsal cing dus ma yin
467b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su spangs pas zag pa zad pa yongs su dag pa dang / g.yo ba dang rlom sems thams cad dang bral bas dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / ji ltar sngon dam
467b7(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pas bshes pa brten pa yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag /de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis mngon par shes pa yongs su dag go /grogs po dag/ de
468a1(dkon brtsegs): la rnam pa brgyad kyis ye shes yongs su dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga yongs su shes pas sdug bsngal shes pa yongs su dag pa
468a2(dkon brtsegs): dang | sred pa shin tu spong bas kun 'byung ba shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / rten nas skyes pa la skye ba med par so sor rtog pas 'gog pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / 'dus byas dang
468a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pas lam shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / las dang bya ba dang mi 'gal bas rgyu shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / bdag med pa dang sems can med pa
468a4(dkon brtsegs): dang | srog med pa dang / gso ba med pas rkyen shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / 'khor gsum yongs su gcod pas dus gsum shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ye
468a5(dkon brtsegs): shes thams cad la 'jug pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag /de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis ye shes yongs su dag go /grogs po dag /de la rnam pa brgyad
468a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis nges par sems pa yongs su dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang nye bar zhi bas yongs su dag pa dang / phyi rol du mi rgyu bas yongs su dag pa dang / khams gsum la
468a7(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas pas yongs su dag pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang mthun pas yongs su dag pa dang / skye ba med pa dang 'byung ba med pas yongs su dag pa dang / mngon
468b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'du byed pa med pas so sor rtog pas yongs su dag pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med par so sor rtog pas yongs su dag pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis shin tu mi
468b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pas yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag /'di ni rnam pa brgyad kyis nges par sems pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /grogs po dag /de la rnam pa brgyad kyis bag yod pa yongs su
468b3(dkon brtsegs): dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa med pas yongs su dag pa dang / thos pa yongs su byang bas yongs su dag pa dang / bsam gtan de
468b4(dkon brtsegs): la ma chags pas yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab dang gsung rab kyis yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa las ma nyams pas yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes kyi rlom sems
468b5(dkon brtsegs): med pas yongs su dag pa dang / nges par sems pas rtsod pa med pas yongs su dag pa dang / dge ba'i chos chud mi za bas yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag /rnam pa brgyad po de
468b6(dkon brtsegs): dag gis bag yod pa yongs su dag go / grogs po dag /de lta bas na khyed bag yod par gyis shig /bag yod pa la brten pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bde ba gsum las
468b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i bde ba dang / bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba'o/ /ngan song gsum las yongs
469a1(dkon brtsegs): su thar bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang gsum
469a2(dkon brtsegs): po de dag go / sdug bsngal gsum gyis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang / rga ba'i sdug bsngal dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal te gsum po
469a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag go / 'jigs pa gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa med pa'i 'jigs pa dang / 'khor
469a4(dkon brtsegs): ba la bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa ste gsum po de dag go / srid pa gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i srid pa dang / gzugs kyi srid pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
469a5(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'o/ /dri ma gsum sbyongs te/ 'dod chags kyi dri ma dang / zhe sdang gi dri ma dang / gti mug gi dri ma'o/ /bslab pa gsum yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ lhag pa'i tshul khrims
469a6(dkon brtsegs): dang | lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab bo/ /yongs su dag pa gsum 'thob par 'gyur te/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su
469a7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'o/ /bsod nams bya ba las byung ba'i dngos po gsum po yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ sbyin pa las byung ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'o/ /
469b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom par byed de/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /rigs gsum rgyun mi gcod de/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / chos kyi rigs
469b2(dkon brtsegs): dang | dge 'dun gyi rigs so/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs gsum gsum rab tu spong ste/ ser sna'i dri ma dang / ser sna'i kun du sbyor ba dang / gtong ba dang ldan pa
469b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la sdang ba dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims las bzlog pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / gnod sems dang / bzod pa las bzlog pa dang /
469b4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / le lo dang / brtson 'grus las bzlog pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / bsam gtan las
469b5(dkon brtsegs): bzlog pa dang / bsam gtan dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab dang / shes rab las bzlog pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba'o/ /pha rol tu phyin
469b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi rton pa gsum gsum gyis nye bar rton te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / rnam par smin pa la mi reg pa dang / byang chub tu yongs
469b7(dkon brtsegs): su bsngo ba dang / tshul khrims yang dag par len pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / bzod cing des pa dang / bdag dang gzhan rjes
470a1(dkon brtsegs): su bsrungs pa dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / brtson 'grus gces pa mi 'dor ba dang / blang ba med cing dor ba med pa dang / byang chub tu yongs
470a2(dkon brtsegs): su bsngo ba dang / bsam gtan nye bar len pa dang / mi gnas par bsam gtan byed pa dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / shes rab kyi snang ba dang / spros pa med pa
470a3(dkon brtsegs): dang | byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ste/ grogs po dag /bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rton pa 'di gsum gyis nye bar rton te/ /
470a4(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dag /de lta bas na khyod cag bag yod par gyis shig /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub dang / de las gzhan pa'i dge ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang yang
470a5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dag kyang bag yod pas thob bo/ /grogs po dag /bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshegs chung dus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
470a6(dkon brtsegs): te| dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang la lus kyi gnas med pa dang / tshor ba'i gnas med pa dang / sems kyi gnas med pa dang / chos kyi gnas med pa
470a7(dkon brtsegs): ste| chos thams cad kyi gnas med cing rten med pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa zhes bya'o/ /tshegs chung dus yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par
470b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / gzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma 'thon pa dang /
470b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par ma grub par yang so sor rtog cing / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu
470b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin te/ yang dag par rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad las kyi rnam par smin pa med par yang so sor rtog cing sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mi
470b4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing 'bad la/ brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa
470b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams spang pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing 'bad la/ brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / chos thams cad la stong pa nyid du yang mos la/ dge ba'i
470b6(dkon brtsegs): chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing 'bad la/ brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par grol bar yang
470b7(dkon brtsegs): yid ches la/ dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas par bya ba dang / nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya ba dang / phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing 'bad la/ brtson 'grus rtsom
471a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te yang dag par rab tu 'jog la/ chos thams cad la rtsom pa med cing rtul ba med par yang mthong ste/ yang mnyam pa nyid gang
471a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de la chos gang gi skye ba yang med/ 'gog pa yang med pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i spong ba bsgom pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul
471a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang lus dang sems las su rung ba ste/ de sems las su rung bas dge ba'i chos las 'dun pa yang mi 'dor la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spang
471a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir yang mngon par brtson pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la brtags nas kyang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa dang / sangs
471a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems kyang mi 'dor ro/ /sems sgyu ma lta bur yang rab tu shes pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i
471a6(dkon brtsegs): chos la tshul bzhin du yang spyod la/ chos rnams la gnas par yang mi byed cing mngon par zhen pa yang med pa'o/ /de dbang po lnga bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dbang
471a7(dkon brtsegs): po drug la brten par mi byed cing / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir shes pa yang gtod la gcig tu gnas pa yang thob par 'gyur zhing / gzhan gyi
471b1(dkon brtsegs): dad pas kyang mi 'gro ba dang / thams cad kyang yongs su thob la/ blangs pa yang med cing dor ba yang med pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam la yang rmongs pa med la/ dran pa yang med cing
471b2(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa yang med pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rjes su yang song la/ rtag tu mnyam par yang gzhag par gyur cing / chos thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid la snyoms par zhugs
471b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rab rib med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang thob par gyur la/ spros pa dang lta ba yang yang dag par chad pa 'di ni de'i dbang po bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /de stobs lnga bsgom
471b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dad pa'i stobs dang ldan pas phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis bdud thams cad kyi thub par dka' ba dang / dran pa'i
471b5(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad du mi 'phrogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis sgrib pa rnams kyis zil gyis mi gnon pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pas lta
471b6(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen pa med pa ste/ de ltar stobs lnga bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ byang
471b7(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad mi brjed par bya ba'i phyir dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang
472a1(dkon brtsegs): mthun par bya ba'i phyir chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / byang chub kyi lam las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir brtson
472a2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / zang zing med pa'i chos la dga' ba rab tu myong bar bya ba'i phyir dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / lus
472a3(dkon brtsegs): dang sems mi g.yo ba dang bral ba'i phyir shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas mngon par
472a4(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / mtho dma' med pa'i btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub kyi yan
472a5(dkon brtsegs): lag bsgom pa zhes bya'o/ /grogs po dag /bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshegs chung dus 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/
472a6(dkon brtsegs): lam bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang 'di rtag pa dang chad pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i lta ba bsgom pa dang / 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral
472a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa bsgom pa dang / bdag dang gzhan la gtong ba med pa'i yang dag pa'i ngag bsgom pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / gzhogs slong dang / thob kyis
472b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jal ba dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba bsgom pa dang / lus dang sems nyam chung ba dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' bsgom pa dang / bdag la bstod pa dang gzhan la
472b2(dkon brtsegs): smod pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i rtsol ba bsgom pa dang / gti mug dang rmongs pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i dran pa bsgom pa dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral
472b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ste/ 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub dang / de
472b4(dkon brtsegs): las gzhan pa'i dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa dag kyang bag yod pas thob ces bya'o/ /grogs po dag /de ltar na bag yod pa byang chub sems dpa' de ltar byang chub kyi
472b5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag la 'jug go / zhugs nas 'du byed thams cad kyi 'dams brgal te/ /brgal nas kyang rnam par lta ste/ rnam par bltas nas mi mthong ngo / /mi
472b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ro/ /shin tu nye bar zhi ste/ rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed do/ /shin tu nye bar zhi ba gang yin zhe na/ gang nye bar ma bsgrubs pa des ma byas so/ /gang ma byas pa de myong ba med pa'o/ /gang
472b7(dkon brtsegs): myong ba med pa de la gdags pa med do/ /gang gdags pa med pa de ni shin tu nye bar zhi ba'o/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang
473a1(dkon brtsegs): bral ba rnam par dag go / lha'i bu dpal bzang gis gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems
473a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' lam ji ltar bsgom/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor ba yang mi spong la/ 'khor ba'i nyes pa rnams kyis kyang mi gos so/ /'dus ma byas su yang mi ltung la/ 'dus
473a3(dkon brtsegs): ma byas kyi yon tan rnams kyang myong ngo / /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam yang bsgom la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang snang ngo / /lha'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
473a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi lam ni stong pa nyid kyis rnam par dag pa yang yin la/ lta bar gyur pa la yang mkhas shing / lta bar gyur pa la mngon par zhen pa yang med do/ /mtshan ma med pas rnam par dag par
473a5(dkon brtsegs): yang yin la/ mtshan ma la yang mkhas shing / mtshan ma la mngon par zhen pa yang med do/ /smon pa med pas rnam par dag pa yang yin la/ khams gsum pa la yang mkhas shing /
473a6(dkon brtsegs): khams gsum pa la mngon par zhen pa yang med do/ /skye ba med pa dang 'byung ba med pas rnam par dag pa yang yin la/ skye ba dang 'jig pa la yang mkhas shing / skye ba dang 'jig pa
473a7(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par zhen pa yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems nges par sems pa de dag rnams ni sems can chos thams cad stong pa'o snyam pa'i lta bar gyur
473b1(dkon brtsegs): bar zhugs pa lta bar gyur pa bag la nyal bar byas pa rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa spang pa'i phyir chos kyang ston la/ lta bar gyur pa de dag kyang stong pa nyid du mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub
473b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems nges par sems pa ni mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / byung ba med pa'i chos thams cad la 'byung
473b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang 'jig pa'i rjes su mthun par 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa bag la nyal ba byas pa rnams kyi 'byung ba dang / 'jig par lta ba spang pa'i phyir chos kyang ston la/ 'byung ba dang 'jig pa de yang
473b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dang 'jig pa med pa nyid du mthong ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bsgom pa zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni 'gro ba dang
473b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni sems can gyi bsam pa rnams la'o/ /'ong ba ni so so ci rigs par chos ston pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro
473b6(dkon brtsegs): ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro/ /'ong ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can gyi nang du skye ba'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni 'phags pa'i lam du'o/ /'ong ba ni
473b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /'gro ba ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /'ong ba ni bzod pa de sems can gyi khong du chud
